Jobtitle: Service Delivery Director / IT Solution Director/ผู้อำนวยการฝ่ายไอที
column8: Responsibilities MIS and Network Infrastructure Management: Oversee the management of Management Information Systems (MIS) and network infrastructure. Collaborate with Application Owners and Process Owners to understand business requirements and ensure alignment with technology strategies. Evaluate vendor proposals to determine application, infrastructure, budget, and resource requirements for proposed projects. Project Management: Plan and develop project specifications, schedules, tasks, and other project-related documentation. Assist in the design, implementation, development, and deployment of IT projects. Ensure projects are delivered on time and within budget. Disaster Recovery and Contingency Planning: Develop and maintain disaster recovery and contingency plans for systems. Implement and periodically test disaster recovery procedures. Technology Operations: Oversee all technology operations, including network security, and evaluate them according to established goals. Identify and address potential risks to ensure the security and integrity of the company's data and technology infrastructure. Policy and Strategy Implementation: Devise and establish IT policies and systems to support the implementation of strategies set by upper management. Collaborate with senior management to align technology initiatives with overall business objectives. Business Analysis and Technology Needs: Analyse the business requirements of all departments to determine their technology needs. Identify opportunities for technology innovation and improvement to enhance business processes. Equipment and Software Procurement and Development: Purchase efficient and cost-effective technological equipment and software. Manage vendor relationships and negotiations to ensure optimal value for the organization. Experience in software development and technologies. Technology Inspection and Upgrades: Inspect the use of technological equipment and software to ensure functionality and efficiency. Identify the need for upgrades, configurations, or new systems and report findings to upper management. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field; Master's degree preferred. Proven experience in managing MIS and network infrastructure. Strong background in software development and project management. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Knowledge of technology trends and best practices. Strong leadership and communication skills. English language is a requirement.

Jobtitle: Assistant Manager - Digital for Commercial , Chemicals Business
Company: The Siam Cement Public Company Limited (SCG)
column8: Responsibilities: Creating and maintaining databases, and developing and implementing data-driven strategies to improve business performance. Creating reports, dashboards and visualizations to communicate insights Collaborating with different teams across the organization to identify areas for data-driven improvements Identifying and recommending new data sources and tools to enhance the company’s data analysis capabilities Conducting scenario testing, statistical analysis, and other data analysis techniques to support decision-making and problem-solving. Qualifications: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Polymer Science, Chemical Engineering, Business Administration or related fields Achieved a minimum GPA of 2.7 for Undergraduate and 3.3 for Post-graduate studies Good communication in both spoken and written English (required TOEIC at least 550) Having at least 2 years of experience in the petrochemical and refinery industry is a plus Having experience in business management background with data management knowledge is preferred Strong interpersonal communication, persuasion, and creative problem-solving skills

Jobtitle: Data Analysis and Data Warehouse (Assistant Manager - Manager Level)
column8: Data Analysis - Corporate Planning Job Responsibilities: Design and develop data visualizations, dashboards to help the business user better comprehend their data and make critical decisions. Describe the meaning of data and outline critical information or conclusion to provide the key information to management and relevant teams. Estimates costs and benefits of alternative actions such as sales campaign, incentive schema, delinquency analysis, or other solutions to establish their viability/return on investment. Design analysis report to track and monitor performance and validate Accuracy of Data. Produce Daily, Weekly, Monthly business reports with an alert system. Data Warehouse - Corporate Planning Job Responsibilities: Responsible for database design, implementation, configuration, SQL tuning/optimization, SQL commands, maintenance, and deployments of all databases in the staging and production environments. Ensure the database system efficiency, monitoring, and interface with other related systems. Set and Maintain Database Standards. Diagnose and Troubleshoot Database errors. Qualifications: Bachelor degree in Computer Engineer, Computer Science and related field At least 4 years experience (Senior level) in business performance analysis, data analysis, data warehouse Experience in Hire-Purchase or Financial service would be an advantage. Be able to data query/manipulation using SQL and data visualization using tools SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL. Be able to communicate in English (spoken and written).

Dusit International, a renowned leader in the hospitality industry, is seeking a dynamic and skilled Data Analytics Specialist to join our team. This role is pivotal in supporting our innovative Dusit Data Platform, contributing to the enhancement of our business intelligence capabilities. Key Responsibilities: Collaborative Role in Business Requirements Analysis: Engage with stakeholders to effectively understand and translate business needs for the Dusit Data Platform Project Leadership in Data Analytics: Spearhead the implementation and rollout of data analytic initiatives across Dusit entities, showcasing leadership and project management skills Customized Reporting and Dashboard Design: Craft and validate tailored reports and dashboards, meeting specific business requirements and enhancing decision-making processes Support and Optimization of Data Platform: Offer continuous support to Dusit Data Platform users, focusing on optimal performance and user-friendly experiences. Problem-Solving and Process Improvement: Proactively identify, address, and resolve gaps and issues in data processes, demonstrating strong problem-solving abilities. Advanced Reporting and Data Management Skills: Develop advanced reports using Power BI Report Builder, and enhance Power BI Dashboard, while mastering MS SQL Server, Azure Synapse, and Power BI dataset management.. Qualifications: 3-5 years of experience in Business Intelligence development and support. Minimum 2-3 years of hands-on experience in full-cycle implementation of Power BI projects, including Power BI Report Builder and Power BI Dashboard. Strong understanding of data warehouse concepts and practical experience in this area. Proficiency in designing operation reports and management dashboards. Solid knowledge of data analytics principles and practices. Experience in the hospitality industry is advantageous but not essential. Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Data Analytics, or related field preferred. What We Offer: A dynamic and inclusive work environment. Opportunities for professional growth and development. Competitive salary and benefits package Dusit International is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace.

Drive strategic initiatives at regional level by working closely with local markets and various business functions to deliver business impact in growth, profitability, and efficiency Work closely with local markets to identify opportunities and gaps, review problem statements, and generate useful solutions on regional strategic initiatives Conduct data analysis and competitor benchmarking, take a hypothesis-driven approach to address business challenge, identify new growth opportunities and initiate the project with structured business case Project management responsibilities including supporting teams in driving initiatives on a regional level Requirements: 0-2 years (Associate) and 3 - 5 years (Senior Associate) of experience working Previous experience management consulting or e-commerce industry would be preferred Strong business acumen, critical thinking and ability to form actionable insights and recommendation using analytic skills Strong project management, stakeholder management and communication skills Team player, humble, organized and results driven Able to work in fast-paced and dynamic environment

Jobtitle: Data Analyst (ใช้โปรแกรม Excel)/Data Analyst (ใช้โปรแกรม Excel)
column8: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ กำหนด Data Sources เพื่อใช้ในการวิเคราะห์ข้อมูล รวบรวมข้อมูลที่จะใช้ในการวิเคราะห์ การจัดหาข้อมูลที่ขาดหายไป กำหนด ตั้งค่า โครงสร้างพื้นฐาน สร้าง Insight จากข้อมูล และระบุแนวโน้มที่เกิดขึ้นได้ สร้าง รายงาน สร้าง Dashboard/Automated Dashboard สำหรับผู้บริหารและทีมงาน สร้าง Data Visualization จากข้อมูลได้ มีความเข้าใจในธุรกิจ และวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลเพื่อตอบโจทย์ในทางธุรกิจได้ คุณสมบัติ อายุ 26-35 ปีขึ้นไป ปริญญาตรีหรือเทียบเท่าทางด้าน Data Analytics หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง ประสบการณ์ด้าน Data Analytics 5 ปีขึ้นไป ทักษะด้านคณิตศาสตร์และตัวเลขในระดับดี เข้าใจเรื่องสถิติ มีประสบการ์ณในการสรุปผล เช่น Excel,Power BI เข้าใจฐานข้อมูล เช่น SQL Server,Oracle และ SAP เข้าใจเรื่องสคริปต์และเว็บไซต์ เช่น Json,xml,java,script,html5 เข้าใจกระบวนการ ETL และการใช้เครื่องมืออย่าง SSIS,Power Quey สามารถใช้งานเครื่องมือในการสร้างรายงาน สร้าง Dashboard เช่น Power BI,Looker Studio,Tableau,Qlik เข้าใจเครื่องมือการตลาดดิจิทอล เช่น Google Analytics,Google Tag Manager ทักษะการวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลเชิงลึก เช่น การสรุปผล การดูแนวโน้ม ดู Pattern ข้อมูล เป็นต้น

Are you an experienced professional who is enthusiastic about leveraging technology, agile principles to drive high impact products within organizations? If so, Pandora is embarking on an exciting digital manufacturing journey to create a new strong digital backbone for the biggest jewellery brand in the world. The digital manufacturing transformation will go on for multiple years and is foundational for the delivery of our Phoenix strategy. The programme is a fantastic opportunity to develop your career, build new capabilities and contribute to the future growth of Pandora. We are embracing agile methodology structured around product teams with clear focus on business outcomes. Strong and enthusiastic Product Management is a key component of realizing these ambitions. In this newly created role, you will be part of the team shaping of our product domain to ensure Pandora is leveraging technology at the heart of evolving our manufacturing business and delivering growth. This is a hands-on functional role, with a high degree of collaboration to drive cultural change and raise the maturity levels of the agile delivery practices. Have we sparked your interest? If so, we would love to hear from you! Job Description As a Digital Engineer within Pandora Manufacturing Technology COE team, you will be responsible for design, implement and deliver the functional and technical components of planning, manufacturing solutions using SAP Cloud solutions especially SAP DMCi and SAP cloud solution. You will function as the connector between functional needs and technology ensuring that we are always working on the things that creates value for our business. This also includes delivery of our new Digital Strategy, Crafting & Supply Strategy, and the ambition of creating the SMART factory and Data-driven manufacturing. You will work together with Production, Quality, Maintenance and Supply Chain teams to establish a new agile delivery engine to cross-functionally realize the strategic ambitions. You will focus on driving the analytics agenda for the most critical part of the strategy, i.e., shaping and implementing a new ecosystem for MOM (SAP Digital Manufacturing Cloud - SAP DMC) capabilities across the plants. Your key accountabilities will be to: Design, develop, and deploy cloud-based applications on the SAP BTP platform using SAP Cloud Platform tools and technologies such as SAPUI5, Fiori and JavaScript Business Requirements Analysis and design Mock-ups based on Business Requirements Develop, test, debug, and implement SAP Fiori applications by working closely with functional and testing teams Partner with functional team to understand business requirements and prepare technical design specifications for applications of low to moderate complexity Provide advanced problem-solving and technical support, including on-call support for SAP Fiori Applications Follow established patterns, framework, and procedures to develop and enhance Fiori Applications Develop and maintain SAP BTP extensions and add-ons for existing SAP solutions such as S/4 HANA and custom ERP integration Implement application security using SAP BTP services like SAP Cloud Identity, Sign-On, and OAuth 2.0 Perform unit testing, integration testing, and performance testing to ensure the quality of developed applications Provide technical documentation for developed applications, including design documents, user guides, and troubleshooting guides Advise on best practices in the operating model for the function in your scope of expertise Proactively work with business leaders, process leaders, and working teams to identify technology solutions and integration opportunities to solve business needs especially in analytics area Become industry expert in areas of responsibility, while continuing education and knowledge through self-directed learning, user groups, educational materials, training Explore new SAP applications as a subject matter expert and may be first adopter for emerging SAP technologies What is needed to succeed 5 years of hands-on experience in SAP BTP platform using SAP Cloud Platform tools and technologies such as SAPUI5, Fiori and JavaScript. Good understanding of FIORI concept, system architecture, FIORI Launchpad configuration and app integration Extensive experience in Java Script, XML, JSON, CSS3, HTML and MVC Development framework Experience with SAP API Management and knowledge of API policies (security, proxy etc) Experience knowledge on using various adapters (REST, SOAP, and OData) and Cloud Foundry Multitarget applications (MTA) Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills for design, creation and testing of programs Good understanding of manufacturing operation flows across materials, information and people and manufacturing KPI’s Good understanding of the SAP Activate implementation methodology and agile framework Ability to document business requirements, functional design specification requirements and training materials Ability to conduct business blueprint workshops, configuration, user acceptance testing, end-user training Strong stakeholder management to ensure a holistic perspective gathered and backing for product backlog / priority ensured Advanced client-facing skills, including the ability to analyze complex problems, influence and negotiate with customers Understanding of agile methods and processes, and capability of supporting agile product teams by providing advice and guidance on opportunities, impact, and risks, taking account of technical and architectural debt Business acumen and politically astute, ability to act with diplomacy and sensitivity to cultural diversity Professional SAP certification would be an advantage Combination of strategic and analytical insights with a passion for technology

Project Management: Lead to plan and implement new system or improve the existing system as business requirement (Global system expansion/Regional System enhancement). Gather requirement from user, make plan (job & resource). System design, conduct testing, quality assurance, change over and initial stage control align IT working process. Corporate with user for user testing. Plan and manage vendor for programming. Progress Report to Supervisor or Head of Section Daily operation support: Support user for Q&A (By functional assignment) Support Night Batch (By rotation) Qualifications Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related fields with GPA.>2.50 1-2 Years of experience as System Analyst 1-2 Years of experience as programmer such as JAVA or PHP Have a knowledge of AS/400 would be receiving special consideration. Can communicate in English. Willing to go on business trips when required Able to work night shift or long holiday. Able to work either WFH or office (depend on situation)

Create and streamline project management processes, methodologies, and tools. Generate management reports (Project progress/performance, resource/project utilization, financial information - budget/actual). Plan and schedule resource efficiently. Project admin support (Vendor contract management, vendor payment management, internal/customer meeting arrangement). Support project needs, e.g. play the PM or project coordinator role of customer-facing projects.

NIIT Technologies is now Coforge . Coforge is a global digital services and solutions provider, that leverages emerging technologies and deep domain expertise to deliver real-world business impact for its clients. A focus on very select industries, a detailed understanding of the underlying processes of those industries and partnerships with leading platforms provides us a distinct perspective. Coforge leads with its product engineering approach and leverages Cloud, Data, Integration and Automation technologies to transform client businesses into intelligent, high growth enterprises. Coforge’s proprietary platforms power critical business processes across its core verticals. The firm has a presence in 21 countries with 26 delivery centers across nine countries. We are looking for Data Solution Architect (Application + Data) Working place: Central Ladprao - Hybrid WFH/WFO Preferred Experience: Realtime integration: API (REST, Web service) Web socket, streaming - Batch integration: ETL ELT - Data: Data lake, Data warehouse Database - Unix: Basic command Simple Shell Ccript - Network: TBC Security: Authentication (SAML, OAuth2, API key, Clent ID, Azure AD) Authorization - Architecture: can draw any architecture (System, integration, data) Communication: work as a team, cooperate with other teams Problem solving - Root cause analysis Job Descriptions: Bridge the gap between business problems and technology solutions Works with Product Owner to align the roadmap with strengths and opportunities within the technical stack Find the best tech solution among all possible to solve the existing business problems. Designs the overall technological architecture of the product Design and develop (components of) an architecture, infrastructure, business, information applications and/or security system both current & future architectural requirements, operational cost and technological developments Describe the structure, characteristics, behavior, and other aspects of software to project stakeholders. Responsible for the detailed Application Design and specifications of required solution aligning with team Support the project team a roadmap for implementing software engineering practices for higher code quality Job Qualifications: Fluent in English Bachelor’s degree (Master’s degree preferred) in Computer Science, Engineering, Statistics, Mathematics (information technology or an engineering discipline) Seen as an expert within the technical components of the domains/products/journeys with deep insight into newest technologies and trends With 3-7 years of experience as developer or technical lead with deep insight into newest technologies and trends Can make technological architecture decisions at a team and product level Experience in software or system development team Experience working on projects that span multiple organizations and business units Experience in Agile Development, with specific Solution Architect (or similar) experience preferred Strong communication skills with ability to align organization on complex technical decision BENEFITS; WHAT WE ARE OFFERING? Permanent opportunities Fixed Bonus + Provident Fund + Social Security Medical Insurance (OPD/IPD) + Group Insurance 30 Sick leaves + 14 Annual leaves Increase salary once a year based on your potential performance Special Dating Allowance (Birthday allowance and Free cake) Training Course (English course, Online Tech Training course etc.) Staff Engagement Activities (Team Outing, Annual Day, Sports Day, etc) Laptop provided We thank all applicants. Please note that only short-listed candidates will be contacted for interviews.

Jobtitle: Automobile Aftersales Strategy Planning Senior Officer
column8: Long Description Job description Draw an aftersales direction and strategy as regional headquarter. Facilitate the project to maximize customer satisfaction and increase aftersales revenue. Organize the regional events and meeting to support the business for local offices and distributors. Conduct performance check and provide training to improve service operation. Proficient in PowerPoint, Excel, and Data Analysis. Able to travel oversea. Work location Bangrak, Silom

column8: Role & Responsibility Participate in creating and revising the Project Plan Collecting, analyzing and documenting the requirements. Create Software Test Script and perform Software Testing. Report the responsible tasks status and progress to project management and acknowledge for other member’s Co-work with PG to install the application at Customer Site. Qualification At least Bachelor's degree in computer science, computer engineer, or a related field Hands on experience with software development and documentation Familiarity with programming languages at least one language Excellent analytical skills A good problem-solving attitude Solid knowledge of business Logistic Database: SQL Server Database design Experienced of SQL Query Tools/Framework : .Net framework

We are seeking a skilled Software Engineer with expertise in Node.js, Angular, Nest.js, React and MSSQL to join our growing technology team. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and maintaining software applications that power our logistics operations. You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure our technology solutions align with business goals and deliver exceptional user experiences. Key Responsibilities: Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other engineers to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications. Design and develop scalable and maintainable software applications using Node.js, Angular, React, Nest.js, and MSSQL. Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code following industry best practices and coding standards. Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback to team members and incorporating feedback on your own work. Integrate external APIs and third-party services to enhance application functionality and data exchange. Optimize application performance and troubleshoot issues to ensure high availability and reliability. Implement automated tests and continuous integration processes to ensure software quality and robustness. Collaborate with DevOps teams to deploy applications and manage cloud infrastructure as needed. Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends, technologies, and best practices to continuously improve our technology stack. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience). 3+ years of professional software development experience. Strong proficiency in Node.js, Angular, React, Nest.js, and MSSQL. Experience with RESTful API design and integration. Solid understanding of software design principles, data structures, and algorithms. Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and collaborative development workflows. Experience with unit testing, integration testing, and test-driven development. Knowledge of containerization and cloud platforms (e.g., Docker, AWS, Azure) is a plus. Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to debug complex issues. Strong communication skills, both written and verbal. Proven ability to work effectively in a collaborative team environment. Prior experience in the logistics or transportation industry is a plus. What We Offer: Company Provide Laptop Free Drink Snack and Lunch! Work from home 3 days a week, Work from office 2 days. Tech Community/Conference/Meet up ticket are provided Learning Perks Company Outing and Project Close Celebration Office Location walkable with BTS/MRT Performance Bonus and Project Incentive

Responsibilities Operate and control all installed IT Infrastructure system and network and provide IT technical support to every users to ensure the highest levels IT system and service availability IT Operations Operate all installed infrastructure application, computer system, server and networks (MS Windows based and Oracle ERP e-business suite) Daily monitor and test system performance for potential bottlenecks, identify possible solutions, and sort out the issue Maintain data and system backup, redundancy strategies (IT Disaster Recovery System) Users Support and troubleshoot found issues Liaise with vendors and other IT personnel for problem resolution Create reports and documentation outlining issue findings and solutions IT Infrastructure (Implementation and Upgrade) Produce project planning Process the installation and configuration of operating systems, software, and hardware components Conduct the testing Coordinate with IT team in rolling out the new application or system IT Security Control Routinely test software for bugs, redundancies and security issues Perform routine/scheduled audits of IT Infrastructure system baseline Review Enforce application and system permission control Inventory Management and Control Routinely / annually check and maintain IT Asset Qualifications Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, MIS or related field Mininmum 3 years experience in IT systems Knowledge in IT server and network systems for Data Center Good knowledge on Cisco network is a plus. Have experience as system administrator is a plus. knowledge of Microsoft based technology such as Exchange, IIS, Active Directory and other key Microsoft server technologies Understanding of diverse computer systems and networks Diagnostic and problem solving skills working hour Mon - Fri 8.00 - 18.00 Occasionally, able to work on non-office working hours. Please send application with current and expected salary Only short-listed candidates will be contacted for interview. Interested persons, please send application with current and expected salary

Responsibilities:Administer Unix/Linux and Windows Server environments. Develop and maintain scripts for automation tasks. Implement and manage network configurations and security measures. Troubleshoot hardware and software issues. Deploy and manage virtualization technologies and cloud services. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field. Proficiency in Unix/Linux and Windows Server administration. Experience with scripting languages (e.g., Python, Bash, PowerShell). Networking knowledge and security best practices. Familiarity with virtualization (VMware, VirtualBox) and cloud platforms. Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills. Effective communication and collaboration in a team environment. Continuous learning mindset and relevant certifications. Certifications (if any) : CompTIA Linux+, Microsoft Certified: Windows Server, and other relevant certifications.

Responsibilities : Design, review and implement network communication related projects to assure good quality, security, time and cost. Configure, migrate and install various network devices and IP Telephony systems. Perform network maintenance and system upgrades including service packs, patches, hot fixes and security configurations. Monitor performance and ensure system availability and reliability. Monitor system resource utilization, trending, and capacity planning. Work within established configuration and change management policies to ensure awareness, approval and success of changes made to the network infrastructure. Liaise with vendors and other IT personnel for problem resolution. Perform additional tasks as needed. Work as second tier support for network communication related issues. Qualifications : Bachelor’s degree or higher in area of Computer Engineering, Computer Science, IT or related fields. Minimum of 2-5 years’ experience in network administrator, network engineer or related position. Experience with LAN/Wi-Fi, WAN, firewalls, VPN design, implementation, troubleshooting, and problem resolution. Good knowledge of LAN/WAN and VoIP networks, TCP/IP protocols, Routing protocols and network technologies. Customer Service focus, team player and good communication skills. Initiative an innovative in IT network. Good command of written and spoken English. Able to work under pressure and tight schedule.

*Working as shift rotation *Responsible for monitoring networking systems, networking devices, on LAN/WAN scope *Responsible for handling first tier troubleshooting issues focus on LAN/WAN scope. *Configuration and troubleshooting of network device based on Cisco in LAN/WAN environment. *Support customer requests the were defined in team scope of work, following service level agreemen *Responsible in own case, follow up status and keep tracking until the incident was closed *Provide report to customer and supervisor upon requests.

Jobtitle: IT Manager / Assistant IT Manager/ผู้จัดการฝ่าย IT/ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการฝ่าย IT
column8: Responsibilities: - Develop and implement IT strategies. - Prepare and present the annual IT budget. - Monitor and manage IT expenditures. - Create clear documentation for each IT policy. - Enforcing IT policies and monitor compliance. - Implement tools and technologies that support policy enforcement. - Oversee the day-to-day operations of the IT department, ensuring the delivery of high-quality services and support. - Delegate tasks and responsibilities to IT staff based on their strengths and expertise. - Conduct regular performance evaluations and provide constructive feedback to enhance team performance. - Lead IT projects from conception to completion, ensuring timely delivery and successful implementation. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to achieve project goals and milestones. Qualifications: - Bachelor’s degree in information technology, Computer Science, or a related field. - 5 years in a leadership role within the IT domain. - Strong understanding of IT systems, infrastructure, and emerging technologies. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. - ISO 27001 and IT General Controls (ITGC) proficiency are highly advantageous. - Experience in Project Management would be an advantage. - Experience in SAP S/4HANA in any module would be an advantage.

column8: Job Responsibilities: Responsible for Monitor and analyze Server performance, Operating System and ensure efficient utilization of Server Hardware Responsible for performance tuning and corrective maintenance to assure that Server Hardware, OS and Network Connection is performing efficiently Installing and upgrading UNIX / Window system software on company servers and computers Creating UNIX / Windows file systems. Setting up and maintaining UNIX / Windows user accounts and access management systems Implementing network and computer system policies Detecting and troubleshooting software and hardware issues Responding to user requests and software errors Monitoring the performance of the system and server Creating backup and recovery policies Setting up and monitoring security policies Applying patches and upgrades when necessary Knowledge, Skills and Competency: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, computer engineering, or a similar field. Previous experience as a UNIX/Window system administrator Knowledge of UNIX, LINUX and Windows operating systems, storage environments, file systems, and network protocols Detailed knowledge of UNIX/Window principles, file editing, UNIX commands, and file manipulation. Roles & Responsibilities: Database Administration. Maintains database production and testing environments. Performs upgrades of databases. Installs, configures, and maintains the database systems software and related replication software, e.g., Golden Gate, etc. Plans and manages the migration of databases. Builds scripts automating the daily operations of database management. Evaluates future database technologies. Implements database backup and recovery procedures include security for all the databases. Install, Configuration & Troubleshoot Oracle VM, VMWare ESXi Host, Failover Cluster. Support and install security patch, security investigate root causes analysis of incident related. Qualifications Required: Bachelor or higher in Computer Science or related field. Minimum 5 years of experience with database administrator e.g., Oracle, MySQL etc. Experience with system administration of Exadata and Cloud platforms. (Oracle, AWS) Experience with patching Exadata Dom0 and Grid components as well as Oracle environments. Experience in multitenant (Container/Pluggable DBs), RAC environments. Experience with installing and maintaining database management system software, scripting, and automation. Ability to diagnose/tuning and solve highly complex problems with database management systems. Knowledge of computing environments and operating systems (for example, Linux or UNIX). Knowledge of database storage management e.g., Oracle ASM Knowledge of Disaster recovery and HA, Backup, and recovery e.g., Oracle RAC, Data Guard, RMAN, Golden Gate etc. Required Virtualization technologies on Premise and on Cloud. Communication skills with the ability to work with both technical and non-technical users. Shows strong and positive interpersonal skills including written and oral communications and works well in a team.

We are currently seeking individuals with skills and experience in network engineering to join our team at CDG GROUP to take charge of developing an efficient and secure network system. Responsibilities: Implement and manage network systems, focusing on Imperva WAF, Intrusion Detection, and Firewall Checkpoint on Cloud AWS. Monitor and enhance security measures for network servers and data center networks. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure efficient network operations. Provide technical consultation and recommendations for network security enhancements. Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, or related IT field. 1-3 years of experience in network server security, data center networks, or server certificates (special consideration for relevant experience). Understanding of OSI model, TCP/IP model, TCP/IP networking (e.g., WLAN, switch, router, network security), DNS, DHCP, E-mail, and Operating Systems. High sense of responsibility and readiness to undertake organizational projects. Ability to install, coordinate, consult, and present effectively. Manage system efficiency, risks, and backup plans effectively. Willingness to travel to different provinces For further information, please kindly contact CDG GROUP 202 CDG House, Chongnonsee, Yannawa, Bangkok 10120 063214 5170 (K.Tanitar) (Monday-Friday 08.00-17.00 hrs.) www.cdg.co.th [link removed] CDG Group คือ ผู้นำด้าน IT solutions service provider ที่ใช้เทคโนโลยีและนวัตกรรมเพื่อออกแบบโซลูชันใหม่ๆ ตอบโจทย์ระดับประเทศ ทั้งภาครัฐ รัฐวิสาหกิจ และเอกชน เชี่ยวชาญด้าน GIS, Big Data & Analytics, AI, Real Time Services & Automation, Robotic, Robotic Process Automation, IOT, Application Services และ Cyber Security เป็นต้น [link removed]

Jobtitle: G-Able Internship Program/นักศึกษาฝึกงาน
column8: เปิดรับสมัครแล้ว “G-Internship Program” มาร่วมสร้างประสบการณ์สุดพิเศษ ในโลกแห่งการทำงานจริงในระดับมืออาชีพ กับสุดยอด IT Digital Provider แห่งยุค สำหรับน้องๆ นักศึกษาที่สนใจร่วมงานกับทาง G-Able เราเปิดรับสมัครนักศึกษาฝึกงาน สหกิจ ตลอดทั้งปี! บอกเลยว่าน้องๆที่ได้ร่วมฝึกงานกับ G-Able ได้เปิดประสบการณ์สุดพิเศษ และพัฒนาทักษะต่างๆ ทางด้าน Technology สุดเทรนดี้แห่งปีอย่างแน่นอน . ตลอดโครงการ น้องๆจะได้พบกับ Mentor มืออาชีพ คอยดูแล สอนงาน ให้ Feedback ตั้งแต่เริ่มจนพัฒนาน้องๆ สู่ความเป็น Specialist ในด้านที่น้องๆ สนใจ พร้อมลงมือทำจริง ทำโปรเจคจริง! . และทาง G-Able ยังมี G-Community ให้น้องๆ สามารถเข้าร่วมได้เปรียบเสมือนเป็พนักงานจริง พร้อมกับเรียนรู้เพิ่ม Knowledge ผ่านหัวข้อต่างๆตามความสนใจ ทั้งเรื่องของ Data Analytics, Data Platform, Cyber Security, Blockchain Technology, Cloud Technology และอื่นๆอีกมากมาย . นอกจากได้ความรู้แล้ว ยังได้ค่าขนมด้วยนะจ๊ะ บอกเลยว่าเปย์หนักขนาดนี้ไม่มีอีกแล้ว และ ที่สำคัญเลย G-Able ให้อิสระในการทำงานด้วยรูปแบบการทำงานสุดชิวแบบ Work From Anywhere อยากฝึกงานจากที่ไหนก็สมัครมาได้เลย!! ตำแหน่งงานที่เปิดรับ JAVA Developer Full Stack Developer Font-End Developer Back-End Developer Software Tester Data and Analytic Engineer Data Scientist Network Engineer Cloud Engineer Security Engineer Security Analyst Employee Relations Content Creator Activity Staff Software Teste System Engineer AI Engineer Application Support DevOps engineer (Cloud/OnPrim) Programmer Mobile Application Developer UX/UI Designer Network Engineer Project Engineer Talent Acquisition internship PBP project management Digital Marketing คุณสมบัตินักศึกษาฝึกงาน ศึกษาในระดับปริญญาตรี/ปริญญาโท ในสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง สามารถฝึกงานได้ตั้งแต่ 4 เดือนขึ้นไป

Jobtitle: Full Stack Developer – React.js, Node.js – Hatyai
column8: Cathcart Technology is presenting an exciting opportunity for a Full Stack Developer proficient in React.js and Node.js to join a well-established company located in the vibrant Southern area of Thailand to contributing to the development of their CRM platform. As a Full Stack Developer, you will play a key role in designing, implementing, and maintaining software solutions that empower the business operations and enhance user experiences. The ideal candidate will be a passionate and skilled professional with a strong background in both front-end and back-end development, capable of turning creative ideas into efficient and user-friendly applications. Responsibilities: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and objectives. Develop and maintain scalable, responsive, and high-performance web applications. Design and implement user interfaces using modern web technologies. Create and optimize server-side logic and database interactions. Troubleshoot, debug, and resolve software defects and issues. Qualifications: Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field. Strong proficiency in React.js and Node.js. Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud. Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills. Good communication skills. This is an opportunity to work with a strong and stable company in southern Thailand. Please don’t hesitate to contact me at 02-038-5878 , 094-554-4259 , K. Pimpisa , Open-Source recruitment consultant.

Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology or in a related field. At least experience 1-3 years in Application Support or related fields. Having skill on SQL statements (Query, Stored procedure, Function) Good attitude with service-mind. Ability to quickly gain new system skills and to work with new technologies. Strong communication skills to interact with users of varying technical backgrounds. Flexibility to adapt to changing priorities and handle multiple tasks. Fluent in Thai and English, both oral and written Responsibilities: Managing and maintaining the application service. Responding to customer / business user inquiries that escalate from Tier-1 support team. Coordinating with other technical teams in troubleshooting and resolving service incidents. Log, track, and manage support tickets in accordance with established procedures and service level agreements (SLAs). Maintain SLA, application availability, capacity and performance KPI Oversee development and updates of help sheets, usage guides, and FAQ lists for end users.

Jobtitle: Commercial Product Planning and Development Engineer/Commercial Product...
column8: This role involves comprehensive responsibility for investigating the underlying issues, conducting testing, and addressing concerns pertaining to the quality and utilization of both company and competitor tires. The scope of accountability extends to conducting market demand surveys, offering support information, and providing recommendations to enhance and develop product quality. Key Responsibilities Conduct surveys on tire usage conditions among dealers and customers. Strategize and execute trials, along with follow-up testing for current and new products. Analyze the efficiency and diversity of both company and competitors' products. Monitor competitors' product movements and assess market needs. Gather information on waste tires, overseeing the analysis of tire claims for truck tire products, minibus, and truck tires (TB/LT) based on customer complaints. Address and follow up on product quality issues, presenting findings to relevant parties for further corrective action. Enhance expertise and skills in both professional and technical practices through participation in training and reviewing public media related to the tire industry, fostering relationships within relevant industry networks. Undertake additional tasks as assigned by supervisors. Sub Responsibilities Work closely with Bridgestone Japan and Bridgestone Asia Pacific teams to conduct follow-up testing. Act as the company's representative to deliver product introductions and provide product instruction manuals to interested parties at trade shows. Assist in various initiatives aimed at boosting sales in commercial tire products. Research and understand operational processes, applying insights to leverage new technologies for faster and more accurate work. Job Requirements Bachelor’s degree of Mechanical Engineer, Automotive or Industrial Engineer or related fields. 1-3 years of experience in Product Planning and Development fields Experience in the automotive field will be an advantage. Good command in English. (TOEIC >700 scores) Flexible with good interpersonal skills and communication skills. Basic knowledge of vehicles and tire-related concepts. Have a driving license. Work Location: Abdulrahim place, Silom (MRT Silom / BTS Saladaeng)

Jobtitle: Junior Data Analyst/เจ้าหน้าที่วิเคราะห์ข้อมูล
Company: Internet Based Business Group Co., Ltd.
column8: We are seeking for a Social Data Analyst (Based in Bangkok, Thailand) with the capabilities and excitement to turn posts, comments, and trends into high-quality insights and actionable recommendations. If you are: You are addicted to social media, News and Current Trends. You have a passion for working for a variety of popular brands in Southeast Asia. You are always curious why this, why that of what is happening on social media. You are excited by consumer insights, big data and social media analysis. If those statements are so you, then working as a Social Data Analyst at Zanroo is the right choice for you What You’ll Do: Analyze data across multiple websites and social media platforms to understand consumer insights and consumer behavior, as well as to draw actionable insights that will help our clients achieve their strategic communications objective. Utilize our Zanroo-owned software, as well as Microsoft Excel and PowerPoint, to process data, discover insights, and produce understandable reports for clients. Plan and share how to improve report quality in order to meet the changing needs of client. Collaborate with internal teams such as Client Success and Research and Development to deliver a better outcome and exceed client expectation. Qualification : 0-3 years of relevant work experience. Agency experience, specifically a client-servicing role with report writing experience is preferred. Good analytical and logical skills-able to translate data into actionable insights in the simplest and concise fashion, eye for details, and ask the “what does this mean?” to the data. Proficient in using Microsoft Excel, Pivot Tables, VLOOKUP, and Microsoft PowerPoint. Good in English (Needs to writing reports) Social Media enthusiasts such as Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, TikTok, YouTube and Pantip. A self-starter with a proactive and go-getter attitude. Capable of multitasking and managing multiple projects concurrently. Welfare : Working day Monday-Friday (9.00-18.00) Hybrid Working Annual Leave Business Leave Social Security Fund​​ Life Insurance & Accident Insurance​​ Health Insurance ​ Annual Health Check up​ Birthday Gift Outing Snack Bar​ Bonus

Jobtitle: Network System Administration  / System Engineer /Network Security System...
column8: ตำแหน่ง Network System Administration  / System Engineer Responsibilities: Oversee product assignments, managing tasks from implementation to maintenance. Develop, deploy, and uphold wired and wireless networks, along with security infrastructure for clients. Monitor and respond to network and security incidents promptly. Provide standby/on-call and remote support. Address customer requests and troubleshoot issues effectively. Coordinate troubleshooting activities with vendors (Cisco, HPE, Fortinet, etc.). Fulfill additional job requirements as necessary. Qualifications: Hold a Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology System, or related fields. 2 years or more of experience as a Network Engineer or Network Administrator. Experience in a system integrator company is advantageous. Proficient in enterprise wired and wireless networks, including L2-L3 switch, Access Point, router, and security equipment like Firewall and Bandwidth management. Familiarity with network management and monitoring software. Positive attitude, quick learner, and excellent service mindset. Analytical approach to efficiently address system requirements. ใบประกาศนียบัตร CCNA  /  Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNA) ตำแหน่ง Network Security System Supervisor มีใบประกาศนียบัตร CompTIA Security+ หรือ CISSP

column8: Job Description Design, build, and maintain our own cloud IoT/AI systems Design and work with other member to develop our own cloud IoT/AI system to meet the requirement Collaborate with teams to ensure whole systems are delivered on time and met quality and customer requirements Ensure that cloud systems are running smoothly and securely Stay up-to-date on the latest cloud technologies Monitor and troubleshoot cloud systems Estimate usage cost and provide comparison for cloud solution Share knowledge to other members on cloud technologies Qualifications Bachelor's Degree or higher in Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering or related field 0-5 years’ experience in IoT system design and Web application design Have knowledge in Cloud System Architecture, Cloud Database, Software Development, API Development Experience in Python, JavaScript, C/C++, R Good command of both written and spoken English Experience with various cloud platforms, such as AWS, Azure, or GCP Strong understanding of cloud computing concepts, such as serverless, virtualization, scalability, and elasticity Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills Ability to work independently and as part of a team Strong in service mind, good interpersonal skill and ability to work under pressure Have knowledge in AI, Machine Learning, Deep Learning would be a plus Working Location Head office at TOYOTA TSUSHO NEXTY ELECTRONICS (THAILAND) CO., LTD. 15th-16th Floor, Mercury Tower, 540 Ploenchit Road, Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330 (Chidlom BTS station exit 4) Welfare & Benefits 5-day working Overtime payment Performance Bonus Provident fund 5% Dental insurance Group Health insurance Japanese language allowance Flexible working time Others

Public and private organizations in various sectors worldwide now openly acknowledge that cyber-attacks are one of the most prevalent and high impact risks they face. Dealing with cyber threats is a complex challenge. KPMG professionals recognize that cyber security is about risk management – not risk elimination. We are looking for experienced consultants to join our cyber team to focus on the below. Job Responsibilities: Develop frameworks, policies, processes, procedures, architecture, and controls Review OT Security and architecture and identify potential risks Assess governance processes and controls Ability to write reports on OT Security related issues in risk and business terms. Review OT Security and architecture and identify potential risks Self starter and team player Lead complex and multi team OT security related projects Preferred Experience: Experienced in DCS System Experienced in Process Control knowledge Experienced in design, development, coding, testing and debugging of software solutions and products. Job Qualifications: OT / ICS security, audit, OT/IT security, operational risk management Have at least 2-5 years working in related background Requires working knowledge of and ability to apply standards, principles, theories, concepts, and techniques of OT security security. Experience with emerging technologies and methodologies in the OT space will be a benefit Excellent report writing skills in both English and Thai Ability to translate OT and OT Security needs and requirements to senior management and business stakeholders Ability to report OT security related issues in a risk based manner to board level management Excellent report writing skills in both English and Thai Good analytical and problem-solving skills Learning mindset Knowledge in ICS, PLC, SCADA would be advantage Good in communication and interpretation skills Certification preferred (but not a must have): IEC62443, Global Industrial Cyber Security Professional Certification (GICSP) Certified Operational Technology Cybersecurity Professional (TÜV) ISO27001 CISSP

Assisting in the design, development and implementation of communication services as well as troubleshooting communication services for all voice and data needs. This includes phone service, WAN Communications and PBX services. Positively contributes to teams and other work groups to carry out departmental projects. Qualification : Bachelor’s degree or higher in Telecommunication Engineering, Information and Communication Technology, or related fields Strong knowledge on Cisco CCNP, CCNA, Cisco is a plus 1-3 year of experience as a Network Engineer, Network Administrator, or Network Security Engineer Excellence interpersonal skill and communication skill Able to travel to upcountry occasionally Good command of Thai and English For any information as if to know more about  our company please  visit our website  by following  this link : https://www.pttdigital.com [link removed] "Great Job, Great Working Environment , Great Benefit is waiting  for you "

Company: Kiatnakin Phatra Securities Public Company Limited
column8: Job Summary: Kiatnakin Phatra Securities’ Research Group is in charge of originating investment ideas and translating those ideas into practical investment strategies and recommendations for our clients. We constantly explore and study the latest news, data, and trends in the financial markets and real sectors globally. We are looking for a “Data Engineer” or a “Data Analyst” who is capable of assisting our strategists and equity analysts (sell-side research) on data pipeline (ETL) maintenance used for developing quantitative models (quant research), building web apps, etc. to equip our clients with the most insightful investment strategies. A perfect candidate for us would be a life-long and fast learner who also possesses a strong passion for both the worlds of investment and data analytics. Roles and Responsibilities Work closely with strategists on the equity research team to develop quantitative models that generate insights for investment strategies. Be part of a data-driven team in developing web apps and automated data services that are efficient, scalable, and user-friendly to enhance investment research capabilities. Eager to learn and understand any topics related to economics, finance, investment, and other new topics within the business domain to better serve clients’ needs. Qualifications/Specific knowledge and skills: Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Computer/Electrical Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, Finance, Economics, or other equivalent/related fields. Proficient in Excel (Power Query is a plus) and experience with programming language (Python is required) and database management system (SQL Server is required). Good understanding of Statistics, Linear Algebra, Econometrics, and Time Series Analysis is a must. Basic concept of Machine Learning is a plus. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with a good sense of extracting insights from the data available. Ability to work as a team with self-motivated, detail-oriented, and can-do attitudes.

Support ongoing operation of Microsoft Dynamics 365/AX (Finance & SCM). Communicate with key users to analyze & solve issues, problem at Finance or SCM area. Report and coordinate with team in Japan to provide solutions and explain resolutions. Closely monitor progress of requests to support. You will be discussing more in-depth descriptions with our consultant in the interview session. column8: As a React Developer for our commerce web applications, you will play a critical role in shaping the user experience and ensuring the high performance and responsiveness of our website. You will work closely with our front-end and back-end development teams to deliver a seamless online shopping experience. This position offers the opportunity to work on exciting projects, apply your React expertise, and influence the growth of our platform Responsibilities: Develop new user-facing features using React.js Build reusable components and front-end libraries for future use Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability Collaborate with the design and product teams to implement responsive web designs Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs Maintain high-quality code through code reviews and automated testing Troubleshoot and debug issues as they arise •Stay updated on industry trends and best practices to continuously improve development processes Participate in the planning and estimation of project timelines Qualifications : Proven experience as a React Developer or similar role Strong proficiency in JavaScript, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model Thorough understanding of React and its core principles Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Redux or Mobx) Familiarity with RESTful APIs and WebSockets Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Tokens Experience with front-end build tools, such as Babel, Webpack, and NPM Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail Excellent communication and teamwork skills •Bachelor's degree in computer science or a related field is a plus

Jobtitle: IT Security (Red Team / DLP Team) (OSCP / CHFI)

column8: Responsibilities: Facilitate stakeholders from various Business Units and external entities regarding all network, system and cybersecurity. Security enforcement, monitoring, analysis, and auditing role in design, development, implementation and production phase of the Business Intelligence project and existing systems. Responsible for information security management system including completing assessment, analysis and treatment to find ways to prevent, reduce or eliminate risks. Understanding and ensuring we are in line with ISO27001 / ISO22301 requirements. Working with Management and security committees to determine internal and external security issues and prevention. Communicating and creating awareness of information security standards and protocols and knowledge transfer to users. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technologies, or related fields. Minimum 2 years of experience in Information Security systems is preferable. Good personality with excellent communication and negotiation skills. Having a good attitude toward team working and willing to work hard. Self-motivated and initiative. OSCP / CHFI is preferable Responsibilities for DLP Admin: Responsible for reviewing DLP system alerts and working with IT Security Operation to resolve issues. Responsible for coordinating solution upgrade and patching efforts with IT Security Operations. Responsible for testing, configuring and troubleshooting DLP solution as well as identifying performance concerns. Qualifications for DLP role: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technologies, or related fields. At least 1 year of experience in Information Security systems, DLP Systems is preferable. Experience in IT security standards/rules and regulations. Good personality with excellent communication and negotiation skills. Having a good attitude toward team working and willing to work hard. Self-motivated and initiative. Good communication in English. Jobtitle: Senior Associate - Innovation (Blockchain and Digital Assets Lead)
column8: About the Role: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Senior Associate to lead our Innovation team in the Blockchain and Digital Assets domain. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in blockchain technology and digital assets, combined with a passion for driving innovation in a fast-paced environment. Key Responsibilities: Lead the development and implementation of blockchain and digital asset strategies. Stay abreast of the latest trends and developments in blockchain and digital assets. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate blockchain technologies into our business processes. Drive the adoption of blockchain and digital assets across the organization. Manage and execute projects related to blockchain technology and digital asset initiatives. Provide thought leadership and expertise on blockchain and digital assets both internally and externally. Develop and maintain relationships with key blockchain and digital asset partners and vendors. Ensure compliance with all regulatory requirements related to blockchain and digital assets. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Finance, or a related field. Master's degree preferred. Minimum of 5 years of experience in blockchain technology and digital assets. Proven track record of leading and implementing successful blockchain projects. Strong understanding of cryptocurrency and digital asset markets. Familiarity with programming languages used in blockchain development. Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and project management skills. Strong communication and leadership skills, with the ability to lead and motivate a team. Innovative thinker with a passion for technology and digital transformation.

About the job As a Data Analyst in Akulaku X, you will play a pivotal role in crafting, innovating, and encouraging the adoption of reports and dashboards across our company. Your primary responsibility is to guarantee the accurate generation and distribution of strategic reports and dashboards on a daily basis, supporting informed decision-making processes within the dynamic landscape of consumer lending. Job Description Data Analysis: Conduct thorough analysis of lending data to identify trends, patterns, and insights that can inform business decisions and strategies. Reporting: Generate and present clear, concise reports to stakeholders, highlighting key performance indicators and actionable insights derived from data analysis. Data Management: Oversee the collection, processing, and cleaning of large datasets to ensure data accuracy and integrity. Forecasting : Forecast trends and support decision-making processes within the unsecured consumer lending business. Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including business, IT, product and management, to understand business requirements and deliver data-driven solutions. Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities for improvement and efficiency gains through data analysis and recommend actionable solutions. Compliance: Ensure compliance with data protection regulations and company policies related to customer data. Qualification Bachelor’s degree or higher in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, Information Technology Static or related fields. Experience more than 3-5 years of proven experience in a data analyst role, with a focus on unsecured consumer lending or related financial business. Technical Skills: Proficient in SQL for data extraction and manipulation. Strong programming skills in Python for data analysis and automation. Familiarity with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) is a plus. Fluent in English, Proficiency in Chinese is a plus. Skill: Analytical Skills (Strong analytical and problem-solving skills), Communication Skills, Team Player, Adaptability (Ability to adapt to a dynamic business environment and quickly learn and apply new technologies and tools)

Company: Global Power Synergy Public Company Limited
column8: Main Purpose : ดำเนินงานด้านการกำหนดกลยุทธ์การลงทุนของกลุ่ม GPSC รวมถึงรับผิดชอบการกำกับและกำหนดกระบวนการบริหาร การลงทุนเกณฑ์ที่ใช้ในการตัดสินใจลงทุน และผลักดันให้กลุ่มธุรกิจและบริษัทในเครือปฏิบัติตามเพื่อให้เป็นมาตรฐานเดียวกัน Responsibilities: ศึกษา ติดตามสถานการณ์สภาพแวดล้อมการลงทุนที่เกี่ยวข้องกับธุรกิจของบริษัทฯ อย่างต่อเนื่อง สามารถประเมินโอกาสและความเสี่ยงของการลงทุนใน Focus Countries ของบริษัทฯได้ ประเมินสมมุติฐานโครงการ และมีความรู้ความเข้าใจในการลงทุนทั้งที่เป็น Conventional, Renewable และ New-S Curve ทั้งในประเทศและต่างประเทศ รับผิดชอบงานเลขาคณะกรรมการการลงทุนฯ และ ประสานงานกับเจ้าของโครงการ และหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง เพื่อจัดประชุม Peers Review/ SIMC Meeting วิเคราะห์โครงการลงทุนตามหลักเกณฑ์พิจารณาความเหมาะสมของการลงทุน จัดทำข้อคิดเห็นประกอบการลงทุน เพื่อนำเสนอต่อคณะกรรมการ SIMC และ จดบันทึกประชุม SIMC กำหนด จัดทำ ปรับปรุง และ กำกับ นิยาม หลักเกณฑ์ กระบวนกลั่นกรองเพื่อจัดทำระเบียบ/คู่มือการอนุมัติและกลั่นกรองการลงทุนของบริษัทฯ กำหนดหลักเกณฑ์ และกระบวนการติดตามความก้าวหน้าของการผลตอบแทนการลงทุน (Post-Investment Review) และจัดหาแนวทางแก้ไขที่เหมาะสมร่วมกับหน่วยงานเจ้าของโครงการ(Lesson Learn & Mitigation Plan) เพื่อรายงานต่อ SIMC กำหนดมาตรฐานการคำนวณ WACC & Hurdle rate เพื่อใช้เป็นเกณฑ์พิจารณาผลตอบแทนการลงทุน จัดทำและปรับปรุง Internal Carbon Pricing สำหรับใช้ในการพิจารณาลงทุนของบริษัท Qualifications: ปริญญาตรี, ปริญญาโทสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง (วิศวกรรมศาสตร์, การเงิน, บริหารธุรกิจ,เศรษฐศาสตร์) ประสบการณ์อย่างน้อย 3-5 ปีที่เกี่ยวข้อง เช่น Business Development, Analyst , Equity Analyst, IB, Engineering , Financial Valuation, Risk Management มีความรู้ความเข้าใจที่ดีเกี่ยวกับธุรกิจพลังงาน หรือโรงไฟฟ้า หรือ ธุรกิจ New S-Curve อื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง สามารถใช้ภาษาอังกฤษและภาษาไทยได้ดีทั้งการพูดและการเขียน (คะแนน TOEIC 700 หรือมากกว่า) สามารถในการใช้โปรแกรม MS office สามารถสรุปความ และจดบันทึกประชุมได้ดี มีทัศนคติ มนุษยสัมพันธ์ที่ดี สามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้เป็นอย่างดี มีทักษะการสื่อสารและประสานงาน พร้อมเรียนรรู้และพัฒนาตัวเองตลอดเวลา มีทักษะการวิเคราะห์ ตรรกะ การแก้ปัญหา และการคิดอย่างเป็นระบบ มีความละเอียดรอบคอบ มีความรับผิดชอบในการทำงาน และทำงานภายใต้แรงกกดดันได้

Jobtitle: IT Support Engineer - Bangkok (Good Reward)/IT Support Engineer - Bangkok...
column8: IT Support for users support (inc. PC and notebook) and basic network/server support. Experience with Windows 10 or 11 and Office / Office 365 etc. Some training provided. Opportunity to improve English and IT skills. Summary We are looking for an IT Support Engineer with experience in End User IT Support (maintenance and support for notebooks, desktops, networking and peripherals). Applicants should be able to communicate in English and have at least 3 years past experience in IT Support. Good opportunity to work with International company and advance your skills. Location - Position is at Saraburi Responsibilities: End user support for desktop, laptop and other devices. Smart hand support for server, network and other site specific IT devices. Responsible for regular maintenance and support of desktop and end user environment. Support printer and network related issues. Image and build desktops and laptops. Troubleshoot and repair software and hardware related problems. Project working (installation, networks / cabling, machine staging etc). Manage services requests and incidents. Maintain record of IT inventory. Escalate issues to next level and coordinate resolution with other team members. Support is provided and gain new skills. Reporting. Qualifications: More than 3 years past working experience. Bachelor’s Degree (preferably in Computer Science, Electronics or related field.) Willing to solve the IT problems including Hardware, Software, Operating System, Network Connection, LAN, WAN, Printer. Knowledge of Microsoft Windows, Office Applications, E-Mail, Mobile devices, Printers etc. Proactive, self-motivated, service mind, team player and able to work under pressure at times. Able to communicate in English. Willingness to learn new things relating to IT. Company: Allianz Ayudhya Assurance Public Company Limited
column8: Your Day at Allianz Ayudhya Data Architect maximizes the value of data/ information by developing and disseminating Data Architecture strategies, methodologies and tools to enhance the value of data along the value chain. Create and maintain logical data models and flowcharts indicating as-is data landscape. Develop a transformation roadmap towards target architecture. Develop a transformation roadmap indicating current, transition, and future state Data Architecture. Maintain the overview of the as-is data landscape and manage the roadmap and planning towards the target. Advise and co design end-to-end data solutions that meet the organization's data strategies, including, but not limited to, ELT by connecting to and/or consuming Azure and third-party services on a near real-time basis; qualified data catalogs / marts for business consumption in a timely manner. Define and implement data architecture framework and principles including data modeling. Partner with Data Governance to oversee data management topics such as ensuring the conceptual data model is translated properly to logical data model and that metadata are properly managed. Define and own data flows within Data Platform; collaborate with IT and Enterprise Architect for a completed view across the organization. Design/improve standard processes regarding data acquisition, storage and consumption. Participate in technical data requirement meetings, and able to answer technical questions related to cloud infrastructure used in Data Office. Work closely with ISO to ensure data security by design. Must Have Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Data Engineering, IT or related fields At least 5 years of experience in Solution architect, Data architect, Cloud architect, Data engineer, or DevOps Engineer Experience gathering and analyzing system requirements Experience in designing data models, data flow diagrams Experience in define and/or provision infrastructure-as-code Azure Solutions Architect Expert Data modeling tools such as ER/Studio to visualize and design data architecture Understanding of data quality standards and data cleansing processes Nice to Have Knowledge of cloud computing (preferably Azure) Expertise in SQL and understanding of database structure principles Understanding of ETL or ELT processes using Azure Data Factory. Able to support fine tuning from platform perspectives as well as scaling using load balancer. Understanding of Cloud security, particularly in the areas of data management and protection. Understanding of digital transformation, data strategy as well as data analytic technology Experience in API management or event-based solutions on Azure is a big plus Knowledge of version control systems (e.g. GitHub, GitLab etc.), data pipeline and workflow management tools (e.g. Airflow, Azkaban, Luigi, etc.) Experience with Big data technologies (Hadoop, Hive, HBase, Spark etc.) or distributed databases and NoSQL databases like HBase, Elasticsearch, Postgres, Cassandra, MongoDB, Snowflake etc. can be a plus Understanding of insurance business and information technology is a plus Knowledge of network security, enterprise security, cloud security, database security Understand the system development life cycle, project management approaches, and requirements, design, and test techniques

Jobtitle: Senior Risk Management Officer (Prima Marine Plc.)

column8: จัดทำเครื่องมือในการวัด ติดตาม และควบคุมความเสี่ยงเพื่อเสนอต่อคณะกรรมการบริหารความเสี่ยง จัดทำคู่มือบริหารจัดการความเสี่ยงและทำการทบทวนเพื่อให้สอดคล้องกับนโยบายบริหารจัดการความเสี่ยง ประสานงานการจัดตั้งคณะทำงานบริหารความเสี่ยงและร่วมทำการประเมินความเสี่ยงระดับองค์กร (Enterprise Risk) ประสานงานการจัดตั้งคณะทำงานบริหารความเสี่ยงร่วมกับผู้จัดทำโครงการ (กรณีโครงการใหม่) ทำการประเมินความเสี่ยงโครงการ (Project Risk) และรายงานผู้บังคับบัญชาตามสายงานหรือคณะกรรมการบริหารความเสี่ยง เพื่อขออนุมัติความเสี่ยงของโครงการก่อนการลงทุน รวมถึงการทบทวนวิเคราะห์ การปรับปรุง เพื่อควบคุมระดับความเสี่ยง รวบรวม วิเคราะห์ และติดตามการบริหารความเสี่ยงของแต่ละหน่วยงาน และองค์กรติดตามความคืบหน้าของแผนปฏิบัติการและกิจกรรมลดความเสี่ยง จัดทำรายงานข้อมูลและการปรับปรุงความเสี่ยงด้านการปฏิบัติการ จัดฝึกอบรมให้ความรู้ความเข้าใจกับเจ้าหน้าที่ของบริษัทเพื่อให้เกิดเข้าใจในเรื่องการบริหารจัดการความเสี่ยงที่เพียงพอในองค์กร พร้อมแนะนำในการใช้เครื่องมือบริหารความเสี่ยงด้านการปฏิบัติการมาบริหารความเสี่ยงที่เกิดขึ้นภายในแต่ละหน่วยงาน อำนวยความสะดวกให้กับผู้จัดการในการพัฒนาบันทึกการรายงาน รวมถึงปริมาณและคุณภาพเบื้องต้น และการตรวจสอบกระบวนการรายงาน ปริญญาตรี สาขาการจัดการ บริหารความเสี่ยง การเงิน นิติศาสตร์ เศรษฐศาสตร์ หรือสาขาอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องการรายงานความคืบหน้าและหัวข้อและข้อเสนอแนะ ในการปฏิบัติที่จำเป็นต่อผู้บังคับบัญชาตามสายงาน

About this role ZILO is seeking a talented and experienced SRE - Application Support Engineer to join our growing team. As a SRE - Application Support Engineer at ZILO, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the reliability, scalability, and performance of our cutting-edge technology solutions. As an SRE - Application Support Engineer you will have the opportunity to work closely with our technology, operations, and product teams to ensure that our systems are running smoothly and efficiently. You will be responsible for implementing and maintaining monitoring tools, troubleshooting issues, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve any performance bottlenecks or system failures. This role requires a strong understanding of cloud-based infrastructure, automation, and a passion for creating reliable and scalable systems. Responsibilities • Production Support: Participate in providing 24x7 production support, including incident resolution and on-call rotation, to ensure the availability and reliability of critical applications. • Performance Optimization: Continuously monitor and analyze application performance, identifying and addressing bottlenecks, and implementing optimizations to enhance overall performance. • Cost Optimization: Implement cost-effective solutions to optimize cloud resources and ensure efficient resource utilization within AWS environments. • Resilience: Work to enhance the resilience and fault tolerance of applications, including designing disaster recovery solutions and conducting failover testing. • Defect and Bug Fixes: Investigate, diagnose, and resolve defects and bugs in applications, collaborating with development teams to implement effective solutions. • CI/CD: Contribute to and maintain CI/CD pipelines, ensuring the seamless deployment of applications, and automating release processes. Qualifications • Bachelor's degree or relevant experience in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. • Proven experience as an SRE, Application Support Engineer or similar role. • Proficiency in : AWS, Kubernetes or other cloud environment. • Strong understanding of application support, performance optimization, cost optimization, and resilience. • Familiarity with infrastructure as code. • Decent knowledge of one or more programming languages such as Golang, Python, Java, React, or JavaScript. • Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and tools. • Ability to diagnose and troubleshoot complex software and infrastructure issues. • Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills. • Strong communication and collaboration skills. • Working as part of a global team to provide 24x7 on call coverage. • Able to work shift patterns where required.

column8: Responsibility Strategically build STA Friends digital products and features through a deep knowledge of the rubber industry, platform, client business models, and the agricultural ecosystem. Actively find internal and external solutions for our existing projects in order to fill in the market demand gaps. Source out new accounts and partnerships for our STA Friends digital projects. Act as a client advocate in navigating STA Friends’ teams and functions during relation management and onboarding with the partnerships. Assess client’s potential for development and STA Friends’ estimated future revenues for the working projects. Act as data centric unit for the product, collecting, analyzing, and managing quantitative data and creating meaningful reports or metrics to influence business actions. Process documentations (pitch deck creation, contracts, and others), update databases, optimize business processes, and conduct data analysis for data driven decision-making. Who we are looking for Fluent in both Thai and English Strong in tracking things to be done - self-driven, ownership and execution are core to our culture at STA Friends from a process standpoint, you’re someone who prioritizes your day, and then gets things done. You should be able to point out the current stage and roadblock where possible. An ability to connect - you are effective in new environments in part because you can network and connect with different types of people. You have the gravitas and charisma to serve as the face of our business, and you are able to turn others into fans and advocates of STA Friends. Pure creativity - The challenges you face when growing a business from scratch are massive and constant. In this role, you need the creativity to solve those problems especially under COVID-19 situation; to influence the partners we work with, for instance; to communicate with users; to generate quality, attention-grabbing marketing ideas, and ensure that people are always thinking about Friends. Flexibility – Under normal circumstance, you will likely spend a lot of time away from home, in cities you haven’t necessarily been to before. This is a job for someone who’d be excited to go somewhere completely new, often very little notice; someone willing and able to truly immerse themselves in that city, quickly and deeply. Qualification and Required Skills Bachelor’s and/or Master education in Business, Economics and Engineering majors are encouraged to apply At least 2 years of working experience in the “Business Transformation” project or “Business Process Improvement” is preferable Microsoft Office skills especially Microsoft excel and PowerPoint Knowledge of BI tools, Qlik, Tableau, or Microsoft BI is a plus Good negotiation, communication and problem-solving skill Good team-player, proactive, positive and can-do attitude, service-mind Highly-interested  in taking Thai farmer and agricultural industry to the next level is a plus Location: Bangkok Interested applicants, please send your updated resume and expected salary to us by click "Apply now"
