Jobtitle: ERP Consultant - Microsoft D365 F&O (Associate - Manager)
column8: Management Consulting KPMG’s Management Consulting group assists our clients identify and solve the challenges that stand in the way of their growth and progress. We will work with clients as colleagues, shoulder-to-shoulder, until we have delivered the results that matter to clients. Ideally, we create a better future for our clients and our people. KPMG's Management Consulting group assists our clients in improving and transforming business performance through strategic and operational re-engineering and better leverage of technology investments. We help develop strategies relating Finance Transformation, Supply Chain Management, IT Strategy Implementation, Cost Optimization, Business Integration, Business Intelligence as well as ERP implementation services.Specifically, we are looking for someone who is familiar with Project Management Office (PMO) for large or complex system implementation. Job description Work as an integral part of KPMG Management Consulting to execute process transformation, measurable improved operational performance, and organizational restructuring. Work with client businesses throughout the project lifecycle by leveraging business performance improvement approaches and frameworks and helping to ensure timely execution of project deliverables Lead and deliver large, complex client engagements that identify, design, and implement creative business and technology solutions for large companies. Provide service excellence by identifying key client business issues, determining client needs by supplementing the standard assessment techniques and tools with innovative approaches. Perform project management activities including: development and management of work plans, schedules and project budgets Project management activities including: development and management of project scope, schedules, budgets, risks, resources, and quality. Work with managers or senior managers to develop and present KPMG Advisory offerings to the market. Qualifications : Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Business Administration, Accounting, Finance, Information System, Computer Engineering or related field Minimum of 3-5 years relevant experience preferably within an advisory firm Working experience in process analysis, implementation or application management support activities. Process an analysis and improvement, process design, process management and process&technology integration experience Experience in accounting system or large complex system implementation preferred Experience in at least one of Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Application D365 ERP: Finance, SCM, CE Strong product knowledge of D365 Experience in full life cycle projects within Dynamics. Experience with the following modules: Finance modules: AP, AR, GL, FA SCM: Purchase, Sales, Inventory, Production Power Platform: PowerApps, Power Automate, etc. Experience in developing new PowerApps model and canvas driven apps. Experience in Automating with Microsoft Power Automate. Experience in Power BI reports and dashboards development and support. Experience in full life cycle projects within Power Platform. Ability to participate in the development and presentation of proposals for business development activities. Strong communication and presentation capability Excellent analytical, problem solving and project management skills Proficiency in spoken and written Thai and good command in English

Jobtitle: IT System Support/เจ้าหน้าที่สนับสนุนระบบงานสารสนเทศ
column8: ลักษณะงาน: ดูแลกระบวนการเข้าถึงระบบงานและ server จากผู้ให้บริการภายนอก ดูแลบริการฐานข้อมูลและควบคุมระบบงานในการดูแลระบบงานสารสนเทศ ดูแลกระบวนการนำระบบงานที่ใช้ในการสนับสนุนการดำเนินงานขึ้นใช้งานจริง ตรวจเช็คการทำงานของระบบงาน รับผิดชอบงานต่อภารกิจอื่น ๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติ: ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิศวกรรมคอมพิวเตอร์ วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ด้านการนำระบบงานขึ้นใช้งานจริงทั้งในด้าน application และ database อย่างน้อย 1 ปีขึ้นไป มีความรู้ในเรื่องระบบปฏิบัติการของ Server, Web Server และระบบเครือข่าย มีความรู้เรื่องระบบฐานข้อมูล Bangkok Life Assurance Public Company Limited 1415 Krungthep - Nonthaburi Road, Wongsawang, Bangsue,Bangkok MRT Wongsawang Exit 1

Job Summary This position is responsible to take care of system development for support sales and after sales operations. Job Responsibilities 1. To develop new program, change program, investigate issue, etc. 2. Work with functional team to fulfill users’ requirements. 3. To provide program technical specification and system requirements document 4. To control the development can be finished on schedule. 5. To analysis problem or system improvement. 6. To follow the company’s/IT policy. Qualification • At least 5 years of working experience in SAP developer. • Bachelor’s Degree Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology or related fields. • Good command of English, written and verbal communication skills. • Strong knowledge of ABAP programming Note • สามารถทดสอบระงานก่อนที่จะส่งให้ User ทดสอบได้ • สามารถแก้ปัญหาและ พัฒนาต่อจากระบงานเก่าที่มียู่แล้วได้ พัฒนาต่อจากระบงานเก่าที่มีอยู่แล้วได้ • สามารถเก็บคุยความต้องการกับ User แล้วสามารถออกแบบระบบงานได้ (ถ้าได้จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ ) สนใจสอบถามได้เลยนะคะ Line: kamin_mc

Summary of Responsibilities: SSC IT Support Officer will be responsible for the day-to-day delivery of IT support services to group companies, monitor and report IT support services and work closely with subsidiaries’ officer in responding to inquiries based on service agreements. Main Responsibilities: Manage service/ user request relates to SAP, including investigate the situation and diagnose the underlying causes to ultimately assist SAP MM/PM in recovering or continuing operations. Configuration on SAP in MM/PM Module. Be a facilitator to escalate unsolved problem from end users/ key users to competency center. Provide updated information to users on SAP changes and related system/ process e.g. development, issues, errors, etc. Proactively support and/ or arrange training to end-users to solve and improve the operational SAP system and related processes. Analyze and business, functional, and related issues to formulate and develop new and/or modified programs. Develop functional specifications for ABAP programming work and all module interfaces. Should possess integration knowledge of other modules like FI/CO or other application. Design & set up authorization matrix for each business process and SAP licenses usage planning. Initiative to proactively interface with and learn the businesses process flows and realization requirements. Responsible on update work instructions and system tasks, create and update manual, provide periodic report. Other Responsibilities: Manage and control list of software to the client installed. Work with BA/SA and team to understand customer's business requirement such as E-document process, Eportal. BI skill [Business Intelligence] such as Power BI ,Tableau [Optional] Databases and non-relational database such as MSSQL, MySQL. [Optional] Requirement: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science/ Statistics/ Business management. Experienced in SAP business or related fields. At least 3–5 year experience in SAP related configuring and supporting for MM/PM module and support development program with ABAP programming. Able to work multiple activities concurrently and as a team. Experienced in BI report [Business Intelligence] such as Power BI ,Tableau [Optional] Experienced in programing with .net or understanding in RDBMS such as MS SQL.[Optional]

Jobtitle: Cloud Operations and Support Engineer - AWS
column8: ภาพรวม ทีม Operations & Support ของเราทุ่มเทในการดูแลระบบที่มีความสำคัญสูงต่อการบริหารงานของลูกค้า (Mission-Critical) ด้วยการประยุกต์ใช้เทคโนโลยีที่ทันสมัยและประสิทธิภาพ, เราได้นำเครื่องมือและวิธีการที่หลากหลายมาใช้ในการแก้ปัญหา เพื่อรับประกันว่าระบบของลูกค้าสามารถให้บริการได้อย่างไม่มีสะดุด ในขณะที่ภายในทีม, คุณจะได้เรียนรู้และประสบการณ์การจัดการกับปัญหาที่เกี่ยวข้องกับ Amazon Web Services และผู้ผลิตสินค้าอื่นๆ ทั้งนี้เพื่อให้แน่ใจว่าเราเสนอแนวทางในการแก้ไขปัญหาที่เหมาะสมและมีประสิทธิภาพสูงสุดแก่ลูกค้า ซึ่งในที่สุด จะนำไปสู่ประสบการณ์การใช้คลาวด์ที่สมบูรณ์แบบ ทางเดลิเทคกำลังมองหาบุคลากรที่มีความกระตือรือร้นในการแก้ปัญหา, สามารถทำงานร่วมกับลูกค้าได้อย่างมืออาชีพ, และมีความรู้ด้านเทคโนโลยีอย่างกว้างขวาง ไม่ว่าจะเป็นระบบปฏิบัติการ Linux และ Windows, ทักษะด้านการดูแลระบบ, ประสบการณ์ด้านเน็ตเวิร์ก, การเขียนโปรแกรม, ความรู้เกี่ยวกับความปลอดภัย, และความพร้อมในการร่วมมือกับทีมพัฒนาแอพพลิเคชั่นเพื่อยกระดับระบบขึ้นไปใน Production รายละเอียดเพิ่มเติม คุณจะได้ทำอะไร - คุณจะมีหน้าที่รับผิดชอบด้านการจัดการและดูแลระบบปฏิบัติการ, การบริหารเครื่องเซิร์ฟเวอร์, การจัดการเน็ตเวิร์ก, การสร้างแดชบอร์ดสำหรับการแสดงกราฟ, พร้อมทั้งการปรับปรุงและเปลี่ยนแปลงระบบต่างๆ นอกจากนี้คุณยังจะต้องมีความเข้าใจในสถาปัตยกรรมระบบที่ถูกมอบหมายให้คุณรับผิดชอบ เพื่อให้คุณสามารถวางแผนและประยุกต์การแก้ไขปัญหาได้อย่างมืออาชีพ ไม่ว่าจะเป็นแบบแมนนวลหรือผ่านวิธีการอัตโนมัติ นอกเหนือจากนั้น, คุณยังจะมีหน้าที่ในการพัฒนาสคริปต์หรือโปรแกรมเพื่อลดความซ้ำซ้อนของกระบวนการทำงาน ทำไมงานนี้ถึงสำคัญ - เรามุ่งมั่นปฏิบัติตามคำสั่งซื้อการบริการ (Service Level Agreement - SLA) ที่ได้ตกลงไว้ เพื่อรับรองให้ลูกค้ามั่นใจในความเสถียรและความสามารถในการให้บริการของระบบที่เราจัดการ โดยสังเกตุจากการที่ระบบมีผู้ใช้งานอยู่อย่างต่อเนื่องในทุก ๆ ชั่วโมงของวันและทำการปฏิบัติงานโดยไม่หยุดชะงัก อะไรเป็นความท้าทาย - การจัดการและดูแลระบบเป็นสาขาที่หลากหลายและเต็มไปด้วยความท้าทาย ซึ่งสะท้อนถึงการเปลี่ยนแปลงอย่างต่อเนื่องของเทคโนโลยีคลาวด์ที่ก้าวหน้าอย่างรวดเร็ว ในบทบาทนี้, คุณจะได้ศึกษาและประยุกต์ใช้ความรู้ในการตัดสินใจแก้ไขปัญหาทั้งในมิติทางเทคนิคและมิติทางธุรกิจ นอกจากนี้คุณยังจะเป็นหนึ่งในผู้เป็นส่วนสำคัญที่สนับสนุนการพัฒนาและปรับปรุงกระบวนการทำงานให้เป็นไปอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ การสาธิตผลงานดังกล่าวสามารถเป็นไปในรูปแบบของ SLA, แผนภาพ, ขั้นตอนการทำงาน, เครื่องมือเฉพาะทาง, หรือเอกสารอ้างอิง และตัวคุณจะมีบทบาทสำคัญในการวางแผนและคาดการณ์ตนเองเพื่อรับมือกับเหตุการณ์ที่อาจเกิดขึ้นในอนาคต คุณสมบัติขั้นต่ำ ผู้สมัครควรมีวุฒิการศึกษาไม่ต่ำกว่าปริญญาตรี หรือปริญญาโท ในสาขาคอมพิวเตอร์หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง ต้องมีความรู้และเข้าใจด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศและการสื่อสารอย่างละเอียด ควรสามารถใช้ภาษาอังกฤษเป็นอย่างดีเพื่อการสื่อสารในการทำงาน มีความสนใจและ/หรือมีประสบการณ์ทางด้าน Amazon Web Services คุณสมบัติพิจารณาเพิ่มเติม สามารถยืนยันว่ามีประสบการณ์ในการดูแลและจัดการระบบ และเครือข่าย มีความรู้และประสบการณ์เฉพาะทางในด้านระบบ, เครือข่าย, หรือความปลอดภัยข้อมูล มีความเชี่ยวชาญเกี่ยวกับเครื่องมือและโปรแกรมของ Linux / Unix มีประวัติที่สะท้อนถึงการดูแลระบบอย่างต่อเนื่อง 24x7 พร้อมมีการจัดการปัญหาผ่านระบบ Ticket มีประสบการณ์ในการใช้เครื่องมือสำหรับการดูแลระบบเฉพาะด้าน Server หรือ Application สามารถให้บริการวิเคราะห์ปัญหาและจัดการ Operations สำหรับระบบขนาดใหญ่ คุณสมบัติส่วนตัว มุ่งมั่นในการเรียนรู้และพัฒนาความรู้ความสามารถอย่างต่อเนื่อง มีความอดทนและมุ่งมั่นในการแก้ไขปัญหาที่พบ สามารถทำงานร่วมกับทีมได้ดีและสนับสนุนคณะทำงาน เปิดรับและยืนยันต่อการเปลี่ยนแปลงทางด้านเทคโนโลยีและนวัตกรรม เพิ่มเติม โปรดคลิกที่ ลิงก์นี้ เพื่อศึกษารายละเอียดเกี่ยวกับการทำงานกับเรา [link removed] Overview Our Operations & Support team is dedicated to managing high-importance systems for customer operations (Mission-Critical) with the application of modern, efficient technologies. We use a variety of tools and methods to solve problems, ensuring that our clients' systems operate smoothly. Within the team, you will learn and gain experience in handling issues related to Amazon Web Services and other vendors, ensuring that we provide the most suitable and effective problem-solving approaches to our clients. This ultimately leads to a perfect cloud usage experience. DailiTech is looking for individuals who are enthusiastic about problem-solving, can work professionally with clients, and have extensive knowledge of technology. This includes expertise in Linux and Windows operating systems, system administration skills, network experience, programming, knowledge of security, and readiness to collaborate with application development teams to elevate systems to Production. More details What you will do - Your responsibilities will include managing and maintaining operating systems, administering servers, managing networks, creating dashboards for displaying graphs, as well as upgrading and modifying various systems. Additionally, you will need to understand the architecture of the systems assigned to you, enabling you to plan and apply problem-solving techniques professionally, whether manually or through automation. Beyond this, you will also be responsible for developing scripts or programs to reduce redundancy in processes. Why this job is important - We are committed to adhering to the Service Level Agreements (SLAs) to ensure our customers have confidence in the stability and service capability of the systems we manage. This is evident from the continuous use of the system by users every hour of the day and its uninterrupted operation. What the challenge is - Managing and maintaining systems is a diverse field full of challenges, reflecting the continuous changes of rapidly advancing cloud technology. In this role, you will explore and apply your knowledge in making decisions that address both technical and business aspects. Additionally, you will be a key supporter in developing and improving efficient operational processes. Demonstrating such work can be in the form of SLAs, diagrams, workflows, specialized tools, or reference documents. You will play a crucial role in planning and anticipating future events. Minimum qualifications Applicants should have a minimum educational qualification of a Bachelor's degree or a Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field. Must have knowledge and a detailed understanding of information technology and communications. Should be able to use the English language proficiently for communication in a work environment. Have an interest and/or experience in Amazon Web Services. Additional qualifications considered Able to confirm experience in managing systems and networks. Possess specific knowledge and experience in systems, networks, or data security. Expertise in Linux/Unix tools and software. A history of managing systems continuously 24x7, with issue management through a Ticket system. Experience in using tools for specific server or application management. Ability to provide analytical and operational management services for large-scale systems. Personal qualifications Committed to continuous learning and skill development. Possesses patience and determination in problem-solving. Able to work well within a team and support the workforce. Open to and adaptable to changes in technology and innovation. Additional information Please click on this link to learn more about working with us. [link removed]

Jobtitle: Grants Analyst - Capital Market Development Fund
column8: Responsibility Job Summary : An analyst in grant development operations, helping CMDF to successfully offer grant funds in support of proposals for existing or future capital market development programs. Major Duties : Provide centralized grant administration and coordination of grant activities. Plan, organize, and coordinate all aspects of grant-related initiatives. Analyze and prepare grant proposals. Monitor grant administration through on-site evaluations and reviews of plans and reports. Maintain and organize grant and contract files. Qualification ​Bachelor’s degree in related field. Good command of Thai and English. No prior working experience is required. Interested candidates, please submit your applications ( by word format only ) with detailed resumes stating qualifications, contact telephone number and current photo via APPLY NOW Human Resources Department The Stock Exchange of Thailand The Stock Exchange of Thailand Building, 17th Fl., 93 Ratchadaphisek Road, Dindaeng, Dindaeng, Bangkok 10400 Thailand

Job Description: Accomplish IT General Control assessment (ITGC) e.g. design, walkthrough, and operating test following company's guideline. Application Audit (SAP). Collaborate with concerned departments both internal and external to complete ITGC assessment. Summarize an assessment audit reports and to report to concerned persons. Job Qualification: Bachelor Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Business Computer or any related fields 1-2 years experience in IT General and Application Controls, SAP. Having knowledge and familiar with Accounting, IT General and Application Controls, SAP, and IT Auditing. Good command of written and spoken English.

หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ เขียนเว็บไซต์ เกี่ยวกับ SEO พัฒนาเว็บไซต์ / Web App ตาม requirement โดยใช้ภาษา HTML, CSS framework เช่น Bootstrap หรือ Metrial design, JavaScript, TypeScript และ PHP Framework เช่น Laravel, CodeIgniter หรืออื่นๆ ให้ออกมามีคุณภาพ และประสิทธิภาพสูงสุด พัฒนาปรับแต่งเว็บไซต์โดยใช้ WordPress และการใช้ Plug-in WordPress โดยเฉพาะ WooCommerce รับผิดชอบและพัฒนาเว็บไซต์ Frontend ด้วย Angular, React, Vue อย่างใดอย่างหนึ่ง พัฒนาเว็บไซต์ Responsive และปรับแต่งเว็บไซต์เพื่อเชื่อมต่อกับ 3rd parties APIs ต่างๆ ดูแล แก้ไขปัญหา Bug / Error ข้อผิดพลาดที่เกิดขึ้นกับระบบเว็บไซต์ ประสานงาน/ทำงานร่วมกับทีมต่างๆ เช่น ทีมพัฒนาผ่าน Source Control (Git), ทีม Digital Marketing, ทีมพัฒนาธุรกิจ, ทีม customer service ในการทำงานให้ได้ตามผลลัพธ์ที่วางไว้ คุณสมบัติ อายุ 25 ปี ขึ้นไป วุฒิปริญญาตรีวิศวกรคอมพิวเตอร์, วิทยาศาสตร์คอมพิวเตอร์ หรือสาขาอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง 3 ปีขึ้นไป ในสายงานเขียนเว็บไซต์ หรือประเภทที่เกี่ยวข้อง ไม่จำกัดเพศ สามารถเขียนเว็บไซต์ PHP, Ajax, JAVA Script, CSS, HTML สามารถเขียน Website ด้วย Wordpress ได้เป็นอย่างดี สามารถใช้งาน SQL Statement กับฐานข้อมูล MySQL, MsSQL และ NoSQL มีความสามารถในการปรับแต่ง Template มีความเชี่ยวชาญและทักษะด้านการวิเคราะห์ออกแบบระบบงานและพัฒนาระบบ มีความคิดสร้างสรรค์ มีความรับผิดชอบ กระตือรือร้น ไฝ่รู้ และสามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้

Responsibilities: Design, develop and maintain software systems using C# and ASP.NET (MVC5) according to requirement specifications. Test the developed software to meet the data, logical, functional requirements, and document the test results according to Unit Test document. Skills & Requirements: 5+ years of experience as a .NET developer Strong knowledge of OOP and the Microsoft stack: C#, .NET 4, ASP.NET, MVC5, WebAPI, Entity Framework Sound knowledge of SQL Server and store procedures is a must Knowledge of HTML5/CSS/JS is a must Knowledge of AngularJS and TypeScript is a plus Knowledge of UML, Agile and Scrum is a plus Good command of English, able to communicate with foreign partners and colleagues Positive, customer-service minded, with analytical and problem solving skills Eager to learn new technologies Self-motivated, creative, able to take the initiative Bachelor's Degree or higher in Computer Science/Engineering/Information Technology or related field of study We offer an attractive remuneration package, a fast-paced and exciting working environment, and provide challenging opportunities for life-long learning and career development. Interested candidates are invited to send your comprehensive resume with current and expected salary package via this job ad. Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Please consult our Candidate Privacy Notice to know more about how we collect, use and transfer our candidates’ information: https://2c2p.com/candidate-privacy-notice. By submitting your resume and information, you acknowledge that you have read our privacy policy and consent to receive email and/or other electronic messaging communication from 2C2P.

Jobtitle: Business Development Officer (Business Development Thailand and...
Company: Global Power Synergy Public Company Limited
column8: Main Purpose: Coordinate and support business development in Thailand including conventional and renewable power development for commercial and industrial sectors, energy platform and solution in industrial estates as well as other related business that align with short to long-term strategy of GPSC. Responsibilities : Support team of greenfield and brownfield projects development for merger and acquisition, joint partnering, and divestments activities which align with business direction in Thailand. Support for new business models and opportunities along the power business value chain to create new area of opportunities for sustainable expansion in Thailand. Develop network, working, liaising and communicating with government institutions and other stakeholders on regulation requirements for socio-economic, environmental, land acquisition, technical and other aspects necessary to facilitate project development. Support all relevant and critical elements of projects under responsibility, including but not limited to analyze and select the best technical configurations, partners, contractors, that suitable for company’s strategies and customers’ needs. Identify key risk factors and propose mitigation plan of each project under responsibility from business development perspective and report to risk assessment meeting. Prepare all required project documents in compliance with applicable internal/external processes and regulations. Analyze financial projection, prepare, and monitor projects’ budgets, expenses as well as provide information to accommodate progress reports which may require. Support for feasibility study until COD to ensure the smooth development of the project within approved budget in timely manner. Complete other jobs as assigned by management. Qualification: Master’s degree in related field i.e. engineering (preferably Electrical, Mechanical or Process Engineering), MBA, or other related fields. Experience in business transactions and project development of renewable energy and large-scale power projects Experience in business transactions and project development of renewable energy and large-scale power projects Experience with technical, financial, economic, and legal aspects of business transactions Managerial role in energy business is a plus Background in feasibility study and due diligence process Strong interpersonal, communication, negotiation, and presentation skills Proficiency in Microsoft Office Good English with at least TOEIC scored 700

Job Descriptions: 1. Handle chemical products (Plastic compounds, Dyestuff, Adhesion etc.) for Sale. 2. Find new business with managers/colleagues, both new customers and existing ones. 3. Stock Management with our Customer Service team. 4. Good knowledge about import and export, Incoterms. 5. Coordinate with another parent or subsidiary company. 6. Basic PC skill is required, especially Word/Excel/Outlook. 7. Experience in utilizing webinars for sales activities is preferred. 8. An outgoing person is preferred since we could go to customer places or overseas for business. Qualifications: - More than 2 years of experiences as sales (Chemical, Agri, Livestock, Food, or any field) - Good communication (speaking and writing : TOEIC level 650) - Driver License is a MUST

Company: LAEM CHABANG INTERNATIONAL TERMINAL COMPANY LIMITED
column8: PRIMARY POSITION OBJECTIVE  : Provide all Window Server to ensure high performance for company. Provide all Security System (Trend Micro Systems, Firewall-1 and VPN-1 system) to ensure high performance for company. Provide O365 Mail system to ensure high performance for company. Daily administration and maintain of  the various operation applications on Windows Server such as TOS, IFS and all other PC Applications etc. Daily administration and maintain of all computer equipment (Printer, Network, etc…) QUALIFICATIONS Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology or related field. At least 5 years of related professional experience in Infrastructure System, Cyber Security Technology. Experiences in maintaining computer, Network & Server, internet connection technologies including Data Backup and antivirus solutions. Familiar with prevalent networking, security technology including Windows servers, Network Intrusion, Firewall and security equipment. Application letter in English including current and expected salary together with resume, transcript and recent photo may be send by click " APPLY NOW " Laem Chabang International Terminal Co.,Ltd. PO box 11, Laem Chabang, Sriracha, Chonburi, 20231, Thailand Tel : 038 408200 ext. 5141 www.lcit.com

KPMG’s Management Consulting group assists our clients identify and solve the challenges that stand in the way of their growth and progress. We will work with clients as colleagues, shoulder-to-shoulder, until we have delivered the results that matter to clients. Ideally, we create a better future for our clients and our people. KPMG's Management Consulting group assists our clients in improving and transforming business performance through strategic and operational re-engineering and better leverage of technology investments. We help develop strategies relating Finance Transformation, Supply Chain Management, IT Strategy Implementation, Cost Optimization, Business Integration, Business Intelligence as well as ERP implementation services. Specifically, we are looking for someone who is familiar with Project Management Office (PMO) for large or complex system implementation. Job description Work as an integral part of KPMG Management Consulting to execute process transformation, measurable improved operational performance, and organizational restructuring. Work with client businesses throughout the project lifecycle by leveraging business performance improvement approaches and frameworks and helping to ensure timely execution of project deliverables Lead and deliver large, complex client engagements that identify, design, and implement creative business and technology solutions for large companies. Provide service excellence by identifying key client business issues, determining client needs by supplementing the standard assessment techniques and tools with innovative approaches. Perform project management activities including development and management of project scope, schedules, budgets, risks, resources, quality, and delivery. Work with managers or senior managers to develop and present KPMG Advisory offerings to the market. Drive and support in the business development and presentation of proposals to client Qualifications : Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Business Administration, Accounting, Finance, Information System, Computer Engineering or related field Minimum of 3-5 years relevant experience preferably within an advisory firm Working experience in process analysis, implementation or application management support activities focusing on CRM, sales and marketing, Finance & Accounting, Supply chain and ogistic. Process an analysis and improvement, process design, process management and process & technology integration experience Experience in Salesforce.com or large CRM system implementation preferred Experience in design and develop management dashboards using BI tools preferred Salesforce.com certified is a plus Strong communication and presentation capability Excellent analytical, problem solving and project management skills Proficiency in spoken and written Thai and some English.

Responsibilities: Create and maintain test automation framework pipeline Designing and developing test automation reports for development team and management. Collaborating with QA Analysts and Software Developers to develop automated test solutions. Keeping updated with the latest industry automation test technology. Qualificatios: Bachelor's degree in computer science, software development, or a related field. Previous experience as a test automation engineer. Proficiency in programming languages such as C# or Java or Python. Excellent mathematical and problem-solving skills. Highly accurate and detail-oriented Ability to complete milestones and work toward multiple deadlines simultaneously

Company: Phiboonchai Maepranom Thai Chili Paste Co., Ltd.
column8: รายละเอียดงานและหน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ จัดทำงบประมาณรายเดือน รายไตรมาสและรายปีให้สอดคล้องกับแผนงานของทุกกลุ่มงานตามที่ได้รับอนุมัติจากฝ่ายบริหาร จัดทำและวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลงบประมาณรายจ่ายและงบประมาณการลงทุนสินทรัพย์ประจำปี ตรวจสอบ รายงานและติดตามผลการใช้จ่ายให้เป็นไปตามงบประมาณประจำปี และจัดทำรายงานวิเคราะห์เปรียบเทียบการใช้งบประมาณที่เกิดขึ้นจริงกับแผนงานต่อผู้บริหาร จัดทำแผนและงบประมาณใหม่ในกรณีที่มีการปรับเปลี่ยนกลยุทธ์ หรือแผนงานในระหว่างปี ซึ่งกระทบต่องบประมาณประจำปีที่ได้จัดทำไปแล้ว จัดทำและวิเคราะห์รายงานผลประกอบการของบริษัทฯ รายเดือน รายไตรมาสและรายปี จัดทำและวิเคราะห์ผลต่างของงบการเงินที่เกิดขึ้นจริงกับงบประมาณ รวมทั้งข้อมูลในอดีตและข้อมูลอุตสาหกรรม วิเคราะห์และสอบทานรายงานต้นทุนและค่าใช้จ่ายรายแผนก จัดทำรายงานการวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลในหลากหลายมุมมองที่เป็นประโยชน์ ทั้งเป็นรายเดือน รายไตรมาสและรายปี ( MIS Report & Dashboard) ประสานงานกับฝ่ายขายและการตลาด รวมถึงหน่วยงานที่วางแผนกลยุทธ์เพื่อรวบรวมลักษณะความต้องการข้อมูลหรือรูปแบบรายงาน และนำมาจัดทำรายงานที่ตรงกับความต้องการของผู้ใช้ งานอื่นๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมาย จากหัวหน้างาน คุณสมบัติ จบการศึกษาปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป สาขาบัญชี มีประสบการณ์ด้านการทำงบประมาณ/งานด้านบัญชี 3 ปีขึ้นไป มีประสบการณ์ทำงานในอุตสาหกรรมโรงงานอาหาร หรืออุตสาหกรรมโรงงานอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์การใช้ ERP ขนาดใหญ่ เช่น Epicor , SAP, Infor, Oracle,  Microsoft Dynamics AX เป็นต้น มีความชำนาญในการใช้งาน Microsoft Excel เป็นอย่างดี สามารถใช้โปรแกรม Power BI หรือ Reporting Tool อื่นๆ ได้ มีทักษะด้านวิเคราะห์ สามารถคิดเป็นระบบ เชื่อมโยง วางแผน และแก้ไขปัญหาได้ดี มีทักษะในการบริหารจัดการข้อมูลในระบบเชิงสถิติ มีความรู้ความสามารถและตรรกะที่ดีในการคิดวิเคราะห์ในเชิงตัวเลข มีทักษะในการบริหารจัดการข้อมูลในระบบเชิงสถิติ มีความรู้ความสามารถและตรรกะที่ดีในการคิดวิเคราะห์ในเชิงตัวเลข สามารถทำงานเป็นทีม, มีแรงจูงใจในตัวเองต่อความสำเร็จของงาน

Key Responsibilities: Participate in service delivery execution by supporting role in technical part Resolve all technical issues in solutions/projects Activate and provision new service for service delivery Trouble shooting during service delivery process Configure all connectivity and add on services ex WIFI , Firewall , DDoS , SD-WAN , Router , Virtual Firewall as a plan from NP ,TPD and ICT Other duties as assigned Qualifications: Bachelor’s Telecommunication Engineering, Computer Engineering,  or related field Proven experience 1-3 years as IT solution, Add on service, Network, Firewall, Wi Fi etc. Excellent client-facing and internal communication skills Strong leadership, analysis, negotiation, and problem-solving skill Flexibility and ability to work and enjoy working under tight deadlines and handle pressure Hands-on experience with monitoring, network diagnostic and network analytics tools Certifying in CCNA / CCNP is preferred

Overview: We are seeking a hands-on Assistant Project Manager to lead and execute a range of projects within our organization. This role requires both strategic planning and active involvement in the day-to-day operations to ensure projects are delivered on time, within scope, and within budget. The ideal candidate will be a proactive individual who can seamlessly transition between planning, coordinating, and executing project tasks. Key Responsibilities: Project Planning and Execution : - Develop detailed project plans to monitor and track progress. - Actively manage all project phases from initiation to closure. - Coordinate internal resources and third-party vendors for the flawless execution of projects. Cost Management: - Conduct thorough cost analysis for each project phase. - Manage project budgets, ensuring minimal deviations. - Negotiate with vendors and suppliers to achieve cost-effective agreements. Stakeholder Communication: - Regularly update stakeholders on project progress. - Handle any issues or risks that arise, ensuring all stakeholders are informed and involved in decision-making. Quality Assurance: - Implement and oversee quality controls throughout project execution. - Ensure all projects meet or exceed the quality standards set by the company. Implementation and Monitoring: - Implement project solutions in a timely and efficient manner. - Monitor the efficiency and success of project implementation, making adjustments as necessary. Documentation: - Document project phases and create summary reports for company stakeholders. - Ensure all project documentation is complete, up-to-date, and stored appropriately. Requirements: - Bachelor's degree in Business, Project Management, or a related field. - 3 years of project management experience, preferably in a hands-on role. - Proven ability to manage all aspects of a project including planning, execution, and closing. - Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. - Excellent written and verbal communication skills. - Proficient in project management software tools (specify if any particular software is preferred) - Able to communicate in English.

column8: Key Accountabilities Develop IT audit plan and audit work program. Evaluate the following areas:Perform I&T audit regarding the company’s Information Technology (IT) and Operation Technology (OT) systems. Information and Technology (I&T) related risks and internal controls in both general and application controls Compliance according to company’s policies, procedures, guidelines, laws, and regulations Deliver and provide value-added recommendations to create and increase the extent of effective, efficient, and sufficient IT and OT controls. Follow up the implementation of audit recommendations with the process owner to ensure that risks are appropriately mitigated. Provide advice on data analytic techniques and perform advanced or complex data analytic to support audit processes such as Audit Planning / Risk Analysis, Audit Scope, Execution of an Audit and Visualization/ Reporting Support other audit teams by performing the IT Application Controls Audit Coordinate with function/business owners in order to monitor and assure technology audit activities. Provide consulting services for other functions as requested such as strategic advice and lessons learnt from I&T projects and technologies. Professional Knowledge & Experiences Bachelor’s Degree or Master’s Degree in IT, Computer Science, Computer/Network Engineering, Information Technology Management, or relevant fields 3-5 years of experience in information technology (IT) and/or operational technology (OT)-related audit Good knowledge and skill about the risks, controls and regulatory compliance of IT and/or OT systems Good knowledge in cybersecurity, network design and security, software engineering, IT governance, BCP (Business Continuous Plan) and DRP (Disaster Recovery Plan) Good knowledge of Information and Technology (I&T) standards and control frameworks such as COBIT2019, NIST Cybersecurity Framework, ISO27001, IEC62443, etc. Have a good understanding of risk-based audit and IT audit universe and be able to conduct and IT audit plan, both a short-term and long-term plan. Familiarity with audit methodologies and techniques, such as risk assessment, control testing, and audit planning. Good knowledge and ability to formulate recommended actions to address I&T risks. Preferable to be certified a well-known or industry-recognized IT auditor and/or cybersecurity certification such as Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA), Certified in Risk and Information Systems Control (CRISC), Certified Data Privacy Solutions Engineer (CDPSE), etc. Good communication and interpersonal skill Strong negotiation and presentation skills. Good command of spoken and written English Good project management skills Occasionally work upcountry / overseas

Knowledge & Skill - MSSQL and Oracle and PostgreSQL configuration - MSSQL and Oracle Server and PostgreSQL Servers - Monitoring tools setup - Databases Conceptual - Database management tools - Shell Scripts and Python Program - Tuning Database - Upgrade Database with new releases - Troubleshoot Database issue.

Company: บริษัท ดีเฟนส์มี จำกัด
column8: Systems Analyst plays a crucial role in bridging the gap between business needs and technical solutions. This individual is responsible for understanding business requirements, analyzing processes, and designing technology solutions that align with organizational goals. The BSA collaborates with business stakeholders, project teams, and technical experts to ensure the successful delivery of software projects and system enhancements. Responsibilities: Requirements Gathering: Elicit and document business requirements from stakeholders using interviews, workshops, and documentation analysis. Requirements Analysis: Analyze and prioritize business requirements, ensuring they are clear, complete, and feasible. Systems Design: Collaborate with technical experts and software developers to design and architect technology solutions that meet business needs. Process Mapping: Document and analyze existing business processes to identify areas for improvement and suggest optimized workflows. Technical Specifications: Create detailed technical specifications and user stories based on business requirements for development teams. Stakeholder Collaboration: Act as a liaison between business stakeholders, project managers, and technical teams to facilitate effective communication and understanding. User Acceptance Testing (UAT): Participate in UAT activities to validate that the implemented solutions meet business requirements. Change Management: Assist in change management efforts by helping stakeholders understand the impact of technology changes and supporting training efforts. Risk Assessment: Identify potential risks and issues during the development process and propose mitigation strategies. Continuous Improvement: Stay updated with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies to suggest process improvements and innovative solutions. Qualifications and Skills: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Business Administration, or a related field. Proven experience as a Business Systems Analyst or similar role, preferably in Agile/Scrum software development or IT projects. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to understand complex business processes and propose effective solutions. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to effectively collaborate with stakeholders at all levels. Proficiency in creating visualizations, process flow diagrams, and technical documentation. Familiarity with software architecture concepts and an understanding of technical systems. Experience with requirement management tools and software, such as JIRA or Confluence. Ability to work independently, prioritize tasks, and meet project deadlines. What We Offer: Comprehensive training and mentorship by experienced professionals in the field. Hands-on experience working on real projects and contributing to meaningful solutions. Opportunity to grow and develop your skills in a supportive and dynamic work environment. Competitive salary and benefits package. Laptop Provided (Mac/Window) Health Insurance and Learning Perk

Jobtitle: DevSecOps Engineer/ Network, Infrastructure, Security (Hybrid working)
column8: DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: Design and develop the working process or tools by DevOps Concept to improve technical teams and production environment Research and suggest technical feasibility to improve Conicle’s products Work with technical team and assist CTO build technical execution plans to ensure team hit the working and delivery schedule Build and improve the infrastructure including Automating infrastructure, monitoring, deployment pipelines and infrastructure solutions DevOps Solution Implementation for software, process, people, and practices for build release and application lifecycle changes Create and arrange documents flow to support related teams such as Technical, Product and Project Setup / Config / Monitor Infrastructure as a Service and our service TECHNOLOGY STACK: Python - Django Framework Node / Vue / Nuxt Gitlab CI MariaDB / MongoDB / Memcached / Redis RabbitMQ / Celery Docker and Kubernetes Ansible / Fabric / Terraform KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND ABILITIES: DevOps concept understanding is a must Knowledge of Python / Bash / SQL Familiar and able to work with MariaDB/Mongo database Knowledge of Continuous Integration, Continuous Deployment concept including Infrastructure as Code Knowledge of web services, network protocol, socket and deployment Linux server environment is an advantage Excellent in communication, interpersonal and documentation skills EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE: Bachelor degree in Computer engineering or a related field Experience in Developer or Software Engineer experience / Network engineer / Server Engineer

Familiarize and ensure thorough understanding of the existing setup of company’s IT infrastructure, operating systems, applications and equipment, organization, functions, user groups and business processes and workflows. Familiarize and ensure thorough understanding of IT, system access and data security policies, procedures and forms/templates/reports and communicate the same to all stakeholders for company-wide use. Propose the policies, procedures, guidelines, controls and response plans in relation to the access and usage of IT systems, data integrity/security and business continuity. Gather requirements on the business processes, facilitate the discussion and conclusions on areas for improvements, draft business workflows and functional specifications for the implementation of systems to enhance efficiency and effectiveness of business operations and prepare for expansion. Evaluate, propose, implement, monitor, maintain and revisit the systems implementation/modifications for both users and administrators’ role as per the agreed business blueprint and functional specifications. Act as a 2nd tier IT system support, coach the IT Support staff to handle/resolve IT system matters/issues and train users the relevant systems and modules. Act as a focal point between users and developers to resolve/screen enquiries and propose solutions to manager for decision making. Establish a set of IT vendor list who offer the expertise matched with the company’s IT system requirements. Build/enhance relationship and effectively manage the IT vendors in order to deliver the agreed business requirements. Keep up-to-date and research new IT technology and solutions applicable to the company’s business and operations. Perform any other jobs as assigned by supervisors. Qualification Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, IT Engineering, MIS or related fields. Good command of spoken and written English and Thai. At least 7 years of experience in IT system administration, execution and modification. Experiences in the retail industry and business startup using SAP, inventory management systems and POS systems with EDC and/or Handheld Terminal are mandatory. Experiences in performing the role of Business Analyst are preferred. Competent user of all MS Office programs and basic desktop applications for office uses. Good communications and able to communicate well and in a pleasant manner with users with diverse backgrounds incl. executives, colleagues, and vendors. Working location: MRT Chatuchak or BTS Mochit ( Mon-Fri) 5 Days of working

column8: The SAP Business Analyst CS will act as the interface between Business and IT, plan, design, configure and implement effective business and system solutions, identify opportunities for improvement, train the SAP key users, participate actively to SAP Projects, and solve complex issues in collaboration with the Operations team. Job responsibility Definition of migration strategy. Implementation of new S/4 platform from fit/gap workshops to post go live activities. Activity will mainly be on S/4 but could also be on ECC until migration is completed. Review change requests, clarify them and present solutions to Change Advisory Board. Conduct workshops with Business during project fit/gap analysis phase, identify gaps and propose solutions. Prepare quotations for customers. Provide support to Operations team for complex issues. Provide knowledge transfer to colleagues about new implemented solutions. Create or update functional specifications with test cases for developer and follow-up advancement of development. Create or update process flows, customizing documents, user documentations, test scripts, etc. Profile (Competency / Skill) Experience in SAP SD/MM, SAP S/4 HANA environment is a must, ECC is a plus. Certification in SAP, ECC and or S/ 4 HANA is a plus. Good knowledge of CS processes and/or logistic processes which should include implementation, support, design, training, and configuration. Preferably from a multinational environment handling consumer goods/retail industry. Professional Required (Qualification) Bachelor or Master Degree of Computer Science, IT, or similar qualification and/or relevant experience. Good knowledge of ABAP programming/debug. Proficient in Microsoft Office. Good in oral/written English language is a must. Able to Travel.

Jobtitle: IT Support Engineer/ไอที ซัพพอร์ต
column8: Aware’s Group IT Overview Aware is a privately held Technology Company focused on Business-to-Business (B2B) applications that remove redundant manual processes and drive down costs. We strive to break down technology barriers and provide intelligent and predictive solutions that optimize our client’s business results. Group IT will help and support all IT issue within the Organization. Responsibilities Process calls, chats and emails from end users Create, update, follow up and close tickets and ensure processing of tickets within SLA defined timelines Provide user support via remote control systems in order to diagnose and solve simple incidents Provide on-site support for end users located at customer offices around Bangkok Handle computer preparation and installations and hand over to end users Handle repair and warranty cases with vendors and delivery of hardware to respective support centers Process standard service requests such as creation of user accounts and authorization requests Perform administrative tasks such as regular reporting and system checks Provide simple IT related trainings and prepare written instructions to end users Qualification Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology, ICT, Computer Engineering, Software Engineering, or other related fields At least 1 year expereince as IT Support, Help Desk, Service Desk Knowledge in Operating System (Windows 11, Mac) Able to support applications such as Microsoft 365, Active Directory, Office (2019/365), Microsoft Exchange, Adobe and Malware protection (Windows Defender, Sophos, Kaspersky, etc.) Able to use Incident Management Tools (Jira, etc.) Practical, day to day operation in a corporate IT support department Able to support users on the phone or using remote control tools Experience in resolving incidents with standard operating systems and end user applications Professional and effective communication with users on all levels, preferably in a multi-national environment Certifications in Microsoft or ITIL field will be advantaged Good command in Thai & English (Speaking, Listening, Writing and Reading) -- Interview in English The benefits of working at Aware go beyond the awesome team you get to work with. We offer: Social Security Fund Provident fund up to 15% Annual Leave start from 8-day a year, Business Leave 3-day, Sick Leave Health insurance program (OPD, IPD, ER) & Life Insurance Health Lump sum subsidized (Dental, Eye-care, Fitness, Medical) Financial support for your personal needs (Marriage, childbirth, and funeral arrangements) Personal Computer, Laptop, Mobile subsidized Language, technical and business training, and support Annual Party & Recreational Activities Performance Bonus Aware Corporation Limited (ACL) Contact: Thanthip (Nat) Tel: 084-147-3407 Bangkok: Phaholyothin Place Building, Samsennai, Phayathai, Bangkok 10400 Chiang Mai: 25/1 Moo 2, T.Pabong A.Sarapee, Chiang Mai 50140 Web Site : http://www.aware.co.th [link removed]

column8: Job Descriptions: In charge as assistant to project manager to execute and conduct assigned projects and accountable for the overall project and multiple workstreams including project plan, work schedule control, design & build deliverables, project coordinator and project outcome monitoring and evaluation. Besides, being a project member for support, coordinate, and facilitate all tasks related to projects being assigned. / Work as part of the project team on the tasks being assigned, such as data collection, workflow development, creating memos, and conducting surveys. Besides, have to monitor and evaluate the project result after implementation, etc. Business Planning: A business plan is set up and reviewed. Follow up on the progress of business/action plan; analyze/monitor/ keep track of the progress of each department’s plan, develop contingency plan (if needed) and review key focus KPI Target. Analysis data and research : Update and follow up on the economic situation and future trends. Able to communicate in English both speaking and writing Computer literature in Microsoft Office Strong analytical skills, problem-solving Skill and logic thinking Able to work under pressure and limited time line Presentation and reporting skill Project Management skill

Company: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited (Ayudhya Capital Auto)
column8: Responsibilities: To be a Project Member of Credit & Operations to manage initiative projects Manage and coordinate to seeking the solution to improve wing to wing processes in credit & operations area and related other Coordinate with all Credit & Operations team to UAT and prepare for implementation Manage to arrange the training session for system implementation Coordinate to IT to solve system issues and related To do job assignment to support Project Implementation & Process Excellent Management Section Head Qualification: Bachelor’s degree or higher in IT, Business Administration or related fields Minimum 5 years of experience in Operation Process and Project Management Having background in Hire Purchase / Finance / Banking industry will be an advantage Good knowledge of Project Management and Process Improvement Good command of written and spoken English Good communication and presentation skills, creative thinking, energetic and can-do attitude Human Resources Department Krungsri Auto 550 Krungsri Ploenchit Office, Floor 30, Ploenchit Road, Lumphini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330 www.krungsriauto.com [link removed]

หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ ดูแลระบบ Web Application ที่ใช้งานจริงไปแล้ว  ช่วยแก้ไข bug หรือเพิ่มเติมฟังก์ชันเล็กๆ น้อยๆ ตามคำร้องของผู้ใช้งาน ศึกษา พัฒนาระบบ Web Application ใหม่ๆ o   ศึกษาทำความเข้าใจประเด็นปัญหาของหน่วยธุรกิจ (business unit) o   ร่วมวางแผนโครงการ, นำเสนองบประมาณและแนวทางดำเนินงาน, นำเสนอข้อมูลทางเลือกในการลงทุน และประเมินทางเลือกเพื่อนำเสนออนุมัติโครงการ o   สร้างฐานข้อมูล และพัฒนาโปรแกรม ภายใต้การดูแลของเจ้าหน้าที่พัฒนาระบบ Web อาวุโส o   ทดสอบโปรแกรมที่ได้ วางแผนการขึ้นระบบของซอฟต์แวร์ร่วมกับผู้จัดการโครงการ o   จัดทำเอกสาร คู่มือ การใช้งานซอฟต์แวร์ที่ได้พัฒนาและระบบที่เกี่ยวข้อง เพื่อเป็นเอกสารอ้างอิงการใช้งาน และอ้างอิงในการพัฒนาต่อยอดของซอฟต์แวร์ o   ฝึกอบรมการใช้งานให้กับผู้ใช้งานในระดับต่างๆ รวมถึงการถ่ายทอดเทคโนโลยี และการดูแล ปรับปรุงรักษาพัฒนาซอฟต์แวร์ ให้สอดคล้องกับการเปลี่ยนแปลงและทำงานได้ตรงกับความต้องการของบริษัท ศึกษา ติดตามการเปลี่ยนแปลงของเทคโนโลยี พัฒนาซอฟต์แวร์ ใหม่ๆโดยสามารถนำสิ่งที่เรียนรู้มาประยุกต์ใช้ในงานได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ คุณสมบัติ ปริญญาตรีสาขาคอมพิวเตอร์หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ หรือเชี่ยวชาญในงานบริการพัฒนา Web Application มีความเข้าใจ . NET Framework Architecture สามารถเขียนและใช้งาน ASP.net C# or VB.net, Go , Node.JS หรือ python มีความรู้ และประสบการณ์ React, Vue.JS, HTML, JS, และ CSS เป็นอย่างดี สามารถเขียนโปรแกรมในรูปแบบ OOP มีความเข้าใจ Agile, CI/CD MS.SQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL

ดูแลทางด้าน H/W, S/W, Network และอุปกรณ์สื่อสารทั้งหมดที่มีอยู่ในบริษัท ดูแลการติดตั้งโปรแกรม HRMS, ORACLE Database, PHP และ System Config ต่างๆ บน Server ของลูกค้าและบน Cloud (AWS) ให้เป็นไปตามแผนงานที่กำหนด ให้บริการและให้คำแนะนำปรึกษาแก่พนักงานในบริษัท, ทีมงาน (System Engineer) และลูกค้าในการแก้ไขปัญหาต่างๆ เกี่ยวกับ H/W, S/W, D/B และ Network ควบคุมดูแล และกำหนดแผนการทำงานให้ทีมงาน (System Engineer) ให้สามารถทำงานได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ และเสร็จตามเวลาที่กำหนด ศึกษาค้นคว้าและ Update Version ใหม่ สำหรับ OS, Database, และ PHP อย่างสม่ำเสมอ คุณสมบัติ วุฒิปริญญาตรีทางด้าน Computer Science, Computer Engineering หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์อย่างน้อย 5 ปีในการดูแล / ติดตั้ง OS Window, Linux และ Application  Software มีประสบการณ์อย่างน้อย 1 – 3 ปี ในการบริหารจัดการทีมงาน (System Engineer) มีประสบการณ์ในการติดตั้ง ORACLE Database มีประสบการณ์ในการติดตั้ง Software การจัดการเกี่ยวกับ Infrastructure บน Cloud AWS มีความเป็นผู้นำ, มีความรับผิดชอบสูง และทำงานร่วมกับผู้อื่นได้เป็นอย่างดี มีความสามารถในการสื่อสาร โดยใช้ภาษาอังกฤษได้เป็นอย่างดี

Company: Kiatnakin Phatra Securities Public Company Limited
column8: Role summary : We are looking for Technology leading professional to drive firm’s change and strategic IT project. The role is financial IT enabler to blend technology and financial knowledge to make a sustainable company’s competitive advantage. Role and Responsibilities / หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ: Gathers and analyzes software requirement to efficiently address business needs Provides team and user with technical recommendation and procedural design Liaison between user, operation team, other support area, IT vendor to provide superior customer service Develops functional specifications and system design specifications for user engagements Responsible for the application design, application development that meets system standards from beginning to end Co-operates and facilitates team and related participant interaction Qualifications / คุณสมบัติ : Significant Financial Services Industry experience(3-5 Years in Securities Brokerage & Asset Management preferred) Strong knowledge of financial product such as Equity, Derivative, Mutual Fund, Stock lending and borrowing, etc. Specific skill of brokerage operational process, clearing and settlement, risk and internal control, regulatory Ability to participate and share knowledge for Business process re-engineering, Process control review and design, Lean Bachelor or higher degree in Computer Science or related field Strong background in the following technologies: C#, .NET, MSSQL, Web application, Data Modeling, RDBMS and Data Warehouse Skill and Competencies: Self-motivated, ambitious and quickly absorb Problem solver Strong analytical and organizational skills Work independently and effectively as part of a team Handling multiple tasks and responsibilities in a dynamic environment Excellent verbal and written communication skills We offers career development, and is committed to developing each employee to fulfill his/her potential.   Successful candidates can look forward to competitive remuneration package, fringe benefits and exciting career prospects. Interested applicants: Please send your detailed resume and salary history to: The Human Resources Department Kiatnakin Phatra Securities Public Company Limited 8th Floor Human Resources Department, Muang Thai-Phatra Office Tower 1, 252/6 Ratchadaphisek Rd.,Huay-Kwang, Bangkok 10310 Contact Khun Arisa 02-3059243 (Applications will be treated with strictly confidential)

ศึกษา/ค้นคว้า และกำหนดแนวทางการออกแบบกระบวนการทำงานและระบบงานให้มีความทันสมัยและแข่งขันได้ รวมถึงเป็นที่ปรึกษาในการวิเคราะห์ พัฒนา และปรับปรุงกระบวนการให้บริการลูกค้าและกระบวนการภายในองค์กร วิเคราะห์ ออกแบบและจัดการกระบวนการทำงานภายในองค์กรเพื่อเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการปฏิบัติงาน ดำเนินการพัฒนาและปรับปรุงกระบวนการ รวมทั้งกำหนดเวลามาตรฐานในการทำงาน (SLA) บริหารโครงการที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการพัฒนาปรับปรุงกระบวนการทำงานให้เป็นไปอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ ตรงเวลา และอยู่ในต้นทุนที่เหมาะสม คุณสมบัติ จบการศึกษาปริญญาตรี/โท วิศวกรรมอุตสาหการ,MBA,การเงิน หรือสาขาอื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ด้าน Process Improvement/Process Engineer/Project Management  อย่างน้อย 1 ปี มีทักษะการคิดวิเคราะห์,การบริหารจัดทำข้อมูล,การแก้ไขปัญหา มีทักษะการสื่อสารและมีมนุษยสัมพันธ์ที่ดี สามารถใช้ภาษาอังกฤษเพื่อการสื่อสารได้ดี หากมีประสบการณ์ด้าน  Process Improvement จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ ผู้ที่สนใจสามารถสมัครด้วยตัวเองหรือส่งประวัติส่วนตัวพร้อมระบุตำแหน่งที่ต้องการสมัครมาได้ที่ : Human Resource Management Unit17th Fl. Kasikornbank Building 400/22 Phaholyothin Road, Samsen-Nai, Phayathai, Bangkok 10400 โทรศัพท์ : 0-2696-9948 โทรสาร : 0-2696-9978 โฮมเพจ : www.kasikornleasing.com

Company: Charoen Pokphand Foods Public Company Limited
column8: Responsibility: Create a standard report in Fix Form format to be used as a daily company sales report. For all levels of executives Create online Power BI reports For sales views at all levels, from store managers to upper executives. Using accelerated summary tools, prepare executive presentations in an easy-to-understand format, including daily, monthly, or annual summaries. precise and simple to grasp Create a dashboard and standard report, as well as providing information assistance to all departments inside the CPF Trading business. preparing and evaluating data before entering it into the system including seeking For a relationship to utilize in reporting. data Analysis Investigate Google Cloud Platform, Big Query, Power BI, and Excel For company data associations. Import data such as sales analytics area, product group, and delivery personnel information via the Smart soft system or Google Sheet. They must be converted and checked before They are suitable For usage Keeping customer and product information For reporting purposes Ensuring that the sales tracking system is always correct to avoid mistakes in bringing information to report Assist other departments in bringing analyzed data and making it easy to use Using Pivot Excel and Power BI tools. Qualification: Graduated with a bachelor's or master's degree business administration, statistics, applied statistics or other aspects related or have direct experience in the same field 3-5 years of experience in FMCG business or retail and wholesale business In terms of creating Dashboard and using Power BI system Knowledge of statistics such as statistical testing, most likely estimator, descriptive statistics, inferential statistics, and statistical programming (R). Knowledge of Visualization To use the Power BI program High level of computer skills (SAP, Microsoft, Cloud, Database, SQL) Excellent knowledge of Excel communication skills Numerical data and computer language Tell it out to people who don't know it to be easy to understand.

Responsibilities: Designs the overall technological architecture of the group and is responsible for the technical design of the product Engages in coding to help the team to develop the solution Solves all surfacing problems at hand by identifying and removing technical impediments Work with Product Owners to align the roadmap with all strengths and opportunities within the technical stack Mentor and coach the technical team, specifically with code reviews, be hands on and engage in coding to help the team to develop the solution and solve all surfacing problems at hand, identifies and removes technical impediments Qualifications: Minimum 7+ years’ experience in Software Development and/or systems analysis A Bachelor Degree or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or any related fields. Desired Expertise: Experience in Agile Development, with specific Enterprise Architect (or similar) experience preferred Understand relationship with Product Owner, Scrum Master, and the rest of the technical team Experience managing technical priorities within the backlog

Jobtitle: Oracle Developer,Programmer,Software Developer, Oracle Application Developer
column8: Responsibility:- Customize Oracle Application using Oracle Developer tool to support multi-international company Communicate and report to the Oracle - ERP Development manager (foreigner) directly Develop documents of Program Spec, Test script, etc. Work Mon-Fri, Saturdays maybe required on needs basis Qualification:- Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology, MIS or related fields. At least 2 years’ experience in Oracle Developer skill (Develop Oracle Form and Oracle Report) of any version as  6i, developer200 Experienced in database design/programming and PL/SQL Have knowledge in Oracle Application ERP (E-Business suite) Reporting to the ERP Development manager Analytic and problem-solving skills Good in English and good communication (spoken/ written) Technical Skills:- Oracle ERP  Modules – PO/OM / INV /  / AR / AP/GL/FA/Discrete Manufacturing/Process Manufacturing/ (preferred) / Customization using Oracle Developer  - Forms / Reports / Workflows / PLSQL/ Personalization Oracle Workflow Builder XML / XML Publisher Performance tuning / Optimization on Oracle DB Unix command / shell script Java Programming - Java, JSP, Java-based Oracle Framework Benefit and Welfare; Working Time : Monday to Friday 8:00 - 17:00 Bonus (up to company’s profit each year) 10 Days Annual Leave Provident Fund Life Insurance (OPD/IPD) Annual medical check-up Group Insurance Dental care Overtime Pay Scholarship for employees and their children Financial support for employees’ wedding Training in Thailand and overseas Membership in the employee club for participation in recreation activities, library, travel and sport competitions Purchase of company’s products at discounted price

We are seeking a highly skilled Project Manager to lead our CRM and Customer Service projects. The Project Manager will be responsible for overseeing the implementation, integration, and maintenance of our CRM system, as well as ensuring excellent customer service for our clients. The successful candidate will have experience in project management, CRM implementation, and a solid understanding of customer service best practices. Responsibilities: Manage the implementation and integration of our CRM system. Develop project plans, timelines, and budgets. Oversee project team members and ensure project goals are met on time and within budget. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of the CRM system. Ensure excellent customer service is provided to our clients by working closely with customer service representatives. Analyze customer feedback to improve the customer experience. Create reports and provide updates on project progress to senior management. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in business administration, Project Management, or related field. 5+ years of experience in project management. Experience with CRM implementation and integration. Experience in Salesforce is a plus. Understanding of customer service best practices and how they apply to CRM systems. Excellent leadership, communication, and collaboration skills. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Ability to manage multiple projects and priorities simultaneously. Proficient in project management software and tools. Experience working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. Good communication in English

As an IT Support, you will be responsible for implementing IT operations according to policy, interpret IT related issues on both system and user side to meet corporate requirements, and provide technical support in a fast-paced and demanding environment. Responsibilities: - Support/Installation/Maintenance and manage IT infrastructure, file server, PC’s and Laptops, copy machine, printer, access control, server room, IT peripherals, telephone and mobile devices and any IT equipment. - Performing remote troubleshooting through diagnostic techniques and questions. - Prepare, review and ensure accuracy of technical documentation. - Train and instruct users on the use of IT equipment and systems so that the users can effectively perform their jobs. - To prepare and control all IT Fixed Assets for example purchase the PC, Notebook for new staff, provide the IT Fixed Asset report to accounting. - Purchasing and Outsourcing control (IT related & Office Supplies). - Research and recommend new solutions to improve the IT operations. - Other assignments by immediate supervisor. Qualifications: - Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology or IT related field - At least 2 years works experienced in IT support, Network system and System administration etc., is a plus - Knowledge into Microsoft O365 services and application - Knowledge into basic networking and systems trouble - Hands-on experience with Mac OS environment. - Able to work in agile environment. - Able to manage and solve problems with a good attitude. - Able to communicate in English. - Fast learner and good attitude

General Description of Duties and Responsibilities: Analyze customer requirement, sales strategy，solution design, network design during Bidding, provide assist in design and configuration during marketing if need, and related customer clarification and communication Assist customer in generating Purchasing Order, such as Making Bill of quantity, quotation and related Clarification. Create BOQ and submit for PO processing, and make contract amendment if need. Candidate Requirements: Bachelor Degree or above in Telecommunications, Electronics & Communications or equivalent Strong knowledge in fixed network domain（ IP network, Access network and Transmission network(WDM), familiar with telecommunication architecture , familiar with technologies in said domains At least 2 years of working experience in related field is required. Experience with solution sales, planning or implementation is preferred Good command in English, Chinese capability is preferred Reliable and able to work under pressure and work well with deadlines Team player, self-motivated, result-oriented and highly independent. Possess strong analytical skills, excellent interpersonal relationship building skills, and ability to understand and capture business and technical requirements. Energetic personality, service mind, and able to work independently Proficient in computer skills, especially MS Office applications. Fresh graduates without relevant experience but passionate in telecommunication industry are encouraged to apply Huawei Technologies (Thailand) Co., Ltd. 38th Floor, No.9, G Tower Grand Rama 9, Rama 9 Road, Huaykwang Sub-district, Huaykwang District, Bangkok Metropolis, 10310 Thailand. Tel : 02-095-8199 Fax: 02-095-8000

As a Wireless Solution Engineer, you will be responsible for acting as the technical expert in mission-critical IP-based Radio network implementation, to deliver stable and resilient railway communications. You will undertake day-to-day responsibility for leading the efforts to define, develop, validate, and maintain the Radio Solution. You will serve as the point of escalation for complex technical queries encountered during the system deployment for projects we are actively engaged with around the world. You will have a strong understanding and skillsets in radio architecture, systems engineering, and cyber security. Responsibilities: Conceptualize the wireless network solution based on the system application requirements. Develop wireless network sub-system requirements framework, Define the architecture and implementation methodology for the standard radio solution Collaborate within the program team to integrate interfaces of the network solution (e.g. wired network system, application developers). Create and maintain standard documents for the radio solution in accordance with project-specific requirements. Create test cases for validation activities related to the radio solution and review test results. Act as a technical reference for issue escalation during project deployment. Ensure that the solutions proposed comply with the relevant Quality and Process directives. Regularly suggest tools and product improvements in line with technological developments. Basic Qualifications: Bachelor’s Degree in Radio and/or Telecoms Engineering, Knowledge of Wireless Network Design and deployment experience, Competencies & skills : Experience in product development. Hands-on experience with network management and traffic analysis tools (e.g. Wireshark, iperf). Proven expertise in the field of wireless communications such as Wi-Fi, GSM, 3G, 4G, Tetra technologies and their deployment. Strong knowledge of industry standard protocols (802.11a/b/g/n/ac, 3GPP REL14/15/16, SNMP, Syslog). Familiarity with wireless cyber security controls (WPA2, WPA3, WIPS, EAP-TLS). Competency in NMS implementation for Wireless Equipment status and control Familiarity with wireless network implementation using major telecoms suppliers: (Cisco, Huawei, Nokia, Westermo, Moxa, Hirschmann). Knowledge of Wi-Fi6 and 5G Technologies. Working knowledge of Requirements Management and Configuration Management tools. Be proactive and have excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Excellent spoken and written English. Experiences: Minimum 5 years of experience in wireless-related positions. You don’t need to be a train enthusiast to thrive with us. We guarantee that when you step onto one of our trains with your friends or family, you’ll be proud. If you’re up for the challenge, we’d love to hear from you! Important to note As a global business, we’re an equal-opportunity employer that celebrates diversity across the 63  countries we operate in. We’re committed to creating an inclusive workplace for everyone.

Company: A Company of the Swatch Group
column8: Designs, develops, and maintains computer software at a company. They use their creativity and technical skills and apply the principles of software engineering to help solve new and ongoing problems for an organization. Job responsibility Provide support for all in-house applications to business users. Develop and improve in-house applications as needed by the business using Microsoft technology (e.g., web application or .Net technology) linked to MS SQL Server Modification and develop of technical reports (Yield, Re-working & Un-reworkable, traceability, losses, additional functionalities. Ensure all data are valuable for management making decision from system. Develop business operation performance dashboard. Provide IT technical solution/support to the business to ensure a smooth operation. Responsible for SAP interface and support for Electronic Data Interchange (EDI) transfer from head quarter. Create and maintain software and user training documentations. Conduct user training on MS Office, SQL queries, and other IT related topics. Profile (Competency / Skill) Understanding of end-to-end SAP implementation. Analytical thinking and Problem Solving. Effective Communication Skills among Diverse Audiences. Organization to handle multiple projects. Attention to Detail. Professional Required (Qualification) Bachelor or Master Degree of Science (Software Engineering). Write popular programming languages for SQL, Microsoft.Net, Visual Studio, BI. 3-5 years of experience in software development. Good in oral/written English language is a must. Experience in retails business is a plus.

Jobtitle: Application Support/เจ้าหน้าที่ Application Support
Company: Mitsubishi Electric Kang Yong Watana Co., Ltd.
column8: หน้าที่รับผิดชอบ แก้ไขปัญหา และอุปสรรคต่างๆ ในการทำงานที่เกี่ยวข้องกับ Software ที่รับผิดชอบ จัดเก็บข้อมูล System Log เพื่อนำไปพัฒนาประสิทธิภาพของระบบที่รับผิดชอบ จัดทำ Investigete Case เพื่อการหาข้อมูล สำหรับการส่งต่องานให้กับ Vendor ภายนอก ประสานงานและดูแลการทำงาน ของ Vendor ผู้พัฒนา Sofaware ภายนอก ให้เป็นไปตาม Spec และแผนงานที่กำหนด ทดสอบ Software : Unit Test จัดทำเอกสาร Change Request และ User Sign Off เพื่อ Transfer to Production คุณสมบัติ ป.ตรี สาขาเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ, คอมพิวเตอร์ธุรกิจ, วิศวกรรมคอมพิวเตอร์ หรือที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ด้าน Support Application ในองค์กร อย่างน้อย 1 ปี มีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดี รักงานบริการ สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้เป็นอย่างดี ยินดีรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่ * หมายเหตุ : ปฏิบัติงานวันจันทร์ - วันศุกร์ ยกเว้น 3 เดือนแรกของทุกปี (ม.ค. - มี.ค.) ปฎิบัติงานวันเสาร์ เว้นเสาร์

Jobtitle: Developer - Web Application/เจ้าหน้าที่พัฒนาระบบ Web Application
Company: Samsung Life Insurance (Thailand) Public Company Limited
column8: Responsibility : 1. Transform user requirements to software design. 2. Develop and maintenance web application to support Front-end and Back-end application. 3. Integrate data from various back-end services and databases and develop process to manage date from database. 4. Test the system to ensure it achieveuser. 5. Interact and commuicate with the team. Qualifications : Necessary Skills 1. Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineer , Electronics Engineer , Computer Science or relate field. 2. New Graduate aer welcome. 3. Basic knowledge skill in programimg with C# , JAVA , HTML , CSS 4. Basic knowledge in Data Structure and Algorithm skills. 5. Knowledge or experience in database (Oracle , SQL , or NoSQL) Preferable Skills 1. Knowledge in JavaScript or related is a plus 2. Basic knowledge in version control (Git , SVN , other) would be advantage. 3. Has Experience in Web Application Development.

Work Location : Bangpoo Industrial Estate General Job functions: Support 2 Sites with rotate schedule. Control all device in server room include Networking, VLAN, Firwall, Wireless and VPN. General Description of Duties and Responsibilities: Analyzes data, as well as contributes to the design, implementation, and delivery of analytics wireless/fixed network solutions/services or business insight. Data modeling, data processing, e.g. cleaning, aggregating, merging, integration validation, and data visualizations, generate APP and reports. Communicate with product manager, service engineer to understand carrier network solution requirement, implement above data analyzing to generate APP and reports. With the help of product managers or supervisors, communicate with customer (carrier stuff) about data analyzing result as need. Candidate Requirements: Willing to engage in data analysis in the communications field and have strong learning skills. Basic knowledge of communications or electronics is preferred. Be proficient in common programming skills, master process-oriented and object-oriented program design capabilities, and be proficient in at least one programming language of C, C++, Java, or Python. Familiar with database principle, conventional computer algorithms, data structure, etc. The ability to manipulate data with SQL (Hadoop/Impala skill preferred). Capability to quick decode specific concept into data logic, then covert into diagram. Related data analysis or business intelligence experience preferred.* New graduates with potential are welcome to apply. Additional Requirement Experience building predictive models using regression and machine learning techniques. Knowledge of experimental design and causal inference experience with GIS. Experience creating informative and engaging data visualizations using industry leading tools, e.g. Tableau, Power BI. Huawei Technologies (Thailand) Co., Ltd. 38th Floor, No.9, G Tower Grand Rama 9, Rama 9 Road, Huaykwang Sub-district, Huaykwang District, Bangkok Metropolis, 10310 Thailand. Responsibilities : Providing software application support Performing analyses on software application functionality and suggesting improvements. Ensuring effective front-end and back-end functionality of applications. Consulting with the software development team, internal users, and clients to improve application performance. Managing code migration across environments to ensure continued and synchronized functionality. Establishing the root causes of application errors and find the solutions. Keeping a record of configuration changes and scheduling application updates. Documenting processes and monitoring application performance metrics. Providing front-end support to clients and colleagues in other departments. Qualification: A bachelor's degree in software engineering, computer science, information technology, information systems, computer engineering, or similar. Demonstrable experience as an application support engineer in a related field. Advanced knowledge of front-end and back-end programming languages, such as C++, JavaScript, Python, and Nifi Ability to manage code migration, document configuration changes, and monitor performance. Exceptional ability to provide front-end support to internal departments and web-based clients. Advanced proficiency in determining the causes of application errors and repairing them. Knowledge of Advanced Encryption Standards (AES). Ability to keep up with innovation in application design. English communication skills.

column8: Job Summary: You’ll be responsible for offering professional assistance and examining concerns brought up by customers or the support team to identify the underlying causes and develop solutions for clients. The technical support team will work closely with the Product Management team, Software Development, and Quality Assurance team throughout and following the investigation process. Job Descriptions: Provide professional support and investigate troubleshoot issues raised by customers Respond to technical support requirements on an assigned on-call basis and resolve software incidents in the production environment Ensure a prompt response to technical support requirements on the assigned on-call basis Ensure that the service level agreement is met in both resolution time and the quality of updates Produce professional investigation reports according to assigned service requests Work closely with the Software Development and Quality Assurance teams to ensure that the issues are resolved Make recommendations for process improvements Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems, Information Technology, or a related IT field At least 5 years of experience in a technical support role for "Senior" and 1+ year of experience for "Junior" Experience in software development or IT-related roles Strong knowledge in writing SQL commands, database technologies, web technology stack, REST API, and Micro Service architecture Good knowledge of the Java language, software development, application code, Message Queue products (e.g., IBM, ActiveMQ, Kafka), Elastic search, Kibana, and Grafana Understanding of the Spring framework (Spring Boot or Spring Cloud) Strong troubleshooting, communication, and problem analysis skills Good communication and interpersonal skills
