Could you be the full-time System Integration & Test Engineer in Bangkok, Thailand we’re looking for? Your future role Take on a new challenge and apply your system/software engineering expertise in a new cutting-edge field. You’ll report to Engineering Domain/Metier Group Manager (Bangkok,Thailand), and work alongside passionate, motivated and dedicated teammates. You'll will work in a global team to ensure the system meets its functional, safety and availability targets. Day-to-day, you’ll work closely with teams across the business as a a key contributor to the quality of the Signalling System delivered to customer. The CITYFLO product family is an urban railway Signalling System solution ensuring the operation and safety of metros and people movers all around the world. We’ll look to you for: Performing the integration testing of CITYFLO functions and interfaces as per System Requirements and Design Specifications. Analysing system specification and create test cases to properly test the system functions. Managing the various configuration of testing labs. Defining requirements for simulators needed for testing. Executing the tests, analyse results, identify issues. Writing test report and non-conformity report. Continuously improve the test process by identifying areas for improvement to increase quality and reduce cost and delay. Participating in technical meetings with system and sub-system engineers in Bangkok or Pittsburgh (US) as well as on-site project teams in order to: define test strategies, test plans and test specifications/procedures provide early input of testability aspects to product development. analyse test results for troubleshooting and bug fixing. All about you We value passion and attitude over experience. That’s why we don’t expect you to have every single skill. Instead, we’ve listed some that we think will help you succeed and grow in this role: Bachelor of Computer Engineer, Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Electronic Engineering, Information System, Telecommunications or related field. Minimum 1-3 years’ experience in the Software Quality Assurance field , Test Fields. Knowledge of automated testing tools Knowledgeable in Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) , Agile process and software testing procedures and practices. Able to perform development, testing and debugging work Experience in setting up common test hardware and installing software. Able to perform development, testing and debugging work. Good analytical and problem-solving skills Aptitude and desire to learn new skills and concepts. Good communication skills are essential. Knowledge of Linux, Window Server, SQL, MongoDB, Networking and protocols is a PLUS. Script Languages (Shell utilities), JSON, JavaScript, PowerShell is a PLUS. Things you’ll enjoy Join us on a life-long transformative journey – the rail industry is here to stay, so you can grow and develop new skills and experiences throughout your career. You’ll also: Enjoy stability, challenges and a long-term career free from boring daily routines. Collaborate with transverse teams and helpful colleagues. Contribute to innovative projects. Utilise our flexible and agile working environment. Steer your career in whatever direction you choose across functions and countries. Benefit from our investment in your development, through award-winning learning. Benefit from a fair and dynamic reward package that recognises your performance and potential, plus comprehensive and competitive social coverage (life, medical, pension). You don’t need to be a train enthusiast to thrive with us. We guarantee that when you step onto one of our trains with your friends or family, you’ll be proud. If you’re up for the challenge, we’d love to hear from you! Important to note As a global business, we’re an equal-opportunity employer that celebrates diversity across the 63  countries we operate in. We’re committed to creating an inclusive workplace for everyone.

column8: The IT Support Division Manager is responsible for overseeing and managing the Information Technology (IT) support services within the organization. This role involves leading a team of IT professionals, ensuring the smooth operation of IT systems, and providing technical support to end-users. The IT Support Division Manager will collaborate with various departments to understand their IT needs and implement effective solutions to enhance overall business operations. Key Responsibilities: Team Leadership: Lead, mentor, and manage a team of IT support professionals. Foster a positive and collaborative team environment. Conduct regular team meetings, performance evaluations, and training sessions. IT Infrastructure Management: Oversee the planning, implementation, and maintenance of IT systems and infrastructure. Ensure the availability, security, and optimal performance of all IT resources. Collaborate with other departments to identify and address IT needs. Technical Support: Provide expert-level technical support to end-users, troubleshooting hardware and software issues. Establish and enforce IT support protocols and procedures. Work closely with the Help Desk team to ensure timely resolution of support tickets. Security and Compliance: Implement and enforce IT security policies and procedures. Stay updated on the latest cybersecurity threats and implement measures to protect organizational data. Ensure compliance with relevant regulatory requirements and industry standards. Vendor Management: Collaborate with vendors to procure hardware, software, and services. Evaluate vendor performance and negotiate contracts for cost-effective solutions. Budget Management: Develop and manage the IT support division budget. Identify cost-saving opportunities and ensure efficient resource allocation. Technology Planning and Strategy: Stay abreast of emerging technologies and assess their potential impact on the organization. Develop and implement IT strategies aligned with organizational goals. Documentation and Reporting: Maintain accurate records of IT systems, configurations, and changes. Generate regular reports on IT performance, support metrics, and project status. Qualifications and Skills: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or related field. Proven experience in IT management, preferably in a manufacturing or industrial setting. Strong leadership and team management skills. Excellent problem-solving and decision-making abilities. In-depth knowledge of IT systems, infrastructure, and security best practices. Effective communication skills for interacting with both technical and non-technical stakeholders. Project management experience is a plus.

column8: Major Responsibilities Define, implement, assess, and maintain controls necessary to protect the network/internet perimeter in accordance with security requirements (E.g., Firewalls, DMZ, Network connections, Third-party connectivity, Remote access, VPNs) Address security throughout the development and acquisition lifecycle Develop and maintain a security architecture. Define, implement, manage and maintain identities and access controls based on identities (e.g., Password management, Single Sign-On, Multi-factor authentication, PIN management, Digital signatures, Smart cards, Biometrics, AD) Ensures that system access is maintained in accordance with company policies Administer and supports all access management control activities across all infrastructure systems (systems, equipment, hosts, and networks) Lead and drive cybersecurity technology projects to achieve results in terms of quality, time and cost Ensure planning to go-live and deployment activities and facilitate their execution as well as post launch success and continuously identifying key improvement areas Provide technical advice on technological innovations and alignment with the cybersecurity strategic objectives of GC and future architectural standards to enhance cybersecurity quality Define, implement, assess, and maintain controls necessary to protect software and applications in accordance with security requirements (operating systems, applications, database management systems, web-based applications, COTS; maintenance) Identify potential flaws in application and design countermeasures or mitigations against potential exploitations of programming language weaknesses and vulnerabilities in system and elements Define, implement, assess, and maintain controls necessary to protect information and vital assets (including media) in accordance with security requirements (includes privacy requirements, PII, DLP, encryption) Ensure data lifecycle is secured Education Bachelor's degree or higher in computer science, cybersecurity, information technology, software engineering, information systems, computer engineering or related field Required Certification: CISSP or CISA / CISM Experiences Minimum of 5 year experience in information security, security solution implementation, security architecture, security management, data security, cloud and/or OT security Minimum of 3 year experience in overall management within a large enterprise environment

column8: ลักษณะงาน นำเสนอขายสินค้า เพิ่มยอดขาย ตลอดจนติดตามแก้ไขปัญหา ดูแล เยี่ยมเยียนลูกค้า ในพื้นที่รับผิดชอบอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพและรวดเร็ว คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร 1. เพศชาย/หญิง 2. หากมีความรู้ด้าน conveyor system จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ 3. บริษัทฯ ยินดีรับผู้จบการศึกษาใหม่ที่มีความมุ่งมั่นรักการขาย กระตือรือร้น อดทน 4. มีรถยนต์เป็นของตนเองพร้อมใบอนุญาต 5. มีคอมพิเตอร์เป็นของตนเอง 6. มีทักษะการเจรจาต่อรองที่ดี และมีความเชื่อมั่นในตัวเอง 7. หากมีประสบการณ์ บริษัทฯ จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สวัสดิการ / ข้อมูลเพิ่มเติม เงินเดือน, ค่านายหน้า, ค่าน้ำมัน, ค่าโทรศัพท์, ประกันอุบัติเหตุ, เบี้ยขยัน, ยูนิฟอร์ม, เงินช่วยเหลือสวัสดิการอื่นๆ, จัดท่องเที่ยวประจำปี, มีอบรมนอกสถานที่ และสัมมนาต่างประเทศ

Company: PERSOLKELLY HR Services Recruitment (Thailand) Co., Ltd.
column8: The PMO position is responsible for establishing and maintaining effective project management processes and standards within the organization. This role involves overseeing project portfolios, ensuring project alignment with strategic goals, and providing leadership and guidance to project managers and teams. The PMO position will also contribute to project management methodologies and drive continuous improvement initiatives. PMO Establishment and Governance: Establish and lead the Project Management Office (PMO) function. Define and implement project management methodologies, processes, and standards. Develop and maintain PMO governance frameworks and policies. Portfolio Management: Oversee the organization's project portfolio, ensuring alignment with strategic objectives. Evaluate project proposals, prioritize projects, and allocate resources effectively. Monitor project performance and report to executive stakeholders. Project Leadership: Provide leadership and support to project managers and project teams. Foster a culture of collaboration, accountability, and excellence in project execution. Identify and resolve project-related issues and risks. Methodology Development: Continuously improve project management methodologies and best practices. Ensure compliance with industry standards and best practices. Develop and deliver project management training and workshops. Resource Management: Optimize resource allocation and utilization across projects. Assist in recruiting and developing project management talent within the organization. Conduct performance evaluations and provide mentoring and coaching. Reporting and Communication: Prepare and deliver regular reports to executive management on project status and performance. Facilitate effective communication and collaboration among project stakeholders. Risk Management: Identify, assess, and mitigate project risks. Develop and maintain a risk management framework within the PMO. Continuous Improvement: Drive continuous improvement initiatives within the PMO. Monitor and measure the effectiveness of project management processes. Recommend and implement improvements to increase efficiency and effectiveness. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in a related field (Master's degree preferred). Project Management Professional (PMP) or similar certification preferred. 3 – 5 Proven experience in project management and PMO leadership roles. Strong knowledge of project management methodologies (e.g., Agile, Waterfall). Excellent leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills. Proficiency in project management tools and software. Growth Mindset and Can-do Attitude.

Drive IT Group Governance and Process Improvement initiative to ensure key projects meet defined IT delivery methodology (e.g. SDLC, Agile), comply with IT governance and regulatory requirements. Gather and consolidate key projects and investment status across the group. Collaborate with IT teams particularly in international subsidiaries to align key projects with company IT roadmap. Support international subsidiaries IT and Digital Portfolio Management goal and assist in business initiatives prioritization and other requests, to align the initiatives with company roadmap. Must 7+ years of program/IT portfolio management experience. 3+ years management experience in large-scale projects in Banking /Financial industries. (from consulting firm is preferable) Experience participating in all aspects of IT planning and implementation of IT projects. Have strong knowledge and background in Information Technology related to financial and banking industry in Thailand and regionally. Qualifications Bachelor or Master's degree in Business Administration, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or any related field. 1 to 2 years of working experience in business development or business analysis is mandatory. Jobtitle: ERP System Officer / ERP System Associate / Senior
column8: สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : อาคารเล้าเป้งง้วน1 ถนนวิภาวดี หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ วิเคราะห์ และแก้ไขปัญหาที่เกี่ยวข้องกับโปรแกรมระบบ SAP ใน module ที่ได้รับมอบหมาย 1 module (SD, MM, FI, CO) และระบบอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง ประสานงานกับหน่วยงาน / เพื่อนร่วมงานที่เกี่ยวข้องเพื่อแก้ไขปัญหา o   เนื่องจากระบบ SAP เป็น integrate system การพัฒนา หรือแก้ไขปัญหามักจะมีการเชื่อมต่อกับระบบงานในหลาย Module   ในการสนับสนุนจึงอาจจะต้องทำงานร่วมกับเพื่อนร่วมงานที่ดูแล Module อื่นๆ เพื่อหาทางแก้ไขปัญหาร่วมกัน o   ปัจจุบันมีการเชื่อมต่อโปแกรมระบบ SAP และดำเนินการป้องกันปัญหา o   ศึกษาวิเคราะห์สาเหตุที่แท้จริงของปัญหาที่เกิดซ้ำ, ทดสอบ solution และแจ้งให้เพื่อนร่วมงานท่านอื่นทราบ o   ในกรณีที่ปัญหาเกิดจากความไม่เข้าใจของผู้ใช้งาน  ควรจะจัดทำคู่มือขั้นตอนการปฏิบัติ เพื่อเผยแพร่ให้ผู้ใช้งานท่านอื่นทราบ  รวมทั้งจัดการฝึกอบรมเชิงปฏิบัติการเพื่อชี้แจงขั้นตอนที่มีความซับซ้อน o   กระตุ้นให้ผู้ใช้สามารถใช้ระบบ SAP ใน Module ที่ตนเองรับผิดชอบ และ/หรือ ระบบที่เกี่ยวข้องได้อย่างเหมาะสม และมีประสิทธิภาพ วิเคราะห์ และร่วมพัฒนาโปรแกรมระบบ SAP o   ศึกษา วิเคราะห์และจัดทำข้อมูลที่เกี่ยวข้องกับประเด็นปัญหา  หรือความต้องการของแต่ละหน่วยงานที่เกิดขึ้นจากระบบงาน หรือขั้นตอนการทำงาน o   นำเสนอข้อมูล และประเมินทางเลือก แนวทางการตัดสินใจ และแนวทางดำเนินงานพัฒนาฟังก์ชั่นใหม่ของระบบ o   ดำเนินการ และประสานงานในการพัฒนาฟังก์ชั่นใหม่ของระบบ เช่น การยืนยันความต้องการ, การนำเสนอ prototype, การกำกับดูแลให้ผู้ใช้ทดสอบ/ยืนยันความถูกต้อง, การฝึกอบรมผู้ใช้งาน, การสนับสนุนระบบเมื่อมีการติดตั้งจริง และการติดตามผลภายหลังจากที่นำระบบมาใช้งานจริง คุณสมบัติ ปริญญาตรีสาขาคอมพิวเตอร์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ในงานบริการด้านสนับสนุนโปรแกรมระบบ SAP  หรือมีประสบการณ์ในการติดตั้ง ระบบ SAP มีความรู้พื้นฐานทางเกี่ยวกับขบวนการทางธุรกิจ เช่น ระบบบัญชี, ระบบการเงิน, ภาษีอากร, ระบบงานขาย, ระบบจัดซื้อ, ระบบการวางแผนการผลิต, ระบบโลจิสติก สามารถวิเคราะห์ แก้ปัญหาและให้คำปรึกษาเกี่ยวกับระบบ/ขั้นตอนการทำงานได้

Identify user-submitted incidents to be buged or specification change. column8: Job Descriptions Source and build up the largest base of merchants for our “Pay with Points” and other Moon Shot and Initiative projects. Driven and motivated self-starter with ability to do the business trip as part of a supported merchant acquisition. Excellent organizational skills with a willingness to assume responsibilities to deliver against targets. Willingness to think outside the box even when under pressure. Ability to interpret and analyze complex information from a range of sources and present it in a succinct and compelling way. Fluent in English, both presenting and writing (TOEIC score > 600) E-Commerce or Tech background is a plus. Experience in Points Redemption is a SUPER PLUS. Having corporate clients with good relationships on hand is also a SUPER PLUS. MS Power Points and presentation skills are a MUST.

Job Description: Strictly follow Project Coordinator instructions, guidelines and follow Implementation plan. Site supervision on each stage for all implementation works from SKOM till PAC, including but not limited, CW, Power, Osp, Fiber, TI, migration works, tests, etc. Strictly follow ZTE QEHS Policy, technical requirements, NEO-02, implementation SOP, MOP. Within sites supervision must ensure all works, being done by subcontractor, are matching to SOP, NEO-02 and ZTE QEHS standards. Ensure all specifications and requirements of ZTE are well known and in use by the subcontractors. Ensure the quality and EHS processes are effectively implemented by subcontractors. Before start works, check and confirm all data, location, design, etc. on the site are fully matching with NEO-02. Check and verify whether TSSR/NEO-02 information is matching with actual situation on the site. Immediately inform Project coordinator for any mismatch. Check and confirm SOW/Quantity into NEO-02 is matching with actual quantity need to be done on the site. Immediately inform Project coordinator for any mismatch. Check on the field and confirm the site has no predictable, visible or any suddenly occurred issues, might affect to works implementations. Check and confirm all materials supplied by subcon and used for the implementation works, - good quality and fully comply SOP, NEO-02 and ZTE Quality requirements. To act as a focal point for all quality and HS problems and to ensure that the corrective and preventive actions are carried out. Ensure all teams has done KO before start any kind of activities/works on the site and daily Quality check list and Health safety check list filled in and following by Subcon team leader within whole day while works execution. Ensuring the subcon is submitting the HS and Safety doc for their team in EPMS. Check and control team have PPE. In case of QEHS violations, take urgent actions for the rectification. If violation is critical, stop the works until rectification, inform Subcon Project Coordinator and QEHS engineer for the same Non-compliance report.

Experience in software engineering or managing enterprise-scale projects. Expertise and experience with standard software engineering practices and software lifecycle management. Familiarity with Agile methodology in software development. Outstanding organization skills to track a variety of ongoing projects in a busy environment. Well-rounded understanding of enterprise information technology Hands-on experience with business requirements gathering and analysis Strong understanding of information processing principles and practices Proven project planning and management experience leading large, complex, cross-functional projects Experienced working in a team-oriented, collaborative environment Ability and willingness to thoroughly understand and embrace the organizations goals and objectives Demonstrated leadership and people management skills. Exceptional analytical, conceptual, and problem-solving abilities Proactive and proficient at making informed decisions in a timely manner Superior oral and written communication skills including technical support documentation creation and editing Able to present ideas in user-friendly language, communicating clearly to non-technical audiences Strong interpersonal and consultative skills including conflict resolution proficiency Capable of prioritizing and executing tasks in a high-pressure environment Effective at tracking lessons learned and sharing those lessons with team members Identifies opportunities for improvement and makes constructive suggestions for change Skilled at enabling team interaction, boosting employee morale, and appreciating team contribution Solid customer relationship and performance management skills Communicates effectively with clients to identify needs and evaluate alternative technical solutions Knowledge of and experience with contracting and negotiating. ทำงานร่วมกับทีมโปรแกรมเมอร์อย่างใกล้ชิด เพื่อศึกษาคุณสมบัติของผลิตภัณฑ์ ทำการทดสอบผลิตภัรายณฑ์เบื้องต้นในกรณีอัปเดตเวอร์ชัน ให้ความช่วยเหลือทางด้านเทคนิคแก่ลูกค้า แก้ไขปัญหาเบื้องต้นให้ลูกค้า ประสานงานกับทีมโปรแกรมเมอร์และผู้ดูแลผลิตภัณฑ์เพื่อแก้ไขปัญหาเทคนิคในเชิงลึก รับผิดชอบดูแลให้ความช่วยเหลือลูกค้าหลายเจ้าในเวลาเดียวกัน ตรวจสอบและติดตามความคืบหน้าของเคสต่างๆ จัดทำรายงานสรุปปัญหาและแนวทางแก้ไข จัดทำคู่มือการใช้งานผลิตภัณฑ์ จัดฝึกอบรมการใช้งานผลิตภัณฑ์ ให้ความช่วยเหลือทีม และทำงานอื่นๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติ จบปริญญาตีสาขาเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ วิทยาศาสตร์คอมพิวเตอร์ วิศวกรรมศาสตร์คอมพิวเตอร์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีทักษะการใช้คอมพิวเตอร์ดีมาก มีทักษะการแก้ปัญหาดีมาก โดยสามารถคิดวิเคราะห์เพื่อหาสาเหตุของปัญหาได้ภายใต้ความกดดัน สามารถทำงานในช่วงเวลายืดหยุ่นได้ในกรณีเกิดปัญหาฉุกเฉิน สามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้ กระตือรือร้นที่จะเรียนรู้ ใส่ใจรายละเอียด

column8: About the job KYZEN is currently seeking a Sales and Technical Engineer to join our Sales team in Thailand, based in Bangkok. This position manages sales of the company’s products and services, electronic and industrial, ensuring consistent, profitable growth in sales revenues through positive planning, deployment, and supporting distributors and/or manufacturer’s representatives. This candidate identifies objectives, strategies, and action plans to improve short- and long-term sales and earnings. JOB RESPONSIBITIES: • Develops and maintains strategic partner relationships. • Maintains and increases sales of company's products. • Establishes, maintains and expands the customer base. • Support distributors. • Reviews progress of sales performance • Works with distributors to identify and contact decision-makers. • Collects customer feedback and market research. • Keeps up to date with products and competitors. • Coordinates with proper company departments to ensure superior customer service and sales results. • Collaborates with team to develop sales strategies to improve market share in all product lines. • Join tradeshows, event, exhibition. • Other tasks as assigned by the SEA manager REQUIREMENT: • Bachelor's degree in engineering or higher. • Required language(s): Thai, English. • Preferably 2-5 year(s) of working experience in the related field. (Electronics / Semiconductor / Industries) • Excellent oral and written communication skills • Required skill(s): MS Excel, MS Office, MS PowerPoint, MS Word • Possess own transport. • 75-80% regional travel required BENEFITS: • Performance bonus • Medical insurance • Full time permanent role • 5 working days (Work from home) • Transportation reimbursement

Responsibilities : Develop IT Risk Management policy and procedure for identification assessment and mitigation of information technology risk management. Review and maintain IT Risk Management policy. Review related standards, guidelines, and operating procedures. Review relevant IT procedures based on risk perspective. Monitor and maintain information technology risk management framework and its associated controls. Provide risk advisory service on IT strategic initiatives/projects/BU in a manner to address the current risks and supervise the proper controls to mitigate risk by complying with internal and external regulations and laws. Review solution design documents based on risk perspective. Review the appropriateness of relevant risk mitigation strategies and remedial actions with follow-up. Create and ensure IT Risk management awareness in the organization. Provide IT risk dashboard, assessment result, risk trend for senior management and relevant committees. Create and sustain strong working relationships with all relevant stakeholders. Review and Monitor IT Risk Control Self-Assessment (RCSA) and IT Key Risk Indicators (KRI) setting. Facilitate the business units in reporting the IT incident by investigating and analyzing IT incident root cause and validation of controls effectiveness to manage/mitigate the IT risk. Qualification: Minimum 5 years of experience in IT Risk Management knowledge. Minimum 5 years of experience in IT Security, Cyber Security, Software Development knowledge and skill. IT process and technical knowledge and practice IT system, Security, Cloud, Cyber Security, Infrastructure, SDLC, Project Management, IT 3 rd party, PDPA knowledge and skill is preferred. Power BI, Power Automate, Programming skill will be advanced. Analytical experience Workplace : SCB Park (Plaza West Building) Work Schedule : Mon -Fri, 8:30 - 17:30

Jobtitle: AVP/VP of IT Corporate Management and Digital Transformation
column8: Location : Lake Ratchada Building (BTS Asoke / MRT Sukhumvit) Working Day : Monday - Friday Working Time : 09:00 - 18:00 RESPONSIBILITIES: Analyze the Company’s businesses to formulate IT strategy and create execution plans and roadmap in term of Digital Transformation to meet the Company’s objective and goal. Create IT policy and implement ISO 27001 and IT projects related with IPO application. Coordinate with all key stakeholders to get their requirements to design Digital Technology and Solutions to support all team execution. Promote and propose IT Digital Transformation Projects to management team to support company growth, revenue increment, and excellence business operations. Continuously adapt, innovate, and implement new technologies which aligned with Company’s strategies and objectives. Driving IT Digital Process Improvement and Optimize IT resources and people in the team. Manage, Control, Assess and Select IT Vendor to drive all process and solution done on time. Coordinate various departments to implement ERP modules or Core applications and develop effective strategies to enhance all ERP and Core Applications. Manage and Control the end-to-end implementation project (Planning/Requirement/Design/Develop/Testing/End-user-training and Go-live) to achieved the objective result within scope, budget and time. Act as a liaison between business stakeholders, technical team, and related third party. Organize trainings for team as need in the scope of implementation of IT Digital Transformation. Overseeing all technology operations and evaluating them according to established goals. Devising and establishing IT policies and systems to support the implementation of strategies set by upper management. Analyzing the business requirements of all departments to determine their technology needs. Perform other relevant duties as assigned. QUALIFICATIONS: Bachelor or Master’s in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, ICT or any related field. 10+ years in Management level of IT strategy, IT project and Digital Transformation. Having experiences related to IT Infrastructure, ERP Implementation and Web and Application Development. Having experiences in IT policy written and ISO 27001 implementation. Solid technical background with understanding and/or hands-on experienced in software development (In-house software development is a plus). Experience in software and vendor selection, control and cooperation. Strong analytical and Problem-solving skills. Strong organizational skill including attention to detail and multi-tasking skills Able to work effectively as a team player with internal and external team members. Our client is a leading global provider of information and communications technology (ICT) infrastructure and smart devices. With integrated solutions across four key domains – telecom networks, IT, smart devices, and cloud services – we are committed to bringing digital to every person, home, and organization for a fully connected, intelligent world. Responsibilities Working as a Network Engineer in the company's IPRAN team for project implementation, responsible for IPRAN network activities such as integration, cutover, expansion, etc. Handling network activities on daytime and/or night-time as required (average 2 - 3 nights per week). Collaborating with internal and external parties including the project management team, subcontractors, and customers to complete work assignments. Preparing technical documents such as MOP (Method of Procedure), WI (Work Instruction), etc. Troubleshooting and resolving technical problems that occurred during network implementation activities. Complying with the company's internal processes to ensure the safety and security of the company's and customer networks. Requirements At least a Bachelor’s Degree in telecommunication engineering, computer engineering or related IT fields. Good knowledge of Data communication including TCP/IP, Routing & Switching, VLAN, MPLS, etc. Working experience in IP network implementation or operation/maintenance in service provider networks or enterprise networks is a plus Working experience with Huawei routers e.g. ATN, CX600, NE series or carrier-graded routers of other vendors is a plus Positive and open-minded attitude, able to work well in a multi-cultural dynamic environment. Being proactive, achievement-oriented, strong sense of responsibility. Fast learning ability, highly adaptable to Huawei’s fast-paced environment. Good English communication. Able to work overtime or on weekends/public holidays.

Who are we looking for? Bachelor’s degree or higher in area of Computer Engineering, Computer Science, IT or related fields. Minimum of 2 years’ experience in IT as an Engineer. Must have experience with Operating System (e.g., CentOS, Redhat, Ubuntu, AIX and Windows Server 2003-2012 ) Enterprise hardware architecture (e.g., Server, Storage) Virtualization and containerization (e.g., VMware, Hyper-V) Web application service (e.g., Nginx ,Apache Tomcat and IIS) Microsoft Exchange mail system Active directory user and computer service DNS and DHCP service Group policy on Windows domain controller Power Shell and Batchfile script Monitoring system Backup and recovery software (e.g., Backup Exec, Veeam) Public Cloud computing service Proven experience in overseeing the design, development, and implementation of software systems, applications, and related products. Proven experience with systems planning, security principles, and general software management best practices. Good project management skills. English Communication would be advantage. Your main role is to: Gauge the effectiveness and efficiency of existing systems and implement strategies for improving or further leveraging these systems. Propose and create system design models, specifications, diagrams, and charts to provide direction to system programmer and development teams. Design and perform server and security audits, system backup procedures, and other recovery processes in accordance with the company’s disaster recovery and business continuity strategies. Integrate servers, including database, e-mail, print, and backup servers and their associated software into enterprise systems. Create and maintain documentation as it relates to system configuration, mapping, processes, and service records. Ensure compatibility and interchangeability of in-house computing systems. Coordinate and perform in-depth tests, including end-user reviews, for modified and new systems. Monitor and test system performance; prepare and deliver system performance statistics and reports. Provide orientation and training to end users for all modified and new systems. Provide guidance and assign tasks to System Engineers. Benefits: 5 day work week Group insurance

Install and configure software and computer systems. Monitoring hardware, software, and system performance. Identifying hardware, software and database solutions. Maintaining databases and resolved database issues. Updating version of computer hardware, software and database. Apply patch for hardware, software and database. Documenting processes and performing diagnostic tests. Support the implementation of new solutions for customer. Training end-users on hardware functionality and software programs.

column8: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ ตรวจสอบระบบเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศและข้อมูล ให้สอดคล้องกับกฎหมาย ระเบียบข้อบังคับและมาตรฐานต่างๆ ศึกษา วิเคราะห์ ระบบเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศตามแผนงานตรวจสอบเพื่อจัดทำโปรแกรมการตรวจสอบ โดยใช้แนวการประเมินความเสี่ยง ดำเนินการตรวจสอบตามแผนการตรวจสอบประจำปี และวิเคราะห์ปัญหา สาเหตุที่ทำให้เกิดปัญหา ผลกระทบที่เกิดขึ้น เพื่อจัดทำแนวทางแก้ไขและ/หรือป้องกันมิให้เกิดขึ้น จัดทำรายงานผลการตรวจสอบ และนำเสนอผู้บังคับบัญชา รวมถึงติดตามผลการตรวจสอบ เพื่อให้มีการดำเนินการปรับปรุงแก้ไขตามข้อเสนอแนะ คุณสมบัติ ปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป สาขาเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ในสายงานตรวจสอบที่เกี่ยวข้องอย่างน้อย 2-3 ปี มีทักษะในการสื่อสารและการนำเสนอ มีทักษะในการคิดวิเคราะห์ และกล้าตัดสินใจ สามารถเดินทางปฏิบัติงานต่างจังหวัดได้เป็นครั้งคราว หากมีประสบการณ์ในสายงานที่เกี่ยวข้องจะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ

column8: Responsibility : รับผิดชอบดูแลการใช้งานระบบให้สามารถใช้งานได้อย่างราบรื่น ร่วมหาสาเหตุและแก้ไขหากพบปัญหา วิเคราะห์ความต้องการ ออกแบบและนำเสนอโซลูชั่นให้กับลูกค้าหากมีการเปลี่ยนแปลง กฎเกณฑ์ ความต้องการ อื่น ๆ ตาม Business Requirement เป็นผู้ประสานงานหลัก กับ Outsource เพื่อควบคุมคุณภาพการบริการ ในกรณีที่ระบบมีการใช้งาน Outsource กรณีทำงานกับฝ่าย Market Information Systems: พัฒนาและดูแลเว็บไซต์ SET Website, TFEX Website, www.settrade.com รวมถึงเว็บไซต์อื่นๆของกลุ่มตลาดหลักทรัพย์ กรณีทำงานร่วมกับฝ่าย Enterprise Systems: พัฒนาและดูแลระบบ Digital Workflow สำหรับ ISV และบริษัทสมาชิก, e-Document และงานภายในของตลาดหลักทรัพย์ รวมถึงโครงการ Digital Transformation ต่างๆ เพื่อพัฒนากระบวนการทำงานให้อยู่ในรูปแบบดิจิตอล Qualification : ปริญญาตรีหรือสูงกว่าในสาขาวิศวกรรมคอมพิวเตอร์ วิทยาศาสตร์คอมพิวเตอร์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง ประสบการณ์ทำงานทางด้าน IT Development ที่เป็นประโยชน์ต่องานไม่น้อยกว่า 3 ปี ทักษะที่จำเป็น ทางด้าน Programming เช่น Java, Javascript, HTML, CSS Java Framework เช่น React, Angular, Vue.js, Spring Boot Database เช่น SQL Server, MySQL มีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดี สามารถทำงานร่วมกันเป็นทีม มีความรับผิดชอบ และมีความมุ่งมั่นทำงานให้ประสบความสำเร็จ สามารถใช้งานภาษาอังกฤษทั้งฟัง พูด อ่าน เขียน ได้ดี (TOEIC Score > 600) Interested candidates, please submit your applications ( by word format only ) with detailed resumes stating qualifications, contact telephone number and current photo via APPLY NOW Human Resources Department The Stock Exchange of Thailand The Stock Exchange of Thailand Building, 17th Fl., 93 Ratchadaphisek Road, Dindaeng, Dindaeng, Bangkok 10400 Thailand

As a Software Tester, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the high quality and reliability of our product  end-to-end solutions. Your primary focus will be on manual testing and automate testing. Requirements ● Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Statistics (Information Technology), or a related field (or equivalent work experience). ● Proven experience in software testing and quality assurance ● Knowledge of software automation test frameworks (Robot, Selenium, etc.). ● Familiarity with software development processes and methodologies. ● Knowledge or experience that would be a plus: ○ Frameworks for web development technologies such as NodeJS, ReactJS, etc. ○ Any database technologies such as MSSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, etc. ○ Source control systems such as Git, Team Foundation, etc. ○ Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) principles. ● Detail-oriented mindset with a strong analytical and problem-solving aptitude.

This role is to oversee end-to-end IT service delivery, ensuring it meets or exceeds customer expectations. Description Lead and oversee the IT service delivery team to ensure the timely and efficient provision of IT services. Establish and enforce service level agreements (SLAs) to consistently meet or exceed customer expectations. Monitor service performance, implementing improvements to enhance overall service delivery. Serve as the primary point of contact for escalated issues, collaboratively working towards timely resolutions. Identify improvement areas and implement best practices, fostering continuous enhancement in service delivery. Allocate resources effectively to achieve service delivery objectives. Manage staffing levels through recruitment, training, and performance evaluations. Develop and implement contingency plans to address potential issues. Conduct data analysis to identify trends, improvement areas, and key performance indicators. Profile A Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related IT field is required. Demonstrated expertise in IT support, with a minimum of 5 years in a leadership or managerial capacity. Possession of ITIL certification is highly preferred. Profound technical proficiency spanning various IT systems, encompassing hardware, software, and networking. Exceptional leadership, communication, and interpersonal skills. Previous experience with IT service management (ITSM) tools and ticketing systems. Capability to effectively prioritize and handle multiple tasks within a dynamic environment. Customer-centric approach with a dedication to delivering high-quality service Possession of ITIL certification. Certification in project management (e.g., PMP). Hands-on experience in Power automation, Power apps, or Power BI. Proficiency in working with Service Desk tools, such as Service Now. Job Offer Flexible working hours Performance Bonus Page Group Thailand is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy.

Jobtitle: N&T Network Designer (Routing, Switching, Firewall, MPLS)
column8: Purpose of the job Implement and develop data network communication system designs including fiber optic distribution, network switch/router/firewall software, Wireless Radio configuration, and architecture. Application of the communications system relevant to Communications Based Train Control (CBTC) solutions on Mainline and Mass Transit. Key responsibilities Communications Systems Design (Conceptual, detailed and final design with documentation) Interface with other Sub-Systems/Third Parties for design and implementation Installation, Testing and Commissioning support remotely and on-site Product development and planning for next generation communications Systems Support strategic sourcing for Communications Equipment Vendor evaluation Education: Degree in communications. electrical or similar engineering subject, or equivalent industry experience. Relevant experience required: Design, test and commissioning of wired communication systems with involvement in the complete design lifecycle. Design with Cisco, Hirschmann, Westermo or Moxa switches/routers is a plus. Equipment about switch router or firewall. Certificate such as Cisco CCNA, CCNP, CCIE, MPLS, HCIA, HCIP, HCIE Compliance to emissions regulations and electromagnetic compatibility (EMC) standards highly desired but not required

Job description Lead projects and initiatives with multiple stakeholders including senior executives, peers, across multiple functions and ensure project(s) are progressing in a timely manner with any necessary support required for action items from origination to execution. Ability to get into workforce planning (pyramids, utilization improvement, improving SCR, operating rhythm for a cluster e.g., COE build to optimize cost & service delivery) Ability to identify and drive improvements to service delivery through enhancing process and data across the Lead to Cash lifecycle, monitor report and action planning towards improvement, Ability to build relationships, communicate effectively and hold key stakeholders accountable. Responsible for analyzing the business requirements provided by regional and local teams and bringing together cross-functional needs into the overall design and implementation. Oversea and ensure that proper business requirements are given during project cycles and act as a business partner for the IT development teams ensuring that specifications, development, testing phase and final validation by business units are complete before project go live. Requirements Bachelors / master’s degree, preferably in Business, Operations, Finance related. Preferably with 8-13 years' experience or exposure to: Industry: Project Management, Digital – platforms, Media – Planning and Buying Functions. e-commerce, technology, finance operations Ability to work independently and be adaptable in a dynamic fast-paced environment. Strong presentation, communication and interpersonal skills Results and detail oriented to generate insights with a strong emphasis on problem solving. Essential qualities Stakeholder management and Communications Engage and maintain relationships across the Operations Team as well as key partners at Dentsu SEA. Proven experience working in complex business change. Understanding business profitability drivers, defining statements of work, drawing and refining process maps. An aptitude for working with technical experts. You should be comfortable dealing in both business and technology requirements. A strong understanding of operational process. Strategy is important, but a focus on execution is what will set you apart from other candidates. Strong communication skills: an intuition, as well as methodology, for helping a diverse group understand what needs to be done and when. Strong attention to detail and the curiosity to ask why a number is right or wrong. Articulate in explaining technical concepts in simple terms. Calm when faced with multiple tasks; able to priorities and deliver on time. Willingness to ‘pick up and run’ with projects across a broad range of business challenges. An ambition for personal development; the appetite to define your own career path. A disposition towards solutions, not problems Understand how we add value to our clients’ business. Additional skills Proficiency in MS Office (Excel, Project, Planner, Visio, Power Point) Working knowledge and exposure to RPA Tools, Exposure and working knowledge of AI Tools a plus. Good communication (Fluent in English)

Job Summary: As a Entomo Consultant, you will play a vital role in assisting our clients in the successful implementation and utilization of our software. You will work closely with our Senior Consultants and clients to understand their specific needs, provide training, and offer ongoing support to ensure the seamless integration of our software into their organizations. Key Responsibilities: 1. Client Engagement: Collaborate with clients to understand their performance management goals and objectives. 2. Software Implementation: Assist in the deployment and configuration of our performance management software to meet client requirements. 3. Training: Provide training sessions to clients on software features, functionality, and best practices. 4. Data Analysis: Analyze client data to identify performance trends and opportunities for improvement. 5. Support: Offer ongoing technical support and troubleshoot issues to ensure client satisfaction. 6. Documentation: Maintain comprehensive documentation of client interactions, configurations, and issues resolved. 7. Feedback Collection: Gather feedback from clients to relay to the development team for software enhancements. 8. Collaboration: Work closely with cross-functional teams, including Sales, Product Development, and Customer Support, to ensure client success. Qualifications: - Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (Business, Information Technology, etc.). - Strong analytical skills and the ability to interpret data. - At least 3 years of working experience in Business Analyst and Software Implementation Consultant Roles. - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. - Good command of English - Basic understanding of performance management principles is a plus. - Tech-savvy with the ability to quickly learn and navigate software systems. - Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently and as part of a team. - Willingness to travel occasionally to client sites (if required).

Company: Summit Auto Seats Industry Co., Ltd.
column8: We are currently seeking a highly motivated and skilled IT Officer/Engineer to join our dynamic IT team and contribute to the success of our operations. As an IT Officer/Engineer, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the smooth functioning of our IT infrastructure. You will be responsible for managing and maintaining our IT systems, providing technical support to end-users, and implementing innovative solutions to enhance efficiency and productivity. Key Responsibilities: IT Infrastructure Management: Maintain and monitor the company's IT infrastructure, including servers, networks, and hardware. Ensure the security, availability, and reliability of IT systems and data. Perform regular system updates, backups, and disaster recovery procedures. Technical Support: Provide technical support to end-users, resolving hardware and software issues promptly. Troubleshoot and resolve network connectivity problems. Assist in setting up and configuring computer systems and software applications. Software and Application Management: Install, configure, and update software and applications used in the manufacturing process. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and implement software solutions that streamline manufacturing operations. Cybersecurity: Implement and maintain security protocols and policies to protect sensitive company data. Stay updated on cybersecurity threats and best practices to ensure the integrity of IT systems. IT Documentation: Maintain accurate documentation of IT systems, configurations, and procedures. Create user guides and documentation for IT-related processes. Vendor Management: Liaise with external IT vendors and service providers for hardware and software procurement and support. Continuous Improvement: Proactively identify opportunities for IT process improvements and automation. Collaborate with the IT team to develop and implement innovative solutions. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. Proven experience working in IT support or system administration within the manufacturing industry. Strong knowledge of hardware, software, and network systems. Proficiency in troubleshooting and problem-solving. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work independently and in a team. Certification in relevant IT fields is a plus. Headquarters Location : CLICK HERE [link removed]

This position plays a critical role in the organization by overseeing the operations of the Aftersales Department, which includes 2 business units (Volvo and Lotus). Their primary responsibilities include: Process Management : The Head of Aftersales is responsible for the efficient functioning of all processes within the Aftersales Department. This involves setting up and optimizing workflows, ensuring smooth operations, and addressing any bottlenecks or issues that may arise. Motivating Staff : Motivating and leading the team within the Aftersales Department is a key aspect of the role. This includes creating a positive work environment, setting clear goals and expectations, and providing guidance and support to staff members. Continuous Development : The Head of Aftersales is responsible for the professional development of the department's employees. This involves identifying training needs, providing opportunities for skill enhancement, and fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement. Achieving Throughput and Service Revenue Targets : The Head of Aftersales is accountable for meeting specific performance targets related to throughput (the rate at which services are delivered) and service revenue. These targets are typically set in consultation with the company's management and align with the overall business strategy. Strategic Alignment : Ensuring that the activities and objectives of the Aftersales Department are in line with the broader strategic goals and vision of the company is a crucial aspect of the role. This involves aligning the department's actions with the company's long-term plans and ensuring that the department contributes to the company's overall success. Business Performance : Responsbile for the aftersales P&L Customer Service : Ensuring customer are satisfied with our service level at all tines Operations : Ensuring the aftersales operations that consists of service, workshop, parts, PDI and Bodyshop are carried out efficiently.

Jobtitle: IT Support Technician/เจ้าหน้าที่ไอที
column8: We are looking for technically skilled candidates with good problem-solving abilities for the position of IT Support Technician. The duties include being a point of contact for all IT related questions at the user level, responding to user needs in a timely manner, and ensuring the optimal running of all systems, among other duties. Work can also occasionally include installation of network and camera cabling, installing wired/wireless networks, security camera systems, phone systems, and door access systems. You are expected to display good interpersonal skills as you will interact with clients from various departments and executive levels. You are to listen to their technical needs, understand their problems and implement solutions for them. Responsibilities: Providing support to users and being the first point of contact for problem resolution. Troubleshooting hardware, software, and network issues. Installing and configuring hardware and software components. Repairing or replacing damaged computer hardware. Establishing good relationships with all clients and colleagues. Managing technical documentation. Keeping accurate and detailed descriptions of services performed while on a service call. Managing information technology and computer systems Controlling and managing IT and electronic data operations On-Site, On-Call and On-Message with our customer from SEA countries Consultant about input/output devices to support customer service. Responsible and accountable for the smooth running of our computer systems within the limits of requirements, specifications, costs and timelines. Demonstrate a positive attitude towards other employees and customers. Plan, organise, control and evaluate IT and electronic data operations, both for the Company office and also for Project Management with customers. Implement and coordinate systems, policies and procedures Ensure security of data, network access and backup systems Maintain a safe and functional IT environment inside the administration office and golf studio. Responsible for set-up of necessary IT equipment for events on a regular basis. Stock IT and office supplies Consult and recommend IT and office supplies for Company staff as necessary Check office and golf studio for broken or non-functioning computers or IT equipment. Repair or replace them when required Co-responsible for moving supplies and equipment between various locations, such as, but not limited to; office, stores, warehouses, events, customer locations, residences. Take leadership on special handling of any computers, resale products and / or IT related technology. Supports the Project Manager and IT supervisor regularly for simulator installation Qualifications: Proficient in English. This includes excellent written and speaking knowledge Be able to frequently travel, locally and internationally Ability to be flexible on a day-to-day basis with task priorities Ability to operate in a fast-paced work environment Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Good interpersonal skills. Attention to detail. Good problem-solving skills. Ability to lift up to 15kgs Ability to work comfortably on a ladder. 0-3 Years’ experience in IT support and systems maintenance. (New graduate are welcome) Preferred Experience: Microsoft Windows Desktop Environment. Microsoft Windows Server Environment. Zendesk, Slack & Google Workspace Environment

Line of Service: Risk Assurance Risk Assurance is a dynamic place to be right now, and the variety of opportunities on offer is unprecedented. It matters for businesses, governments and society at large. Our team provides confidence on the most complex decisions companies have to take and this offers a wealth of opportunities to everyone who joins us and works with us. Our Risk Assurance team helps business leaders gain comfort that their systems, processes, and risk management procedures are operating effectively within a well-controlled environment. We focus on helping clients make sure they have adequate controls in place to mitigate key risks, maintain key processes that enable management to make appropriate decisions, and ensure that an effective risk management framework is in place in case of a system breakdown. Essential day to day responsibilities Demonstrate knowledge of IT controls in IT security, operations and development, keeping up to date with changes. Identify the key IT risks and controls for various industries and types of IT/ERP systems. Examine and analyse internal controls and business risks through IT audit work. Develop audit scopes/procedures and prepare IT audit reports. Review IT technical controls on related IT infrastructure including operating systems, databases and relevant network equipment. Assess the impact of IT audit findings on the client’s business risks and audit strategy. Work as an effective team member to complete project components and assigned tasks. Build strong working relationships with client contacts. Qualifications and skills University degree, preferably in Accounting, Management Information Systems, Computer Science, Engineering or related fields. Fresh graduates are welcome. Excellent analytical, research and presentation skills. Excellent communication in both spoken and written English. Able to take responsibility for personal growth. Excellent attention to detail and a logical thinker. Fast learner, good attitude and a team player. Understanding of the IT environment such as network, server and database including ERP e.g. SAP, Oracle.

Overview Sale Manager: The Sales Manager has a key leadership role responsible for leading and managing the sales team to achieve revenue targets and drive business growth. This position involves strategic planning, team development, client relationship management, and collaboration with other departments to ensure overall organizational success. Responsibilities: Sales Team Leadership: Recruit, train, and develop a high-performing sales team. Set clear sales goals and targets for the team. Provide ongoing coaching and feedback to enhance individual and team performance. Motivate and inspire the team to achieve and exceed sales objectives. Strategic Planning: Develop and implement strategic sales plans in alignment with organizational goals. Analyze market trends, competitor activities, and customer needs to identify growth opportunities. Formulate and execute effective sales strategies to penetrate new markets and expand the customer base. Performance Monitoring and Reporting: Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) for the sales team and monitor performance regularly. Prepare and present sales reports, forecasts, and analysis to senior management. Use data-driven insights to make informed decisions and adjustments to sales strategies. Client Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients and partners. Collaborate with the sales team to understand customer needs and provide solutions. Address and resolve customer concerns in a timely and effective manner. Sales Process Optimization: Streamline and optimize the sales process for efficiency and effectiveness. Implement best practices in sales methodologies and techniques. Work closely with marketing to ensure seamless coordination between sales and lead generation efforts. Budget Management: Develop and manage the sales budget, ensuring cost-effectiveness and resource allocation. Monitor expenses and revenue to ensure financial targets are met. Cross-Functional Collaboration: Collaborate with other departments such as marketing, product development, and customer service to achieve overall business objectives. Provide input to product development based on customer feedback and market trends Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or a related field (master’s degree is a plus). Proven experience in sales management, with a successful track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets. Strong leadership and team management skills. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Strategic thinking and problem-solving abilities. Knowledge of the industry and market trends. Proficiency in CRM software and Microsoft Office Suite. Experience working with government agencies.

Main Purpose of this job: To set an overall strategy to improve and optimize processes for the entire organization and support business goals. Respond to rapidly change in customer needs to enable businesses to operate efficiently and effectively as well as seek opportunities for continuous improvement. Major Tasks / Responsibilities Analyze requirements and prioritize critical findings from business and technology perspectives and translate them into business process management to improve business operations with practical and measurable solutions Understand business requirements and recommend any potential solutions in terms of people, process, and technology to support business decision and customer need to create new experience with high customer satisfaction Set strategic planning, make decision and also provide a highly consultative approach to the stakeholders, scope develop and deliver an end-to-end business case to improve Customer Experience and increase Customer Satisfaction/Engagement Initiate and manage all projects related to process & work improvement Develop plan, monitoring, update project status report and management report including any critical issues to the related stakeholders. Support and encourage working team to design new processes with new technology to support future business expansion in digital era Other special assignments Job Specification Bachelor's degree or higher in Industrial Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, Operational Research or any related field. Experience 7 years up strong in Process Improvement and Project Management Experience in Digital Platform, Retail, Energy industry are preferred Thought leadership, experience and track record in executing business transformations, process re-engineering and change management within large enterprises Demonstrated “Can-do” attitude and eagerness to learn Strong analytical, innovative and logical thinking, problem solving, and problem identification skills Good leadership skill, relationship building, interpersonal, communications, and persuasive skills Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Thai

The ultimate goal in data research is to find consumer insights from social media data to best serve the objective(s) of clients in terms of business such as supporting the decision making process or measuring the performance of their business to a more precise level. Responsibility Handle Social Media Data Learn and understand the objectives of each business or industry assigned and set up the tools or crawlers in ways that can best collect data to directly serve the needs of clients from different industries Gather and clean the unrelated data from the data collected Code, categorize, and label the data from the voices of customers on social media Display Social Media Data and Insights Understand the basic of a business process and how a business and/or its stakeholders can leverage from having data to insightfully analyze the processed data and deliver that insights to clients Incorporate data to create a report with the analysis using Powerpoint or PowerBI Present reports to clients and handle inquiries in a professional manner Use social media data to create and deliver quality reports to support clients’ business decision making and measure the business performance Qualifications Holds a bachelor degree or above in Economics, Statistics, Marketing, Business Management, or related field Enjoys working with data! as you would be spending 80% of your time dealing with it Has creativity and able to make sense out of the social data to turn it into insights best serves the client’s business objectives Comfortable using MS Excel with knowledge of fundamental functions, and able to handle a large amount of data Good at using MS PowerPoint and can create a professional report to present to clients Understand Research Methods Knowledge Base such as descriptive analysis Good analytical and logical thinking skills and experienced in working with data analyzation Experienced in data visualization tools (e.g. Power BI, or Tableau) Preferred Qualification Familiar with social media measurement, knows the matter values such as Engagement Rate, Interaction Rate Has some understanding or experiences in working with social media or marketing strategies

Our Company Do you want to be part of Thailand banking transformation? Data is the core of the new financial services era, and we are open for the opportunity to be part to drive this change at the core. SCB DATAx is a new venture of the Siam Commercial Bank (SCB) holdings, a leading financial services and digital services holdings in Thailand and ASEAN. As part of the transformation of SCB into a group of product and technology companies, under the SCBx brand, SCB DATAx is the technology company to centralize data and provides AI and data science services and products to the group. With a leading-edge cloud native data & AI platform, our vision is to support the group to providing everyone in our region with the opportunity to prosper. We work on forward-thinking challenges of centralizing, analyzing and sharing information. We collaborate with companies and experts in many different domains, embrace diversity and all that while having a good laugh and joy in work. About Team and Role As a dynamic and innovative AI/ML startup operating in the fintech industry, we are seeking a motivated and skilled Business Continuity Senior or Lead to join our Risk Management team. This role offers an exciting opportunity to be of a fast paced and agile environment and contribute to the continuous improvement of our risk management processes. At DataX, we understand the importance of maintaining uninterrupted business operations in the face of various disruptions, including natural disasters, cyberattacks, and unforeseen incidents. In this role, you will play a critical role in developing and implementing strategies to ensure the continuity of our critical functions, safeguarding our organization from potential risks. Responsibilities Develop, implement and maintain comprehensive business continuity plans, ensuring critical functions can continue during and after disruptions. Conduct business impact assessments (BIA) to identify potential risks, prioritize critical processes, and develop appropriate recovery strategies. Perform risk assessments to identify vulnerabilities, evaluate potential impacts, and recommend risk mitigation measures. Coordinate the development of IT Disaster Recovery plans and ensure their effectiveness through regular testing and updates. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define roles and responsibilities during a recovery effort and establish communication protocols. Provide regular updates and reports to management, group leadership, and regulators as required, highlighting the status of business continuity efforts. Foster a culture of awareness and preparedness throughout the organization by conducting training sessions and promoting best practices. Develop, mentor, and lead a small team to ensure effective execution of business continuity plans and activities. Stay informed about industry trends, emerging risks, and regulatory requirements related to business continuity, integrating them into the organization's strategies and plans Qualifications Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (e.g., Business Administration, Risk Management, Technology) or equivalent practical experience. Proven experience in developing and implementing business continuity plans within a complex and regulated environment. Strong expertise in conducting business impact assessments (BIA) and risk assessments. Demonstrated ability to coordinate IT Disaster Recovery plans and conduct regular tests to validate their effectiveness. Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills with the ability to effectively report to management, internal groups, and regulators. Experience in leading and mentoring a team, fostering a collaborative and high-performing environment. Knowledge of industry best practices, standards, and regulations related to business continuity (e.g., ISO 22301, NIST SP 800-34). Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think strategically and provide innovative solutions. Ability to handle stressful situations effectively and work under tight deadlines. Professional certifications in business continuity management (e.g., CBCI, MBCI) are highly desirable

Job Summary: We are seeking an experienced IT Security Specialist to join our fintech team. The IT Security Specialist will play a crucial role in safeguarding our systems, data, and operations from cyber threats and ensuring compliance with industry regulations. If you are a dedicated professional with a strong background in IT security and a passion for fintech, we want to hear from you. Key Responsibilities: Security Policy Development: Develop and implement IT security policies, standards, and procedures to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of data. Risk Assessment: Conduct regular risk assessments and security audits to identify vulnerabilities and provide recommendations for improvement. Incident Response: Manage and respond to security incidents and breaches, including incident detection, analysis, and resolution. Access Control: Implement and manage access control measures, including user access, authentication, authorization, and encryption. Network Security: Configure and monitor network security measures, such as firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and VPNs. Compliance: Ensure compliance with industry-specific regulations and standards, and other relevant financial regulations. Security Training: Provide security awareness training to employees and promote a security-conscious culture within the organization. Security Tools: Select, deploy, and manage security tools and technologies to protect the organization's IT infrastructure. Security Monitoring: Monitor and analyze security logs and events to identify and respond to security threats. Vulnerability Management: Identify and remediate vulnerabilities in systems, applications, and infrastructure. Security Documentation: Maintain up-to-date documentation of security policies, procedures, and incident reports. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Information Security, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's degree preferred). Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP), Certified Information Security Manager (CISM), or similar certifications preferred. Proven experience in IT security, especially in a fintech or financial services environment. Strong understanding of financial industry regulations and compliance requirements. Experience with security tools and technologies, including firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and antivirus software. Knowledge of encryption, PKI, and secure data transmission protocols. Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Detail-oriented and highly organized.

Jobtitle: ERP Developer (JavaScript)/นักพัฒนา ERP (จาวาสคริปต์)
column8: As an ERP Developer, you are responsible for reviewing, analyzing, and modifying the ERP application including coding, testing, and debugging to support an organization’s Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) applications. Ensures that your provided solutions can be completely integrated into the ERP system. As an ERP Developer you are responsible for working with ERP applications on integration analysis, development, testing, debugging and fixing integrations between NetSuite and other external or third party  systems. The ERP Developer is involved in all phases of the project lifecycle. Design, build, test, and deploy Integration/Customization solutions to support the organization’s ERP applications. Create custom integrations using Suite Cloud Platform, Suitescripts, Web Services and Rest APIs. The ERP Developer is also responsible to perform Unit Test and support systems integration testing (SIT) and user acceptance testing (UAT) by providing insight to testing teams to ensure the appropriate depth of test coverage. The ERP Developer is also responsible for providing any automation using workflows as per the requirements. Create technical documents which capture the development standards for the NetSuite project. These standards are fundamental building blocks to maintain consistency throughout the project and facilitate an effective output till post-production support. Coordinate the feasibility study with the cost-effective technology and to come up with architecture details to resolve problems of intent, inaccuracy, or limitation of the system. The ERP developer ensures that the ERP customization or integration can be completely integrated into the ERP system and works well with all the stakeholders and end users, on an as needed basis to ensure that the design and code meet customer requirements. The ERP Developer is responsible for following the industry best practices for coding and also needs to maintain code in version control. Requirements At least 3-4 years of software development experience in Javascript. NetSuite suitescript experience will be preferred. Possess good communication skills. Ability to work independently. Ability to work efficiently with other team members. Ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously. Possess strong technical and analytical skills.

Jobtitle: IT auditor (Application audit in accounting & finance) - travel occasionally
Company: PTT Exploration and Production Company Limited
column8: Key Accountabilities Develop IT audit plan and audit work program. Evaluate the following areas:Perform I&T audit regarding the company’s Information Technology (IT) and Operation Technology (OT) systems. Information and Technology (I&T) related risks and internal controls in both general and application controls Compliance according to company’s policies, procedures, guidelines, laws, and regulations Deliver and provide value-added recommendations to create and increase the extent of effective, efficient, and sufficient IT and OT controls. Follow up the implementation of audit recommendations with the process owner to ensure that risks are appropriately mitigated. Provide advice on data analytic techniques and perform advanced or complex data analytic to support audit processes such as Audit Planning / Risk Analysis, Audit Scope, Execution of an Audit and Visualization/ Reporting Support other audit teams by performing the IT Application Controls Audit Coordinate with function/business owners in order to monitor and assure technology audit activities. Provide consulting services for other functions as requested such as strategic advice and lessons learnt from I&T projects and technologies. Professional Knowledge & Experiences Bachelor’s Degree or Master’s Degree in IT, Computer Science, Computer/Network Engineering, Information Technology Management, or relevant fields 3-5 years of experience in information technology (IT) and/or operational technology (OT)-related audit Good knowledge and skill about the risks, controls and regulatory compliance of IT and/or OT systems Good knowledge in cybersecurity, network design and security, software engineering, IT governance, BCP (Business Continuous Plan) and DRP (Disaster Recovery Plan) Good knowledge of Information and Technology (I&T) standards and control frameworks such as COBIT2019, NIST Cybersecurity Framework, ISO27001, IEC62443, etc. Have a good understanding of risk-based audit and IT audit universe and be able to conduct and IT audit plan, both a short-term and long-term plan. Familiarity with audit methodologies and techniques, such as risk assessment, control testing, and audit planning. Good knowledge and ability to formulate recommended actions to address I&T risks. Preferable to be certified a well-known or industry-recognized IT auditor and/or cybersecurity certification such as Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA), Certified in Risk and Information Systems Control (CRISC), Certified Data Privacy Solutions Engineer (CDPSE), etc. Good communication and interpersonal skill Strong negotiation and presentation skills. Good command of spoken and written English Good project management skills Occasionally work upcountry / overseas

Job Purpose/Role The Incident Coordinator will provide an IT Support within 24x7 shift environment supporting customers/users and delivering functions under the Managed Services Portfolio. Key responsibilities/What you do Support Incidents related to servers, applications, and other IT platforms. Acts as the escalation point for complex customer issues from technical support personnel. Own the day-to-day incident processes for Managed Services, ensuring that all incidents and problems are acknowledged, and status accepted by Managed Services; Manage resolutions to SLA targets. Work with different levels of the technical support team to escalate more complex issues for resolution. Provides appropriate personnel a precise understanding of user's issues when the problem needs to be escalated to a higher level. Acts as a liaison to users regarding issues or requested changes. Monitors incoming cases and emails and escalate it in accordance with Service Level Standards (SLS) guidelines.  Assist the regional and global team on major and critical issue. Participates and drives customer requested conference calls. To produce knowledge articles and information to be distributed amongst the team. Perform other tasks as assigned. Key requirement /What you bring 2+ years’ experience in IT support field. Degree in a computer-related field, MIS, IT, or related field skills, or the equivalent combination of relevant training and experience. A general understanding of the IT architectures including Network (Router/Firewall), Server (Windows/Linux), cloud & Internet. Excellent customer service, communication, teamwork, reliability, and consistency in quality of work. Comfortable working independently, but has experience working in a team environment. Strong aptitude and desire to learn new technologies and tools & Able to work on a shift rota to ensure full 24 x 7 onsite coverage is provided to clients based on an alternating day and night time shift pattern. You will be expected to work in shift, weekends and public holidays. Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to present complex technical information in a clear and concise manner to a variety of audience. ITIL Foundation Level knowledge, certification preferred. Flexible nature which will adapt to additional products entering the Managed Services portfolio later along the line

Responsibilitie • Implement and Consult security solutions using various technologies and best practices. • Manage issue management activities and closely monitor remediation plans to ensure prompt resolution. • Stay updated on emerging Cyber Security trends and technologies. • Provide continuous support to customers after the implementation of security solutions, • Educate customers on best practices in Cyber Security, helping them understand the importance of maintaining a secure environment. Requirement Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, Information Technology, Cybersecurity, or a related field. Minimum of 2-5 years of experience in network security, with a strong emphasis on advanced security solutions. In-depth knowledge of network protocols, IP networking, and troubleshooting techniques for WLAN and LAN. Experience in analyzing network flows and application sequences to identify security issues. Familiarity with complex network policy configurations. Understanding of both web-based and non-web-based application security. Jobtitle: IT Project Manager - True Money Wallet
column8: Primary role of this position is to coordinate and complete IT projects with quality, on time, within budget and within scope and to ensure projects comply with all compliance and security policy. Another role is vendor and cost controller to oversee cost management of IT in our company. In this role, you will work collaboratively with various department managers to analyze costs, assess vendor relationships, and maximize profitability. Key responsibilities: Coordinate internal resources and third parties/vendors for the execution of projects Ensure that all projects are delivered on-time with quality, within scope and within budget Assist in the definition of project scope and objectives, involving all relevant stakeholders and ensuring technical feasibility Develop comprehensive project plans to be shared with stakeholders Track project performance to analyze the success of short and long-term goals Perform risk management to minimize project risks Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation Vendor and Contract management Meet with vendor to take detailed ordering and clarify requirements of each project Meet budgetary objectives and make adjustments to project constraints based on financial analysis Work in conjunction with all department heads to ensure maximum profitability Provide critical assessment of all budgets and cost projections Analyze invoices to ensure correct products/services were received at the expected cost Develop and implement proactive solutions and cost-cutting measures Roll out clear cost-saving programs with timelines and assessment goals Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in the appropriate field of study or equivalent work experience. Excellence in communication both English and Thai, Writing and Speaking, Listening. Minimum 2 years working experience. Strong presentation skills, able to explain concepts concisely and accurately Excel skills required (ability to write formulas, link files, conditional formatting, lookups, pivot tables, etc.) Ability to interact with different departments at various levels with a consistent, self-assured, pleasant manner, making strategic business recommendations backed up by analytics and facts Ability to understand, interpret and explain complex data and production metrics in the simplest of terms to any audience. Understanding of Hardware/Software delivery project, Project Management or Agile project management. Experience in IT project management is preferred. Experienced in Cloud Technology either AWS or GCP especially cost optimization will be preferred. Experience of working in the Banking, FinTech or related organization is advantageous.
