**Job Description: Assistant Project Manager/Supervisor - NTT DATA (Thailand)** **Location:** Pak Kred, Nonthaburi **About Us:** NTT DATA (Thailand) is a trusted global IT services provider offering advanced and innovative solutions to our clients. We pride ourselves on the quality of our work, our commitment to our values, and the strength of our partnerships. **Project Overview:** The chosen candidate will be predominantly working on a credit acquiring system project. **Position Summary:** With over 7 years of professional experience in Business Analysis (BA), Systems Analysis (SA), or related fields, the Assistant Project Manager will play a pivotal role in guiding the project team, coordinating with stakeholders, and ensuring timely and successful delivery. **Key Responsibilities:** 1. **Project Planning & Execution:** - Assist in the overall planning, execution, and delivery of the credit acquiring system project. - Work closely with the Project Manager to define project objectives, scope, and deliverables. - Ensure timely delivery of tasks as per project timelines. 2. **Stakeholder Management:** - Serve as a key point of contact between stakeholders and project teams. - Facilitate communication and ensure stakeholders are kept informed about project status and developments. - Address any concerns or issues raised by stakeholders in a timely and effective manner. 3. **Team Management:** - Mentor and guide the project team. - Allocate and delegate tasks effectively. - Ensure that team members have the necessary resources and support to succeed. 4. **Risk Management:** - Identify potential risks and challenges. - Collaborate with the Project Manager to develop risk mitigation strategies. - Ensure that risks are communicated to stakeholders and managed effectively. 5. **Quality Assurance:** - Oversee quality assurance processes, ensuring deliverables meet the desired quality standards. - Conduct regular reviews and audits of project deliverables. 6. **Documentation & Reporting:** - Ensure all project documentation is maintained and updated regularly. - Prepare and present regular project updates and reports to senior management and stakeholders. **Qualifications:** - A minimum of 7 years' experience in Business Analysis, Systems Analysis, or a related field. - Demonstrated experience in project management and team leadership. - Strong understanding of the credit acquiring domain is advantageous. - Excellent interpersonal and communication skills. - Strong problem-solving skills and analytical thinking. - Proficiency in English and Thai. - Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Business, IT, or a related field. What we offer: Annual Bonus Annual salary increment Group health insurance Personal accident insurance Provident Fund Dental treatment budget Free TOEIC test Free premium Udemy online training Language allowance Travelling allowance Wedding and new child born allowance Long service award Annual health check up Annual leave up to 21 days / years

หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ : จัดทำแผนงานการตรวจสอบด้าน IT (IT Audit Plan) และจัดลำดับงานให้สอดคล้องกับความสามารถของบุคลากรและปริมาณงานหรือความเร่งด่วนของงาน กำหนดวัตถุประสงค์และแนวทางการตรวจสอบ (IT Control Objectives / IT Audit Program) การปฏิบัติงานตรวจสอบตามหลักการควบคุมภายในด้าน IT Control / Application Control / General Computer Control (GCC) & Business Computer Control (BCC) และการควบคุมความเสี่ยงด้าน IT (IT Risk Control) โดยสามารถให้ข้อเสนอแนะในการควบคุมภายในที่รัดกุมและเหมาะสม สอบทานการจัดทำรายงานตรวจสอบ และดูแลการจัดเก็บเอกสารประกอบการตรวจสอบตามหลักการที่กำหนดไว้ ให้ความร่วมมือและประสานงานกับผู้สอบบัญชีภายนอกหรือหน่วยงานภายนอกที่ทำหน้าที่กำกับดูแลบริษัทฯ รวมทั้งพิจารณาทบทวนข้อสังเกต/ข้อเสนอแนะของผู้ตรวจสอบภายนอกและผู้ตรวจสอบภายใน คุณสมบัติ: วุฒิการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป สาขาคอมพิวเตอร์, สถิติ, การกำกับดูแลกิจการ, การบัญชี, การเงิน, บริหารธุรกิจ หรือสาขาอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ด้านงานตรวจสอบสารสนเทศหรืองานด้าน IT ตั้งแต่ 5 ปีขึ้นไป สามารถทำงานในเชิงวิเคราะห์และให้เหตุผลในการอธิบายได้ดี มีทักษะในการใช้คอมพิวเตอร์  Microsoft Office และมีความรู้ความเข้าใจในโปรแกรมประยุกต์ (Audit Software หรือ Audit Tools) มีทักษะการใช้ภาษาอังกฤษในระดับดี สามารถติดต่อสื่อสารได้ หากมี Certified Internal Auditors (CIA หรือ CISA) จะได้รับพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ

Jobtitle: Sales Engineer/วิศวกรการขาย
column8: Job Description Responsibilities: Execute sales strategies and plans to achieve sales targets. Proactively explore new business opportunities and drive market penetration of products and solutions. Track market changes. Stay ahead of new products and key industry trends. -Engage with customers and follow up on customers’ orders promptly. Provide accurate monthly rolling forecast to ensure on-time production and delivery schedule to meet the requirements of customers. Execute product positioning plan and manage price structure. Build and maintain long-lasting relationships with customers. Work closely with marketing, R&D, Operations, and Application Engineering teams to provide customer support. Manage and organize sales activities to achieve sales targets for hermetic solutions and sensor solutions Develop and execute sales strategies aligned with company objectives Accurately forecast and provide regular updates on sales performance Work closely with business leaders to develop and implement pricing proposals and identify market trends Assist in formulating and driving market development plans to pursue business growth Manage key accounts and strengthen relationships with existing customers Identify new business development opportunities and gaps in the markets to grow our existing portfolio of customers Requirements: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering disciplines, System Integration is a plus. Minimum of 5 years of technical sales experience in component, OEM, or electrical appliances with a minimum of 3 years of managerial position Quick learner and a good team player. Proven performance in sales, winning new business, and account management. Good team player with excellent communication and presentation skills Striving for success, logical and well-organized, attentive to details Good command of spoken and written English Traveling is required

The Role Software Engineering Manager Software Engineering Director Quantium is in pursuit of an on-site Engineering Manager / Director who embodies a blend of leadership prowess and technical expertise. This individual will lead our development team, impart strategic direction to other team leads, and drive the evolution of our platform, all from our Bangkok office (True Digital Park – Sukhumvit). This role is pivotal in ensuring that our software solutions not only meet but exceed the expectations of our distinguished client base. Job Description Oversee and mentor a team of developers and provide guidance to two to three additional team leads. Ensure the team consistently delivers high-quality features, with clean code and optimal performance that aligns with user expectations. Develop deep understanding of technical and business requirements to effectively define scope and allocate sprint stories to development team Track and drive high productivity of engineering team while maintaining balance and high job satisfaction of team Lead by example in maintaining high standards of quality assurance and control. Drive the creation of automated tools and high-availability solutions that support and enhance the functionality of the Quantium platform. Provide technical solutions to development and DevOps team to ensure high speed and availability of system Facilitate collaboration with the client solutions team to refine and improve software functionalities based on client feedback and market demands. Spearhead API development and maintain a comprehensive suite of RESTful API documentation. Qualifications Proven experience in a leadership role managing large software development team in enterprise software or FinTech product Demonstrated technical expertise in desktop and mobile application development. In-depth knowledge of backend programming languages (e.g., C#, Java) and front-end JavaScript frameworks (e.g., Angular, React, Node.js). Proficiency with databases (e.g., MySQL, MongoDB) and a sound understanding of UI/UX design principles. Exceptional ability to manage multiple projects and deadlines in a fast-paced, high-pressure environment. A demonstrated passion for the financial technology industry and a long-term mindset aligned with our company culture. Business fluency in English, with outstanding communication skills. Work location: True Digital Park West, BTS Punnawithi On-site 3-4 days a week (Friday requires)

Job purpose : To plan and carry out marketing and sales activities, develop and maintain sales of the company in the country. Accountable for business operation and Profitability in Thailand Key responsibilities and accountabilities: Develop and maintain a customer and prospect database. Experience of selling industrial capital equipment preferable ultrasonic equipment. Accountable for business operation in Thailand Respond to and follow up sales enquiries by personal visits, mails, telephone, and post. Maintain and develop existing and new customers with the support of Head office. Carry out market research on potential industrial applications for the company’s products. Monitor and report on activities and provide relevant management information. Skills: Business and selling skill Good Personal and professional communication skill Learning attitude Management and leadership skill Requirement: Candidate must possess at least a Diploma, Advanced/Higher/Graduate Diploma, Bachelor's Degree, Post Graduate Diploma, Professional Degree, Engineering (Chemical), Engineering (Electrical/Electronic), Engineering (Industrial), Engineering (Mechanical), Engineering (Mechatronic/Electromechanical) or equivalent. Having min. 2 years’ experience in selling capital equipment’s. Able to work independently Good communication skill / initiative and analytical skill Able to speak and write in English Full-Time position(s) available. Own car Features:- Sales Incentive Bachelor Degree in Mechanical / Electrical / instrumentation or Telecommunication Growth in career

Our client, a leading retail company founded for more than 30 years in Thailand, is seeking for a PL/SQL Developer to join their team for contribute to the development, delivery and maintenance of business solutions based on Oracle technologies. As a PL/SQL developer, you will work closely with Business Intelligence and Developer team, both Thais and Non-Thais, in order to ensure that Oracle software products meet highest quality and industry standards both functional and technical. Responsibilities As a PL/SQL Developer, you will actively engage in solution implementation projects centered around Oracle applications. Contribute to the development and deliver of business solutions to the team using Oracle technologies. Support for various Oracle products across all stages, full life cycle, of solution implementation projects which is including analysis, design, building, testing, production, and maintenance. Be able to design, configure, develop, and test Oracle software products , ensuring they meet both functional and technical requirements. Responsible for the implementation of application extensions, reports, data conversion, and integration components. Be able to work as a team with Business Intelligence and Developer, both Thais and Non-Thai. Requirements to fit in this role Strong experienced in Oracle SQL and PL/SQL programming. 5+ years of professional experience as a PL/SQL Developer. Strong understanding of Oracle Database across all stages , including design, data modeling, and architecture. Experience in performance tuning and optimization of SQL queries and database operations. Familiarity with database development tools such as Oracle SQL Developer, TOAD, or PL/SQL Developer. Knowledge of version control systems and issue tracking tools. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Strong communication and teamwork skills. Oracle certification is a plus. Experiences in E-commerce or Retail project would be advantageous If you are the one who looking for a chance, do not hesitate to apply for this role!

Responsibilities; - To Manage DB Administration tasks. - Gathering and analyzing authenticate system requirements as well as proposed alternative solution to serve online business needs. - Assist the development teams with SQL tuning, database design, and data access issues. - Suggest the suitable alternatives to serve business needs impact analysis and ensure the authenticate system compatibility and interface with related systems. - Coordinate amongst development teams and users to clarify issues and ensure the authenticate and DB project success. - Database maintenance and support. - Coordinate and perform System and User - Acceptance Test to ensure deliverable good quality. - Monitor and analyze database performance and ensure efficient utilization of database systems. - Performance tuning and corrective maintenance to assure that database is performing efficiently. - Perform data backups and developing data recovery plans. - Perform Database security and integrity controls. - Perform database capacity planning and maintain a database instance. Qualifications; - Bachelor's Degree in MIS, IT/Computer Sciences or related fields - 2-7 years’ experience Manage and Administration Database system - MCDBA preferred, with good analytical and problem-solving skills - Have an excellent SQL language skill - Knowledge of Database: MS SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle and others RDBMS - Knowledge of MongoDB and Redis will be advantage - Installation and re-installation of MS SQL and other databases - Troubleshooting problems on Database, cluster, and replication Fault Management and Data Management - Process for data backup and restoration - Quick learner, ability to learn new technologies - Work with them effectively in a short period of time - Ability to work in a cooperative and team environment, as well as the ability to work independently

Responsible for reconciliation of cash, trade, transfer and distribution transactions. Focus on risk avoidance in fast paced environment to ensure transaction posting is accurate and timely. Works directly with broker/dealer clients, fund families and internal ancillary departments on a daily basis e.g. upload and maintain omnibus billing rates. Calculate and report omnibus fees to broker dealer clients. Deliver approved invoices to fund families on behalf of our clients, determining appropriate action to resolve the discrepancies; this includes taking corrective action using research and decision-making skills. Independent thinking is expected with more complex research situations. Job Description: Provides daily broker/dealer clients support, including responding to broker/dealer inquiries, setting up security and enrollment in products, researching reports aimed at overall quality improvements, and updating and maintaining documentation. Performs tasks associated with broker/dealer solutions. Gathers and analyzes information for problem resolution. Candidate will need strong communication skills, as well as the ability to multi-task. Qualifications: An associate degree with 2 or 3 years of related experience. 1-2 years’ experience in application / production development and/or support role. 1-2 years in financial application support would be an advantage. Strong communication, writing and reading skills with the ability to effectively collaborate with both clients and technical stakeholders. Ability to execute multiple assignments within an established timeframe and maintain department quality standards. Problem solving skills; ability to confidently recommend solutions on the basis of prior analysis. Have knowledge of Relational Database and SQL Have a knowledge of Mutual Fund will be a plus. Note: Basic mainframe knowledge and tools will be provided. *** This position is required to work Tuesday - Saturday. Candidates selected for interviews will be contacted for this position. Human Resources Department - Talent Acquisition 6th Floor, RSU Tower 571 Sukhumvit Road North Klongton, Wattana Bangkok 10110, Thailand t: t: (+66) 2685-8400 ext: Talent Acquisition m: 065-384-4022

Roles & Responsibilities Work with the manager to perform actuarial reserving functions Use reserving methodologies to estimate insurance policy liabilities Set up reserving models, including data extraction, checks and collating results Set, review, and monitor the company’s actuarial assumptions for reserving Communicate with auditors/regulators with respect to explanation on methodology and results. Prepare presentations and communicate findings and key results at the Reserving Committee Meeting. Provide second opinion to the pricing team as a member of the product committee. Work closely and efficiently with Regional Actuarial Team to comply with regional actuarial policies and guidelines. Work closely and efficiently with the Accounting and Finance departments to ensure processes are aligned and deliverables are met. Prepare market information and estimate the capital adequacy ratio. Assist in other reporting activities and ad-hoc projects, e.g., IFRS17, Reinsurance Retention Review, Business Planning exercises, BI-project etc. Candidate Specifications Degree in Actuarial Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or related field with good exam progression in a recognized actuarial body. At least 3 years of relevant working experience in insurance/reinsurance and at least 1 year of reserving experience. MS Excel skill is required and experience in ResQ would be an advantage. Proficiency in SQL/SAS would be an advantage. Experience in IFRS17 would be an advantage. Good command of spoken and written English.

column8: หน้าที่รับผิดชอบ จัดทำขั้นตอนการปฏิบัติงาน และ Workflow ต่างๆ ที่สอดคล้องกับระเบียบปฏิบัติ IT Rules บันทึกข้อมูลการปฏิบัติตาม Workflow ในแบบฟอร์มต่างๆ ของกระบวนการทำงานทางด้าน IT วิเคราะห์ข้อมูล ให้คำแนะนำ และข้อเสนอแนะ สำหรับปรับปรุงและพัฒนาระบบงานด้าน IT ให้สอดคล้องกับมาตรฐานต่างๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง เพื่อประสิทธิภาพและทันต่อเหตุการณ์ สรุปผลลัพธ์การทำงานทางด้าน IT กับ Target ที่กำหนดไว้ คุณสมบัติ ป.ตรี สาขาเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ, คอมพิวเตอร์ธุรกิจ หรือที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีความรู้ความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับ Hardware Software และ Network มีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดี รักงานบริการ สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้

column8: Job Description Manage BAU application support team to operate and maintain applications to be able to “Run” the business effectively. Perform the lead role in managing resolutions of all deployed and operationally live systems during Incident management. Take ownership to manage relevant parties to fix incidents. Lead define, plan and conduct activity to ensure platform reliability. Lead and manage improve efficiency SLA of platform including application LCM, security patching, compliance, audit finding, application housekeeping and regularly ensure capacity sizing. Lead and organize cross-functional team to deliver end results on regular basis. Manage project implementation with COE application to understand how solution design and provide requirement for application SLA monitoring capability once transition to operation BAU after project go-live. Lead reliability engineer team with co-working with COE Application custodian on incident troubleshooting, investigate root cause analysis to prevent future failures as problem management process and follow up with COE until incidents have been permanent fixed. Engage, influence SRE to improve service quality and SLA in view of E2E customer experience & impact. Overview regularly “Platform reliability & SLA “ report to update and present to Group head of COE and related committee meeting. Qualification Bachelor’s degree in information systems, computing studies, IT, business administration or any other related fields. Minimum 15 years in banking application architecture design and solution in specific application solutions Knowledge of programming languages like Java, JavaScript, SQL, basic Unix command and Python Knowledge of basic tools like JIRA, Bitbucket, Jenkins Strong communication and interpersonal skills (Channel team, Infra team and Network team)

Jobtitle: Cyber Security Analyst/เจ้าหน้าที่บริหาร - เจ้าหน้าที่บริหารอาวุโส...
Company: The Office of The Securities and Exchange Commission, Thailand
column8: ฝ่ายเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ สายงาน Cyber Security & Infrastructure หน้าที่รับผิดชอบ : 1. ประเมินความเสี่ยง วางมาตรการป้องกัน ทั้งระดับนโยบายและแนวปฏิบัติ และสร้าง awareness 2. วางมาตรการตรวจจับความผิดปกติ รวมถึงมาตรการ response and recovery หากเกิด cyber security incident Digital Forensic 3.ปฏิบัติงานหรือสนับสนุนการปฏิบัติงานของหน่วยงานอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้องตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติ - วุฒิการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป สาขา Compute Engineer, Computer Science, Information Technology หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง - มีประสบการณ์ทำงานด้าน Network/System Administrator หรือ IT Security หรือ DevOps อย่างน้อย 2 ปี คุณสมบัติเพิ่มเติม ที่จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นกรณีพิเศษ : -ผ่านการฝึกอบรมด้าน IT Governance หรือ IT Best Practice เข่น ISO27001 NIST COBIT -ได้รับประกาศนียบัตรด้าน Cyber security หรือ IT Audit เช่น CISSP CISM CISA CompTIA CEH

Company: The Siam Cement Public Company Limited (SCG)
column8: Responsibilities: • Manage Cloud Infrastructure projects and transition to operations according to Action Plans. • Coordinate with IT Vendors to implement Cloud Infrastructure Services and Operations. • Analyze and Propose an IT Technology platform to support SCG business. • Work with IT Vendors and Manage SOW (Scope of Work), SLA (Service Level Management) • Manage IT Cost Allocation for SCG Subsidiaries and Coordination with BU IT representatives. • Study New Technology and be able to transfer knowledge to others. Qualifications: • Bachelor or Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, IT, ICT or related field.. • Having experience in Cloud Infrastructure Knowledge such as AWS, Microsoft Azure, Google Cloud. • At least 3 years of experience in IT Infrastructure Network, Project Management, IT Operation Management. • Process Oriented skills, Problem-solving skills, and being able to work with people. • Organized and well-planned project management skills. • Interesting in new Technologies.

Our Company Do you want to be part of Thailand banking transformation? Data is the core of the new financial services era, and we are open for the opportunity to be part to drive this change at the core. SCB DataX is a new venture of SCBx, the mothership of the financial technology business group comprising Siam Commercial Bank (SCB) and other subsidiaries, a leading financial services and digital services holdings in Thailand and ASEAN. As part of the transformation of SCBx group of product and technology companies, under the SCBx brand, SCB DataX is the technology company to centralize data and provides AI/ML and data science services and products to the group. With a leading-edge cloud native data & AI platform, our vision is to support the group to providing everyone in our region with the opportunity to prosper. We work on forward-thinking challenges of centralizing, analyzing and sharing information. We collaborate with companies and experts in many different domains, embrace diversity and all that while having a good laugh and joy in work. About Team and Role At DataX, we recognize the critical role that effective risk management plays in our operations. DataX Risk Management division is responsible for data governance, privacy, security, technology risk, operational risk, model risk, business continuity, legal and compliance. We are tasked with development and execution of risk management strategies and ensuring the integrity of our processes and the safeguarding our organization. This role sits within IT Risk and Security functions of the Risk Management division. As a dynamic and innovative AI/ML startup operating in the fintech industry, we are seeking a motivated and skilled IT Risk & Security Controls Specialist to join our team. This role offers an exciting opportunity to contribute in design and development of our risk management processes in a fast-paced environment. In this role, you will be exposed to new ways of working, new risk management techniques, complex business model, and a collegial working environment. Responsibilities Identify, assess, and mitigate risks associated with technology infrastructure, systems, and processes. Evaluate vulnerabilities, design and implement controls to protect against threats. Perform risk assessments to identify gaps and areas of improvement in the security posture. Coordinate with Security and IT teams to ensure the implementation of security controls and measures. Conduct risk assessments, control checks, and evaluate maturity of control environment using appropriate tools and methodologies. Align technical security controls and processes with industry frameworks (e.g., NIST CSF, ISO 27001) and regulatory requirements. Monitor and stay updated with emerging threats, vulnerabilities, and security practices to propose proactive measures. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement security awareness and training programs for employees. Regularly report to senior management and regulators on the status of security controls, risks, and compliance with regulations. Qualifications Bachelor's degree in a relevant field (e.g., Computer Science, Information Security) or equivalent practical experience. Extensive experience in technology risk management or information security roles. Strong knowledge of technology infrastructure, systems, and processes, with an understanding of associated risks. Proven experience in identifying vulnerabilities, implementing security controls, and performing risk assessments. Familiarity with security frameworks and regulations (e.g., NIST CSF, ISO 27001, PDPA) and their practical application. Proficiency in using automated risk assessment tools and conducting security maturity assessments. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to think strategically and propose effective solutions. Strong communication skills, with the ability to convey complex information to both technical and non-technical audiences. Attention to detail and ability to work independently as well as collaboratively in cross-functional teams. Professional certifications in information security (e.g., CISSP, CISM, CRISC) are highly desirable. Experience with incident response and familiarity with incident response frameworks is a plus.

Jobtitle: Cyber Risk & Technology - Associate to Manager (Financial Services)
column8: Job Description We help our clients better comprehend and manage technology, cyber and information risks. By closely understanding our clients’ issues and strategies, we assist them by managing their technology risks and to align with their business objectives. We help clients: —   identify, manage and reduce their technology and cyber security risks —   meet their IT compliance and governance obligations —   increase confidence that their IT, risk management, and security practices satisfy their needs Responsibilities Contribute as a team member in delivering technology and cyber risk services to clients in the financial services sector. These services range from designing and developing frameworks, strategies and operating models for cyber security and IT risk management, to performing compliance assessments and assurance engagements. Example activities include: Performing maturity assessments and roadmap development in the security, IT risk, and data governance domains. Designing, developing, and implementing frameworks, policies, procedures, and standards. Performing gap assessments against regulatory requirements and providing recommendation to remediate the gaps. Performing IT, cyber risk & third-party risk assessments. Performing IT audits Take ownership for the completion of assigned work within the agreed timeframe and quality standards. Prepare work papers and support the preparation of project deliverables and reports Coordinate with client and keep track of project status Qualifications Bachelor’s or Master’s degree, preferably in Information Systems and Technology, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Management Information System, Technology Management, or a related discipline. We are also open to candidates with degrees in other areas, such as Accounting, if there is a strong interest and motivation to learn and pursue a career in the Tech and Cyber risk domain. Ability to develop excellent client and internal relationships Ability to deliver work within tight timescales and to a high quality Broad understanding and interest in emerging technology (e.g. cloud, AI) and any of the areas of IT risk, cyber security, data protection and privacy, and data governance. Fluent English and Thai communication skills, ability to work collaboratively across functions and offices.

Company: บริษัท แอสเซนด์ กรุ๊ป จำกัด
column8: About the Role • You will be lead the vision, strategy, and execution of one of our product verticals across our 7 countries (Vietnam, Cambodia, Philippines, Myanmar, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand). • You will be working with best-in-class colleagues in a dynamic environment. You will conceptualize, launch and manage products across the SE Asia region, collaborating with other product managers and designers. • You will manage the roadmap for your vertical, analyze customer journeys, define requirements, set timelines, and lead a cross-functional team through Product Development Lifecycle. What you’ll do • Identify opportunities and problems areas for your product lines • Value-based prioritization of continuous improvements and new features alike • Develop a deep understanding of your customers, using various tools and methods, to continually gather and analyze qualitative and quantitative data. • Research competitive offerings across the region and deliver a best-in-class experience to your customers. • Define and monitor objective success metrics for your products. • Translate the opportunities into high-quality and detailed Product Requirements in collaboration with the design and development teams. • Partner with the engineering team to execute the requirements and see it to smooth launch. Who you are • You have experience working as a product owner, or similar, in high performing, cross-functional teams • You have a technical understanding of what it takes to build and maintain large scale applications and services and you are comfortable facilitating and participating in the architectural and technical decisions made in the team • You know how to inspire, motivate and support a team to get things done • You can translate your and your team's knowledge and experience to user stories and detailed requirements • You are good at communicating concepts and ideas to stakeholders at all levels. • You know how to influence decision-making at all levels within an organization and in a variety of situations. • You have experience with data-driven product development and knowledge of agile methodologies • You work well with uncertainties and tight timelines. • You love what you do.

Job Description At ClouDee Telecom Co., Ltd, our clients have access to high-levels of support from our Customer Success team. As a SaaS Support Specialist, you play a critical role as the first point of contact for clients contacting the Help Desk for our SaaS products. You are a strong multi-tasker who can work successfully across multiple teams to resolve issues in a timely manner. You are also a tech-savvy product expert with strong attention to detail and ability to go beyond clients’ initial requests to understand their underlying needs. Responsibilities: Provide Tier 1 support for our clients by troubleshooting and maintaining frontend and backend systems. Multi-task and track dozens of open tickets at various stages of completion. Communicate the root cause to clients in non-technical terms. Assume full ownership and responsibility of all allocated support tickets ensuring they are dealt with promptly and professionally and satisfactorily concluded. Ensure strict adherence to SLA when dealing with customer tickets/calls. Work closely with the relevant stakeholders to ensure that the highest quality of technical support and consultancy is delivered to the customer at all times. Work with vendors/partners to resolve complex problems. Proactively identify clients experiencing repeated issues or requests that are not resolved to the client’s satisfaction. Escalate issues, as needed. Provide recommendations to the Product team about how to improve customer experience. Document relevant technical information on the internal knowledge base system including system problems, problem resolution and knowledge base content. Required Skills and Qualifications: Minimum 2 – 5 years relevant support experience on SaaS based platforms such as Helpdesk, CRM, Automation platform, RPA, Cloud Contact Center. Bachelor’s degree in computer science or information technology or communication engineering. Thai nationals only. Excellent analytical, troubleshooting, and problem-solving skills. Excellent oral and written communication skills in Thai and English. Ability to convey technical information to a general audience. Aptitude for learning new technologies quickly. Ability to prioritize tasks and carry out responsibilities with minimal direction.

column8: หน้าที่งานทั่วไป: มีหน้าที่เขียนโปรแกรมด้วยภาษาDart, C#, JavaScript พร้อมทั้งจัดทำเอกสารประกอบการพัฒนาโปรแกรม ปฏิบัติงานที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากผู้บังคับบัญชา คุณสมบัติ: สำเร็จการศึกษาระดับ ปริญญาตรี สาขาวิชา คอมพิวเตอร์, เทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศหรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง สามารถพัฒนาโปรแกรมด้วยภาษา Dart, C#, JavaScript, C# ได้ สามารถใช้ Flutter Framework และเขียน Mobile App สามารถ พูด อ่าน เขียน ภาษาอังกฤษได้พอใช้ Work location: Near BTS Siam, MRT Silom Salary will be dependent on experience and qualifications, applications including a detailed resume, references, contact phone number, present, and expected salaries should be sent via email to Apply Now . Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Job Description We help our clients better comprehend and manage technology, cyber and information risks. By closely understanding our clients’ issues and strategies, we assist them by managing their technology risks and to align with their business objectives. We help clients: — identify, manage and reduce their technology and cyber security risks — meet their IT compliance and governance obligations — increase confidence that their IT, risk management, and security practices satisfy their needs Responsibilities Lead and manage teams in delivering technology and cyber risk services to clients in the financial services sector. These services range from designing and developing frameworks, strategies and operating models for cyber security and IT risk management, to performing compliance assessments and assurance engagements. Example activities include: 1. Performing maturity assessments and roadmap development in the security, IT risk, and data governance domains. 2. Designing, developing, and implementing frameworks, policies, procedures, and standards. 3. Performing gap assessments against regulatory requirements and providing recommendation to remediate the gaps. 4. Performing IT, cyber risk & third-party risk assessments. 5. Performing IT audits Support the project lead in the project scoping and planning, financial management, delivery risk management, production, and review of deliverables. Take ownership for the completion of assigned work within the agreed timeframe and quality standards. Coordinate with client and keep track of project status. Build and manage excellent client relationships. Actively identify and progress business development opportunities, as well as manage sales activities such as proposal writing and assisting with client presentations. Coach and develop team members on engagements Qualification 6+ years’ experience in Technology and Cyber Risk with expertise in at least one of the following domains: IT risk management, information security, data privacy, IT compliance, IT governance, BCM, or IT audit Ability to develop excellent client and internal relationships Ability to deliver work within tight timescales and to a high quality Ability to present on specific subjects to a large group of people Professional Certifications: CISSP, ITIL strongly preferred. Strong understanding of relevant frameworks and standards, such as COBIT, NIST, ITIL, ISO 27K, PCI DSS, ISO22301 Knowledge of relevant laws and regulations will be considered an advantage. Bachelor’s or Master’s degree from an accredited college/university in Information Systems and Technology, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Management Information System, Technology Management, or a related discipline Proficiency in spoken and written Thai and good English

We are looking for an active, detail-oriented and service-minded person to join our Technology System Department in the role of IT On-Site Support. The key accountabilities are the following: As part of the Technology system department, represent Technology as a source of contact for users needing technical assistance primarily in the Bangkok Office. Provide level 1 initial assessment and troubleshooting of inbound issues. Answers end-users’ queries when possible and appropriate. Record, track and monitor incidents and service requests following the defined Incident Management Process. Provide an accurate record of each incident description and resolution. Manage resolution of issues efficiently and professionally. Monitors on-going jobs and ensures immediate resolution of the reported problem. Liaise between end user community and technical teams towards resolution of the reported problem. Escalate unresolved incidents and request to the appropriate tier 2 and tier 3 support teams, following defined escalation procedures. Follow up on SLA breach notifications. Provide on-time status and communication to end users regarding outstanding and resolved incidents. Proactively increase the efficiency of the day-to-day operations by suggesting improvements regarding tools and processes. Maintain a strong working knowledge of supported systems and continually strives to enhance knowledge through ongoing training, reading and participating in projects and improvement initiatives. Communicate to management on high-impact operational issues. Follow Service Desk procedures, policies and processes diligently and accurately. Provide back-up support for other team members, as required. Perform any other project or tasks assigned by supervisor and/or management. Required Qualifications: Native in Thai and English basic communication. Bachelor's degree in IT-related fields, e.g. computer science, computer engineering, etc. 0-1 year of work experience in a technology service desk, or related fields, will be an advantage. Open to a fresh graduate who has an internship in technology service desk or related fields. Passionate about new technology and applications, willing to learn, quickly grasp, and adapt to new technology, as well as willing to provide support services to internal users. Driven, proactive, initiative-oriented, result-oriented, highly committed to work, good interpersonal, and excellent customer service skills. Thoroughness in terms of following defined processes diligently and accurately. Ability to work collaboratively across functions but also to work independently in a very fast-paced and stressful environment. Ability to work overtime, on a shifting schedule, or weekends as necessary. To apply, please click ' APPLY NOW ' For more information, please contact: HR at 02 636 2000 or 02 666 2824 Ext. 8785 Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. Visit https://bmcknz.ie/3tIzPCB [link removed] to read the data privacy statement

IT Business / System Analyst (Digital Platform) Location: Bangkok – BTS Line Cathcart Technology is cooperating with a dynamic and innovative digital platform provider seeking a talented and passionate Business / System Analyst to join their team. Our clients provide a solution supporting leading technology companies and organizations with a focus in IT infrastructure, cloud solutions and customized platforms. Key Responsibilities: Collaborate with business users to gather requirements, and business objectives and identify opportunities for process improvement. Identify areas for optimization and enhancement of current business processes and systems. Design and support any required document detailed in business and system requirements. Conduct a review of systems to identify and address any issues, ensuring continuous improvement. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in computer engineering, Computer Science, or any IT-related field. 3 years or over of experience as a Business / System Analyst in web application development. Experienced with enterprise scales product or project development. Familiar with designing Business, Functional, and Software Specification. Knowledge in IT Infrastructure is preferable. Intermediate English competency. If you are a proactive and result-driven professional interested in contributing to the company's success, please apply for this position or contact – Kasamapong (Kong) – 061-829-7744 for more information.

Requirements Degree in Computer Science or related field At least 3 years of experience in IT Systems Support & Services Strong with Microsoft Technologies, Windows OS, Office 365, Cloud/Azure, Exchange Server & Network environment (routers, switches, access points, firewalls and VPNs) Solid Expertise in Risk Management, IT Security, Endpoint Security, Data Protection; Firewall, Backup, Antivirus Excellent skills in general IT Infrastructure support & proactive IT Consulting Ability to create, follow up and follow through with IT Plans, Policies, IT Budgets and IT documentation Strong Knowledge of IT Audits, License compliance, Asset Management, Quality Assurance Cisco, ITIL, Microsoft certificates will be an advantage Great service mind and user support skills, with ability to understand our customers’ business goals, user problems and how to support and solve them with best solutions Proactive with highly responsible attitude, always willing to acquire new skills Excellent Team Spirit & smooth communication skills with technical and non-technical clients Self-motivated, 100% reliable and diligent You’ve also got to be a nice, loyal and balanced person that fits into our creative team, happy to support your colleagues and clients Skywave Technologies offers attractive remuneration, flexible working hours and a great team work experience to the right candidate. Interested candidates are invited to forward their application letter with detailed resume, references, last salary, expected salary and recent color photograph BY EMAIL to: Skywave Technologies (Thailand) Co., Ltd. 42 Tower, Unit 302, 3rd Fl., 65, Soi Sukhumvit 42 (Kluaynumthai), Sukhumvit Road, Prakanong, Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110

Company hi-light Competitive salary and benefits. Hybrid working style. (WFH and Office) Work directly with professional IT vendor. Seeking Niche Technology in Cyber Security area. Opportunity to learn and develop skillsets throughout your career Career Booster – grow your career as you can go. Implementing and managing privileged access management and Endpoint Security, EDR, and XDR systems. Providing training on Privileged access management and Endpoint Security systems to customers. Diagnosing and resolving technical issues related to PAM/ Endpoint Security, EDR, and XDR, providing ongoing support, and ensuring optimal performance and security. Proficiency in network protocols, configurations, and architectures (TCP/IP, VLANs, Subnetting, etc.) Skill in deploying and integrating PAM or EDR, or XDR systems solutions into existing IT environments, ensuring a smooth and efficient deployment. Excellent Thai and English language skills. Interpersonal skills, a mature personality, and an excellent service attitude are a must. Analytical skills and the ability to recognize the demands on the clients Experience in BeyondTrust, Cyber Ark, CarbonBlack, Crowd Strike, or Similar solutions is advantageous. Advantage skill Relevant certifications such as CCNA, PAM, EDR, or vendor-specific certifications can be advantageous. Benefits Hybrid working style. (WFH and Office) Free Snack corner Team entertainment party (Quarterly) Sports Day & Outing (Annually) Support certificate exam fee with plus package after the gain experience Quarterly Incentive linked to individual and team contribution Annual bonus Medical healthcare and  insurance Transportation allowance Access to all knowledge directly from a professional vendor company Provident fund GrabGifts Birthday Welfare  marriage Welfare maternity In-patient medical welfare Welfare cremation WIT’s Star Program

Job Description ประสานงานระหว่างภายนอกและภายในองค์กร ในการดูแลโครงการที่เกี่ยวข้องกับระบบ e-Learning การจัดอบรม การจัดสัมนา และโครงการอื่นๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมายให้เสร็จตามเวลาที่กำหนด รับ Requirement จากลูกค้า สรุปรายละเอียดขอบเขตงาน (Scope of Work) ทำเอกสารส่งมอบงาน, รายงานการประชุม, จดหมายต่างๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องในการดำเนินงาน สนับสนุนการออกแบบ flow การทำงานของระบบ, การแสดงผล wireframe, การแสดงผลหน้า mockup และคู่มือการใช้งานระบบ สนับสนุนด้านการทดสอบการทำงานของระบบให้ถูกต้องตาม Requirement ของลูกค้า รับเรื่องจัดการปัญหาต่างๆ ของลูกค้าที่เกี่ยวข้องกับโครงการที่รับผิดชอบ ทั้งก่อนและหลังงานเสร็จสิ้น และจัดสรรทีมงานในการแก้ไขปัญหาให้ลูกค้า และพิจารณานำเสนอลูกค้าหากมีค่าใช้จ่ายเพิ่มเติม จัดดูตารางงาน แผนงานต่างๆ ของทีม ทำการนัดหมาย ติดต่อลูกค้า พาร์ทเนอร์ Qualifications จบปริญญาตรีทุกสาขา สามารถใช้งานโปรแกรม Words, Excel, PowerPoint ได้เป็นอย่างดี พร้อมเรียนรู้สิ่งใหม่ๆ สนใจเทคโนโลยี สามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ สามารถลำดับความสำคัญของงานได้ สามารถแก้ปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้

The Test Engineer will be responsible for analyzing the business requirements and establishing test design, inputting test data and executing the test cases. Key Responsibilities : Review of requirements and design documents (BRD, FSD, TSD) from testing point of view​ Develop test cases and execute manual testing based on user requirements​ Conduct functional testing, regression testing, system integration testing (SIT) for each component, system, application and integration product​ Works with business to write test cases for business users to execute​ Analyze, interpret and report test results (defects, bugs) for verification and validation​ Provide feedback to development and system design teams based on test results​ Create, update, approve and implement overall technology Quality Assurance Framework (QAF) Qualifications and Experience Required : Experienced in the role of a Full Stack Engineer or Software Engineer Strong understanding of multiple software applications design tools and languages Able to perform development, testing and debugging work Proven technical aptitude in one or more application programming domains, or “T-shaped” skills Ability to work in an agile development environment Benefits : Hybrid Working Arrangement World-Class Development Program Performance Bonus Vacation Leave 15 Days + Maternity Leave MacBook Provided Housing Loan Life Insurance/ Health Insurance/ Dental Care Jetts Fitness (Corporate rate and privilege) Opportunity to be a part of team that drives Thailand Digital Economy (The contributor of the great impact to millions of Thai people through digital platforms e.g. PaoTang App. and Krungthai Next App) Working Location : The ParQ ชั้น 5, 9-10 (Hybrid Work) ติดกับ MRTสถานีศูนย์การประชุมแห่งชาติสิริกิติ์ ทางออกที่ 2

Job description 1.Set up the system and maintain the equipment used to operate the network system. Setup network system, Network Infrastructure, Network System, Network Administrator, Network & System Security Track the efficiency of using the system Take care of implementing the P.M system according to plan. Report the status caused by abnormalities in the system to the supervisor and consult to find solutions to prevent system risks. 2.Set up all types of network access Acknowledge the plan and settings according to the access assignment policy. Create a user code and set permissions to use the computer system in accordance with the data access policy. 3. Network security work Analyze and present to the leader the selection of tools to be used to protect against Virus attacks or threats. Carry out installation control at all levels of use (SERVER, clients, entire system) Follow up and report the status of threats to supervisors regularly. both normal and risks encountered 4. Creating a backup system, System DATA & Config, to support plans in emergencies. Determine the form of backup system that must be used in emergencies. Control the safety of the set of information that the policy specifies as important information for the operation of the business. Check the completeness of various data backups. from the system used to store backup Pull back the Backup and be able to install it back out for complete use when an event occurs. Requirements ● Bachelor's degree in Information Technology ● At least 3 years of experience in IT work. ● Knowledge of Hardware, Infrastructure, knowledge of Anti Virus system management. ● Be careful with details. ● Have systematic thinking skills. ● Be enthusiastic and proactive. Benefits Incentive Provident Fund Healthcare Performance bonus 5 days work Others

Jobtitle: Section Manager Application Support – Software Support (O2O)

Makro Pro – O2O web application . OMS – Order Management system . OCS – Omni Channel Customer Service . TMS – Transportation Management System . Line OA . Support Data integration to other system such as Inventory management in store location - Korber, Sales tools services . Jobtitle: Cyber Security Expert - GRC/Cyber Security Expert - GRC
column8: As a Cyber Security Expert - GRC, you will protect our information and its supporting IT infrastructure (including cloud platform, networks, hardware and software) from a range of malicious activity. You will assess, analyze, and handle security operations and incidents until their resolution Key Responsibilities Gathering threat intelligence information and prioritizing appropriate actions in context with the risks Analyze our IT posture to assess security risks Performs security incidents handling and participates in the remediation Draft and maintain policies, procedures and guidelines Enforce security standards and procedures Suggest and implement solutions for improvement Assists project teams, developers and business units. Provide consultation to all security processes, related tools and resolve security issues Contribute to the design and execution of security audits, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies Conduct regular risk assessments and vulnerability assessments to identify potential security threats Identity and evaluate the IT and Security Risks the company is facing (ISO27001) Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate security controls into various processes and technologies Report the IT and Security Risks the company in facing Support the CISO to establish the IT and Security risk management program Support the other department to centralize and reports their own risks Follow-up the remediation of the potential security risks identified in the assessments Qualifications Minimum of 3 years of experience in Security governance, risk management, and compliance Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Security or IT related field Solid understanding of industry standards and frameworks, such as ISO27001, NIST, PCI-DSS and GDPR Experience with conducting risk assessments, vulnerability assessments, and security audits Proven knowledge in Security Monitoring Controls and Tools (e.g. SIEM, WAF, Antivirus) Implementation and operation basis Familiarity with GRC (Governance, Risks, and Compliance) tools and platforms Relevant certifications such as CISSP, CISM, or CRISC and preferred Knowledge in Cloud platform (AWS, Azure) is an advantage Knowledge in IT service management tools (JIRA, ITSM) in an advantage Knowledge in Cybersecurity best practice and Risk analysis Ability to collaborate and work as a team, Security analytical and problem-solving skill Analytical mindset with the ability ti make informed decisions in high-pressure situations CISSP, CISA or equivalent certification is an advantage Eager to learn. Adaptive and agile mindset Good command in English

Job Descriptions: Analyze the business needs then propose and implement IT solutions to improve the business processes. Define As- Is process and design To-Be process then record them in documentation. Scope of work A Business Analyst is a professional who is responsible for identifying and defining the business needs of an organization and helping to find solutions to business problems. Business Analyst will be involved in projects ranging from process improvement to the implementation of new systems. Job Description: Show skills in making workflow charts, entity models, business flows, and writing documents that list system or product needs for better project planning. Find out business needs by looking closely at data and talking to stakeholders, focusing on main problems. Create and draw out solution needs, making sure they match with what the business needs. Talk clearly with everyone involved to make sure they understand and agree with the proposed solution. Also, take part in risk management to prevent and handle any problems that might come up in the project. Other duties may be assigned by the supervisor. Qualification: Bachelor's degree or higher in business or computer science with a strong understanding of business models and processes. Minimum 1 years’ experience in translating business models into presentations using tools such as the Business Model Canvas, workflow diagrams, sequence diagrams, and use cases, etc. Demonstrated knowledge of basic business concepts and operations.

Position Overview: We are seeking a highly skilled Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic team. As a Full Stack Developer at InsightEra Co., LTD. , He will play a crucial role in developing and maintaining web applications using a variety of technologies, including VueJS, ReactJS, NodeJS, TypeScript, Golang, Kotlin Spring Boot. Passionate about creating innovative solutions and thrive in a fast-paced environment, we would like to hear. Key Responsibilities: Frontend Development: Utilize VueJS and ReactJS to create responsive and visually appealing user interfaces. Collaborate with design team to ensure seamless integration of UI/UX designs. Implement best practices for front-end development, including code optimization and performance tuning. Backend Development: Develop robust and scalable APIs using NodeJS-TypeScript, Golang, and Kotlin. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to design and implement backend solutions. Ensure data security and integrity by implementing authentication and authorization mechanisms. Full Stack Development: Integrate front-end and back-end components to deliver end-to-end functionality. Debug and troubleshoot issues across the entire application stack. Continuously improve and refactor code to maintain high code quality standards. Technology Stack: Work with a diverse set of technologies, including VueJS, ReactJS, NodeJS-TypeScript, Golang(require), Kotlin Spring Boot(optional). Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and ensure the adoption of best practices. Collaboration and Communication: Collaborate with team members to understand project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions. Communicate effectively within the team, providing regular updates on project progress and challenges. Qualifications: Proven experience as a Full Stack Developer or similar role. Proficiency in VueJS(require) and ReactJS(optional) for front-end development. Strong expertise in NodeJS-TypeScript(require), Golang, Kotlin Spring Boot for back-end development. (require one from Golang, Kotlin) Familiarity with RESTful APIs and microservices architecture. Solid understanding of database systems (SQL and NoSQL). Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git). Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills. Strong communication and teamwork abilities. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field (preferred).

Scope of work: As a systems analyst, you will be responsible for analyzing, designing, and implementing computer systems to meet the needs of our organization. You should have strong analytical and problem-solving skills, as well as the ability to communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical audiences. You should also be comfortable working with a variety of software and hardware systems and have a strong understanding of computer science principles. Duties and Responsibilities: Analyzing our current systems and identifying areas for improvement. Gathering and documenting requirements from stakeholders and users. Designing and implementing new systems or modifying existing ones. Testing and debugging systems to ensure they are functioning properly. Providing technical support and troubleshooting for systems. Collaborating with other IT professionals, such as software developers and network administrators. Training users on how to use new systems. Ensure deadline and budget requirements are met. Staying up to date with new technologies and trends in the field. Other duties may be assigned by the supervisor. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in computer science or computer engineering or a related technical field. Experience as backend developer or system analyst. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Communication skills. Attention to details. Time management skills. Technical expertise. Adaptability. Interpersonal skills.

column8: Job Requirement : Forecasting Lead the joint demand forecast rolling 3 months (including promotion & seasonal) in order to provide proper forecast to factories Connect with sales and commercial team to ensure allocation to stores for promotion & seasonal Collect sales data and review requirement by stores in the next 7 days from all channels (B2C, O2O, B2B and SMO) Ordering Own CMI process by analyze stocks and off-take data, then prepare order proposal for store to review in daily basis Review & adjust replenishment parameters, especially to reflect promotion and seasonal Monitor ordering flow, ensuring all orders have interfaced correctly, completely, and within window time Maintain store / vendor / item master data Maintain Items both add (NPD) and delete (Discontinued) Maintain order cycle & order lead-time & factory closing dates Stock focusing Review stock and feedback on OSA and fix Gap if needed Review stocks and identify potential phantom stock at store, and follow up with Lotus’s SC & Operations Support to check & adjust if needed Connect with Lotus’s SC to review aging & slow moving, and follow up action plan to clear short shelf-life products Connect with Lotus’s SC to review stock cover day, and follow up action plan to clear items with high stock cover or have high provision Coordinate with Commercial to clear leftover from promotion & seasonal Job Qualifications: Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Supply Chain & Logistics, Business Administration or related fields 3 - 5 years works experience in FMCG in demand planning, replenishment, or customer interface Good knowledge of end-to-end supply chain & logistics both in manufacturing and retails environment Good analytical & problem-solving skills, planning skills and numerical skills Forecasting or demand planning Good command both written and spoken in English including negotiation skills Computer literacy (Microsoft Office particularly in Excel) Can work under pressure and tight deadlines Good attitude and self-motivated Available to work overtime (if needed)

column8: Position: Head of IT (Blockchain/ Fintech) 200-230K Benefits:  200,000 – 230,000 Baht/ month Based:  Bangkok Contact Recruiter: Sirinapa 086-3784083 Our client is a leading Financial Services in Digital Asset Platform. They are now looking for a strong Head of IT to help set up IT team, bring new technology and Applications to the business. Responsibilities : Set up and oversee all technology operations and evaluating them according to established goals Devise and establish IT policies and systems to support the implementation of strategies set by upper management Analyze the business requirements of all departments to determine their technology needs Oversee all technology operations (e.g. network security, IT Operations, infrastructure, Applications) and evaluate them according to established goals. Inspect the use of technological equipment and software to ensure functionality and efficiency identify the need for upgrades, configurations or new systems and report to upper management. Coordinate IT managers and supervise computer scientists, technicians and other professionals to provide guidance. Control budget and report on expenditure. Assist in building relationships with vendors and creating cost-efficient contracts. Knowledge and experience: BSc/BA in computer science, engineering or relevant field; MSc/MA will be a plus A minimum of 5-8 years of experience in IT in Corporate or IT consulting. Proven experience as IT Project Management or Setup IT Team. Experience in analysis, implementation and evaluation of IT systems and their specifications Sound understanding of computer systems (hardware/software), networks etc. Experiences in developing and maintaining systems with a cloud service provider (such as AWS, IBM Cloud, Microsoft Azure, etc.) Experience in Block chain, IT Transformation Management. Excellent organizational and leadership skills Outstanding communication abilities Attractive salary and generous fringe benefits will be offered to the successful candidates. Interested candidates please send your application letter with resume, current and expected salary with contact details and refer the position as “Head of IT (Blockchain/ Fintech)” 086-3784083

รายละเอียดงาน ดูแล ตรวจสอบและให้บริการอุปกรณ์ Computer ทั้ง Hardware และ Software ให้สามารถใช้งานได้อย่างต่อเนื่อง ดูแล และตรวจสอบระบบ Sever ของระบบต่างๆ ให้ใช้งานได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ ดูแลบำรุงรักษา ให้บริการและแก้ไขปัญหาระบบเวิร์กโฟลว์ (WorkFlow) ที่ใช้ในกระบวนการผลิตหนังสือพิมพ์ (เตรียมการพิมพ์) ระบบปฏิบัติการ (Operating System) ซอฟต์แวร์ (Software)และระบบเครือข่ายคอมพิวเตอร์ (Network) ที่อยู่ในความรับผิดชอบ ของฝ่ายการผลิต (เตรียมการพิมพ์) และกองบรรณาธิการและปฏิบัติงานอื่นๆ ตามที่ผู้บังคับบัญชามอบหมาย ปฏิบัติงานอื่นๆตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร ปริญญาตรี ในสาขาวิชา วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์ เทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ (IT) วิทยาศาสตร์คอมพิเตอร์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง ยินดีพิจารณานักศึกษาจบใหม่ หากมีประสบการณ์จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ มีทักษะความรู้ในด้านคอมพิวเตอร์เป็นอย่างดี สามารถติดต่อสื่อสารได้เป็นอย่างดี มีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ดี และมีใจรักในการให้บริการ หากมีประสบการณ์ด้านการใช้ระบบปฏิบัติการ MacOS (iMac, Macbook) จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ

column8: Position: Business Solution Manager Company: FMCG Company (Food and beverage) Period: 8 Months contract Location: Office at Emporium Tower, Bangkok (BTS Phrom Phong) The Business Solution Manager role is to lead Go To Market (GTM) Digital Transformation journey, focusing on integrating PACE as key platform for our AS&D selling & execution operations within 2022, as well as being a key product owner to drive next generation of GTM digital transformation projects including sDNA, eGTM, WS order portal, GTM Cockpit, and Commercial E2E capability. Apart from that, he/she will need to be fully responsible for all technical issue / challenges related to AS&D and WS daily selling operations including but not limited to pricing & promotion setting in DMS system, TT sales dashboard and handheld related tasks as well as sales performance tracking reports. This role also requires to work as a team player with co-workers and in conjunction with other departments especially IT and vendor support contacts to resolve technical problems with end user hardware and software, provide basic training/support in accessing company system and use of software application. Accountabilities Drive the GTM Digital Transformation projects into THF AS&D operations for the next 5 years Be the Business lead for DMS implementation by coordinating with IT resources as well as monthly pricing and promotion set up in system for all store types under AS&D Driving governance on completeness of master data in DMS system Product master Customer master; Customer name, address, Tel, Contact person, Geo code, shop type Beat plan Store Segmentation Manage new Traditional Trade Team (TT) Dashboard for sales performance monitoring by providing users requirements to IT and maintain master data Manage request new user access to DMS and EDW reporting system Support new rack tracking master data and execution process for distributor admin and TT team Coaching sales frontline team and distributor admins on how to manage customer master data before inputting to system Develop handheld kits based on DMS system usage for distributor sales representative Support system set up for Mobile and/or Tablet ordering project with vendor (AIS) in TT channel Collaborate with IT across hardware and software update for AS&D operation including database of DMS systems, such as preparation DMS Backup data of All AS&D Qualifications Minimum 7–10-year experience in related field Proven ability to build business solution strategies and to manage and assure execution of activities adhering the strategy (commercial IT is a plus) Experience in routes sales operations, FMCG industry is preferable Strong acumen in IT / Technology, DMS system is preferable Knowledge of Microsoft Office Suite especially Excel and PowerPoint are imperative Excellent communication (writing/verbal), presentation skills both TH/EN are required Highly accurate with good attention to detail especially pricing and promotion set up Capable of setting priorities and working under pressure Be able to multi-task, planning several events simultaneously Ability to work responsibly with minimal supervision

Job Summary Embark on a thrilling journey as a PMO Assistant, where you'll be at the heart of our dynamic Project Management Office. This role is not just a job; it's an adventure in problem-solving and innovation. You'll find yourself in a vibrant environment where each day brings new challenges and learning opportunities. If you have a passion for project management and a desire to be part of a team that thrives on overcoming challenges, this role is for you. Key Responsibilities Meeting Coordination and Support: Play a pivotal role in organizing and managing high-energy meetings across diverse PMO teams. Master the art of tracking complex discussions, decisions, and action items, ensuring nothing falls through the cracks. Take the lead in maintaining detailed records and documentation, a critical component of our project success. Proactive Project Support and Assistance: Provide energetic and innovative support to project managers, helping to drive projects forward. Be at the forefront of coordinating project activities, playing a key role in ensuring seamless communication and execution. Engage in the exciting implementation of cutting-edge project management methodologies and tools. Communication and Collaboration Excellence: Hone your communication skills in both Chinese and English, becoming a vital link among team members. Collaborate across departments, playing a critical role in knitting together various aspects of project requirements. Flexibility and Adaptability in a Fast-Paced Environment: Thrive in a variety of roles within the PMO, showcasing your adaptability and versatility. Embrace the opportunity for occasional travel or on-site support, especially during high-impact phases of our projects. Qualifications: A Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Project Management, or a related field. Fresh graduates are highly encouraged to apply. Exceptional organizational skills with a flair for juggling multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment. A solid foundation in project management principles and a keenness to build on this knowledge. Outstanding communication skills in Chinese and English, essential for our diverse and dynamic team. Thai language(either speaking or written) would be highly preferred. A natural curiosity and eagerness to learn, adapt, and excel in the ever-evolving world of project management. A strong team player mentality, thriving in collaborative settings.

Role Overview:- We are seeking a dynamic Sales Engineer to spearhead the growth of our Digital Factory division by identifying new business opportunities and fostering lasting relationships with clients. The ideal candidate will have a robust technical background, a strategic sales acumen, and a drive to deliver digital solutions that optimize our clients' manufacturing processes. Key Responsibilities:- Engage with prospective clients to understand their needs and present bespoke digital manufacturing solutions that enhance operational efficiency. Demonstrate in-depth knowledge of our product offerings, including Opcenter APS and other advanced planning systems, to align with customer implementation strategies. Develop technical proposals, presentations, and demonstrations that clearly articulate the value and benefits of our solutions. Collaborate with the production planning team to ensure client requirements are accurately captured and addressed in our solutions. Drive the entire sales process from initial contact through to closing deals, including negotiation and contract signing. Provide technical support and guidance to clients post-sale to ensure the successful deployment and utilization of our products. Stay abreast of industry trends and competitor activities to inform strategic sales initiatives. Participate in trade shows, conferences, and other marketing events to promote our products and gather insights. Qualifications: - Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Technology, Business, or a related field. Proven experience as a Sales Engineer or in a technical sales role, preferably within the manufacturing or industrial sector. Strong understanding of manufacturing processes and digital solutions, with experience in advanced planning systems like Opcenter APS being highly beneficial. Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with fluency in both Thai and English. Ability to translate complex technical information into clear, persuasive language for a non-technical audience. Strategic thinker with a proven track record of meeting sales targets. Proficiency in CRM software and Microsoft Office Suite. A self-starter with the ability to work independently and as part of a team. Must possess a valid driving license and be willing to travel as required. If you are a tech-savvy sales professional passionate about digital manufacturing solutions, we invite you to apply. Please submit your application in English, including a detailed CV, a compelling cover letter, your expected salary, and a recent photograph to us Join us at BOW COMMERCIAL CO., LTD., where your sales expertise will contribute to the digital transformation of manufacturing industries worldwide.

ZILO is focused on transforming the global asset management sector to create sustainable value for firms and the customers they serve. ZILO's technology enables firms to replace legacy technology and end-of-life systems, reducing costs, and risk. This digital transformation journey requires strong partnerships with our customers to modernize and expand their product and service propositions by unifying transfer agency, fund platforms, and fund accounting into a single global solution. Our goal is to build a leading global migration capability, and turn migration into an accessible service, which is highly repeatable and intuitive for end customers. About this role We are seeking a skilled Test Automation Engineer to join our fast-expanding development team. This is a newly created role that offers the chance to work with the latest technologies and tools. The ideal candidate will possess a T-shaped skill set and use their expertise and enthusiasm to apply the most effective testing methodologies in collaboration with the team. Responsibilities: 1. Develop and maintain automated test scripts for backend APIs using C#. 2. Implement and execute automated UI test scenarios using modern front-end automation tools like Playwright or Cypress. 3. Utilise Cucumber/SpecFlow for behaviour-driven development (BDD) and collaborate with stakeholders to create and execute feature files. 4. Apply the Page Object Model for UI automation, ensuring maintainability and reusability of test scripts. 5. Collaborate with developers to ensure comprehensive test coverage and resolve issues efficiently. 6. Utilise your understanding of mocking, stubbing, and structured programming to create effective test scenarios and improve test coverage. 7. Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to design and execute test plans, ensuring alignment with development sprints. 8. Advocate for and implement best practices for automated testing within the CI/CD environment, ideally using Github Actions. 9. Perform database queries to validate data integrity and ensure accurate test results. 10. Understand and apply dependency injection techniques for efficient testing. 11. Leverage your experience in a cloud-based architecture to design and execute tests effectively. 12. Utilise monitoring tools to assist in identifying the root cause of issues and improving overall system performance. Qualifications: 1. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. 2. Proven experience as a Test Automation Engineer, with a focus on backend API testing. 3. Strong programming skills in C#. 4. Experience with modern front-end automation tools like Playwright or Cypress. 5. Proficiency in Cucumber/SpecFlow for behaviour-driven development. 6. Solid understanding of the Page Object Model for UI automation. 7. Familiarity with context injection techniques. 8. Experience with contract testing methodologies. 9. Experience working in a cloud-based architecture. 10. Experience with monitoring tools to assist in issue resolution. 11. Demonstrated ability to work collaboratively with developers and cross-functional teams. 12. Strong experience in advocating and implementing testing best practices. 13. Proficiency in database queries to validate data and ensure test accuracy. 14. Familiarity with CI/CD environments, ideally using Github Actions. Preferred Qualifications: 1. Experience with RESTful API testing. 2. Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git). 3. Knowledge of performance testing and security testing. 4. Relevant certifications in software testing or test automation

Develop a proof-of-concept innovation coordinating with business unit to ensure alignment with organizational goals and technical feasibility. Develop short and long-term Innovation planning and innovation strategy for telecommunication and digital solution business. Work collaboratively with external innovation institutions, universities, and research partners to ensure partnerships are strong fit to brand purpose and strategy. Build awareness/understanding of innovation, and technology trends; demonstrate this knowledge when interacting with internal employees. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to work effectively in a multicultural environment. Self-motivated and proactive with the ability to work independently and as part of a team. A strong desire to grow into more strategic roles in the future.
