Job Summary: We are seeking a skilled and motivated Backend Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in server-side development and API design. As a Backend Developer, you will play a crucial role in designing, implementing, and maintaining the server-side logic, databases, and APIs that power our applications. Responsibilities: Design and implement scalable, high-performance server-side applications. Develop and maintain server-side logic, ensuring responsiveness and efficiency. Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code. Conduct thorough testing of backend applications, including unit testing and integration testing. Design and optimize database schemas. Develop and maintain database structures, including indexing, and ensure data integrity. Collaborate with frontend developers to integrate user-facing elements using server-side logic. Implement and maintain security best practices for backend systems. Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks in the backend systems. Optimize server-side code for maximum speed and scalability. Create and maintain comprehensive documentation for backend systems and APIs. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. Proven experience as a Backend Developer or similar role. Strong programming skills in languages like C# .NET, Java, Python, Ruby, Node.js, etc. Experience with server-side frameworks (e.g., Django, Flask, Express). Proficiency in database systems (e.g., SQL Server, MySQL, MongoDB). Familiarity with API design standards (REST, GraphQL) and implementation. Understanding of security best practices and encryption protocols. Knowledge of version control systems (e.g., Git). Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills. Strong communication and collaboration skills. Working Location : Silom Head office If you require more information, please contact K.Nichapa  Tel. 085-481-3111 . K.Suvaluck Tel. 063-213-4315 .

Scope of work: The Project Coordinator is responsible for overseeing and coordinating various aspects of project management. This includes tasks such as project planning, where they work closely with stakeholders to define project objectives and create detailed plans. They also play a crucial role in team coordination, ensuring effective communication and collaboration among team members. Duties and Responsibilities: Define project objectives, scope, deliverables, and timelines. Collaborate with project managers and team members to develop project plans. Organize meetings and distribute project-related documentation. Serve as a central point of contact for project stakeholders. Facilitate effective communication among team members, project managers, and clients. Provide regular project updates and address project-related queries or concerns. Assist in resource allocation and management. Coordinate with team members to ensure they have the necessary tools and information. Track project expenses and maintain budget documentation. Identify potential project risks and issues. Address risks and resolve issues in a timely manner. Maintain project documentation, including project plans and status reports. Generate progress reports and present project status to stakeholders. Conduct reviews and inspections to verify alignment with project objectives. Manage stakeholder expectations and address concerns or issues. Participate in lessons learned exercises for future projects. Assist with task coordination and conflict resolution. Foster a collaborative work environment and provide support to team members. Other duties may be assigned by the supervisor. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in project management, business management or in a related field. Experience in leadership or management role. Proven experience in project management. Ability to lead project teams of various sizes and see them through to completion. Ability to understand and share the feelings of others. Understand perspectives and experiences of team members. Ability to build trust and create a positive work environment.

We are seeking a skilled and experienced Network admin to join our Global network team. The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 5 years of experience working with manufacturing networks. Your day at EssilorLuxottica Perform routine network maintenance and troubleshooting to ensure that the network is operating at an optimal level. Ensure the security and integrity of the network by implementing and maintaining firewalls, VPNs, and other security measures. Monitor network usage and bandwidth to identify and address issues related to performance and capacity. Configure and maintain network devices, including firewalls, switches, routers, and access points. Implement and maintain network protocols and services, such as DHCP, DNS, and SNMP. Collaborate with other members of the IT team to develop and implement network policies and procedures. Stay up-to-date with GNOC to ensure 24x365 support for the operations. Must be able to travel between Bangkok and Rayong as requested. Must have Minimum 5 years of experience in a network admin role, preferably in the manufactory. Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field. Proven track record of success in building and maintaining strong relationships. Strong knowledge of network protocols and services, such as TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, and SNMP. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment. Experience leading and managing projects related to network integration. Experience working in an international environment. Fluent English, another additional European language is a plus. Flexibility to travel. Able to work at Rayong & Latkrabang Knowledge of Palo Alto platform is a plus.

Be part of a dedicated and culture-driven team where your ideas have the potential to affect companies positively by reshaping traditional mindsets and improving customer’s daily operations. Work with cutting-edge technology with the most diverse businesses while belonging in a talented and inclusive team. Welcome to eCloudvalley Thailand, a go-to-Premier Consulting Partner of Amazon Web Services (AWS) where you can have fun while making history. Join us as a Solutions Architect to help build the future for customers the right way. As a Solutions Architect, you will collaborate with some of the brightest technical minds in the industry today across an entire ecosystem of services and solutions on AWS. You will also be joining a team that invests in your success by providing comprehensive learning programs and work in an open environment that includes self-paced learning, hands-on projects, and project shadowing opportunities that will develop your knowledge and capabilities as an SA. KEY JOB RESPONSIBILITIES Serve as a key member of the business development and account management team in helping to ensure customers success in design and building solutions and services on AWS Lead customers to define and to execute technical and business strategies Help shape and deliver on a cloud strategy based on the risk, limitation and characteristic of different AWS and 3rd party services. Own the technical engagement with client and ultimate success around specific implementation and consultation projects Raise clarification, design and respond to RFPs Develop a deep expertise in AWS technologies as well as broad know-how around how applications and services should be constructed on AWS Work deeply with customers to accelerate their adoption of the cloud through migration, data & analytics, and cloud native development. Perform proof-of-concepts (POC’s) with customers and showcase how a solution offering works and increase the customers understanding of the technology. Educate customers on the value proposition of the cloud and help in deep architectural discussions to ensure solutions are designed for a successful deployment through a well-architected framework REQUIRED SKILLS Bachelor’s or Associate degree in Information Technology, Computer Science and other related field 2+ years of hands – on experience as a Solutions Architect with previous hands – on experience in specific technology domain areas (e.g. software development, cloud computing, systems engineering, infrastructure, security, networking) Experience in one of the key cloud platforms – including but not limited to VMware, OpenStack, AWS, Azure, and GCP – AWS is a plus. Knowledge in software development (SDLC), RESTful API concepts, and programming practice Understanding of application, server and network security Proficiency in CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code (IaC), and automation tools (such as Jenkins, Ansible, Terraform, etc.). Familiarity with containerization and orchestration technologies (like Docker, Kubernetes, etc.). Experience databases (both SQL like PostgreSQL, MySQL, and NoSQL like MongoDB, DynamoDB). Familiarity with database migration processes, backup & recovery, and performance tuning. Experience in formal presentations, white boarding and small group presentations. Demonstrated ability to think strategically about business, product, and technical challenges. Strong analytical skills and ability to solve complex issues. Ability to work independently with minimal guidance. Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional and virtual teams. Have strong written and communication/presentation skills. Outspoken and can communicate technical topics effectively and clearly. Certified AWS Solutions Architect – Associate is a plus Experience in RFP/Acquisition support; market analysis; cost benefit analysis is a plus

Jobtitle: Project Coordinator (Corporate Strategy and New Business)
column8: Project Coordinator (Corporate Strategy and New Business) As the Project Coordinator, your responsibilities will encompass in-depth market research, business planning, and ability to communicate insights effectively. Leveraging your analytical skills, you'll provide invaluable support in developing growth strategies, evaluating new business opportunities, and coordinating key projects. Your ability to navigate complex data, collaborate with internal and external stakeholders, and craft persuasive presentations will be instrumental in driving our business expansion and achieving our strategic objectives. If you're a motivated, detail-oriented, and forward-thinking professional with a passion for strategy and business development, we invite you to join our team. Key Responsibilities Strategic Project Coordination: Coordinate and manage projects related to corporate strategy and new business initiatives. Track and report project milestones, deadlines, and budgets. Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to gather information and insights. Foster relationships with key partners and industry experts. Market Research and Business Analysis: Conduct in-depth research and analysis of target markets within the ASEAN region. Gather market intelligence, including competitor analysis, industry trends, and regulatory factors. Provide insights and recommendations based on research findings to support decision-making. Work on creating comprehensive business plans, including financial projections and risk assessments. Evaluate the feasibility of new business ventures and recommend potential opportunities. Provide executive summary of key findings and present them to the leadership team. Presentation Development: Create compelling presentations that effectively communicate research findings, business plans, and strategies. Ensure presentations are clear, visually appealing, and tailored to the target audience. Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Business, Economics, Marketing, or a related field. Good English communication and presentation skills both oral and written. Proven experience in market research, business analysis, and strategy development. Strong analytical and research skills with the ability to extract insights from complex data. Proficiency in creating compelling and effective presentations. Excellent project management and coordination skills. Business Consulting experience is a plus. Highly organized, detail-oriented, and able to work independently. Benefits: Work From Home Social Security Provident fund Group health insurance, Dental benefit Bonus Fixed Bonus Annual Outing For more information about BlueVenture Group Public Company Limited: About BlueVenture Group PCL. : https://www.blueventuregroup.co.th/ [link removed] Our Solution : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5I_IVV3jG-E [link removed]& [link removed]t=25s [link removed] Delight Policy holder with our solution : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UZ1MGJW3yeg [link removed]& [link removed]feature=youtu.be [link removed] ****Qualified candidates please : *** Submit your resume stating present and expected salary & package details via Apply Now. Upload short VDO >>> tell us about  YOURSELF  and  the SUCCESS or ACHIEVEMENT  that you are most proud of in your working life (English version only) via https://forms.gle/PsKjUy2p8kPk9Prd7 [link removed]  [link removed]

Position: Backend Developer (Golang) - All levels Salary: 50,000 - 120,000 THB Location: Bangkok – Central (Hybrid) JAC Recruitment is helping an international software solutions company find potential Backend Developers (Golang) to help develop robust web / mobile applications to various clients in banking / e-commerce / Insurtech / automobiles. The Backend Developers (Golang) will be responsible for the whole product’s lifecycle developments. Ideal candidates should be able to design, develop, deploy, and maintain products as clients request. This candidate will collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software that leverages products’ quality. Responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain internal systems and services that meet business and technical requirements. Work with cross-functional teams and with Product Owner to find best practices Participating in code reviews, write automated tests to maintain the products for clients Troubleshoot and debug to ensure the performance of the system. Update new technology(Node/React and Ruby) and adapt to the existing / new products Experiences: Bachelor in computer science, computer engineer, or a relevant field 3+ years with Golang with basic experience on JS frontend framework (React/Angular/Vue) Able to write automated tests for web applications Proficient in Thai and English Interested candidate, please send your resume in English (Word format only) along with your recent photo and expected salary to us by E-mail JAC Personnel Recruitment Ltd 10F Emporium Tower  622 Sukhumvit Soi 24 Klongton, Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110 Contact : K.Prima Office Number: 02-261-1270 Time: 9.00 am - 6.00 pm Website : https://www.jac-recruitment.co.th [link removed]

Jobtitle: IT Officer, RECOFTC Main Office (National Position)
Company: Regional Community Forestry Training Center For Asia and The Pacific ( RECOFTC)
column8: RECOFTC is an international nonprofit organization working towards a future where resilient communities with respected rights thrive in forest landscapes that they manage sustainably and equitably. We take a long-term, landscape-based and inclusive approach in supporting local communities to secure their land and resource rights, stop deforestation, find alternative livelihoods and foster gender equality. We have more than 36 years of experience working with people and forests and has built trusting relationships with partners at all levels. As a trusted, honest broker, we occupy a distinct position as an international organization that supports, informs and brings together governments, communities, businesses, academia and civil society organisations. Our innovations, knowledge and initiatives enable countries to foster good forest governance, mitigate and adapt to climate change and achieve the UN Global Goals. RECOFTC operates in the Asia-Pacific region, with country program offices in Cambodia, Indonesia, Lao PDR, Myanmar, Nepal, Thailand and Viet Nam. We are inviting candidates to apply for the position of IT Officer, Knowledge Management, Information Technology and Strategic Communication Unit. The successful applicant will be based in the RECOFTC main office in Bangkok, Thailand. The contract duration is for 24 months with a possibility of extension subject to funding availability and satisfactory performance. Tasks and Duties The IT Officer is a member of Knowledge Management, Information Technology and Strategic Communication unit and works under the supervision of the Digital Solutions Coordinator. The IT Officer is responsible for day-to-day IT technical support to staff including use of software, equipment, and digital platforms. The IT Officer’s specific tasks and duties includes: Provide day-to-day technical support and ‘trouble-shooting’ to RECOFTC IT users’ access to digital platforms, hardware and software, including on premise infrastructure and network connectivity Assist and support the development and maintenance of RECOFTC's digital platforms, including knowledge management, intranet and business systems Support the unit in the implementation of data backup and security procedures across the organization Provide training on the use of IT systems and equipment to RECOFTC staff in Thailand and remotely to other country offices Foster a relationship with Kasetsart University’s Computer Department to ensure reliable and uninterrupted internet and other support services for RECOFTC’s operations Support the planning and implementation for purchasing, upgrading, and maintaining digital systems and infrastructure efficient organizational performance Support asset management and maintenance of the inventory of computer hardware and software, ensuring stock of frequently used spare parts is available on site for repair and replacement Maintain comprehensive documentation of IT systems, configurations, and procedures to facilitate troubleshooting and knowledge sharing Resolve IT issues and extending IT support across seven RECOFTC country offices addressing specific IT-related challenges and requirements including working with administrative officers to provide specifications and review supplier quotations Stay informed about emerging technologies and assess their potential benefits for the organization Perform any other duties as assigned by the Digital Solutions Coordinator, Digital Development and Knowledge Management Manager and the KMITSC Unit Director Qualifications and experience: The IT Officer will have the following essential qualifications and experience. Essential: Bachelor's degree in computer engineering or related field Minimum of three years of experience in IT system operations and support Excellent IT skills including knowledge of on-premises infrastructure such as servers, networks and equipment such as laptops Experience with cloud platform administration and software management Knowledge of IT procurement and asset management practices Excellent time-management and coordination skills Strong communications and interpersonal skills Good written and spoken English Desirable: Familiarity with Microsoft 365 platform administration functions Experience in the development and delivery of IT projects Experience working in a non-profit organization environment Proficiency in digital events, audio-visual technologies Well informed about emerging technologies RECOFTC’s core values At RECOFTC, our core values are the foundation of our culture and guide all our work. In addition to job-specific skills and experience, the applicant should possess the following characteristics, attitudes and skills: Embrace innovation Adapt to and learn from challenges Nurture commitment, responsibility and ownership Collaborate with partners and stakeholders Committed to sustainability Cultivate participation, social inclusion and gender equity Prioritize wellbeing How to apply Interested candidates are requested to submit a CV and a cover letter indicating why they are suitable for this position, with salary expectation and current contact details of three referees, including recent supervisors, please click this link to apply >>  Only short-listed candidates will be notified. RECOFTC has a competitive compensation package. To learn more about RECOFTC, please visit our website www.recoftc.org  [link removed] Applicants shall not be discriminated against based on ethnicity, religion, age, nationality, physical disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, color, marital status, medical condition, or any other classification protected by RECOFTC’s values and code of conduct. Reasonable accommodation may be made so that qualified disabled applicants can partake in the application process. Please inform RECOFTC’s Human Resources in writing of any special needs at the time of application. Qualified candidate are strongly encouraged to apply. RECOFTC is an equal opportunity employer and the successful candidate will be selected based on merit. RECOFTC retains the right to offer this position at a job grade relevant to the qualifications and experience of the selected candidate.

Monday - Friday, 08:00 a.m. to 05:00 p.m. with lunch break or upon customer’s policy Responsibilities - Design, review and implement network communication related projects to assure good quality, security, time and cost. - Configure, migrate and install various network devices both internal domain and external domain areas. - Perform network maintenance and system upgrades including patches, hot fixes and security configurations. - Monitor performance and ensure system availability and reliability. - Monitor system resource utilization, trending, and capacity planning. - Work within established configuration and change management policies to ensure, awareness, approval and success of changes made to the network infrastructure. - Liaise with vendors and other IT personnel for problem resolution. - Work as second tier support for network communication related issues. - Responsible for day-to-day operation incident and change. - Conduct proactive to network infrastructure and security. - Ensure network diagram, configuration and inventory are document and maintenance, properly. - Create and build up traffic fundamental of network flow based on each project or as assigned. - Troubleshoot server problems, Maintaining, Planning server operations. - Document system changes through change management, team process and procedures, configuration management and system diagram. - Coordinate with 3rd. parties to provide expert level to support all system and network infrastructure. - To understanding solution of network monitoring to integrate with existing system. - Perform additional tasks as needed. Qualifications and skills - Bachelor's degree of Computer Engineering others related field. - Have experience 3-5 years in network solution implement of network issues. - Can work together with other team's members and can work under pressure. - Have troubleshooting skill of technologies below, Strong mindset and skillset. - Able to work on non-working hours - LAN Network: Based Routing and Switching. (Required) - WAN Network: Worked or coordinated with service provider and familiar with BGP and OSPF Routing protocols and MPLS. (Optional) - Firewalls: Palo alto, FortiGate. (Optional) - SD-WAN: Cisco Viptela, Cisco Wireless C9800 and FortiGate SD-WAN. (Optional) - CCNP EI, CCNP DC, CCNP Wireless, CCIE will be an advantage.

Jobtitle: System Analyst ( 3 Days WFH 2 Days at Office)
column8: Role Overview: We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented System Analyst to join our dynamic team. As a System Analyst, you will play a pivotal role in understanding project requirements, coordinating with design teams, and contributing to effective system planning. Key Responsibilities: Project Understanding: Identify and understand the current assigned projects  to facilitate comprehensive planning. Team Coordination and Design Check: Collaborate with the design team, ensuring a understanding of project requirements. Conduct thorough checks to ensure designs are complete and accurate. Design and Planning: Develop Sitemaps, System Flow Charts, and ER Diagrams to contribute to the overall project architecture and functionality. Spec Sheet Creation: Create and present comprehensive Spec Sheets to the programming team before the initiation of the development phase. Demo Inspection and Test Phase Preparation: Conduct meticulous inspections of demo websites, ensuring complete functionality before entering the testing phase etc. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field. Proven experience as a System Analyst or similar role at minimum 1 year. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Excellent communication, good problem-solving attitude and teamwork abilities. Familiar with Flow Chart, Sitemap, Dev Spec Sheet Nice to know We are digital marketing agency for +8 years, we are small but think big Our customers are leading brand in market, Central, Sabina, Snail White, as well as Government Agency. We specialize in Performance and E-commerce Marketing. Currently we work at office 2 days and WFH 3 days per week. Interested to join our success, apply!

Job Responsibility Plan and analyze technology resources (teammates) in the RA unit. Analyze and understand the Thai technology market to spot demands in technical resources. Research and understand the go-to technology stacks to implement for different businesses. Locate and recruit potential technical resources into the tech team. Research and study each different customer’s technology projects and be able to quickly formulate solutions for it. Lead team to start different technology projects. Evaluate and allocate resources to meet customer requirements for project execution and coordinate with those resources towards the goals. Track team to ensure resources work meets regulatory requirements and customer expectations. Study and research up-to-date technology trends to support customer requirements. Develop and evaluate the abilities of each resource. Qualifications Bachelor's or master's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related field. 5+ years of technical project management experience managing IT Software Development projects. Minimum of 5+ years’ experience building and leading teams. Strong leadership skills, care about your teammates, and genuinely want each and everyone to be better. Able to communicate professionally with customers. Strong management skills. Strong problem solving skills. Strong interpersonal and good communication skills in both English and Thai. Experience with Scrum and Agile development processes and methodologies. *Hybrid Working

JOB DESCRIPTION 1. Responsible in troubleshooting basic end-user issues related to workstation, server, network, voice, assets and mobile. 2. Responsible in processing service request related to endpoints such as but not limited to: • Workstation installations, movement, upgrades, back-up, monitoring, and related workstation tasks based on agreed targets. • Application of break-fix analysis on workstation operating systems, applications, utilities, Internet/Intranet tools, and related workstation services. • Performing/assisting with the troubleshooting on managed active directory and other related services. • Performing/assisting with the network/connectivity related tasks, and preventive maintenance • Proactive monitoring of voice systems to ensure maximum availability and optimal operation of office phone systems including phone handsets, MDF/ IDF wiring, VoIP systems and voice circuits. 3. Responsible in coordinating workstation hardware related issues to vendor. 4. Responsible in providing timely and accurate update and information on assigned incidents and service request. 5. Responsible on the timely escalation of incidents which cannot be resolved on time or would need vendor/third party support. 6. Coordinates with concerned teams, vendors, and/or appropriate third party as part of operations escalation as necessary. Ensures that all escalation information is accurate and periodically updated, and that all relevant members of the team are regularly informed on the status of the operations escalation process 7. Work closely with service providers to resolve workstation related issues and/or in provisioning new services. 8. Responsible in performing workstation installation, upgrade, preventive maintenance, back-up, monitoring, access administration and other related communication and server infrastructure tasks. 9. Maintains data integrity and ensures the security of workstations in accordance to standards and best practices (e.g., standards implementation/configuration hardening, secure access control, patch updates, etc.) 10. Act as endpoint process expert. 11. May be tasked as a Dedicated Support Engineer where required. 12. May be tasked to coordinate or be a member of various continuous improvement initiatives of the organization. 13. Responsible for Network Load Conversions for troubleshooting and training room set-ups. 14. Performs assigned activities or tasks which are aligned to the set objectives by the management. New graduate and candidate 1 year experience are welcome

Scope of work Gather project requirement and provide technical consulting to customers. Define design and solution. Create BoM and estimated budget. Cooridate with vendor / 3rd party. Create Proposal, Presentation and present to customer. Proactive tracking and observe issue then define prevention and escalate to leader. Provide logical problem serving in both technical and process until the project is completely done.Provide logical problem serving in both technical and process until the project is completely done. Being a good technical consult to customer. Qualification Bachelor's degree or master's degree in computer engineering, Computer Science, or Information Technology 2-3 years with implementation engineer experience. ( Either one of them , System / Cloud / Cybersecurity ). 1-2 years with project management will be benefit.

Company: TMBThanachart Bank or ttb / ทีเอ็มบีธนชาต หรือ ทีทีบี
column8: Key Responsibilities Implementing data strategies and developing physical/Logical data models including Access layer. Design, Manage and Control the standard logical/physical data modeling on an enterprise data warehouse as well as any related business data marts to be aligned with business requirement. Design, Manage and Control the standard logical/physical data modeling on Data Lake to be aligned with business requirement. Works with IT custodian in the design of logical/physical data modeling on an enterprise data warehouse and Data Lake that meet the highest level of performance criteria. Analyzing and translating business needs into long-term solution EDW data models. Evaluating existing data systems on EDW and Data Lake. Working with the Data Engineer team to create conceptual data models and data flows. Maintain, updating and optimizing metadata models. Evaluating implemented data systems for variances, discrepancies, and efficiency. Troubleshooting and optimizing data systems. Prepare and monitor the deployment of the data model into the target data warehouse and Data Lake as well as business data marts. Participate and join responsibility on the data acquisition/management process activities. Qualifications Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Information Technology, Computer Science, or any related field. 5-10 years for design and develop DWH data model. 5-10 year in data warehouse development in SQL, PL/SQL. Good in banking business. Good in team working.

column8: Responsibilities Installation, Upgrades, Migrations and Configuration Database. Design and build databases, schemas, stored procedures, and other database objects. Design Backup Recovery Strategy based on application requirements like Schedule, retention etc. Maintains database security and integrity follow policy and governance. Set up routine database backup procedures and disaster recovery procedures. Perform database performance tuning and capacity planning. Setup monitoring and alerting on database performance, system metrics, trends. Maintain and manage the database system in accordance with the Service Level Agreement (SLA). Supporting day-to-day operation, incident and change. Assist developers and end-users with database usage, query development, and tuning. Provides help to junior DBA with complex database tasks. Competent to work at the highest level of all phases of database administration. Advance database administration – replication, migration, data distribution, etc. Qualifications Experience 3+ years in Database Administration and related DB Software tools management. Must have extensive knowledge of Oracle RDBMS, RAC and Data Guard/ MS SQL Server. Knowledge of MySQL, MariaDB and PostgreSQL are advantages. Experience working in the ETL Tool (IBM DataStage, MS SSIS) is an added advantage. Experienced in Data Warehouse and Big Data on design and performance tuning. Knowledge of NoSQL (MongoDB), GraphQL (DGraph) and Elastic are advantages. Knowledge of in-memory database (Redis) is an added advantage. UNIX and Windows batch scripting knowledge is mandatory. Skills/Abilities Possess knowledge of virtualization/container technology (VMware, Docker) System Software, System Architecture, IT Infrastructure Possess knowledge of communication protocols (i.e. HTTP/HTTPS, REST, SOAP, FTP/SFTP, Sockets, TCP/IP) Possess knowledge of Database Server (Oracle and MySQL) Possess knowledge of Active Directory Server (Microsoft AD) Possess knowledge of Multi-Domain Management Work location : Near BTS Chidlom

Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in IT, computer science, computer engineer, or related fields. Have experience in Java Script Framework. Experience in Web Responsive development, HTML & CSS, JavaScript, JSON, REST API. Strong skills in programming, logical and problem solving. Good teamwork and must be able to work under pressure. Eager to learn new technologies. Responsibilities: Work with business analyst and development team. Develop responsive web applications by using Java Script frameworks. Coding and testing program modules to meet design specifications. Fix defects submitted by business analyst. Prepare Technical documents. Perform knowledge transfer to customer.

Key Responsibilities: Automated Test Development: Design, develop, and maintain automated test scripts using Robot Framework to validate software functionality, performance, and reliability. Test Execution: Execute automated test suites, analyze test results, and identify defects to ensure the software meets specified requirements and quality standards. Collaboration: Work closely with the development team, product managers, and other stakeholders to understand product requirements, identify test scenarios, and ensure comprehensive test coverage. Test Strategy: Contribute to the development and implementation of automated testing strategies, frameworks, and best practices using Robot Framework. Defect Management: Document, track, and report defects using defect tracking tools. Collaborate with the development team to ensure timely resolution of identified issues. Continuous Improvement: Stay updated with the latest trends and advancements in automated testing tools, methodologies, and technologies. Recommend improvements to enhance test efficiency, coverage, and effectiveness. Documentation: Create and maintain comprehensive test documentation, including test plans, test cases, and test reports. Qualifications: Having 4 years working experience as QA/Software Tester. Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. Proven experience in automated testing with a focus on Robot Framework. Strong understanding of software QA methodologies, tools, and processes. Proficiency in writing, executing, and maintaining automated test scripts using Robot Framework. Experience with continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines and tools. Strong analytical, problem-solving, and debugging skills. Excellent communication and collaboration skills. Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.

Job Descriptions (For Junior Level): Lead analysis, design and implementation ERP/ SAP  solutions in close cooperation with the client. Prepare Data Migration. Handle for client requirement and provide logically fact solution. Organized and prepared documentation for configuration workbook requirement. Prepare and conduct structured testing internally and with users. Prepare and conduct training for Client. Give information and advice to client. Job Descriptions (For Senior Level upper): Study, Analyze client requirements, Design working processes in ERP application and generate ERP configuration specifications. Setup, configure ERP modules and integrate them within the organizational platform. Conduct data mapping processes and import processes into ERP modules and the overall platform. Prepare and conduct ERP application training to clients. Prepare and conduct structured testing internally and with users Prepare necessary project documentations associated with implementation like configuration report, user manuals, customer query data, issue logs and their resolution. Maintain working knowledge of the software application including all revisions. Update on new products, business trends and customers requirement needs. Establish positive client relationships during engagement for high client satisfaction, quick deployment and adequate training. Provides non-technical support during and after implementation is “Live” Presales support. If senior level upper will be a mentor and train junior consultant for product knowledge and ERP implementation methodology Job Qualifications: Bachelor's Degree in Accounting, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Accounting, MIS, AIS, Business Administration or any related fields. At least 2 years implemented or supported experiences in ERP, SAP B1 , Oracle, Software application or relevant job. (New graduate are welcome.) Motivated, self-started who is efficient with time-management. Experience working both independently and in a team-oriented, collaborative environment. Good command in English and computer literacy. Good presentation skill. Possess strong management and leadership skill is a plus. We offer an attractive remuneration package with great career advancement opportunities to successful candidates. Jobtitle: Risk Management Officer/เจ้าหน้าที่บริหารความเสี่ยง
column8: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ ประสานงาน / ให้คำปรึกษา กับทุกหน่วยงานในการจัดทำระบบบริหารความเสี่ยงด้านปฏิบัติการให้ครอบคลุมทุกกระบวนการทำงาน ติดตามผลการปฏิบัติตามมาตรการจัดการความเสี่ยงของหน่วยงาน พร้อมทั้งรวบรวมและสรุปผลการบริหารความเสี่ยงด้านปฏิบัติการ และความเสี่ยงในระดับองค์กร ติดตาม / ประมวลผลข้อมูลที่ได้รับจากหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง เพื่อประเมินผลการบริหารความเสี่ยงระดับองค์กร (Corporate KRI) วิเคราะห์และประมวลผลข้อมูล เพื่อจัดทำเงินกองทุนภายในของบริษัทฯ เพื่อประเมินความเพียงพอและสอดคล้องกับสถานะความเสี่ยงของบริษัทฯ และเปรียบเทียบกับเงินกองทุนที่ต้องดำรงไว้ตามกฎหมาย คุณสมบัติ ปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป สาขาการประกันภัย สถิติประยุกต์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีทักษะในการคิดวิเคราะห์ และการแก้ปัญหา มีทักษะในการสื่อสารและการประสานงาน สามารถใช้โปรแกรม Microsoft Office ในการวิเคราะห์และการนำเสนอได้เป็นอย่างดี หากมีประสบการณ์ในสายงานที่เกี่ยวข้องจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ

Company: Thai Life Insurance Public Company Limited
column8: Job Responsibility : Support Data Lead in terms of data governance activities. Support Data Lead to establish and review data governance framework, policies and process. Implement policy and guidelines on data governance. Coordinate, control and implement data governance which requires cooperation from all departments within the organization. Coordinate so that any decision regarding data must be agreed upon by a representative from business units in part of operations and technology Organize meetings, prepare reports and present to working groups related to data governance such as Enterprise Data Governance Committee, Enterprise Data Governance Council, etc. Arrange training sessions about data governance and guidelines. Follow up and communicate changes of law / regulation related to data governance and raise the awareness to all employees Verify activities related to data (Metadata / Reference Data / Master Data) and key data elements to ensure completeness, availability and accessibility according to the business needs in accordance with the policies and procedures. Work with data-related departments (Metadata / Reference Data / Master Data) in case of changes or impact of the data (Metadata / Reference Data / Master Data) to ensure that changes or the impact of the data (Metadata / Reference Data / Master Data) is managed properly and appropriately. Follow up and verify the process and communicate with data users about changes related to Metadata, maintenance and version control to ensure the processes are preceded by data-related departments appropriately. Support and participate in the preparation of Data Inventory Qualification : Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in business administration, information systems, computer science, information technology or related fields. Knowledge and understanding of life insurance business. Experience and ability for requirement/information gathering, analysis and design for development in business process, working process, flows, working instruction and related documents. Understand the concepts of data governance, being an advocate for the implementation of governance principles and processes. Good in communication skills, presentation skills, documentation, logical thinking, strong analytical skills. Good understanding of computer systems, computer security systems, databases and how personal data is stored and processed. Ability to self learn, self motivation to deliver high quality work, meeting all deadlines. Experience in Application Administration such as Users & Roles Access Management, System Parameter Setup, Master & Reference Data Setup. Self-motivated with the ability to prioritize, meet deadlines, and manage changing priorities. Drive results and quality orientated. Experience in managing data incidents.

column8: Responsibilities Understand business objectives, operational processes, and resource requirements of various Business Units within One Bangkok project (Retail, Office, Residential, Hotel, Estate Management). Develop analysis tools to manage specific performance control points to increase efficiency and reduce costs. Creating simulations and financial models (scenario analysis) to test the effect of strategic decisions related financial variables. Coordinate with Business Units and other departments to synchronize data accuracy and reporting standards. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in Economics, Finance, Computer Science, Data Science, or Industrial Engineering. At least 3 years, with relevant work experiences in Commercial Real Estate, Mall operation, Hotel operation (Revenue management, Business development). Other industries can be considered. Practical experience within a profit center (ie: department responsible for Profit and Loss). Familiar with reading Financial Statements (PL, BS, CF). Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and Power Point. Experience with using SAP system would be a plus. Fluent in both written and spoken English.

Jobtitle: Senior Migration Developer – IT Core Banking
Company: Siam Commercial Bank Public Co., Ltd.
column8: Job Summary: We are seeking an experienced Technical Team Lead with a strong background in data migration within the banking sector. The role involves leading a technical team in data migration projects, overseeing work planning, allocating team resources, managing migration technical solutioning, and ensuring a seamless and compliant transition of data as part of our financial institution's initiatives. Job Descriptions: Lead and oversee the technical team in data migration projects, providing guidance, mentorship, and allocation of work. Develop detailed work plans, technical strategies, and allocate tasks for data migration, ensuring alignment with project objectives. Coordinate the team's efforts and efficiently allocate tasks to team members, optimizing work planning for data migration projects. Assess and mitigate technical risks and issues related to data migration. Provide technical solutioning for data migration challenges and ensure adherence to best practices. Allocate and manage technical resources effectively, optimizing work planning for data migration projects. Ensure strict adherence to banking industry regulations and data compliance from a technical perspective. Oversee the technical transition of data for banking services seamlessly. Conduct post-project technical evaluations and lessons learned sessions for data migration projects. Foster a culture of technical excellence, innovation, and efficient work planning within the data migration team. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in information technology, Computer Science, or a related field. Previous experience as a Technical Team Lead in data migration. Strong knowledge of data migration methodologies, technical tools, and best practices. In-depth understanding of banking industry regulations and data compliance from a technical standpoint. Exceptional communication and stakeholder management abilities from a technical perspective.

Company: Ngernturbo Co., Ltd. / บริษัท เงินเทอร์โบ จำกัด
column8: Job Summary As a Senior Credit Risk / Portfolio Analyst, you will have high involvement in end-to-end loan process, starting from acquisition, account maintenance and collection management. You and your team will be responsible from the beginning steps of initiating underwriting system, process and policies, monitoring and analyzing portfolio, maintaining the acceptable risk level and providing prompt solutions on associated issues until setting up business plan regarding loss and reserve In this role, you will be working closely with all related team (Operations, Credit Networking, Product and Process, Sales, Collection, IT, etc.) to improve and carry out the proper and smooth loan process. You will be responsible to initiate and implement risk strategy to ensure acceptable risk appetite and align with business direction/ company’s goal in order to optimize portfolio risk and profitability. You have to monitor portfolio credit performance, conduct strong portfolio analysis to identify risky segments and come up with solid recommendations then you will be able to maintain and manage underwriting policies efficiently, reflecting very dynamic market opportunity/threat. In addition, you will be responsible for business planning including loan loss reserve recommendation and validation to be in compliance with associated regulation. Apart from that, you would be assigned to prepare required report and support Ad hoc analysis. Job Description Involve in the end-to-end loan process, starting from acquisition, account maintenance and collection as well as portfolio management. Involve all aspects of risk management including the initiation of underwriting process and policies, credit approval, portfolio management, and collection process. Manage credit portfolios, analyze risks and provide reliable recommendations and decisions that serve the best for the company. Work closely with all related teams (Operations, Credit Networking, Product and Process, Sales, IT, etc.) to improve and carry out the proper and smooth loan process. Prepare routine report and support Ad-hoc analysis. Qualifications Bachelor's degree or higher in Business Administration, Economics, Engineering or related fields. Experience in risk management from finance/ banking industry. Strong analytical, logical and systematic thinking with good interpersonal skills. Familiar with SQL and Power BI will be a plus. Working Location: Pak kret, Nonthaburi ( Google map [link removed] ) Contact: K.Vanatip (Bua) 096-776-0675 - Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted -

Lead/support testers and business users to prepare test plan, test scenarios, and test cases (both new or updated system to determine whether it performs accurately and reliably as well as establishes standards under both normal and abnormal conditions). Participate in UAT process as required to ensure issues are properly identified, tracked, recorded, reported, and resolved in a timely manner. Develop training materials, conduct training sessions, and provide ongoing support to business users. Provide post implementation support and production support, such as problem resolution, root cause analysis, adjustments to new procedures, and change management. Establish and maintain a working relationship with all related parties including management team, development team, business users, and external vendors. Qualifications: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems, Business Administration, or equivalent in related fields. Minimum 5 years of experience working as a Business Analyst or System Analyst with proven programming background. At least 3 years of experience in life insurance or financial services industry, preferably in the insurance claim function. Skilled in bridging the gap between technical and business teams using documentation and/or visualization tools. Proficient in technical analysis and tools including data analysis, database and API mapping, Postman, and other related tools. Project management and organizational skills, with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks and deadlines. Familiar with agile methodology and practices, such as Scrum, Kanban, and sprints, and able to adapt to changing requirements and priorities.

Able to travel internationally (Malaysia, Indonesia). Good command of English. Good Leadership, Proactive, Teamwork oriented. Able to work at Rayong.

Jobtitle: SAP Support (SD,MM)/เจ้าหน้าที่สนับสนุนงานด้าน SAP
column8: 1.งานระบบ ERP แก้ไขปัญหาจากการใช้งาน SAP Modules SD,MM ให้คำแนะนำ และดูแลการใช้งานระบบ SAP ประสานงานทั้งหมดทุกฟังชั่นการใช้งานระบบ ERP รับแจ้งปัญหาจากพนักงานภายในบริษัทรวมถึงวิเคราะห์ และหาวิธีการแก้ไขปัญหาที่เกิดขึ้น ดูแล User License ในระบบรวมถึงการให้สิทธิที่สอดคล้องกับหน้าที่ของผู้ใช้งาน ออกแบบความต้องการ (Change Requirement) การเปลี่ยนแปลข้อมูลหลัก (Config) วิเคราะห์ถึงผลกระทบที่เกิดขึ้นได้อย่างครบถ้วน ทำการแก้ไขหรือสามารถเขียน Functional Specification เพื่อให้ Programmer แก้ไข 2.Hardware & Software - User Support ติดตั้ง และดูแลการใช้งาน Software ERP ของบริษัท ให้คำแนะนำ User ในการใช้งาน Application และโปรแกรมหลักเบื้องต้น 3.System Set Up ออกแบบระบบตามลักษณะการใช้งานของ User ให้เหมาะสมทั้งในสำนักงานใหญ่ และโครงการ ตรวจสอบ และดูแลการใช้งานระบบเครือข่ายของบริษัทให้สามารถใช้งานได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ 4.Security ตรวจสอบการใช้งาน SAP ด้านความปลอดภัยของข้อมูล และการใช้งาน Backup Daily ในส่วนของข้อมูลย่อยประจำวัน และ Backup Weekly ในส่วนของข้อมูลหลักในระบบรายสัปดาห์

column8: Position: Network Engineer (Infra & Cloud Support) OR System Engineer OR Network & System Engineer * Please find more details once you apply Work day: Monday - Friday Duties: Network Engineer (Infra & Cloud Support) Network troubleshooting and fault analysis by remote access based Figure out incident analysis with root cause and countermeasure Able to onsite support at customer site in the advance troubleshooting Prepare and present incident report, R/C with C/M to customers Meeting with customers Discuss with related parties in order to terminate the problems Determine the change effect Other tasks as assigned Qualifications: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineer, Computer Science, Information Technology. Minimum 4 years of experiences in network engineer or related Experience with WAN and VPN Solutions, DMVPN Phase1/2/3, IPsec, IPsec/GRE, remote client VPN, WIFI, and Cloud. Experience with multibrand enterprise product and able to deep analysis of problem solving Experience with global product support consulting in technical term until get the solution Excellent understanding and troubleshooting of TCP/IP, dynamic routing, LAN switching, Load Balancing, Firewall, WIFI, and Cloud Understand type of connection Good command in English Remark: Only shortlist candidates will be contacted Contact Person: Ning ( 090-9945554 ) *All applications will be treated in strict confidence. CISA is a plus Good communication skills

Responsibilities หาข้อมูลสถิติเพื่อการจัดทำอัตราเบี้ยประกันภัยและ/หรือคำนวณเบี้ยประกันภัยที่เหมาะสมและเพียงพอต่อความเสี่ยงสำหรับแผนประกันภัยภายใต้การประกันภัยประเภทต่างๆ เปรียบเทียบแผนประกันภัยที่จัดทำกับแผนประกันภัยของคู่แข่งในตลาด และ/หรือแผนประกันภัยอื่นๆ ที่มีจำหน่ายอยู่ก่อนหน้าได้อย่างถูกต้อง จัดทำกรมธรรม์ประกันภัย อัตราเบี้ยประกันภัย และที่มาของอัตราเบี้ยประกันภัยสำหรับการประกันภัยประเภทต่างๆที่ได้รับมอบหมาย ประสานงานกับเจ้าหน้าที่ของหน่วยงานอื่น ทั้งภายในองค์กร บริษัทคู่ค้า รวมถึง คปภ. เพื่อชี้แจงการจัดทำกรมธรรม์ประกันภัย อัตราเบี้ยประกันภัย รวมถึงแนวทางการคำนวณเบี้ยประกันภัยและ/หรือแผนประกันภัยสำหรับการประกันภัยประเภทต่างๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมาย ประสานงานกับเจ้าหน้าที่ของของหน่วยงานอื่น ทั้งภายในองค์กรและบริษัทคู่ค้า เพื่อให้แผนงานแล้วเสร็จตามกรอบระยะเวลาที่กำหนด จัดทำงานอื่นๆ ตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย Skills and Qualifications ปริญญาตรี (สาขาคณิตศาสตร์ประกันภัย สาขาสถิติ หรือสาขาคณิตศาสตร์ที่มีวิชาเลือกเกี่ยวกับประกันภัยจะเป็นประโยชน์) ยินดีพิจารณานักศึกษาจบใหม่ มีความตั้งใจในการเรียนรู้สิ่งใหม่ มีความคิดที่เป็นระบบและมีการคิดเชิงตรรกะที่สมเหตุสมผล สามารถติดตามงานที่ได้รับมอบหมายได้ดี มีทักษะในการจับประเด็น การเขียน การนำเสนอ และการสื่อความหมายที่มีประสิทธิภาพ มีความรู้ด้านสถิติและคณิตศาสตร์ประกันภัยเป็นอย่างดี มีความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับหลักการประกันภัย รวมถึงกฎหมายที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการประกันภัย ความสัมพันธ์ที่ดีกับพนักงานร่วมฝ่าย / ร่วมองค์กร รวมถึง บริษัทคู่ค้าและ คปภ.

Jobtitle: Senior Cloud Engineer / Cloud Engineer [Salary up to 120K]
column8: Job Description: As a Senior Cloud Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining the infrastructure and tools necessary to support the development, deployment, and operation of cloud-based applications. You will collaborate closely with development teams, operations teams, and other stakeholders to ensure the availability, scalability, and reliability of cloud environments. Responsibility: Design, implement, and maintain cloud infrastructure using best practices, focusing on scalability, performance, and security Develop and maintain, alerting, and log management software builds, testing, and deployments Implement monitoring, alerting, and log management systems to proactively identify and resolve issues Continuously  improve system performance, reliability, and security through infrastructure optimization and automation Mentor and provide guidance to team members and relevant parties Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Relevant cloud certifications (e.g., AWS Certificated, Azure Certified) are a plus Extensive experience in designing and implementing cloud infrastructure, preferably with one or more major cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) Proficiency in infrastructure-as-code tools such as Terraform, Ansible Strong understanding of CI/CD concepts and experience with build and deployment tools (e.g., Jenkins, ArgoCD, Git) Hands-on experience with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) and orchestration frameworks Solid understanding of networking concepts, security best practices, and experience implementing security controls in cloud environments Proficient in scripting languages (e.g., Python, PowerShell, Bash) for automation and infrastructure management Understanding of database infrastructure and experience in deployment and configuration (e.g., SQL, Postgres, MongoDB) Familiarity with monitoring and logging tools (e.g., Prometheus, Zabbix,  ELK stack) for application and infrastructure observability รายละเอียดงาน: คุณจะได้รับมอบหมายให้ ออกแบบ สร้าง และดูแล ระบบCloud Infrastructure รวมไปถึง เครื่องมือต่างๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง เพื่อใช้ในการพัฒนา ติดตั้ง และปฎิบัติงานร่วมกับ Application ต่างๆ ซึ่งทำงานอยู่บน Cloud โดยคุณจะได้ทำงานร่วมกับทีมผู้พัฒนา ฝ่ายปฎิบัติการรวมถึงฝ่ายอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง เพื่อให้มั่นในว่าส ระบบสามารถให้บริการได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ: ออกแบบ สร้าง และดูแล ระบบ Cloud Infrastucture ตามหลักการ best practice เพื่อให้ระบบทำงานได้อย่างทีประสิทธิภาห เหมาะสมต่อการใช้งาน และมีความปลอดภัย ออกแบบและดูแล CI/CD pipelines โดยการนำเอาระบบอัตโนมัติ มาใช้ในขั้นตอนการสร้าง (build), การทดสอบ(testing) และการติดตั้ง(deployment) ระบบ Application ติดตั้งระบบเฝ้าระวัง(monitor), แจ้งเตือน(alert) และบริหารการจัดเก็บข้อมูลเหตุการณ์ต่างๆ(log management)ของระบบ เพื่อการระบุและแก้ไขปัญหาได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ ใช้เครื่องมือและการทำ automation เพื่อปรับปรุงและพัฒนาระบบให้มีสเถียรภาพ ประสิทธิภาพ และมีความปลอดภัย อย่างต่อเนื่อง เป็นที่ปรึกษา ให้คำแนะนำ ต่อเพื่อนร่วมงาน ลูกค้า และผู้เกี่ยวข้อง คุณสมบัติ: ปริญญาตรีสาขา Computer Science, Engineering, IT หรืออื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง หากมี Certificate ด้าน Cloud เช่น AWS, Azure จะได้รับการพิจาณาเป็นพิเศษ มีประสบการณ์ด้านดารออกแบบ และติดตั้งระบบบน Cloud platform ต่างๆ เช่น AWS, Azure, GCP มีความเชี่ยวชาญในการใช้งานเครื่องมือที่เป็น Infrastructure-as-code เช่น Terraform, Ansible มีความรู้และเข้าใจในขั้นตอนการทำ CI/CD และประสบการณ์ในการติดตั้งและใช้งานเครื่องมือต่างๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง เช่น Jerkins, ArgoCD, Git มีความเข้าใจและมีประสบการณ์โดยตรงกับ Continerization technology เช่น Docker, K8S มีความเข้าใจทางด้านระบบเครือข่าน ความปลอดภัย และมีประสบการณ์ในการออกแบบและติดตั้งระบบรักษาความปลอดภัยบน Cloud environments มีความเชี่ยวชาญในภาษาสคริปต์ เพื่อใช้ในการทำ Automation และการบริหารจัดการ เช่น Python, PowerShell, Bash มีความเข้าใจทางด้านระบบฐานข้อมูล และมีประสบการณ์ในการติดตั้ง และตั้งค่าระบบฐานข้อมูล เช่น SQL, Postgres, MongoDB มีความคุ้นเคยกับระบบเฝ้าระวังและจัดเก็บข้อมูลเหตุการณ์ต่างๆ เช่น Prometheus, Azbbix, ELK stack เพื่อใช้ในการเฝ้าระวังและตรวจสอบ Application และ Infrastucture

The importance and aim of the job SIG strategy is to develop current (preventive) maintenance system towards condition-based and predictive maintenance. The major tool in use is Asset Performance Management. Health indicators generated from the data tags of the connected machines, and the Work History need to be analyzed to achieve improvements. What you will do Owner of the Asset Performance Management (APM) tool Digitization: transpose existing maintenance concept into actionable strategies for utilization in APM Monitoring and analysis: apply data analytics on machine data from different sources, e.g. real time data from connected machines, detect patterns, correlations or anomalies Data management: Define and maintain asset model in APM, manage load of master data from adjacent systems into APM Predictive Analytics: Monitoring and further development of Health Indicators and Smart Signals Creating and conducting FME(C)A Workshops with cross functional team Close collaboration with cluster, relevant SIG departments and external supplier Support optimization maintenance strategies to define the optimal mixture of tactics, such as preventive, condition-based, corrective, run to failure, and predictive Analyzing the failures and generate 8D reports with the support of the reliability engineers team What you will need to succeed BA or master in Engineering degree, preferably in electrical and/or mechanical engineering More than 10 years of experiences in Digital solutions Has good technical knowledge of System Robustness, Data analysis & Presentation Good command of both spoken and written of English

Job Responsibility: Pro-active sales responsibility for increasing sales revenue, maintaining existing clients, and expanding the business to new clients to achieve targets. Manage sales presentations by building solutions with the product team, price, bidding, and managing purchase orders with clients. Must possess strong presentation skills and be able to communicate professionally. Provide consultations and advise key business partner with new technology solutions and how the technology can benefit their businesses. Collaborate closely with the product team to identify growth opportunities and develop product sales strategies. Develop proactive action plans on the defined KPIs and targets, in consultation with the head of sales Support the market development through the identification of additional business opportunities. Attend industry events, conferences, and trade shows to promote our products and generate leads. Actively look for leads and potential business partners through commercial events, meetings, and networking events. Develop and maintain relationships with key business partners. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Information Technology, or related fields. At least 1-3 years experience in sales management. Good command of spoken and written English and Thai. Pro-Active attitude, and strong negotiation and communication skills. Good Computer literacy. Good problem-solving skills. Work Location : Near Saint Louis BTS station / Surasak BTS station

Company Overview: My clients are companies that prioritizes innovation, efficiency, and excellence in delivering top-notch solutions to their clients. We are currently seeking skilled and experienced SAP Consultants to join our clients’ dynamic teams. Position Overview: As an SAP Consultant, you will play a key role in implementing and supporting SAP solutions that align with our business objectives. You will collaborate with internal teams and clients to understand their requirements, configure SAP systems accordingly, and ensure the successful integration of SAP solutions into our business processes. Responsibilities: 1. SAP Implementation: - Lead SAP implementation projects, ensuring successful delivery within scope, budget, and timeline. - Collaborate with key stakeholders to gather and analyze business requirements. 2. Configuration and Customization: - Configure SAP modules based on business requirements. - Customize SAP solutions to meet specific organizational needs. 3. Integration and Testing: - Integrate SAP systems with existing business processes and external systems. - Conduct thorough testing of SAP solutions to identify and resolve any issues. 4. Training and Support: - Provide training to end-users on SAP functionalities and best practices. - Offer ongoing support, troubleshooting, and issue resolution for SAP users. 5. Documentation: - Maintain comprehensive documentation of SAP configurations, customizations, and processes. - Develop and update user manuals and training materials. Qualifications: - Bachelor's degree in Information Technology or related fields. - Proven experience as an SAP Consultant with expertise in S4 HANA , IBP , Transportation Management , Hybris, Fieldglass , and CONCUR . - In-depth knowledge of SAP implementation methodologies and best practices. - Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. - Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities. - Ability to work independently and collaboratively within a team. - SAP certification is a plus.

At Alstom, we understand transport networks and what moves people. From high-speed trains, metros, monorails, and trams, to turnkey systems, services, infrastructure, signalling and digital mobility, we offer our diverse customers the broadest portfolio in the industry. Every day, 74,000 colleagues lead the way to greener and smarter mobility worldwide, connecting cities as we reduce carbon and replace cars.Could you be the full-time Project Cyber Security Manager in Bangkok we’re looking for? Your future role Take on a new challenge and apply your engineering expertise in a new cutting-edge field. You’ll work alongside passionate, motivated and dedicated teammates. You'll analyze Project / Program security needs (including laws and local regulations), determine security objectives and main security risks strategy. Day-to-day, you’ll work closely with teams across the business Cybersecurity Architecture definition and requirement allocation and much more. You’ll specifically take care of cybersecurity context, and Cybersecurity Risk Analysis. We’ll look to you for: Plan security activities within development life cycle, estimate costs and duration, their impacts related to project program execution, Identify training needs Provide support during technical design meetings for cybersecurity activities Obtain agreement from Project/Program/Customer  about on the set of security measures to be implemented Promoting the Alstom Code of Ethics and adhering to the highest standards of ethical conduct. Report on Program / Project Cybersecurity status All about you We value passion and attitude over experience. That’s why we don’t expect you to have every single skill. Instead, we’ve listed some that we think will help you succeed and grow in this role: Degree in Computer Engineering, Software Eingineering Experience with direct responsibility for hands on architecture, design, development Experience related to Cybersecurity in general, deployment experience of security technologies. Knowledge of Alstom Products & Solution Portfolio Experience in embedded or industrial systems (railway / aeronautics) Knowledge of some Cybersecurity solutions and areas Architecture concepts and techniques of systems and networks, operating systems and associated programming languages. Knowledge of main Cybersecurity standards and regulations, such as: ISO 2700X, 62443, NIST, NIS, French LPM Things you’ll enjoy Join us on a life-long transformative journey – the rail industry is here to stay, so you can grow and develop new skills and experiences throughout your career. You’ll also: Enjoy stability, challenges and a long-term career free from boring daily routines Collaborate with transverse teams and helpful colleagues Contribute to innovative projects Utilise our hybrid working environment Steer your career in whatever direction you choose across functions and countries Benefit from our investment in your development, through award-winning learning Benefit from a fair and dynamic reward package that recognises your performance and potential, plus comprehensive and competitive social coverage You don’t need to be a train enthusiast to thrive with us. We guarantee that when you step onto one of our trains with your friends or family, you’ll be proud. If you’re up for the challenge, we’d love to hear from you! Important to note As a global business, we’re an equal-opportunity employer that celebrates diversity across the 70+ countries we operate in. We’re committed to creating an inclusive workplace for everyone.

Jobtitle: Junior Programmer / Junior Software Developer/(รับน้องจบใหม่หลายอัตรา)
column8: Technology is changing every day and Bangkok Bank is determined to be at the forefront of these changes.  Millions of customers use our multi award willing mBanking product on a daily basis. This is just the start - we are aggressively using technology to delight our customers in all segments. Come and join us as we exploit the latest technologies to serve our huge customer and our unique position as the premier Thai bank with a unique presence across the AEC. Role & Responsibilities: Develop and maintenance of pragmatic high quality software to support business requirements. Work with Technology team to build a maintainable technology infrastructure including build & testing environment. Compose System design documents such as database diagram, user manual. Qualifications: Bachelor/Master’s degree in Computer Science or related fields. 0-5 years of experience in developing applications (full stack is a plus). Programming: c#, VB net, , JAVA JEE8, AngularJS, Python, Scala, R Frontend: ASP net core, JSP, HTML5, CSS, SASS, Javascript, jQuery, AJAX, etc. Backend:.net Core, Azure,AWS, PHP (Symfony 2 framework), NodeJS, RESTful Services, ESB(Websphere), Blockchain, GTM API Mgr etc. Database: SQL, Oracle, MongoDB, VSAM, Hadoop Test Deployment Security Performance Improvement Resource Management Project Management Required Skills: Knowledge and regular use of source control. Knowledge about and experience in this kind of software development methodologies; AGILE, SCRUM  is a plus. Systematic and analytic thinking . Working Location: Operating at Rama III Office If you require more information, please contact Khun Nichapa 085-481-3111 . Khun Kamonporn 081-985-4446 .

Company: Kasikorn Technology Group Secretariat Co., Ltd.
column8: Overview: In this role, you will oversee IT processes and practices based on SDLC and project management frameworks to ensure the higher product development quality and efficiency. You will work closely with the IT process owners from several departments to define and adopt the processes, best practices, templates, and tools in KBTG as appropriate. Responsibilities: Analyze as-is process workflow using global framework or best practice to identify potential improvement opportunities and define target measurement. Work closely with IT process owners and executors to develop to-be target operating model and detailed process workflow. Drive for process activation, ensure process quality, and assess the outcome for continuous improvement. Provide process improvement progress visibility and measurements. Provide consultation to project teams to adopt SDLC processes, best practices, tools, templates, and measurements on daily basis. Administrate process tools as supporting the project teams to smoothly operate. Qualifications: Bachelor's or master’s degree in computer science, computer engineering, IT or related fields Minimum 2-year experience in software development process improvement or business process engineering. Good analytical and problem-solving skills Good communication in written and spoken both Thai and English languages. Preferable with administration skills of process tools, e.g., Microsoft SharePoint, K2, etc

Job Highlight: Challenge of manage, operations and maintenance of critical system and multi-platform (Cloud/Virtualization/On-premise and others). Opportunity to learn and work about new database version, technology and related products to build value solution to our customer. Progressive career path Responsibilities: Work with energetic team in providing end-to-end services in Oracle both Cloud Environment and On-premises Environment. Participate in full services life-cycle from architectural design, implementation and migration to post-implementation maintenance and operation support of the critical production systems for our customers. Manage and support the Oracle Database (e.g., tuning, cloning and others). Documentation of solutions (e.g., architecture, configuration and setup).
