(02) 298-0053 www.a-host.co.th

PRTR is partnering with a dynamic international Fintech company and is seeking a Software Engineering Director to lead the Development Department. As the Software Engineering Director, you will be responsible for overseeing a team of 10+ talented individuals and ensuring that the software development projects align with the business objectives. If you are a forward-thinking leader with a passion for driving change and growth within a fast-paced organization, we encourage you to apply. Responsibilities Team Leadership: Leading and inspiring a team of 10+ developers, fostering a collaborative and innovative environment. Coordinating with different business units to understand the business needs and then create high-level strategies to drive effective business change. Managing multiple projects at the same time whilst effectively delegating tasks to the team. Qualifications Strong leadership skills and excellent interpersonal and communication skills, always keeping the end user in mind. Over 5 years of experience in managing IT transformation projects, with a proven track record of success. 5+ years of experience in.NetCore Development and expertise in C# and Microsoft Azure. Front-end development experience with Angular 2+, React.JS, and or Vue. JS. Hands-on and coding-heavy. A Bachelor's Degree or higher in Computer Science or Business Administration. Strong communication skills in both English and Thai. If you are excited about the opportunity to lead a dynamic team and drive business change within a fast-growing organization, please submit your most up-to-date CV as we are actively shortlisting for this role.

Jobtitle: ICT Manager (ห้วยขวาง)
column8: ICT Infrastructure Management ● Oversee the planning, installation, and maintenance of the school's ICT infrastructure, including networks, servers, hardware, and software systems. ● Ensure that all ICT systems are reliable, secure, and up-to-date, implementing necessary updates and upgrades as required. ● Manage ICT equipment and software licensing, tracking, and inventory. Server and Network Security ● Line manage the ICT System Administrator and Network Administrator ● Ensure that the school network is fully operational during access hours and that an appropriate backup strategy is in place ● Make recommendations and offer guidance to the System Administrator and Network Engineer to enhance information security and data protection ● Implement appropriate patch management procedures ensuring servers are secured according to industry best practice ● Conduct regular penetration testing and quickly identify and address issues with information security ● Manage, maintain and enforce all policies and procedures relating to network, server and information security ● Work with the DoLT to ensure that externally accessible services continue to operate and are appropriately secured behind a firewall that meets the educational needs of the school ● Support the DoLT to produce an IT Strategic plan ● Ensure all software systems are properly maintained, conducting regular audits of users ● Provide periodic training to the IT department on IT security practices Operations and Project Management ● Line manages campus ICT support staff. ● Evaluate and select ICT vendors and suppliers, negotiating contracts and service agreements. ● Act as the primary project manager for all ICT CAPEX projects and ensure the completion of the projects based on the timeline ● Monitor vendor performance and ensure compliance with service level agreements. ● Provide feedback to the DoLT regarding all outside vendors and contractors on work completed ● In consultation with the DoLT, establish Key Performance Indicators (KPI) for IT hardware ● Provide technical support to staff and students, resolving hardware and software issues promptly.

JOB SUMMARY: Provide day to day IT Support for the organization in the area of change management of the IT infrastructure. Ensures request for changes are review and approved. Conducts planning, testing and implementation of request for change in the IT Infrastructure. Job Description Responsible in processing service request based on agreed targets by gathering the needed information to plan and request for change in the IT infrastructure. Responsible in planning, testing, and implementation of request for changes involving:  Network, Server, Voice and other related Core Communication and Server Infrastructure Services. Ensures that planned request for changes are reviewed and approved before implementation. Responsible in coordinating tasks to internal IT Operations as part of normal operations. Responsible in providing timely and accurate update and information on assigned service request and request for changes. Responsible on timely communication for assigned request for changes which cannot be implemented as planned due unforeseen circumstances. Coordinates with concerned teams, vendors, and/or appropriate third party as part of operations escalation as necessary. Ensures that all escalation information is accurate and periodically updated, and that all relevant members of the team are regularly informed on the status of the operations escalation process Performs installations, upgrades, preventive maintenance, backup, monitoring, access administration and related Core Communication and Server Infrastructure tasks. Maintains data integrity and ensures the security of Communication and Sever Infrastructure technologies in accordance with standards and best practices (e.g., standards implementation/configuration hardening, secure access control, patch updates, etc.) May be tasked to coordinate or be a member of various continuous improvement initiatives of the organization. Performs assigned activities or tasks which are aligned to the set objectives by the management. WORK EXPERIENCE AND COMPETENCIES / SKILLS REQUIREMENTS: 1. Must have at least two (2) years’ experience in an IT-related capacity. 1) Technical experience must include the following: 2) Basic to Intermediate skills in Workstation/Server/Network/Voice administration, operations & maintenance troubleshooting 3) PC hardware troubleshooting 2. Must have good command of English (oral and written communication), and effective presentation skills. 3. Knowledgeable in the following standards: ISO 20000, ISO 27001; ISO 22301; CMMi for Services 4. Background in Service Support, Service Delivery, IT Service Management, IT Operations. 5.Certification in ITIL, Cisco, Juniper, Bluecoat, Aruba, Microsoft or VMWare will be an advantage. 6.CCNA, CCNP, or any network/firewall product’s certificate is a plus.

Job Responsibilities: Deployment, configuration, and management of all network infrastructure in our data centers and Point of Presence (POP) sites in Thailand Work with partner teams and vendors to manage day-to-day operations, such as schedule and perform maintenance including upgrades, migrations, and decommissioning of production networks Work closely with Network Engineering, Logistics, and equipment vendors as new equipment and technologies are integrated into the production network Calculate and document equipment power/space requirements and consumption for multiple POP sites. Work with Colocation Vendors, Network Engineering, Facility Operations, to meet these requirements Work with NOC to troubleshoot problems and communicate with customers as local point of contact during customer escalations Work with provisioning team, datacenter operator and local loop provider to deliver network services to customers Qualifications: Minimum 3 years of telecommunications in network and customer support experience; especially in telecommunications Layer 1 to Layer 3 services which involve troubleshooting, restoration and escalation. Knowledgeable in the following telecommunications technologies: OTN, DWDM, TDM, SDH, IP VPN, BGP, MPLS, IPSec, SDN, NFV. Solid track record in managing escalation processes and SLAs Strong communication skills and power to follow through Good experience in managing customer expectation and escalation Able to work under tight deadlines Diploma/Degree in Electrical Engineering or Computer Science or other engineering disciplines Salary: Negotiable Benefits / Welfare: Working : Mon- Fri ( 9.00-18.00 ) Allowance : Depend on Department & position Annual vacations: 15 Days Interested candidates please  submit resume stating their present and expected salary by APPLY Contact person : Kanchana M. Address : 102/99 Na Ranong Rd., Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110 Phone number : Tel. +662 348-8906 , +662 348 8098

Location: Sriracha, Chonburi Responsibilities: Preliminary feasibility study of assigned projects on technical or non-technical aspects and coordinate with concerned parties. Drive, monitor, manage as well as report overall consolidated projects progress to ensure business plan achievement. Update market & technical trend. Qualification: Bachelor or higher in Chemical Engineering, Chemical Technology, Petroleum / Petrochemical Technology, other Engineering discipline or Economics. At least 3-5 years, with experience in petroleum/petrochemical business or related, project management and financial analysis & valuation is advantageous. Possess strong English command, be extremely logical, Service Mind, Good communication skills, and friendly and approachable are needed. Welfare: Medical Insurance Accidental Insurance Long Service Emblem Co-operative Club & Activities All Positions Required: Good command of English and computer literacy Interested candidates should submit the application with recent photo, resume, academic transcript, ID card, English proficiency test result (TOEIC) and any other supporting documents on https://careers.thaioilgroup.com/ Apply online: https://careers.thaioilgroup.com/ or click "Apply Now" Contact: Thaioil Group Recruitment Team Thaioil Group 163/19 Moo 7 Tung- Sukla, Sriracha, Chonburi 20230 Tel: 038-359-040, 038 -408500 Ext. 6272-8 Fax: 038-359-018 Ext. 19821 -19825 Website: www.thaioilgroup.com

Job Purpose: Lead Distribution Services Strategic Projects as Product Owner. Be a central role to help the business needs and manage the demands of fast-moving environments. Help the business owner to become digital leaders by creating strategic, cross-company approaches that increase productivity, enhance collaboration and drive more transactions through innovative services and business modes, also include some project manager responsibilities. Key Responsibilities: Communicate with stakeholders across the board, including customers, business managers, and the development team to make sure the goals are clear, and the vision is aligned with business objectives. Create the list of backlog items and prioritize them based on the overall strategy and business objectives. Prioritize needs by considering from project scope, budget, and time and weighing priorities according to the needs and objectives of stakeholders. Oversee the actual development of the product and works closely with stakeholders to identify and organize the steps required of projects and refine the process, identify areas for improvement, and support the sprint. Understand and anticipate the customers’ needs to more effectively manage the development process. Act as primary communicator and link between stakeholders and teams to make sure there’s buy in from stakeholders on all major decisions and strategy and clear instructions and deliverables for the developers. Accountable for each stage of the development process and the final product and inspect and evaluate project progress in order to deliver project on time. Customer Relationship Initiate or lead the review and redesign of process and procedures, on an ongoing basis, to deliver improved team productivity or efficiency. Delivering business and innovative solutions in accordance with customers/users requirements. Anticipating business needs and being proactive and taking unsolicited action to achieve business objectives. Investigate complex systems problems and other requests for support to determine action required to rectify users’ problems. Agile Practices Break down our epic and feature roadmap with our project development team into something that is understandable and deliverable within the agile framework. Take responsibility for the product lifecycle, from ideation and discovery through to requirements gathering, delivery and testing, deployment working within established agile frameworks. Synthesize and drive product vision and platform strategy based on user research and input from cross-functional stakeholders. Manage the team’s roadmap and backlog Manage the release roadmap and backlog for your domain. Create clear and detailed epics and user stories and prioritize ruthlessly to deliver outcomes and value. Always ask ‘why’ and use data and experimentation to make prioritization decisions. Oversee and ensure delivery against our roadmap. Understand cross workstream dependencies to reprioritize the order of work to be done. Ensure the various Committees have a clear understanding of product and execution priorities and any issues, bugs or otherwise. Programme management Support product planning across all workstreams and agile ways of working management. Report and communicate fluently on all aspects of work and communicate effectively with all levels of management and in public forums. Promote and maintain high professional standards whilst delivering value to the business. Ability to support the development of a Business Case with defined benefits and costs Baseline Qualifications: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in any fields. At least 5 years direct work experience as a project manager that includes managing and implementations of projects. Experience in supervising and coaching subordinates. PMP (Project Management Professional) certification is preferred. Experience in Insurance industry is preferred. Fluent in English both verbal and written. Proactive, Open, Caring, Commit, Innovative.

Product & Quality development, and support R&D on development project Open Incident and follow the status until finish and record incident and Problem to Ticket database system Keep a strong relationship with customer, business partner, agent, suppliers, etc. Qualifications: 0-3 years in Technical Support (New graduates are welcome) Bachelor degree in computer science or any related. Jobtitle: IT Sales Account Manager – ERP Infor and Proactis
column8: Cathcart Technology has a great opportunity to join one of the global solutions providers serving clients across the Asia Pacific and having partners in many countries, offering implementation and technical services. Working as a Sales Account Manager, you will handle client relationships to drive sales and maintain customer satisfaction. They identify opportunities, propose solutions, negotiate deals, and aim to expand business within their assigned accounts. Responsibilities: Approaching new potential customers & keeping relationships with current customers. Solid knowledge of processes and documents. Determine respective local region needs and focus. Suggest innovative ideas to increase sales and improve customer experience requirements. Prepare related legal documents and contracts together with Finance and Accounting team and 3rd parties. Experience in creating solutions, effort estimation, high level project plan, proposals, demo, proposal presentations, technical stake holder management. Forecast sales prospects and propose IT Solutions to manage customers. Qualifications: A bachelor's degree in the related degree field. More than 2-5 years of experience in the related industry would be an advantage. Ability to develop a presentation as well as product demonstrations. Perform client facing roles in Thailand mainly, with a plus for other APAC countries, working experience with teams in multiple locations. Knowledge of business process and ERP process will be advantage. Have own contacts within ERP/CRMmarketplace that can be leveraged to build own pipeline. This is a great opportunity for a candidate who is passionate about sales technology. If you are interested in this opportunity, please contact Yupawan (Nok) at Cathcart Technology at 094-989-1274 for further information.

About Kaidee Kaidee is Thailand’s leading trusted auto, marketplace and real estate platform for buyers and sellers. Kaidee has redefined the way business is done. We strive to make the experience with us faster, easier, and simpler, bringing tremendous value to our buyers and sellers. Together at Kaidee, our diverse and growing team is driven by the excitement of challenging the known and being empowered to develop the solutions of tomorrow. If you have a passion for innovating, continuously learning, and making an impact while having fun, join us. In March 2023, Carro acquired Kaidee. We are hiring for experienced Data Engineers. Job Summary: Our company is seeking highly motivated and skilled Data Engineers to join our team at Kaidee. The successful candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our data infrastructure, as well as optimizing and ensuring its reliability and scalability. The ideal candidate should have extensive experience in SQL, Tableau, Airflow and Apache Spark, and possess excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Key Responsibilities: Design and develop data architecture and ETL processes to ensure efficient data flow and management. Collaborate with data analysts and data scientists to identify data requirements, develop data models, and implement data pipelines. Optimize and tune data pipelines and data storage systems to ensure reliability and scalability. Implement and maintain data security and data quality standards. Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure the timely delivery of data solutions. Continuously evaluate emerging technologies and tools to ensure the optimal performance of our data infrastructure. We are also looking for experienced data engineers! In addition to the above, more experienced data engineers will be expected to: Establish best practices for developer operations (For more experienced engineers) provide technical leadership across multiple product teams Share your expertise and mentor other engineers Help with recruiting Requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. At least 4 years of hands-on experience with extensive experience in SQL, Tableau, Airflow and Apache Spark (Databricks). Strong understanding of data modeling, data warehousing, and ETL processes. Experience with big data technologies and cloud-based solutions, such as AWS (preferably) , GCP or Azure. Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment. Able to converse in English Proven track record of delivering high-quality data solutions promptly.

column8: บริษัทต้องการโปรแกรมเมอร์ จำนวน 50 อัตรา รับผิดชอบ ดูแล แก้ไข พัฒนาระบบ หรือ เว็ปแอปพลิเคชั่น เพื่อสนับสนุนการทำงานในบริษัท โดยใช้ภาษา PHP เขียน Interface เพื่อปฎิบัติต่อฐานข้อมูล จัดหา Solution เพื่อช่วยลดการทำงานที่ยุ่งยากซับซ้อน เพิ่มประสิทธิภาพในการทำงาน ดูแล แก้ไข แอปพลิเคชั่น หรือ เว็ปแอปพลิเคชั่น ปรับปรุง /ดูแล / แก้ไข website ของบริษัทให้ผู้ใช้สามารถทำงานได้ถูกต้องและรวดเร็วที่สุด อบรมผู้เกี่ยวกับการใช้งาน software ที่เขียนขึ้นเอง หรือ Third - Party จัดทำเอกสารสรุปที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการใช้งานโปรแกรม หรืองานต่างๆที่ได้รับมอบหมายตามความเหมาะสม จัดทำ Report ต่างๆตามที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร วุฒิปริญญาตรี สาขาวิศวะคอมพิวเตอร์,วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร,เทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง ประสบการณ์(ปี) : 0 ปีขึ้นไป อื่นๆ : ยินดีรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่,ยินดีรับผู้ไม่มีประสบการณ์ มีความรู้พื้นฐานเกี่ยวกับเขียนโปรแกรมภาษา Wordpress, HTML , PHP , JAVA, JAVAScript มีความรู้พื้นฐานเกี่ยวกับฐานข้อมูล MySQL , SQLSERVER มีความรู้พื้นฐานเกี่ยวกับฐานเกี่ยวกับระบบ Web Server มีความขยัน ซื่อสัตย์ อดทน มีมนุษยสัมพันธ์ที่ดี สามารถทำงานภายใต้แรงกดดันได้ หากมีประสบการณ์ด้าน Programming จะพิจารณาพิเศษ

Scope of work: As a systems analyst supervisor, you will be responsible for analyzing, designing, and implementing computer systems to meet the needs of our organization. You can work as individual on a project or with a team of other system analyst on several projects. You may need to supervise, review, or support junior system analyst on a regular basis. You should have strong analytical and problem-solving skills, as well as the ability to communicate effectively with both technical and non-technical audiences. You should also be comfortable working with a variety of software and hardware systems and have a strong understanding of computer science principles. Duties and Responsibilities: Analyzing our current systems and identifying areas for improvement. Gathering and documenting requirements from stakeholders and users. Designing and implementing new systems or modifying existing ones. Testing and debugging systems to ensure they are functioning properly. Performs problem identification and requirements definition and acquires thorough conceptual understanding of the system and the user organization. Collaborating with other IT professionals, such as software developers and network administrators. Training users on how to use new systems. Ensure deadline and budget requirements are met. Staying up to date with new technologies and trends in the field. Providing technical guidance and mentorship to junior system analyst. Ability to plan, lead, and schedule major systems efforts and provide work direction and guidance to others. Other duties may be assigned by the supervisor. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in computer science or computer Engineering or a related technical field. Minimum 3 years’ experience in software development. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Communication skills. Attention to details. Time management skills. Technical expertise. Adaptability. Interpersonal skills. Continual learning. Critical thinker. Team and time management skills and the ability to prioritize tasks.

Your new role Own and drive the product strategy, vision, and roadmap for digital products within the insurance portfolio. Collaborate with stakeholders, including business leaders, development teams, and UX/UI designers, to gather requirements and prioritise features. Lead the end-to-end product development lifecycle, from ideation to delivery, ensuring timely and high-quality releases. Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure the success and effectiveness of digital products. Stay informed about industry trends, emerging technologies, and the competitive landscape to inform product decisions. Work closely with project managers, business analysts, and developers to ensure alignment between business objectives and technical implementations. Advocate for the customer by incorporating user feedback and conducting usability testing to enhance product usability and functionality. What you'll need to succeed To be successful in your role, you would need to: Minimum of 7 years of experience in digital product ownership, with a focus on the insurance sector. Proven track record of successfully delivering and managing digital products throughout the product lifecycle. Strong understanding of insurance industry processes and customer needs. Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams. Analytical mindset with the ability to make data-driven decisions. Previous experience in a multinational environment is advantageous. Relevant certifications in product management or related fields are desirable. What you'll get in return You will be rewarded in your employment with: Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses Comprehensive health and retirement benefits Opportunities for career advancement Dynamic and innovative work environment What you need to do now If you're interested in this role, click 'apply now' to forward an up-to-date copy of your CV, or call us now. If this job isn't quite right for you, but you are looking for a new position, please contact us for a confidential discussion on your career.

Location : Sriracha, Chonburi Responsibilities : Endpoint Solution Design: Collaborate with stakeholders to design and architect endpoint solutions for various devices, including PCs (both Windows and Mac), notebooks, mobile devices, tablets, and printers, ensuring they align with business requirements and security standards. Endpoint Security: Implement robust security measures to safeguard endpoint devices against cyber threats, including malware, ransomware, and data breaches, on both Windows and Mac platforms. Regularly update and patch endpoint security software. Endpoint Configuration Management: Develop and maintain standardized configurations for endpoint devices across both Windows and Mac environments, ensuring consistency and compliance with organizational policies, leveraging desktop management tools. End-User Support: Provide technical support to end-users for endpoint-related issues on both Windows and Mac systems, troubleshoot hardware and software problems, and facilitate quick resolution. Software Rollout and Patch Management: Plan and execute mass software rollouts, updates, and patches to ensure all endpoint devices are up-to-date with the latest applications and security fixes for both Windows and Mac platforms, using desktop management tools. Endpoint Performance Optimization: Monitor and optimize endpoint device performance on both Windows and Mac systems, identifying and addressing bottlenecks and performance issues with the assistance of desktop management tools. Vendor Management: Engage with technology vendors and suppliers to evaluate and select endpoint solutions for Windows and Mac environments, negotiate contracts, and manage vendor relationships effectively, including assessing the compatibility of desktop management tools. Technical Escalation Support: Provide technical escalation support to the IT Support team, assisting in resolving complex endpoint-related issues and guiding junior team members when needed. Documentation and Training: Maintain comprehensive documentation of endpoint configurations and procedures for both Windows and Mac systems, including the utilization of desktop management tools. Develop and deliver training programs for end-users on both platforms to maximize productivity and minimize disruptions. Endpoint Inventory Management: Oversee endpoint inventory, ensuring accurate records of hardware and software assets for both Windows and Mac systems, aided by desktop management tools. Manage hardware procurement and disposal processes. Continuous Improvement: Stay updated on industry trends and emerging technologies related to endpoint solutions on both Windows and Mac platforms, leveraging desktop management tools. Propose and implement enhancements to improve the reliability and efficiency of endpoint management for both environments. Qualifications : Bachelor's degree in a relevant field; certifications in endpoint management and security are advantageous. Proven experience in endpoint solution design, implementation, and support for both Windows and Mac environments, utilizing desktop management tools. Strong technical knowledge of endpoint hardware and software, security protocols, and best practices on both Windows and Mac platforms, with proficiency in desktop management tools. Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills. Effective communication and interpersonal abilities. Detail-oriented with a commitment to accuracy. Ability to work collaboratively in a cross-functional team environment. Project management skills for executing endpoint-related initiatives. Welfare Medical Insurance Accidental Insurance Long Service Emblem Co-operative Club & Activities All Positions Required Good command of English and computer literacy Interested candidates should submit the application with recent photo, resume, academic transcript, ID card, English proficiency test result (TOEIC) and any other supporting documents on https://careers.thaioilgroup.com/ Contact : Recruitment Team Thaioil Energy Services Company Limited 42/1 Moo1 Tung- Sukla, Sriracha, Chonburi 20230 Tel: 038-359-000 Ext.19821 -19828 Website : www.thaioilgroup.com [link removed]

Company: CXC Global Talent Recruitment (Thailand) Co., Ltd.
column8: Position Overview Role Purpose: The Subject Matter Expert is responsible for providing functional support for company's products and solutions, addressing technical and functional inquiries, incidents, issues, requests, and queries. This role involves collaborating with project teams, product teams, and support teams to ensure timely resolution of requests and issues, while ensuring proper documentation, notification, escalation, and tracking. The primary focus is on supporting project tasks and ensuring accurate information to meet stakeholder needs, legislation, policies, standards, and best practices. Core Functions: • Our consultants serve as the direct connection between our company and our customers. • Collaborate with customers to implement Company's systems. • Gather business requirements, prepare environments, provide training, and assist with SIT/Pilot. Responsibilities: • Acquire a deep understanding of the technical and functional aspects of the Company's product range. • Stay up to date with comprehensive knowledge of Company's product and related industry products and technology. • Contribute to the documentation of user guides, training materials, deployment/installation guides, troubleshooting guides, proposals, and statements of work. • Provide functional and/or technical support to project and support teams, resolving issues within their area of expertise that are relevant to project deliverables. • Develop and maintain product knowledge, industry knowledge, business skills, and professional skills through on-the-job training, classroom training, and documentation. Share necessary information for the team's success. • Connect business requirements to existing functionality, suggesting solution approaches that may differ from the customer's current processes but are already implemented in our products. Alternatively, define the most efficient means to bridge the gap between customer requirements and our existing functionality. • Conduct site visits, customer discussions, and interviews. Facilitate customer workshops in collaboration with project and development teams. • Deliver clearly documented business and functional requirements for the solution, which have been approved by the customer and stakeholders, using standard templates to enable the project team to initiate development. Provide clarification as necessary. • Ensure that the developed solution accurately meets customer needs by continuously clarifying business requirements throughout the project's life, acting as a liaison between the customer, project team, and development team. Document and manage clarification requests and gather replies from customers throughout the project lifecycle. • Perform testing of products, services, or installation packages towards the end of the project/program (user acceptance testing), evaluating them for accuracy and usability, and providing feedback to the project team. • *Provide standby support for non-coding issues during UAT and Pilot, acting as a bridge between the customer and the Product team. Resolve non-coding related issues where possible and refine/prioritize tickets for the Product team. • Act as the first point of contact for issue resolution during project design and implementation. • Specify customer solutions, including change requests and scope of work. • Specify interfaces with other third-party systems, such as ERP systems like SAP or Navision. • Ensure and be accountable for the technical integrity of the design in accordance with the client's requirements. • Provide feedback to Product teams regarding products, including identifying gaps, evaluating functionality, and addressing market/customer demands. • *Summarize customer and system information, including troubleshooting details, to facilitate the transition to the support process. Key Qualifications: • The product is a point-of-sale solution in the petrol industry. • Experience with point-of-sale systems, ideally in the petrol industry, is required, with a minimum of approximately 5 years preferred. • Strong communication skills and analytical thinking are essential. • Proficiency in SQL is important, as the role involves acting as the product expert and bridging communication between customers and software development teams. The ability to understand customer needs and effectively communicate technically with the development team is crucial. • Consideration will be given to candidates who have previously served in L1/L2 POS support desk roles.

Jobtitle: Senior Developer สมัครด่วน.!!
column8: รายละเอียดของงาน : Senior Developer (สมัครด่วน !!) มีความเชี่ยวชาญในการพัฒนา Software ด้วยหลักการ Algorithm, Validation, และ Debugging Concept ด้วย C# .Net มีความเชี่ยวชาญในการใช้ Programming Tool Visual Studio สามาถทำความเข้าใจระบบที่ Designer (SA, ASA, SI etc) ได้ออกแบบไว้ ช่วยเหลือ Designer (SA, ASA, SI etc) ในการจัดทำเอกสาร Application Spec ทำความเข้าใจกับ Application Spec จาก Designer (SA, ASA, SI etc) ออกแบบ Technical Function ประสานงาน/ แสดงผลงาน/ รายงานสถานะความคืบหน้าของงาน ต่อหัวหน้าทีมที่รับผิดชอบ ให้บริการเป็นที่ปรึกษาของลูกค้า ในการพัฒนา Software ทำเอกสารที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการพัฒนา ดูแล และควบคุมทีมงาน ให้ผลิตผลงานที่ถูกต้อง ตรงตามการออกแบบ และตามเวลาที่กำหนดไว้ เป็นที่ปรึกษาการทำงานให้กับทีมงาน ดูแล และจัดการ Resource ที่มี ให้ทำงานที่เหมาะสม และ ทำงานร่วมกันได้อย่างราบรื่น รวมทั้งลดความขัดแย้งที่เกิดขึ้นภายในทีมงาน ให้บริการเป็นที่ปรึกษาของลูกค้า ในการทำงานแบบ Leader คุณสมบัติผู้สมัครงาน : จบการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี หรือปริญญาโทสาขา Computer Science, Computer Engineering, IT, MIS, Business Computer หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ในการเขียนโปรแกรมด้วยภาษา ASP.Net C# อย่างน้อย 2 ปี มีความรู้ในการเขียนโปรแกรมด้วยภาษา ASP.Net C# ระดับดี มีประสบการณ์การทำงานกับ IIS Server มีความรู้และประสบการณ์การทำงาน ระบบฐานข้อมูล SQL Server และคำสั่ง SQL Statement, Store Procedure ระดับพื้นฐาน มีความรู้และประสบการณ์ การพัฒนา Web Site Responsive, HTML & CSS, JQuery; JavaScript; AJAX; jSon; มีความรู้และประสบการณ์ การพัฒนา Web Service - SOAP and REST มีความรู้และประสบการณ์ การพัฒนาระบบ (Develop and Program) ในเชิงสถาปัตยกรรม N-Tiers (PT - MT - DT) ระดับดี สามารถวิเคราะห์ความต้องการของลูกค้า และออกแบบโปรแกรมได้ตามหลัก OOP  (Object Oriented Programming) ระดับดี มีความรู้และประสบการณ์จัดการ Source Control และ Deploy Application มีประสบการณ์ การพัฒนา Mobile Application จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ มีประสบการณ์ การพัฒนา Mobile Application ด้วย Xamarin จะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ มีความสามารถและประสบการณ์ในการควบคุมงานของตนเองและทีมงาน ให้ตรงตามการออกแบบ และตามเวลาที่กำหนดไว้ สามารถจัดการ, แก้ไขปัญหาของงาน และทำงานภายใต้ความกดดันได้ ปรับตัวเพื่อการทำงานร่วมกับทีมงานได้เป็นอย่างดี  และช่วยเหลือ แบ่งปัน เพื่อบรรลุจุดมุ่งหมายร่วมกัน เปิดใจรับฟังความคิดใหม่ๆ และ มีความเพียรพยายามในการทำงานให้สำเร็จ สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน  : จังหวัด กรุงเทพมหานคร อัตราที่รับเพิ่ม 4 ตำแหน่ง เงินเดือน 40,000 - 70,000 บาท สวัสดิการ ประกันสังคม ประกันชีวิต, ประกันอุบัติเหตุ, ประกันสุขภาพ สิทธิการเบิกค่าทันตกรรม ทำงานสัปดาห์ละ 5 วัน มีเวลาการทำงานที่ยืดหยุ่น ค่าทำงานล่วงเวลา ค่าใช้จ่ายในการเดินทาง, ค่ายานพาหนะ ค่าตอบแทนพิเศษ เงินโบนัสตามผลงาน วันหยุดพักผ่อนประจำปี ตรวจสุขภาพประจำปี ท่องเที่ยวประจำ วิธีการสมัคร ส่งใบสมัครงานผ่านปุ่ม APPLY NOW หรือ ผ่านปุ่มสมัครงานของ JobsDB ติดต่อวันทำงาน จันทร์ - Jobtitle: Project Leader/หัวหน้าทีมพัฒนาโปรเจค
column8: ความรับผิดชอบ ดูแลและผลักดันทีมพัฒนาระบบ(Software) ให้ผลิตผลงานออกมาให้ ตรงตามความต้องการของระบบ มีประสิทธิภาพ ใช้งานได้จริง และภายใต้กรอบเวลาที่กำหนด รายงานความคืบหน้า ปัญหา และอุปสรรค และแนวทางแก้ไขปัญหาภายในโครงการ ต่อผู้จัดการโครงการ และลูกค้า ดำเนินโครงการตามตารางการทำงาน ( Project Schedule ) ดูแลการดำเนินโครงการให้เป็นไปตาม Software Development Life Cycle  ในรูปแบบ Waterfall , Agile หรือ Scrum Review และแนะนำกระบวนการทำงานให้ทีมได้ คุณสมบัติ วุฒิการศึกษาปริญญาตรี หรือเทียบเท่าใน สาขาวิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์ วิศวกรรมศาสตร์คอมพิวเตอร์ ไอที หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ในสายงานพัฒนาระบบ (Software) หรือสายงานที่เกี่ยวข้องไม่น้อยกว่า 5 ปี มีประสบการณ์การเขียนโปรแกรมด้วย มากกว่า 1 ภาษาในรูปแบบ Front-End และ Back-End หรืออย่างใดอย่างหนึ่งไม่น้อยกว่า 3 ปี มีความสามารถในการสื่อสาร และเข้าใจในความต้องการของลูกค้าหรือผู้ใช้งานได้ดี มีความรู้ความเข้าใจในการจัดทำเอกสารเพื่อส่งมอบงานพัฒนาระบบ มีรับผิดชอบสูง สามารถทำงานภายใต้แรงกดดันได้ดี ชอบศึกษาหาความรู้ใหม่ๆอยู่ตลอดเวลา เพื่อนำมาพัฒนาทีม มีทักษะการสื่อสารที่ดี ทำงานเป็นทีมได้ หากมีความรู้ความเข้าทำงานพัฒนาระบบ (Software) ตามวงรอบการพัฒนาระบบ (SDLC) ในรูปแบบ Waterfall , Agile , Scrum จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ​ มีความรู้ความเข้าใจในการออกแบบและพัฒนาระบบโดยใช้ UML , Flow Chart , Activity Diagram  จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ​ เงินเดือน : ตามตกลง (Negotiable)

Jobtitle: Strategic Real Estate Manager | Market Planning Manager
column8: As a Market Planning Specialist, you will work with Senior Manager to develop market planning programs that fully drive and support the store expansion. This helps the company better serve its growth and client’s satisfaction. This Career as a Market Planning Manager at Starbucks will help you develop analytical skills in spanning multiple store channels. This position is located in head Office or potentially survey 2-3 days per week. Summary of Key Responsibilities Responsibilities and essential job functions include but are not limited to the following: Starbucks’s existing channels and opportunities to expand the market, market trend, trade area, penetration strategy, cannibalization & competitor study and customer type & volume Gathering all related secondary data from the government organization Deliver routinely update to ensure we complete and have up to date information and also developing the market holding capacity. Ex. Create predictive model ad also maintain the accuracy of the model on each store distribution ex. Office, Hospital by applying data mining technique (e.g. machine learning technique, association rule, regression etc. Conducts and update market planning tools ex. Retails Trade Zone (RTZ), traffic count, Top Tails analysist and traffic capture rate. Also, coordinates with supplier and student trainees for surveying and other requested data for further development. Efficiency and effectively applying ATLAS into market planning scope based on sales forecasting or strategic planning to ensure the company’s store sales and long-term profitability. Preparing and managing data presentation to back up decision markets for new site proposed. Responsible for information and data input of store attribute and IMF system for Real Estate team, and Store Development Department. Update weekly for Markets news and the Market movement. Supporting other duties as assigned by direct supervisor. Summary of Experience At least 5-7 years of experience in market planning, business analysis Has experience in analytics function within Macro and Microeconomics with 5-5 years financial projections (IRR), research study and field work, multiple regression, time series analytics and model formulation is preferable. Experience with data mining tools (e.g. R, Python etc.) Must have background in statically analysists. Strong capabilities in operations MS Office, SPAA, Internet and Map Education Bachelor’s Degree in Finance, Statistic or Economics is preferable Required Knowledge, Skill and Abilities Able to travel or work independently Excellent spoken and written command of English Excellent spoken and written command of English Computer skill, esp. for data analysis

Job Summary: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Sales Director to lead our government sales team. They will also have a deep understanding of the government's procurement process and the unique needs of government agencies. Identify and qualify new sales opportunities. Develop and present sales proposals to government agencies. Manage customer relationships. Negotiate and close sales contracts. Track and analyze sales performance. Stay up-to-date on government regulations and procurement processes. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in business administration, computer science, or a related field. 10+ years of experience in sales, with a minimum of 5 years of experience selling complex IT solutions to the government sector. Proven track record of success in achieving sales targets. Excellent communication and presentation skills. Strong understanding of the government's procurement process and the unique needs of government agencies. Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Industry:                   Information Technology & Services Employment Type:  Full-time Job Opening:           Product Manager SaaS Solution Location:                  Bangkok, Thailand Start Date:                 As soon as possible As the Product Manager, you will manage the development of our SaaS solution from idea to launch of new versions and modules. Combining strong market insight with important customer feedback you will be the main contributor to our product roadmap. Cross-functional facilitation with the different stakeholders will be an important part of the process of ensuring the best “First Mile System” in the agricultural marketplace. The perfect candidate has experience in Product Management of SaaS solutions, selling a standardized solution via subscriptions, and experience in driving a process where minimizing the need for customer-specific setup, training, and support is key. We are looking for a candidate who demonstrates a sense of urgency, passion in their work, and a desire to build on our current success and take it to a new level. Responsibilities: Interacting with Key Customers Conduct Market Research related to our products Generate Product ideas and supervise pilots Writing software requirements for new features and modules Responsible for defining and prioritizing the product backlog Ensure customer interaction and feedback through pilots and surveys Perform product packaging towards different segments Be one of the main contributors to Product vision and Product Strategy Project manage delivery of Modules and Larger changes. Cultivate relationships with partners Implement a streamlined product launch Perform training and necessary content creation supporting successful Sales In many of the above responsibilities, you will depend on internal or external resources to get the job done, so good project management skills will be highly appreciated Qualifications 2+ years of Product Management experience (SaaS or an IT-based product) or 5 Years of Software Project Management. A bachelor’s degree in a relevant subject Demonstrated ability to lead/facilitate/communicate with cross-functional teams. Having experience with Business analysis and writing software requirements. Ability to travel overseas as per job requirements (Once every 2-3 months) Excellent communication skills both oral and written. Business focus with the ability to translate business-to-technical requirements, and vice versa. Good command in Speaking/Reading/Writing International Business English What we offer A competitive senior salary and benefits package Global/regional network/ exposure in AgTech/Global Food Industry Casual work environment Opportunity for growth for all employees Privacy notice For information on how we handle your personal data, please refer to our website at: https://farmforce.com/privacy-policy/

About Kaidee Kaidee is Thailand’s leading trusted auto, marketplace, and real estate platform for buyers and sellers. Kaidee has redefined the way business is done. We strive to make the experience with us faster, easier, and simpler - bringing tremendous value to our buyers and sellers. Together at Kaidee, our diverse and growing team is driven by the excitement of challenging the known and being empowered to develop the solutions of tomorrow. If you have a passion for innovating, continuously learning, and making an impact while having fun, join us. In March 2023, Carro acquired Kaidee. We are hiring for an experienced Android Engineer, based in Bangkok (Thailand). Job Summary: Our company is seeking a skilled Android Engineer to join our mobile development team. The successful candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining our Android applications, as well as ensuring their high performance, responsiveness, and scalability. The ideal candidate should have extensive experience in Kotlin programming language and Android development, and possess excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Key Responsibilities: Design and develop high-quality Android applications using Kotlin programming language and Android development tools. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define product requirements and ensure seamless integration with backend systems. Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code and ensure the timely delivery of features. Debug and troubleshoot issues, and implement fixes to ensure the optimal performance of our applications. Continuously evaluate emerging technologies and best practices to ensure the optimal performance of our Android applications. Participate in code reviews and contribute to team development processes. We are also looking for experienced Android engineers! In addition to the above, more experienced Android engineers will be expected to: Establish best practices for developer operations (For more experienced engineers) provide technical leadership across multiple product teams Share your expertise and mentor other engineers Help with recruiting Requirements: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. Extensive experience in Kotlin programming language and Android development. Strong understanding of object-oriented programming, data structures, and algorithms. Experience with RESTful APIs, web services, and mobile application architectures. Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability Strong understanding of Material Design guidelines and Human Interface Guidelines. Familiar with CI/CD and Fastlane will be an added advantage Familiarity with Google Developer account & Google Play Store Console will be an added advantage Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to work independently as well as in a team environment. Proven track record of delivering high-quality Android applications promptly. Able to converse in English

Jobtitle: Senior Software Engineer (Full Stack Web Developer)
column8: Tencent Thailand offers unique opportunities to grow with an industry-leading company while enjoying the benefits of creating and starting new business. Currently, we are looking for a candidate in the role of Senior Full Stack Engineer located in Bangkok, Thailand. Tencent Thailand is dedicated to developing internet platforms with quality content for our users’ lifestyles making the online world safe, enjoyable, and educational. Our leading products include, but not limited to, Sanook.com the number 1 portal in Thailand, WeChat, and Tencent Games. At Tencent, we aim to fulfill the needs of our audiences, partners, and advertisers with diverse and innovative platforms. We seek highly motivated individuals to join us as we continue our journey to create new products, services, and opportunities in Thailand, a hub of innovation and business for Southeast Asia. Job Description/Scope: Focus on Front-End Development using React.js/Next.js framework, JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML, CSS/SCSS. Maintain and develop Back-End, REST API, GraphQL, and Database using Node.js, Express.js, Nest.js, MySQL, MongoDB, etc. Develop and maintenance web application “Sanook.com” and expand your skills using the company online learning to cover all stack requirement for web application development. Develop and drive long-term comprehensive web development and social media strategy with ultimate goals to create top-of-mind awareness and to increase brand favorability. Lead planning and execution of digital marketing initiatives for various campaigns, with different objectives. Marketing levers include both paid and organic fronts. Ensure that key messages of each marketing campaigns are widely spread across all digital channels while measuring, analyzing, and tracking action on performance of strategies. Coordinate internally and externally to make sure that online media plans will be successfully executed. Track and evaluate effectiveness of each online marketing and social media plans. Suggest and adapt to change at all times to yield to best benefits for each projects on both budget control and engagement. Qualifications: 5-6 years of experience in Front-End Development, React.js/Next.js framework, JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML, CSS/SCSS, Responsive Web Development 5-6 years of experience in Back end, API development, and Database will be advantage such as Node.js, Express.js, Nest.js, MySQL, MongoDB, etc. 5+ years of digital marketing experience will be advantage. Strong knowledge of current online marketing tools and strategies and be able to lead integrated digital marketing campaigns from concept to execution. Strong analytical skills and data-driven thinking Excellent communication, writing and persuasive skills. Teamwork and service skills All applications will be treated strictly confidential. Only short-listed candidates will be notified. Tencent (Thailand) Company Limited 8 T One Building, 10th, 11th and 12th Floor (Unit 4-5), Soi Sukhumvit 40, Sukhumvit Road, Phra Khanong, Khlong Toei, Bangkok 10110

column8: We are looking to recruit Jr. QA Engineer ATA-IT Limited- the subsidiary of National Bank of Canada (NBC). Currently, we are looking for Jr. QA Engineer to join our team. We are looking to see you be a member of National Bank of Canada. Main Responsibilities: Plan and manage overall project testing strategy, test approach, and coordinate all testing activities for responsible project. Conduct manual testing of software applications to identify defects and ensure functionality. Understand project requirements and analyze business cases for testing projects. Collaborate with the development team to understand project specifications. Define testing scope, estimate testing effort and resource for project. Assist in developing and maintaining automated test scripts for Web applications. Collaborate with Senior QA team members to enhance test automation processes. Identity quality risks and issues and escalate to line manager or related stakeholders. Facilitate and deliver test planning and test artifacts, such as test cases, test data, test report. Follow up the issues and defects fixing and retesting with the agreed SLA. Assist in creating test plans and test cases based on project requirements. Qualification: Bachelor’s degree in computer science, Computer Engineering, IT or related field A fresh graduate or a candidate with a minimum of 1 year of relevant experience in Manual testing and Automation Testing tools such as Java Selenium Framework (Junit) and Postman for API testing Have a good knowledge of testing methodologies, able to create test cases, test data and test report. Experience in Software Quality Assurance or Testing with financial or banking systems (such as Digital banking, Retail banking, corporate banking, Private banking, Payment gateway, Brokerage system) would be nice to have. Coding/Scripting in Java is a plus. Familiarity with Agile methodologies, particularly Kanban and experience in using Jira/Confluence/SharePoint is a plus. Familiarity with test management tools, including Xray Test Repository Service minded with a positive attitude, initiative, proactive, self-motivated, and analytical thinking. Good command of spoken and written in English. What you will get from ATA IT: 14 days’ vacation in first year Health insurance for staff & family Life insurance Dental fee for staff & family Provident fund Annual Party Annual Health Check Monetary Assistance (Childbirth, Marriage, Funeral) Monthly Activities- Staff Birthday & Company Activities Social discuss & sharing knowledge Multi-national company with flexible working hours, but professional company culture Hybrid work from home policy

#BeMore Do you aspire a rewarding career that lets you do more and achieve more? Unleash your full potential at work with TDCX, an award-winning and fast-growing BPO company. Work with the world’s most loved brands and be with awesome, diverse people. Be home, belong, and start your journey to #BeMore! Top reasons to work with TDCX Attractive remuneration, great perks, and performance incentives. Comprehensive medical, insurance, or social security coverage. World-class workspaces. Engaging activities and recognition programs. Strong learning and development plans for your career growth. Positive culture for you to #BeMore at work. Easy to locate area with direct access to public transport. Flexible working arrangements. Be coached and mentored by experts in your field. Join a global company, winner of hundreds of industry awards. What’s your mission? You’ll help us deliver excellent service to our partner brands by performing these tasks: As part of international team, you will support one of the leading social media platforms You will help build safe communities for millions of people around the globe Assist our community members accurately and on time Investigate and resolve issues that are reported on platform such as requests for account support and reports of potentially abusive content Review reported content and respond to user inquiries with high quality, speed, empathy, and accuracy Who are we looking for? Fluency in written and spoken English , and Thai Bachelor's Degree, or Master's Degree is required More than 1 year experiences in any field. However, fresh graduates are encouraged to apply A deep interest and understanding of online media and social networks Awareness of current cultural, political, and social events in Thailand Goal-oriented work approach and flexibility Able to work in Shifts Benefits & Others: Dental insurance Life insurance Medical insurance Performance bonus Work Location : Sala Daeng BTS Station / Si Lom MRT Station Who is TDCX? TDCX (NYSE: TDCX) provides transformative digital CX solutions, enabling world-leading and disruptive brands to acquire new customers, build customer loyalty, and protect their online communities. TDCX helps clients, including many of the world’s best brands, achieve their customer experience aspirations by harnessing technology, human intelligence, and our global footprint. We serve clients in fintech, gaming, technology, home sharing and travel, digital advertising and social media, streaming, and e-commerce. Our expertise and strong footprint in Asia have made us a trusted partner for clients, particularly high-growth, new economy companies looking to tap the region’s growth potential. We pride ourselves on discovering and employing the best professionals to join us as we transform the outsourced CX industry. Our commitment to #BeMore for our people, our clients, and our community has led to us winning several hundreds of industry awards, including being one of the best companies to work for in Asia. From our first-rate workspaces, above-industry-average compensation packages, career opportunities, to our workplace perks, find out what else is in store when you embark on a career with TDCX.

Location : Sriracha, Chonburi Responsibilities Application Management: Oversee the administration, configuration, and maintenance of non-SAP applications, including those built on Microsoft .NET technologies and popular middleware solutions, to ensure their availability and reliability. Integration and Interoperability: Facilitate the integration of non-SAP applications, including Microsoft .NET-based solutions and popular middleware technologies, with other systems, enabling data flow and process automation across the organization while ensuring compatibility with existing systems. Application Enhancement: Collaborate with business units to identify opportunities for improving non-SAP application functionality, including those utilizing Microsoft .NET and popular middleware, streamlining processes, and enhancing user experience. Vendor Relations: Engage with non-SAP application vendors and suppliers, including those offering popular middleware solutions, manage relationships, and negotiate contracts to ensure the efficient operation of software solutions. User Support: Provide technical support and issue resolution for end-users of non-SAP applications, including Microsoft .NET-based solutions and popular middleware applications, working to resolve application-related problems promptly and efficiently. Security and Compliance: Implement and maintain security measures to protect sensitive data within non-SAP applications, including those utilizing popular middleware technologies, ensuring compliance with industry regulations and internal policies. Documentation and Training: Create and maintain comprehensive documentation of non-SAP application configurations and procedures, including those involving popular middleware solutions. Develop and deliver training programs to empower users and maximize the value of these applications. Performance Monitoring: Continuously monitor non-SAP application performance, including Microsoft .NET and popular middleware solutions, diagnose and address issues, and optimize resource utilization to improve overall efficiency. Upgrades and Patch Management: Plan and execute software upgrades and patches for non-SAP applications, including those utilizing popular middleware platforms, ensuring they remain up-to-date with the latest features, enhancements, and security fixes. Change Management: Manage changes to non-SAP applications, including those involving popular middleware solutions, assess their impact on business processes, and ensure smooth transitions while minimizing disruptions. Business Continuity: Implement and maintain business continuity and disaster recovery plans for critical non-SAP applications, including those utilizing popular middleware, to minimize downtime. Reporting and Analytics: Generate and analyze data and reports to identify trends, bottlenecks, and opportunities for improvement in non-SAP application performance and usage, including those using popular middleware technologies. Focal Point for Escalations: Act as the focal point for non-SAP-related escalations from the application support team, including those related to Microsoft .NET applications and popular middleware solutions, coordinating issue resolution and communication to minimize disruptions and ensure smooth operations. Qualifications Bachelor's degree in a relevant field; certifications in specific non-SAP enterprise applications, Microsoft .NET technologies, and popular middleware platforms are advantageous. Proven experience in the management, optimization, and support of enterprise-level non-SAP applications, including those utilizing Microsoft .NET, popular middleware solutions, and technologies. Strong technical knowledge of non-SAP applications, including those involving popular middleware, integration technologies, and best practices. Proficiency in non-SAP application security measures, compliance requirements, and data protection, particularly for those using popular middleware. Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to diagnose and resolve complex non-SAP application-related issues, including those involving popular middleware. Effective communication and interpersonal skills for collaboration with cross-functional teams and end-users. Detail-oriented with a commitment to documentation and best practices. Ability to adapt to evolving technology trends and maintain a proactive approach to non-SAP application management and optimization, especially those involving popular middleware platforms. Project management skills for executing non-SAP application-related initiatives, including those related to popular middleware technologies. Welfare Medical Insurance Accidental Insurance Long Service Emblem Co-operative Club & Activities All Positions Required Good command of English and computer literacy Interested candidates should submit the application with recent photo, resume, academic transcript, ID card, English proficiency test result (TOEIC) and any other supporting documents on https://careers.thaioilgroup.com/ Contact : Recruitment Team Thaioil Energy Services Company Limited 42/1 Moo1 Tung- Sukla, Sriracha, Chonburi 20230 Tel: 038-359-000 Ext.19821 -19828 Website : www.thaioilgroup.com [link removed]
