Company: Bangkok International Preparatory and Secondary School
column8: ICT Technician are responsible for setting up and maintaining computer systems. They ensure that computers in the school's network, run smoothly and securely. And responsible for Desktop Support & Cloud Application Manager to join our team! You will handle a variety of projects to support and improve the organization's network systems. We are seeking a highly motivated self-directed individual with experience in providing remote and onsite IT support for our school and satellite offices. Main Job Roles and Responsibilities of ICT Technician Configuring and maintaining the networked computer system, including operating systems, security tools, applications, servers, email systems, laptops, desktops, software, and hardware Ensuring data is stored securely and backed up regularly. Diagnosing and resolving hardware, software, networking, and system issues when they arise. Replacing and upgrading defective or outdated components when necessary. Monitoring system performance to ensure everything runs smoothly and securely. Researching and recommending new approaches to improve the networked computer system. Providing technical support when requested. Documenting any processes, which staff need to follow in order to successfully work within our computing systems. Other Roles and Responsibilities of ICT Technician Manage all aspects of the networking platform Manage all aspects of the desktop inventory (Mac & Windows 10) Manage all aspects of the mobile inventory (Android & IOS) Solid knowledge of Active Directory including Group Policy ADFS, Management, DNS, etc. Maintain & troubleshoot network & system issues Monitor active network and server infrastructure Perform routine preventative maintenance on equipment Perform and administer security measures to prevent system interruptions or breaches. Manage compliance tasks and prepare for audits Execute sensitive data backup and restoration procedures Document all technical procedures and user guides Solve technical issues inside the organization. Maintain printer system, including refilling and repairing the print cartridge. Install, configure, upgrade operating systems and software, using standard business and administrative packages; may modify specific applications for use in operational departments. Install, assemble and configure computers, monitors, network infrastructure and peripherals such as printers, scanners and related hardware; pull cables and rewire or direct the rewiring of cables as required for new installations and office reconfiguration. Troubleshoot problems with computer systems, including troubleshooting hardware and software, email, network and peripheral equipment problems; make repairs and corrections where required. Act as a technical resource in assisting users to resolve problems with equipment and data, staff a centralized help desk to facilitate exchange of information and advice, implement solutions or notify outsource provider as required. Make hardware and software acquisition recommendations including helping users assess needs and providing justification for equipment and services. Assist in instructing staff with the use of standard business and administrative software, including word processing, spreadsheets and database management ; provide instruction or written documentation where required. Assist with the planning, design, research and acquisition of new or upgraded hardware and software systems; maintain current knowledge of hardware, software and network technology and recommend modification as necessary. Perform other duties as a similar nature or level Duties and Responsibilities: ( Daily and Monthly Responsibilities) Perform server administration tasks, including user/group administration, security permissions, group policies, print services, research event log warnings and errors, and resource monitoring, ensuring system architecture components work together seamlessly Monitor datacentre health using pre-existing management tools and respond to hardware issues as they arise; help build, test, and maintain new servers as needed Maintain internal infrastructure requirements including, laptop and desktop computers, servers, routers, switches, firewalls, printers, phones, security updates; support internet, intranet, LANs, WANs, and network segments Interact with the help desk and other teams to assist in troubleshooting, identify root cause, and provide technical support when needed Perform routine/scheduled audits of the systems, including all backups Non-Essential Duties: • Performs other duties as assigned. Knowledge, Skills and Abilities: ( ICT System and ICT Network Technician ) Bachelor’s degree in technology or computer science. Proven work experience in IT. Experience with or knowledge of programming languages and operating systems; current equipment and technologies, enterprise backup and recovery procedures, system performance-monitoring tools, active directories, virtualization, HTTP traffic, content delivery, and caching. Experience in project management, application design and integration, and cloud computing (specifically Google workplace and Microsoft Azure). Expertise in creating, analysing, and repairing large-scale distributed systems. Creating volumes, assigning to servers and remote replication. Familiarity with SQL and database operations. Strong Troubleshooting and critical thinking skills Deadline and detail-oriented Key Competencies: • Good command of English. • Proactive, initiative and self-motivated. • Ability to work with staff at all levels.

Job Description User support on ERP Application Troubleshoot problems and advise via telephone and/or Email Assists users, both remotely and in-person, to diagnose and resolve problems, escalates when necessary, and documents problem status and action taken Involving internal QA testing before deliver to user Develop training material and conduct user training and user acceptant testing Responsible for routine daily operation Review and prioritize technical and operational support issues from clients, escalate to related party and follow-up for solution/fix to resolve support tickets Working for ongoing system maintenance, change request and enhancement Performs other related duties as required Job requirements Knowledge of Field Application Support or related POS (Point of Sales) Retail System ERP Microsoft Office Remote software End User Support Application Installations

Jobtitle: Corporate Strategic Planning Officer/เจ้าหน้าทีวางแผนกลยุทธ์องค์กร
Company: Dhipaya Life Assurance Public Company Limited
column8: ความรับผิดชอบโดยสังเขป ( Position Summary) สนับสนุนการวางแผนเชิงกลยุทธ์ขององค์กร ทั้งการจัดทำแผน การผลักดันและติดตามหน่วยงานต่างๆ ให้เป็นไปตามแผน ทั้งระดับแผนธุรกิจและระดับโครงการเชิงกลยุทธ์ รวบรวมและตรวจสอบและรายงานประเมินผล การติดตามผลการปฏิบัติให้ KPI บรรลุเป้าหมายขององค์กร วิเคราะห์สถานการณ์ตลาด อุตสาหกรรม คู่แข่ง รวมถึงปัจจัยอื่นๆ ที่จะส่งผลกระทบต่อธุรกิจ บทบาทหน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบหลัก ( Major Role Responsibilities) ประสานงานในการจัดทำแผนกลยุทธ์ร่วมกับผู้บริหารฝ่ายต่างๆ ประสานงานให้มีการดำเนินการตามแผนและนำแผนไปสู่การปฏิบัติที่สอดคล้องกับกลยุทธ์ของธุรกิจ จัดทำแผนวิเคราะห์ปัจจัยภายในองค์กร สภาพแวดล้อมภายนอก โอกาส และภัยคุกคาม รวมถึงสถานการณ์การแข่งขันในอุตสาหกรรม รวมรวบ ประเมินผล และประสานงานข้อมูลรายงานประเด็นกลยุทธ์และตัวชี้วัด (KPI) ทั้งในระดับบริษัท ระดับหน่วยงานและรายพนักงาน เพื่อใช้ประชุมประจำเดือนพร้อมสรุปประเด็นยุทธศาสตร์ที่สำคัญและอื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องของหน่วยงานจากที่ประชุม จากทุกส่วนงาน พัฒนาระบบข้อมูลที่จำเป็นต่อการวิเคราะห์ การวางแผน การดำเนินการ การติดตามและรายงานผล เพื่อติดตามผลการปฏิบัติตามกลยุทธ์ของหน่วยงานอื่นๆ ที่กำหนดของธุรกิจในองค์กรทั้งในและต่างประเทศ คุณสมบัติ ( Qualification) ปริญญาตรี/ปริญญาโท สาขาบริหารธุรกิจ เศรษฐศาสตร์ การเงิน บัญชี วิศวกรรม หรือ สาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง ประสบการณ์ในงานวางแผนองค์กร วางแผนธุรกิจ การบริหารโครงการ ไม่น้อยกว่า 3 ปี (ยินดีรับเด็กจบใหม่) มีทักษะการคิดเชิงวิเคราะห์ การคิดอย่างมีระบบ และการสื่อสารในระดับดี

Jobtitle: Full Stack Developer (1+ Year Experience/New Graduates Welcome)
column8: Location: Remote / Work From Home (WFH) and On-Site in Bangkok, Thailand Experience: Minimum 1 Year or New graduates welcome We are looking for a talented Full Stack Developer to enhance our team. This position is suited for individuals who are enthusiastic about software development, with a preference for those with experience in an Internet of Things (IoT) environment. The role offers the flexibility to work remotely or on-site in Bangkok. Key Responsibilities: Develop and maintain front-end and back-end aspects of web applications or mobile applications. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features. Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications. Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs. Maintain code quality, organization, and automatization. Qualifications: 1+ year in Front-end or Backend development; Full-stack experience advantageous. Strong knowledge of front-end technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Typescript, Tailwind CSS, and frameworks like React. Proficient in back-end languages and frameworks, such as Golang (e.g. Gin), Python (e.g. Django, Flask), and Java (e.g. Spring Boot). Experience with databases, including SQL or NoSQL (e.g., PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Firestore). Experience with responsive and adaptive design. Understanding of RESTful APIs and integrating front-end applications with back-end services. Experience with Flutter and mobile application development is a plus. Familiarity with code versioning tools such as Git. Excellent problem-solving skills and algorithmic thinking. Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field is preferred. Good communication, presentation, and problem-solving skills Proficient in both written and spoken English and Thai. Nice to Have: Experience in an IoT environment. Knowledge of additional programming languages and frameworks. Benefits: Competitive salary and benefits. Flexible working hours and remote work options. Opportunities for professional growth and development. Collaborative and innovative work environment.

Company: Changan Auto Southeast Asia Co., Ltd.
column8: Job descriptions: Responsible for conducting user research for passenger cars in the Asia & Pacific region. Responsible for collecting vehicle usage scenarios, user psychological needs, and purchasing and usage behaviors. Responsible for establishing a people segmentation system for overseas markets. Responsible for developing methodological models for user behavior insights. Responsible for developing specific plans for overseas research, including questionnaire outlines and execution strategies. Responsible for executing research activities and deliver comprehensive reports. Responsible for supervising and ensuring quality control throughout the research process. Complete any other tasks assigned by leaders to support the overall goals of the organization. Qualifications: Bachelor's or above in Marketing, Statistics, Engineering or Sociology or related fields. 2 years experience in market research, automotive industry research. Proficient in English is must. Proven experience in international user research, particularly in the automotive industry. Proficient in SPSS software , and strong data analysis skills is preferred. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret user behavior data. Excellent communication and coordination skills. Excellent Microsoft Office skills Strong market analysis skills, acute market insight, strong sense of innovation.

Jobtitle: Senior Data-Business Analyst/เจ้าหน้าที่วิเคราะห์ข้อมูลและธุรกิจอาวุโส
column8: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ : ร่วมมือกับทีมพัฒนาระบบงาน/ผลิตภัณฑ์เพื่อให้สามารถดำเนินการพัฒนาได้ตามแผนที่กำหนดไว้ ประสานงานกับหน่วยงานต่าง ๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง และช่วยแก้ไขปัญหาหรือนำเสนอทางออกหากเกิดปัญหาในระหว่างการพัฒนา รวบรวมและวิเคราะห์ความต้องการของผู้ใข้งาน จัดทำเอกสารต่าง ๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องสำหรับทีมพัฒนา นำเสนอรายงานให้กับฝ่ายบริหารหรือผู้เกี่ยวข้องเกี่ยวกับแผนการพัฒนา ผลการดำเนินการ และ/หรืออุปสรรคที่พบระหว่างการพัฒนา (ถ้ามี) ติดตามผลการใช้งานหลังจากการส่งมอบระบบงาน//ผลิตภัณฑ์ เพื่อสามารถนำไปปรับใช้กับแผนการพัฒนาในลำดับถัดไป คุณสมบัติที่จำเป็น : รวบรวมข้อกำหนดทางธุรกิจและแปลเป็นข้อมูลที่สามารถนำไปสร้าง Dashboard และ/หรือแบบจำลองข้อมูล (Data models) ที่ตอบสนองความต้องการของผู้มีส่วนได้ส่วนเสียได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ สามารถระบุข้อมูลที่จำเป็นต่อการจัดทำ Data flow, Data sources (inputs/outputs) และมีส่วนร่วมกับ ผู้เก็บรวบรวมข้อมูลและ/หรือเจ้าของข้อมูลระหว่างหน่วยธุรกิจเพื่อนำเสนอแนวทางและข้อเสนอแนะได้ นำเสนอคำแนะนำที่เหมาะสมพร้อมวิธีแก้ปัญหาเชิงปฏิบัติด้วยระยะเวลาที่เหมาะสม และสามารถสื่อสารกับผู้มีส่วนได้ส่วนเสียในโครงการสำคัญได้ตรงกับความต้องการของธุรกิจ จัดเตรียมเอกสารต่างๆ ได้แก่ user/data workflow รายละเอียดโครงการ ระยะเวลาดำเนินการ รายงานอัปเดตผลิตภัณฑ์ ต้นแบบผลิตภัณฑ์ (Prototype) UAT script เอกสารลงนามการส่งมอบผลิตภัณฑ์ และคู่มือการใช้งาน สามารถจัดทำคำอธิบายบริบทการทำงาน (User story) ของ Software ที่จะส่งต่อแก่ทีม development โดยกำหนดเงื่อนไขการทำงานของ Software ที่ Product Owner และ ผู้มีส่วนได้เสียกำหนดไว้ตามข้อกำหนดทางธุรกิจ เข้าใจและสื่อสารข้อกำหนดทางธุรกิจและทางเทคนิคกับผู้เชี่ยวชาญด้านข้อมูลที่เกี่ยวข้องได้เป็นอย่างดี เช่น data architects, data engineers, and data analysts สนับสนุนการทำงานร่วมกับ Product Owner ในการติดตามการพัฒนาให้เป็นไปตามกำหนดระยะเวลา และกรอบการดำเนินงานที่วางไว้ รวมถึงผลการดำเนินการของผลิตภัณฑ์ มีความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับขั้นตอนการให้บริการในโรงพยาบาล และสามารถสื่อสาร ทำงานร่วมกับบุคลากรของโรงพยาบาลได้ เช่น บุคลากรทางการแพทย์ หรือ เจ้าหน้าที่ IT ประจำโรงพยาบาลได้ มีความรู้ความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับการพัฒนาระบบงานและ/หรือผลิตภัณฑ์ในรูปแบบ Agile ได้ สามารถสื่อสาร พูดและเขียน ภาษาไทยอย่างชำนาญ และสื่อสาร พูดและเขียน เป็นภาษาอังกฤษให้พอเข้าใจได้ ชำนาญการใช้งานเครื่องมือในการพัฒนาผลิตภัณฑ์ เช่น JIRA , Confluence และ FIgma มีทักษะในการแก้ไขปัญหา การจัดลำดับความสำคัญหรือความเร่งด่วนของปัญหา และทำงานภายใต้แรงกดดันได้ สนับสนุนกระบวนการทดสอบการใช้งานซอฟต์แวร์โดยผู้ใช้งานจริงและ Go-Live คุณสมบัติ : ปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป สาขาวิชาวิศวะคอมพิวเตอร์, วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์, คอมพิวเตอร์ธุรกิจ, เทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ บริหารธุรกิจ หรือ สาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์การทำงานทางด้านการพัฒนาระบบงานมากกว่า 3 ปีขึ้นไป มีประสบการณ์การทำงานทางด้าน Business Analyst, Data Analyst หรือ IT data consultant สถานที่ปฎิบัติงาน : Bangkok Business Center Building (Hybrid Working) 29 สุขุมวิท ซ. 63 แขวง คลองตันเหนือ เขตวัฒนา กรุงเทพมหานคร 10110 To apply for this position or to discuss further information, please contact us or send resume to "APPLY NOW" PRINCIPAL HEALTHCARE COMPANY LIMITED Bangkok Business Center,Sukhumvit 63 Rd. Klongton-Nua,Wattana,Bangkok 10110 Thailand.

Our client is a leading global provider of information and communications technology (ICT) infrastructure and smart devices. Key Responsibilities Supervising and managing the installation of BTS, NodeB, and RNC equipment as per project specifications and equipment guidelines. Coordinating and collaborating with subcontractors, ensuring their work aligns with project requirements and quality standards. Conducting site surveys to evaluate installation readiness and potential challenges, then report findings to the customer and project team. Developing detailed work plans, including timelines, resource allocation, and required materials for each installation project. Maintaining a strong focus on safety and EHS compliance, implementing best practices and protocols to ensure a safe working environment for all team members. Monitoring the progress of installations, identifying any deviations from the plan, and taking corrective actions as needed. Provide technical guidance and support to the installation team, addressing any technical issues that arise during the project. Collaborating closely with project managers, engineers, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless project execution. Preparing regular status reports and project documentation, keeping stakeholders informed of project milestones and challenges. Qualifications A bachelor's degree in Telecommunications, Electrical Engineering, or a related field. Proven experience of at least 3 years in site supervision, preferably with a focus on equipment installations. Strong technical knowledge of BTS, NodeB, and RNC equipment, with a clear understanding of equipment guidelines and standards. Experience in coordinating and managing subcontractors in a construction or telecommunications setting. Proficiency in conducting site surveys, analyzing technical requirements, and reporting findings effectively. Familiarity with creating work plans and schedules for complex installation projects. In-depth understanding of safety protocols and EHS regulations related to telecommunications installations. Excellent communication skills to interact with team members, subcontractors, and clients effectively. Problem-solving mindset with the ability to make informed decisions under pressure. Attention to detail and commitment to maintaining high-quality work standards.

Responsibilities: Develops custom project plans to ensure that all unique needs and deliverables are met in an aggressive time frame. Provide strategy support in the planning, coordination, execution and tracking activities associated with implementation team. Project Manager works with all areas of the company through the implementation process and works directly with Clients Looking for someone with strong organizational and communication skills Presents issues to and negotiates with top management to resolve resource conflicts In addition to technology project support functions, serves as a resource to other project managers, assisting them in the resolution of complex problems or leading them on larger projects Coordinates and tracks technology project resources, assets and schedules to ensure timely project outcomes Responsible for maintaining a project plan while going over all deliverables and handling any troubleshooting Responsible for gathering the information needed to complete the implementation Coordinate with assigned staff of the equipment installation while handling any escalations Qualifications for implementation project manager Fluency in English as working language (ability to manage meeting and presentations) Computer literacy in MS Office (profound knowledge of Excel, Visio & Power Point) Structured and process driven mindset to drive and lead change with good influencing skills A strong desire to achieve best-in-class customer satisfaction and service standards Excellent client/relationship skills – with strong written and oral communication skills 3+ years’ experience in Network or Cyber Security or Cloud or SaaS project implementation Having knowledge and experience in Project Management Framework and tools Having Project Management Professional (PMP) Certification is a plus for this position

Key Responsibilities: Comprehensive Business Understanding: Gain a profound understanding of the operational intricacies, challenges, and pain points faced by the target company operating in Thailand's vending machine industry. Challenge Identification: Identify and analyze the primary challenges and pain points encountered by the vending machine business within the chosen company. Analytics Solution Proposal: Formulate a robust proposal for a Business/Data Analytics Solution that aligns with the unique needs of the company. Potential Benefits: Clearly outline the potential benefits and value that the proposed analytics solution could bring to the client company. Implementation Timeframe: Provide an estimated timeframe for the successful execution of the proposed analytics solution. Technical and Data Requirements: (Optional) Suggest any specific technical and data-related prerequisites that would be necessary for the effective implementation of the proposed solution. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. 2-5 years of experience in a presales or consulting role, preferably in the AI/ML or data analytics field. Strong technical skills and experience with analytics tools and technologies such as Databricks, BigQuery, AWS, Tableau, Power BI, QlikView, or similar. Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to understand and analyze clients' business requirements. Ability to work independently and collaboratively as part of a team.

We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Junior Data Engineer to join our innovative team at DBot. This role is a unique opportunity for a professional eager to work at the forefront of the IT industry, particularly in cutting-edge technologies related to AI and Digital Transformation. The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of data engineering concepts, principles, and best practices. They will assist in the design, construction, installation, testing, and maintenance of data management systems, including databases and large-scale data processing systems. Responsibilities: Assist in designing, building, and maintaining scalable, reliable, and secure data pipelines to support business needs. Collaborate with data scientists, architects, and other engineers to understand and implement data-related projects. Contribute to the development of data quality reports and metrics. Participate in code and design reviews to ensure code quality and adherence to best practices. Write automated tests and perform manual testing to ensure data quality. Troubleshoot issues related to data processing, data integration, or data quality. Document technical specifications, procedures, and architectural designs. Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies in data engineering. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or a related field and/or relevant experience 1-3 years. Strong knowledge of database systems, data warehousing, and ETL processes. Experience with big data technologies such as Hadoop, Spark, or Kafka. Proficiency in at least one programming language (e.g., Python, Java, Scala). Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP. Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently and as part of a team. Excellent communication skills and the ability to explain technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Experience working in Agile development methodologies is a plus. Why DBot is the right place for you? Work Your Way: Hybrid model with 100% remote option. Enjoy flexibility and an international ambiance. Grow with Us: Fast-track career advancement opportunities (Team Lead, Project Manager, Operations Manager, etc.). Work-Life Balance: 12-20 days of annual leave, plus health and life insurance. Inclusive Culture: Free coffee/tea, regular team events, and a multinational environment. Global Exposure: Clients in Europe and Southeast Asia with potential travel opportunities. Expat Friendly: Assistance with visa and work permit for international hires. If you want to know more about DBot, visit https://www.dbotsoftware.com [link removed] We believe this role is a perfect match for someone who is passionate about leveraging technology to drive change and innovation. If you are ready to take your career to the next level and work on projects that make a difference, we would love to hear from you.

PRTR Technical is looking for an exceptional candidate to take on the role of Software Engineering Manager for a large tech company based in Bangkok. Responsibilities Utilizing Node.JS as the backend technology and React as the frontend technology. Producing high-quality and scalable code for the applications. Managing and coaching a team of software developers. Being involved in the technical design of the applications. Gathering requirements, designing, testing deploying, and supporting applications. Closely collaborating with other developers working on different layers of the infrastructure. Maintaining current knowledge of the standard language, coding methods, and operations requirements. Qualifications Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related field. 8+ years of experience in Software Development. 3+ years of experience using Node.JS and React. JS. 3+ years of experience managing a team of at least 5 developers is a requirement. Experience with cloud technologies such as AWS and GCP preferred. Good attitude, problem-solving, and interpersonal skills are a huge plus.

Scope of work This job contributes to FrieslandCampina’s success by ensuring the high level of competence within project management in the Commercialization team of Customer SC FrieslandCampina Thailand. With Commercialization we support our Fighting Units and customer to introduce new products/ideas as fast as possible with the highest quality as possible. Our purpose is to manage and implement changes and innovation within Consumer Dairy and customer by being a Supply Chain Expertise Centre and creating a customer oriented Supply Chain Footprint. The project manager facilitates in efficient and effective execution of projects for Fighting Unit FrieslandCampina Thailand achieving the Consumer Dairy FrieslandCampina Thailand Strategy. Responsibilities Project Management Project leader of multiple FrieslandCampina Thailand medium/large size projects (e.g. NPD, Tenders, New market out-roll, Local Redesigns, Local Contingency projects, Local CAPEX as part of Innovation projects, saving relate with recipe, import product); Front to End (Idea to Implementation) Project initiation & orientation; identifies and collects ideas, business requirements and needs, defines the scope of the project, determines the feasibility by building a business case and defines project objectives within agreed project management guidelines Project design & plan; formulates the project plan (including resourcing, planning, risk mitigation, quality control and organizational requirements), determines budget and acquires approval, in line with project objectives Project preparation & execution; executes project, coordinates the activities of the project team members, monitors progress of project and compliance with the project plan (using the project controls: Time, Money, Quality, Information, Organisation and Risks), manages and mitigates project risks and resources, creates risk awareness among stakeholders, manages stage-gates and adjusts project plan when necessary Project closure & implementation; delivers the project in line with project objectives, budget and planning, discusses project results with business, hands over project to line management when necessary and evaluates the project with all involved stakeholders Risk & Stakeholder Management Creates support for complete project approach (objectives, planning etc.), updates and consults relevant stakeholders regularly, manages expectations of relevant stakeholders during execution, involves stakeholders in decision making and builds and maintains a network of relevant stakeholders Information & Communication Ensures periodical project management reporting, quantitative and qualitative, according to defined formats and project management guidelines (e.g. maintaining Principal Toolbox, Props for saving) People Management Functionally leads, coaches, develops members of the own project team, and gives input for appraisal Continuous Improvement Keeps up with relevant project management methods and techniques and optimizes the implementation of and support for these at FrieslandCampina Consumer Dairy Project Portfolio Management Driving the process for the project portfolio management; creating the overview, gather the input, analyses and propose. Deployment Excellence activities Analyze, evaluate and drive commercialization related continuous improvement initiatives. Strategic Portfolio Management Drive the structural portfolio review process for the FU Management of portfolio guidelines Follow up on product life cycle management Identification of value engineering initiatives End-to-End Supply Chain solutions for innovations Central point of contact of SC of a specific plant for all FU driven projects. Executes feasibility checks on capabilities, complexity and capacity for local managed projects. Lead SKU Rationalization Qualifications MSc / MA / MBA Degree Bachelor’s Degree or above or equivalent experience. Excellent in Project Management with a minimum of 6 years of project management experience Minimum of 3 years of work experience in the FMCG industry, preferable in an operational supply chain/manufacturing environment Fluently in Thai and English written and spoken. Demonstrate a strong understanding of project management and supply chain processes are preferred. Excellent skills in using office software e.g. MS project, PPT, Excel, Power BI Location : This position will be base at FrieslandCampina, Head office

About Us Do you want to be part of Thailand banking transformation? Data is the core of the new financial services era, and we are open for the opportunity to be part to drive this change at the core. SCB DATAx is a new venture of the Siam Commercial Bank (SCB) holdigs, a leading financial services and digital services holdings in Thailand and ASEAN. As part of the transformation of SCB into a group of product and technology companies, under the SCBx brand, SCB DATAx is the technology company to centralize data and provide AI and data science services and products to the group. With a leading-edge cloud native data & AI platform, our vision is to support the group to providing everyone in our region with the opportunity to prosper. We work on forward-thinking challenges of centralizing, analyzing and sharing information. We collaborate with companies and experts in many different domains, embrace diversity and all that while having a good laugh and joy in work. About Team & Role As a Solution Architect, your role is to design and oversee the implementation of complex technical solutions that address the specific needs of projects or user stories. You will work closely with stakeholders, such as clients, project managers, development, and platform teams to understand their requirements and develop effective solutions. Your Responsibilities Design and develop scalable and robust technical solutions to meet business needs. Collaborate with stakeholders to gather requirements and define project objectives. Create architectural designs and blueprints, ensuring alignment with industry best practices and company standards. Evaluate existing systems and technologies to identify areas for improvement and propose innovative solutions. Provide technical guidance and expertise to development teams during the implementation phase. Ensure the solution's compliance with security, performance, and reliability standards. Conduct feasibility studies and cost/benefit analyses for proposed solutions. Keep abreast of emerging technologies and industry trends to drive innovation and continuous improvement. Lead architectural reviews and provide recommendations for optimization. Support customer success activities by providing technical expertise and participating in client meetings and presentations. Qualifications Required Skills and Qualifications: Bachelor's or master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field. Proven experience as a Solution Architect or similar role, with a focus on Big Data solutions. Strong knowledge of Big Data technologies and frameworks, such as Databricks, Hadoop, Spark, or Apache/Confluent Kafka. Experience in designing and implementing data processing pipelines and ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) workflows, both batch and realtime. Proficiency in programming languages commonly used in Big Data environments, such as Java, Python, or Scala. Understanding of distributed systems and parallel computing concepts. Familiarity with data storage and querying technologies, including NoSQL databases (e.g., MongoDB, Cassandra) and distributed file systems (e.g., HDFS, ADF). Knowledge of data integration and data governance practices in Big Data architectures. Understanding of data warehousing and data modeling concepts. Proficient in SQL and data querying languages. Familiarity with data visualization and reporting tools. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, specifically in the context of Big Data. Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams. Preferred Qualifications for Data Solution Architect: Previous experience in designing and implementing scalable and performant Big Data solutions. Knowledge of cloud-based Big Data platforms, such as Azure Databricks, Azure HDInsight, AWS EMR, Google Cloud Dataproc. Understanding of machine learning and data analytics techniques commonly applied in Big Data environments. Familiarity with real-time streaming and event processing frameworks, such as Apache Kafka, Confluent Kafka or Apache Flink. Experience in optimizing and tuning Big Data applications for performance and efficiency. Certification in relevant Big Data technologies (e.g., Databricks, Apache Kafka or HDInsights certifications). Preferred Qualifications for Cloud Solution Architect: Experience in cloud computing technologies and excellent knowledge of current computing trends especially Microsoft Azure, including their services, features, and pricing models. Designing and deploying solutions that are scalable, secure, reliable, and cost-effective, including knowledge of microservices, serverless, and containerization. Experience in Azure data platform services such as Azure Databricks, Azure Data Lake Storage, Azure Data Factory, Azure ML, Azure CosmosDB and PowerBI. Experience in Active Directory, Azure Identity Management and Azure AD Premium. Experience in Enterprise network & security architecture design. Integration, APIs, API Management software. Development experience in CI/CD DevSecOps environment using Github and Azure DevOps. Knowledge of Azure Security components such as Azure Security Center, Security Operations, Microsoft Defender, Microsoft Azure Solution Architect. Knowledge of cloud monitoring and optimization tools and techniques, including metrics, logs, and alerts, and experience with tools such as Azure Monitor, Azure Log Analytics Workspace, Prometheus, Grafana. Motivated personality and ability to work in self-organized teams. Leader in the space of Cloud with a deep understanding of the project and solutions lifecycle, designing and estimating solutions that not just meet our clients, but far exceed their expectations. Demonstrable Cloud expertise and Cloud solution architecture.

Job Description Consistently create well-designed, tested code using best practices for website development, including mobile and responsive site design Create websites and user interfaces, using standard HTML/CSS practices, while incorporating data from back-end databases and services Create and maintain workflows with teams to provide visibility and to ensure workload balance for consistent visual desiagns Develop or validate testing schedules, addressing all browsers and devices to ensure various computers can access content Integrate data from various back-end web services and databases Ensure cross-browser compatibility of new features Be responsible for maintaining, expanding, and scaling our site Collaborate with web designers to realize visual design intent Qualifications Proven experience as a Web Developer with at least 1+ year of professional experience. Well understanding of Web development fundamentals, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Experienced with any Front-end frameworks  such as Vue, React, Django. Experienced with any Content management systems (CMSs) such as Sanity, DatoCMS, NetlifyCMS. Experienced with CSS Framework and UI Component (eg. ANALYST As a rapidly expanding company with a diverse business, Integrity Thailand is looking for self-motivated and results-oriented individuals with strong qualifications who love to face challenges to grow and succeed. The company is now looking for an Analyst to work in Business Investigation and Compliance, and support other departments. As an Analyst, you will be responsible for carrying out reputational due diligence, background checks, and investigative research by conducting desktop searches and source inquiries as well as coordinating with field researchers and other specialists. The position requires good analytical skills, attention to detail, proficient written English skills as well as good coordination and communication abilities.  Candidates should agree to embrace our core values: Integrity, Reliability, Go the Extra Mile, Excellence, and Innovation. Responsibilities: Complete the assignment from A to Z to meet the objectives of the case Define keywords and conduct comprehensive media and directory searches Prepare detailed Task Briefs Prepare and manage project budgets Allocation and coordination of field work Find potential sources and conduct interviews by phone and/or face-to-face meeting Analyze all data collected from the field and request further explanations Analyze all data collected from media searches and sources Write reports according to requirements Prepare a well-crafted Executive Summary with pertinent and insightful analysis Report developments to the direct supervisor Participate in research and development projects for capacity building Requirements: High level of integrity and professionalism Minimum Bachelor's Degree in any domain Strong analytical skills and attention to detail An understanding of how the regulatory systems work in Thailand is an advantage Comfortable working within deadlines Proficiency in English writing Must be able to multitask Depending on the skills, open to fresh graduates Able to be flexible on job scope evolution If you meet these requirements and you are looking for a new, exciting opportunity within a successful, growing company, then this role is for you! Integrity Thailand is an equal-opportunity employer.

Responsibilities: Lead end-to-end project management activities, including project planning, scope definition, resource allocation, scheduling, and risk management. Coordinate and collaborate with internal teams, external vendors, and stakeholders to ensure seamless project execution and alignment with business objectives. Provide guidance and mentorship to project team members, facilitating effective communication, collaboration, and accountability. Monitor and track project progress, identifying potential risks, issues, and deviations from the plan. Implement appropriate mitigation strategies and corrective actions as needed. Communicate project status, updates, and key milestones to executive leadership, stakeholders, and project team members through regular reports and meetings. Manage project budgets, ensuring financial resources are allocated effectively and cost control measures are in place. Drive continuous improvement by evaluating project management processes, identifying areas for enhancement, and implementing best practices and methodologies. Foster a positive and collaborative work environment, promoting teamwork, innovation, and knowledge sharing within the project team. Strong understanding of project management methodologies, frameworks, and tools. In-depth knowledge of IT infrastructure, software development lifecycle (SDLC), technology projects, and implementation processes. Familiarity with Agile project management methodologies. Excellent leadership and team management skills, with the ability to motivate and inspire cross-functional teams. Exceptional communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively interact with stakeholders at all levels of the organization. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a keen attention to detail. Good command of English.

หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ รับผิดชอบในการเก็บรวบรวม วิเคราะห์ และแปลความหมายของข้อมูล เพื่อให้ได้ข้อมูลที่ เหมาะสมในการตัดสินใจในทีมการตลาด ปฏิบัติงานร่วมกับผู้จัดการการตลาดและผู้เกี่ยวข้องอื่นๆ เพื่อพัฒนากลยุทธ์ข้อมูลที่สอดคล้องกับกลยุทธ์การตลาดโดยรวม เก็บรวบรวมและวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลจากแหล่งที่ต่างกัน โดยใช้เครื่องมือวิเคราะห์สถิติและการ สร้างภาพข้อมูลเพื่อระบุแนวโน้ม รูปแบบ และความเข้าใจที่สามารถใช้ในการตัดสินใจ ให้ข้อมูลเชิงลึกและแนะนำต่อผู้เกี่ยวข้องโดยอิงจากการวิเคราะห์ข้อมูล คุณสมบัติ วุฒิปริญญาตรีหรือปริญญาโท ในสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ในงานวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลการตลาดในบริษัทขนาดใหญ่ มีความรู้เกี่ยวกับระบบการจัดการฐานข้อมูล การเก็บข้อมูลขนาดใหญ่ มีความชำนาญในภาษาโปรแกรมเมอร์ เช่น Python, SQL ประสบการณ์ในเครื่องมือสร้างภาพแสดงข้อมูล เช่น Tableau, PowerBI มีทักษะการคิดวิเคราะห์ข้อมูล ทำความเข้าใจความสัมพันธ์และ เชื่อมโยงระหว่างข้อมูล, ความสามารถในการสืบค้นและแก้ปัญหาอย่างเป็นระบบ มีความความเข้าใจในธุรกิจประกันภัย ผลิตภัณฑ์ กฎระเบียบ และแนวโน้มตลาด รวมถึงความเข้าใจในพฤติกรรมของลูกค้า จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ

Jobtitle: Oracle OFSAA Functional Consultant (Manager Level & Above)
column8: PwC SEAC’s Financial Transformation team,we help our clients define their Finance transformation journey enabled by the latest technology - generating insights to illuminate innovative ideas, creating valuable experiences for customers, achieving huge cost savings or embracing new collaborative mindsets. PwC Consulting has a strong and growing oracle advisory and implementation practice with key focus on EPM,Finance, Procurement and SCM Strategy, technology, delivery and life cycle management. We are seeking enthusiastic and ambitious individuals to join our growing practice to be part of this transformation journey for our clients and our people. PwC Consulting is at the forefront of leading global and locally based banks in South East Asia in meeting the higher international expectations for risk quantification and management. We are a focused team, with technical expertise and international experience, looking to grow our team across Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand, Indonesia, Philippines and Vietnam. We are looking for skilled and collaborative individuals to join our exciting journey in shaping the future of the financial industry. About the role: You’ll be joining our Oracle Consulting services team. As a Certified Oracle Cloud partner, we help our clients use Oracle’s technology and applications to build their digital enterprise on the cloud; transform business functions, including finance, HR, and tax; achieve maximum value on their investment through Managed Cloud Services; and help them manage risk and ‘go live’ on time and on budget. As a Manager or Senior Manager ; you’ll work with the latest technologies and big-name companies on projects that are driving the future of those organizations. Our team are expected to lead client engagements, create new opportunities, and deliver exceptional client value. They will also drive knowledge sharing and care passionately about the development of our people. This role requires a background in Oracle Financial Services Applications and Analytics (OFSAA), particularly in the design, implementation and testing of OFSAA modules (minimum of 3) to support a solution. The ability to support the business to drive out a full business process for solutions that have already been tested through SIT. You will manage a team to link standard OFSAA processes into a full end to end process solution which may include off system processes. Responsibilities: Leading delivery of key aspects of a finance transformation project / program as a leading member of a mixed PwC and client team. General responsibility for the successful delivery of projects focused on end-to-end OFSAA modules like Funds Transfer Pricing (FTP), Profitability Management (PFT), and Asset Liability Management (ALM) together with predefined or custom reporting using Oracle Business Intelligence (OBI) tools. Managing both within and across project workstreams (functional and technical). Building and maintaining long lasting relationships with senior stakeholders with the goal of reaching the status of a trusted advisor. Identifying further business opportunities when working client side. Identifying enhancement opportunities for our clients and deliver value in each stage of implementation/delivery. Driving areas of our finance change thought leadership to transform client’s businesses. Demonstrate Digital Finance thought leadership, working closely with colleagues in Strategy, Finance and Technology Consulting. Development of marketing material (case studies) from successful rollouts to support pre-sales activities. Demonstrate care and commitment to the team and our business. Actively engage with our people to develop junior resources within the firm in-order to enable them to be valued by our clients as experts in their domain. Being available to travel to client sites anywhere in South-east Asia and another region Manage and invest in your own personal development goals as a continued learning opportunity. Essential Skills & Experiences Strong leadership and influencing skills, with the ability to drive to conclusion key decisions with senior leaders and key business stakeholders Strong bias for action and a “solution orientated” attitude. Able to work closely across a diverse multi-workstream program team to expeditiously deliver results. Able to convey ideas and recommendations in a clear, compelling and succinct way in written and verbal communications. Good attention to detail and an ability to analyze and use data in decision making. Experience identifying, diagnosing and resolving issues independently; taking initiative even under unfamiliar or ambiguous circumstances. Experience of business analysis and functional requirements gathering. Stakeholder management and good people skills to gather requirements and agree on specifications. The ability to work effectively and collaboratively across interdisciplinary teams and cultures. Expert knowledge of Oracle Cloud solutions within a multi-supplier, multi-tenancy, multi-release, central government context. Expert knowledge of OFSAA solutions in the Oracle Cloud product set. Experience in a minimum of four OFSAA implementations. Experience in the Oracle database and SQL. Knowledge of financial instruments (deposit, loans, treasury and corporate bills/bonds, equities, and financial derivatives.) Knowledge of general ledger accounting and income/cost allocation. Able to generate insights from client data in relation to financial market conditions/regulations and present recommendations to client senior management. Minimum of 5 years of experience in OFSAA, EPM/ERM. Experience of working with configurable package solutions or large IT projects. Broad knowledge of Oracle Cloud ERP modules and functionality. Knowledge in any of the additional OFSAA modules (Financial Crime and Compliance Management; Capital Adequacy; Liquidity Risk Management; Market Risk Measurement and Management; Credit Risk Management; Enterprise Stress Testing and Capital Planning Analytics; and/or International Financial Reporting Standards.) Knowledge of financial valuation methods and risk measurement approaches. Knowledge of various project management methodologies (traditional, agile, etc.) including tools (MS Project, Jira, etc.). Background in Banking, Finance services & business, Consulting, Accounting & Auditing would be a plus.

About Bluebik – Ambition to Reality Bluebik is the leading consultancy focusing on comprehensive advice on digital transformation to transform the capabilities of our clients through technological application. We provide transformation consulting consists of Management Consulting – advice on strategies and management, Digital Excellence & Delivery covering in-depth recommendations on digital and technological development within organizations, Strategic PMO – advice on tangible benefits and significant cost saving through clients’ business process, Big Data & Advanced Analytics – provide end to end solution for Big Data & Advanced Analytics from strategy to implementation. About the role Construct robust technology platforms to compete in a rapidly changing and dynamic market. If you are well-equipped with technical expertise and management skills, join us to help the leading companies of various industries to compete in a rapidly changing and dynamic market by developing and constructing technology platforms. Work you will do Coordinate with development team to provide system support including technical engineering Coordinate with team on system development and deployment Perform complicated work as assigned including product design, system development and create new technique to enhance software application effectivenessEnsure that projects are delivered as scheduled with good quality follow the requirements from client Review and control project documents and reports such as Software Specification, User Manual, Test Script and other related documents Review product quality and fix problem to control the operation Provide guidance, consultation and technical support to team Develops workflow, risk assess to enhance team quality and effectiveness Develop system specification including test plans for each product Design and develop software services Develop unit test plan and integration testing Analyze up-front requirements, model data design and plan capacity Develop web-based software using .Net, ASP.Net, C#, C++ or Web Application technologies Coordinate with other teams for a smooth operation Generate ad-hoc as requested Let us Talk About You If you are someone with: Bachelor’s degrees in computer science, Computer Engineering or related field 1 - 3 years of experience in software development field Good knowledge in coding Java and Web Application Good programming skill (Should be able to write quality code when requested) Good command of written and spoken English and Thai Good interpersonal skill Enthusiastic, Leadership, Detail-Oriented and Teamwork Why work with us We are a team of experts in a talented community, a collaborative atmosphere where creativity is encouraged. People First, by putting people at the heart of our priorities, we foster a work environment where you can excel and grow personally and professionally. Bluebik is strived for growth and expansion, and you can be part of our success story. We combine strategy, digital delivery excellence and deep technology advisory to help our clients transform their business. At Bluebik, your career advancement starts with actions. You can manage your own career and will advance based on performance. We collaborate to create unique and outstanding experiences with our talents to empower learning and growth opportunities. Whatever your ambitions, Bluebik offers you with a highly inclusive community of talents from both tech and business worlds to realize your full potential. What we offer We offer impactful and challenging work with mentorship and support from direct managers and subject matter experts. You will have autonomy to manage your career path with endless opportunities for professional growth. Our comprehensive benefit package covers medical insurance, life, accident and disability insurance, wellness allowance, vaccination allowance, providence fund, flexible working arrangement, and Professional certification. Bluebik provides opportunities to become the best version of yourself! Equal opportunity Bluebik is an equal opportunity employer. We owe our success to the talents of our diverse team and the varying perspectives they add to our thriving community. Recruitment agencies Bluebik does not accept unsolicited resumes sent by recruiting agencies. Please do not forward resumes to our job postings, Bluebik employees or other parts of the business. Bluebik will not be liable to pay any fees to agencies for candidates hired as a result of unrequested resumes.

At CDG, a business analyst is the bridge between business ideas and technology capabilities. Our business analysts play an incredibly important role in bringing enhancements to various businesses on a global scale. They analyze business challenges and identify possible solutions. You will be assigned to an impactful project, gain hands-on experience, and work alongside a team of fun and open-mined work culture. Responsibilities: Get requirement from users. Responsible to analysis and design according to requirement. Designed and Analysis process of project responsibility. Able to transform business requirement to technical solution. Control and Manage application development to SDLC and project responsibility. Provide guidance and consultation to user. Create document to support project (Functional specification, High Level Design specification and User Manual). Qualifications: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineer, IT or related fields. Experience in analyst design and gathering requirement from users. Having experience in Responsive Web Design and designing Native Mobile Application should be advantage. Have DBMS knowledge in Oracle DB2 or SQL Server. Self-motivated, smart working strong analytical & problem solving skills. Strong analytical skill, conceptual thinking and problem solving, communication and interpersonal skill. Job Description Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand project requirements and contribute to the technical design of backend systems Develop, test, and maintain server-side applications and APIs using industry-standard programming languages and frameworks Design and implement scalable and secure database architectures Implement data security and user authentication measures Collaborate with Front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server side logic Build reusable code and libraries for future use Stay updated on industry trends and emerging technologies, and propose improvements to current systems Qualifications Proven experience as a Backend Developer with at least 2 years of professional experience. column8: Job Description ออกแบบสถาปัตยกรรมข้อมูลเพื่อตอบสนองความต้องการของธุรกิจ ทั้งด้านการดำเนินงาน และการวิเคราะห์ข้อมูล ให้คำแนะนำการออกแบบฐานข้อมูลให้เป็นไปตามมาตรฐานของบริษัท และตอบสนองความต้องการทั้งด้านการดำเนินงาน และการวิเคราะห์ข้อมูล ศึกษาค้นคว้าเทคโนโลยีที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการบริหารจัดการข้อมูล และวางแผนการนำมาประยุกต์ใช้ในองค์กร รวบรวมและจัดทำแบบจำลองข้อมูล (Data Model) และทะเบียนข้อมูล (Data Catalog) ที่มีอยู่ในองค์กร ดำเนินการหรือให้คำแนะนำในการทำ Data Migration จัดทำ Data Mapping สำหรับการทำ Data Migration / Data Integration Qualification ปริญญาตรีหรือสูงกว่าสาขาวิทยาการเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ / วิทยาศาสตร์คอมพิวเตอร์ / วิศวกรรมคอมพิวเตอร์ หรือ สาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง ประสบการณ์ 5-10 ปี ด้านการออกแบบสถาปัตยกรรมข้อมูล การพัฒนาระบบเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ หรือการจัดการฐานข้อมูล Technical Skill มีความรู้เกี่ยวกับระบบจัดการฐานข้อมูล มีความรู้และประสบการณ์ด้านการออกแบบสถาปัตยกรรมข้อมูล มีความรู้และประสบการณ์ด้านการทำ Data Migration มีความรู้และประสบการณ์ด้านการออกแบบฐานข้อมูล  (Relationship / Foreign Key) สามารถใช้งานโปรแกรม Spreadsheet  (Excel / Google Sheets) และ Presentation (PowerPoint / Google Slide) ได้เป็นอย่างดี เคยมีประสบการณ์ในการเขียนโปรแกรม อย่างน้อย 1 ภาษา Soft Skill การนำเสนองาน การเรียบเรียงเนื้อหาที่จะนำเสนอ / การทำ Slide Presentation สามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้ โดยเฉพาะการฟัง / การอ่าน

(Backup and Disaster recovery planning). Create, design and maintain IT documentation for information systems infrastructure. Competence to prevent risk and IT security issue management. IT Security. column8: Job Description: นำเสนอ การเชื่อมโยงของข้อมูลการขาย และจัดสรรการนำไปใช้งาน ของสำนักบริหารผลิตภัณฑ์ เพื่อการตัดสินใจที่ถูกต้อง แม่นยำ ในแต่ละกลุ่มสินค้า รวมถึงการให้ความเห็นการใช้ข้อมูลให้เกิดประสิทธิผลด้านการขายสูงสุด เฝ้าระวัง ตรวจสอบ และสังเกตข้อมูลยอดขายในทุกมิติ เช่น ยอดขาย, %กำไร, จำนวนลูกค้า, ยอดขายต่อใบเสร็จ, ตัวสินค้า, อื่น ๆ เป็นรายตัวสินค้า เพื่อสร้าง สนับสนุนให้ยอดขายเติบโต ตามเป้าหมายสายงาน หรือที่องค์กรตั้งไว้ ประเมินผล และติดตามผล การวัดผลเป้าหมาย (สายงานการตลาด) ด้าน ยอดขาย, %กำไร, รายได้อื่น ๆ, จำนวนสินค้าใหม่, สินค้า Differentiate, สินค้าที่เป็น Rank A B เพื่อให้เป็นไปตามเป้าหมายที่สายงานตั้งไว้ Qualification: ปริญญาตรี-โท สาขาสถิติ บริหารธุรกิจ หรือสาขาอื่น ๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์อย่างน้อย 2 ปี ในด้านสถิติ การบริหารจัดการข้อมูล หรือประสบการณ์ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการวิเคราะห์และสนับสนุนการขายในเชิงกลยุทธ์ มีทักษะการคิดวิเคราะห์ ตัดสินใจ แก้ไขปัญหา และนำเสนอ มีทักษะด้านมนุษยสัมพันธ์ และการประสานงาน มีความรู้ด้าน IT โครงสร้างระบบ ปฏิบัติงานที่ อาคาร CP Tower สีลม (BTS ศาลาแดง)

Job Summary : Project managers are responsible for managing projects, leading teams to deliver projects, and ensuring the quality and time plan. Manage resources, schedules, financials, and quality of systems development life cycle. This also includes management of issues, risks, and project change requests to ensure project delivery, commitments, and goals. Job Responsibilities : Developing, implementing, and maintaining (keeping up to date) the Management Plan, which includes the work plan and other guiding documentation such as configuration management plan (e.g., enforcing baselines), risk management, change control, project budgeting, cost tracking and status reporting procedures Identify required resources based on appropriate competencies and proficiencies level in response to the roles within the projects. Assign and manage tasks, activities, and dependencies according to the schedule. Create and deliver progress report to the management team and seek appropriate decisions / directions / approvals. Provide necessary support and guidance to project team members and PMO team. Coordinate and facilitate with related parties for required meetings, and workshops. Identify & manage risks and issues by assigning appropriate responsible personnel; make appropriate validations and adjustments in response to risk and issue found; track mitigation and / or resolutions actions. Lead vendor selection process from request for information, evaluation, scoring, scope & price negotiation until contract is signed. Knowledge, Skills, and Competency : Bachelor’s or master’s degree in business administration, Management Information Systems, Software Engineering, Computer Science or related field (Master’s is preferred) 5+ years of experience in project management, IT delivery, or IT consulting (Experience in software delivery, financial industry is preferred) Strong problem analysis, analytic & systematic thinking, good human relations, mature and good interpersonal skills Experienced with system or software development methodologies, including agile project management or agile development. Good in teamwork and collaboration and positive attitude. Ability to work effectively under pressure, self-motivated and goal oriented. Good command of English (Speaking, Writing, Reading, Listening) Workplace: SCB Park (Plaza West Building) Work Schedule : Mon -Fri, 8:30 - 17:30

Enterprise Architect Helps to develop, maintain and govern the Enterprise Architecture program across the organization Interfaces across all business areas, acting as visionary to proactively assist in defining the direction for future architecture states Advises on options, risks, costs versus benefits, system impacts, and technology priorities Works with business leaders to understand business requirements and help them understand how technology tradeoffs influence strategy Provides strategic consultation to clients and IT Leaders Provides overall direction, guidance and definition of an enterprise’s architecture to effectively support the corporate business strategy Works on highly complex enterprise-wide projects that require in-depth knowledge across multiple architecture domains Creates an enterprise-wide architecture perspective within or across multiple architecture domains Shows technical expertise and leadership within one or multiple architecture domains below: o   Business Architecture: leads the enterprise-wide technical and business discussions relative to future enterprise direction; aligns architecture strategy with enterprise goals; defines, explains and advocates the enterprise’s IT strategies o   Data: creates enterprise-wide data strategy and consolidates an enterprise view of data across multiple lines of business; provides guidelines and standards for cataloging and maintaining data repositories; reviews and approves the principles that guide data-related decisions for the enterprise o   Application: performs the analysis and design tasks related to the development of a solution architecture based on enterprise business drivers; defines the principles to guide solution decisions for the enterprise; designs and leads the implementation of an solution architecture based on enterprise business requirements and strategy o   Technology: leads analysis of technology industry and market trends to determine their potential impact on the enterprise architecture; reviews and approves the principles that guide technology decisions for the enterprise Working Location:  currently Hybrid at 1. Silom Head office  2. Rama 3 If you require more information, please contact K.Suvaluck Tel. 063-213-4315

Jobtitle: Cyber Risk : Consultant - Senior Consultant (Information Protection and Data...
Company: Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Jaiyos Advisory Co., Ltd.
column8: Cyber Risk Services (CRS) is one of the practice Risk Advisory (RA). CRS is comprised of professionals with a broad range of information technology and risk management consulting skills. CRS professionals focus on information systems and technology that manage risk and/or drive operational, financial and regulatory compliance processes; as well as solutions that manage the risk associated with information technology itself. These professionals perform implementation, assessments, remediation and integration of end-to-end solutions in these areas. They also deliver advisory services focused on risk and compliance to IT management and senior executives. Responsibilities : Translate data protection and privacy requirements into business processes, scenarios and project implementations for our clients towards elaborating risk-mitigating and remediation plans. Design legal and operational mechanisms to be adopted by clients on various aspects of personal data and privacy (e.g. privacy notices, DPO assistance, international data transfers, etc.). Develop our data protection and privacy services in Thailand by helping our clients to define strategies for risk-based data governance. Advise on legal, operational and technical risks and put in place mitigating controls while leveraging our multidisciplinary capabilities and tools. Apply problem solving skills in line with our Deloitte methodology on engagements. Develop excellent oral and written communication skills in order to establish working relationships with clients. Build industry knowledge to understand data protection, data governance and privacy issues relevant to specific business activities and technologies. Qualifications : Bachelor or Master degree preferably in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems, Accounting Information Systems or other related fields Familiarity with standards, frameworks and privacy laws such as ISO/IEC 27701, ISO/IEC 27001, COBIT, ITIL, GDPR, PDPA would be a plus Holding one or more professional certifications would be a plus e.g. CIPP/E, CIPP/A, CDMP, CIPM, CIPT, CISSP, CISM, CISA, ISO/IEC 27001 Experienced in Data Loss Protection, Data Classification, Data Governance and/or Privacy is advantage Good analytical and decision-making skills supported by clear communication and presentation skills Out-of-the-box thinking to help our clients address the data protection and privacy challenges in Thailand and across Asia All application will be treated strictly confidential. *Eligible applicants must be legally authorized to work in Thailand. Human Resources Department Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Jaiyos Co., Ltd. AIA Sathorn Tower, 23rd - 27th Floor, 11/1 South Sathorn Road, Yannawa, Sathorn, Bangkok, 10120, Thailand Tel: +66 (0) 2034 0000 | Fax: +66 (0) 2034 0100 Website: www.deloitte.com/careers [link removed]

Jobtitle: Internal Auditor/ผู้ตรวจสอบภายใน
column8: Crown Seal Public Company Limited Crown Seal Public Company Limited is a manufacturer and distributor of Crown caps, Pilfer-Proof caps, Maxi-Crown, Maxi-Cap, Maxi-P and Plastic caps used as bottling and container seals for products namely carbonated drinks, milk, beer, liquor, soda, drinking water and medical supplies including the hand-held capping machine and Maxi-Cap sealing machine.  Furthermore the company also earns the revenue from the printed sheets service. We have been awarded ISO9001:2015, ISO14001:2004, GMP, HACCP, FSSC22000:2015 and OHSAS18001:2007/TIS18001:2554 certifications of excellence in management. We are requiring dynamic and highly skilled professionals to join our business in the following positions: Internal Auditor Job Description : To develop risk-based annual audit plan detailing the scope, nature and timing of audit To do preliminary survey and assess what type of risks are contained, assess risk level according to risk assessment to evaluate the sufficient of internal control of function audited To design internal audit programs To deliver objectives of internal audit To review accuracy, timeliness and relevance of financial information and other To prepare audit report in line with approved audit plan To monitor timely implementation of management actions recommended in the audit report To monitor and improve all operations’ processes with recommendations and action plans Qualifications: Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Accounting, Finance, Economics, Marketing, Information Technology, or any fields in Engineering At least 1-2 years of experience in internal audit CIA, CPIAT or CPA certifications would be an advantage Strong knowledge of IT Internal Auditor and IT data research is a big plus Strong analytical and problem solving skills Multi-tasking, service-minded and able to work well under pressure Ability of priority management and deadline meeting Excellent interpersonal and communication skills Ability of English communications and computer literacy especially MS Office Extremely honest and ethical Benefit Package: Uniforms Food Allowance Transportation Services Full Medical Care in Govt. Hospitals and Dental Treatment Annual Check-up Provident Fund: Max Contribution 10% Long Service Award Perfect Attendance Bonus Annual Bonus

Report project issue and project risk in timely manner. Have in-depth knowledge of SAP functionality and configuration Experience in SAP implementation for food manufacturing preferred. Bachelor’s degree or higher degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, or any related. Fluent in Thai and business proficiency level of English Excellent leadership, communication and interpersonal skills An innate collaborator capable of initiating, inspiring and managing action. Enjoy rigorous analysis and data in shaping recommendations, rather than conventional wisdom alone. Strong time-management, multi-tasking and sense of ownership Sensitive and respectful to the multi-cultural environment Willingness to challenge new things by leveraging SAP skills and knowledge

column8: Software Engineer Specialist / Team Lead (Fintech) Ownership of technical design, code development, testing, maintenance and improvement Responsibilities : Ownership of technical design, code development, testing, maintenance and improvement Provide leadership, collaboration, mentor, technical documentation and knowledge sharing among team members Define the technical designs and solutions which meet functional and non-functional requirements, including quality, security, and performance, within a committed timeline. Manage the end-to-end life cycle for the production of software applications, including code development and component test execution to demonstrate alignment to the functional specification. Fixing and performance tuning applications. Collaborate with cross-functional teams of product and development to deliver workflows and product features, work closely with department head, product owners, project managers, scrum master, and designers. Qualifications  : At least a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Sciences, Software Engineering, Management Information System or equivalent experience. At least 7 years of IT experience in software development in developing web applications and client/server applications. Experience developing the front end web applications with open source components with knowledge of React / Redux, VueJS , JavaScript, Web pack, Node.js, HTML5 Familiarity with UX design principles for web applications, mobile applications Experience developing frontend application using asynchronous and event driven technique Experience developing and consuming web-based Restful APIs with Java, Spring Framework and their ecosystem + OAuth2 with JWT principle. Experience developing the cross-platform mobile applications with ReactNative or Flutter Experience in MySQL, MongoDB for database management Experience in caching principle Experience in Elastic Search is a plus Strong experience with common development tool set Git and Docker Experienced in Cloud Platform / AWS Ability to provide development solutions in accordance with SCRUM Agile Software Development Life-Cycle methodologies Participate in performance code reviews and troubleshoot development issues. Familiar with software design patterns, architectural design patterns but also know where to be dogmatic and where to be pragmatic and able to make trade offs when required. Respect for the code that was written before them approaching open source or legacy code base with an "opportunity mindset”. Eager to learn and understand the domain, the business side of the company. Familiarity with Cloud, Kubernetes and NoSQLs is a plus. Works in an Agile environment and continuously reviews the business needs, refines priorities, outlines milestones and deliverables, and identifies opportunities and risks. Translates product roadmap features into well-defined product requirements including features, user stories, and acceptance criteria. Prioritizes and maintains the sprint backlog for assigned products, balancing the requirements of stakeholders. Develops and maintains appropriate tracking and reporting of product performance post-launch to evaluate future investment. About you: 5+ years work experience in product management Proven track record of managing all aspects of a successful product throughout its lifecycle Proven ability to develop product strategies and effectively communicate recommendations to executive management Proven technical background with understanding and/or hands-on experience in software development/technologies Strong problem solving skills and willingness to roll up one’s sleeves to get the job Skilled at working effectively with cross functional teams in a matrix organization Excellent written and verbal communication skills

Jobtitle: Business Analysis and Management Report Analyst
column8: Job Purpose: Provide analysis and insight by using data or statistical method and prepare the presentation on sales performance and analysis to Management. Key Responsibilities: Business Analysis Develop, implement, and maintain leading-edge analytics systems, taking complicated problems and building simple frameworks Identify trends and opportunities through analysis of complex datasets, supporting by insights from sales team, for decision making by partners and organizational stakeholders Create and maintain rich interactive visualizations to present insights and analysis to related stakeholders Design best-practice reports based on data mining, analysis, and visualization for tracking purposes Management Report Prepare sales performance update, insight, and analysis in required format for sale performance discussion forums Ensure up-to-date contents and information provided, relating to current strategic plan and focus Baseline Qualifications: Bachelor or master's degree in Computer Science, Business, Statistics, or related fields At least 5 years of experience in Insurance business and/or Banking business and/or financial industry Business analysis and presentation skills Good command in English both verbal and written Proactive, Open, Caring, Commit, Innovative

Jobtitle: IT Sales Executive / Inside Sales Representative / Outside Sales Representative
column8: Job Description: - Candidates are to work as Sales Executive or Inside Sales Rep or Outside Sales Rep depending on his/her capabilities and experience. (IT solutions and consulting services) List of related tasks are as below. Experience in Sales. (IT solutions or IT consulting services experience will be an advantage.) [Outside Sales Rep] Explore new opportunities and finding more potential customers (Focus on new customer expansion / New account) [Inside Sales Rep] Greet potential client. Direct customers to the solutions and services that best meet their need and close the sales. Understand customer need and work closely with presales team & concerned parties for detailed solution demonstration. Approach and present company’s solutions and services. Following up and negotiating the terms of agreement and closing sales Submit sales report (Sales forecast, Leads Report, Weekly progress report etc.) Increase customer satisfaction and build customer royalty. Lead generation. (Candidate with lead generation experience will be an advantage.) Qualifications: - Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Information Technology, Management Information System, Accounting Information System, Computer Science, Engineering or related fields Experience in IT industry (or IT-related solution/service) is an advantage. Experience in enterprise solution selling is a plus. Good command of written and spoken English. Pleasant personality. Self-motivated & Continuous-Learning Mindset. Excellent presentation skill. Has driving license and own car is an advantage. ** To register for this position, applicant must specify clearly that he / she applies for “IT Sales Executive / Inside Sales Representative / Outside Sales Representative” ** Interested applicants are invited to apply in person or send application with full resume indicating qualifications and experience, transcript, expected salary and recent photo to: ZyGen Company Limited 65/60 Chamnan Phenjati Business Center Tower 6th floor, Rama 9 road, Huaykwang, Bangkok 10310 Tel: +662 612 2116-17 Fax: +662 643 8017 Human Resource Department

Jobtitle: IT Manager (SAP Environment) – Leading Enterprise Company
column8: Location: Bangkok (BTS/ MRT) Cathcart Associates is pleased to present an interesting opportunity for an ERP IT Manager to join a prominent enterprise company operating in the dynamic food manufacturing industry. In this role you will have the unique opportunity to contribute to the development and enhancement of the SAP system, ensuring it aligns with global standards. You will also collaborate on captivating projects alongside overseas subsidiaries, providing you with a truly international experience. This is a chance to showcase your expertise and make a significant impact within a cutting-edge organization that values innovation and continuous improvement. Responsibilities: Develop and implement solution roadmaps for new technologies Manage all applications and digital assets, including SAP and RPA systems Develop and monitor IT service level agreements (SLAs) Support and advise business units on access management and compliance Review and assess application performance and user satisfaction Lead incident and problem management for applications Control costs and budgets related to IT applications Lead IT projects and change management efforts Develop and execute a people development plan Qualifications: Bachelor’s or master’s degree in computer science or related field Over 15 years of experience in IT application management, IT Business Partnering, or Digital Transformation Good command of English Have experience in full lifecycle SAP implementation experience in any modules (FICO, MM, PP, QM, SD, PM) Project management skills and the ability to manage multiple projects If this sounds like a match to your skills, please apply or do not hesitate to contact me at 094-698-0641 , K.Alice, ERP Consultant .

column8: Responsibilities: • เข้าใจภาพรวมกระบวนการทำงานและวัฒนธรรมของบริษัท • วิเคราะห์กระบวนการ การทำงานในระบบให้สอดคล้องกับความต้องการทางธุรกิจภายใต้มาตรฐานบัญชีและ กฏเณฑ์อื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง • แก้ไขปัญหาจากการใช้งาน SAP ภายใต้ Module (SD, MM) • ปรับปรุงรอยต่อของขั้นตอนการทำงานของแต่ละแผนกเพื่อสร้างความเชื่อมโยงของระบบ • ดูแลการใช้งานของระบบ SAP ประสานงานทั้งหมดทุกฟังชั่นการใช้งานของระบบ ERP • ให้คำแนะนำพนักงานภายในให้สามารถใช้งานระบบได้อย่างถูกต้อง • รับแจ้งปัญหาจากพนักงานภายในรวมถึงวิเคราะห์และหาวิธีการแก้ปัญหาที่เกิดขึ้น • ดูแล User license ในระบบรวมถึงการให้สิทธิที่สอดคล้องกับหน้าที่ของผู้ใช้ • ออกแบบความต้องการเพิ่มเติม (Change Requirement) การเปลี่ยนแปลงข้อมูลหลัก (Config) วิเคราะห์ถึง ผลกระทบที่เกิดขึ้นได้อย่างครบถ้วน ทำการแก้ไขหรือสามารถเขียน Functional Specification เพื่อให้ Programmer แก้ไข • พัฒนาความรู้ควำมสามารถของตนเองให้สอดคล้องกับเทคโนโลยีใหม่ ๆ อย่างต่อเนื่อง โดยการเข้าอบรม หลักสูตรที่เกี่ยวข้องกับสายงาน และการศึกษาค้นคว้าด้วยตนเอง Qualification Primary education Level/Experience: Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology Experience in business ERP program at least 3 years Specialized Knowledge/Skills:  Knowledge, Accounting Skills, IT Skills ERP system Communication and coordination skills Language ABAP

Scope of work A Business Analyst is a professional who is responsible for identifying and defining the business needs of an organization and helping to find solutions to business problems. Business Analyst will be involved in projects ranging from process improvement to the implementation of new systems. Job Description: Show skills in making workflow charts, entity models, business flows, and writing documents that list system or product needs for better project planning. Find out business needs by looking closely at data and talking to stakeholders, focusing on main problems. Create and draw out solution needs, making sure they match with what the business needs. Talk clearly with everyone involved to make sure they understand and agree with the proposed solution. Also, take part in risk management to prevent and handle any problems that might come up in the project. Other duties may be assigned by the supervisor. Qualification: Bachelor's degree or higher in business or computer science with a strong understanding of business models and processes. Minimum 1 years’ experience in translating business models into presentations using tools such as the Business Model Canvas, workflow diagrams, sequence diagrams, and use cases, etc. Demonstrated knowledge of basic business concepts and operations.

KPMG Thailand’s Financial Risk Management (FRM) banking advisory team advises clients on the development and implementation of data analytic, data-driven business, mathematic modelling, systems and controls. The scope of the work covers the full panoply of data analytic, such as data processing, data cleansing, data validating, big data analysis, data visualization and the prevention of money laundering and terrorist financing applying business sense and communication skills to influence how the organization tackles various business challenges. We are looking for experienced consultants to join our growing and talented team.
