Company: Thai Life Insurance Public Company Limited
column8: Thai Life is hiring an experienced Project Manager who will take responsibilities of IT and/or Business projects with the goal of delivering on project timeline, within scope and budgeting. Job Responsibilities: Manage internal resources and/or third parties/vendors for the flawless execution of projects. Ensure all projects are delivered on timeline, within scope and budgeting. Direct team members the definition of project scope and objectives, involving all relevant stakeholders and ensuring technical feasibility. Lead, coach and motivate project team members on a proactive basis. Complete work breakdown structure to estimate effort required for each task Ensure resource availability and allocation within company's projects portfolio. Develop a detailed project plan to monitor and track progress. Manage changers to the project scope, schedule, and costs using approbate verification techniques. Resolve any issues and solve projects throughout the project life cycle. Measure project performance KPI using appropriate tools and techniques. Report project status and escalate issues to management as needed. Clearly communicate expectations to team members and stakeholder. Successfully manage the relationship with all stakeholders Perform risk management to minimize project risks. Establish and maintain relationships with third parties and/or vendor. Create and maintain comprehensive project documentation. Qualifications: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Accounting, Finance, Business or similar related degree 10 years proven working experience track in project management/project manager in the IT consulting and/or information technology industry Solid technical background with understanding and/or hands-on experience in software development (In-House software development is a plus) Experience in implementing ERP or large software applications preferred Strong analytical and problem solving skills Effective interpersonal skills (presentation, written and oral) and the ability to communicate effectively with a variety of staff and client levels Strong positive attitude, highly motivated and a self-starter Ability to work effectively as a team player with internal and external team members Ability to set priorities and meet deadlines in a dynamic, autonomous environment Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English and Thai Solid organizational skills including attention to detail and multi-tasking skills Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Office and Google Application PMP / PRINCE II Certification is a plus Thai Life Insurance Public Company Limited 123 Thai Life Insurance Building 1, Ratchadaphisek Road, Dindaeng, Dindaeng, Bangkok 10400

Jobtitle: Project Manager (Banking and Financial service Background)
column8: Our ideal Technical Project Manager is a professional Project Manager with digital transformation delivery experience in the Financial Services sectors implementing digital products & experiences. Digital Transformation project leadership experience delivered via Agile approaches is the sweet-spot for this role for this game-changing full-stack Neo-Bank enablement platform company. This is an exciting mission-critical role and a perfect opportunity for passionate highly skilled financial technology Project Management professionals to leave their mark with our pioneering, disruptive & well-financed FinTech disruptor. Responsibilities: Work closely with Product Owners to understand and deliver Product Backlog & Roadmap Manage development & delivery of project iterations and drive sprint releases Manage business requirements per Product Backlog Guide team in time estimating practices and facilitates team estimates Drive team iteration execution, communicate with management and stakeholders w/ diligent Change Control discipline Manage project conflicts, challenges and dynamic business requirements to keep operations running at a high performance Able to do post mortem and root cause analysis to help teams continuously improve their practices to ensure maximum productivity Leads team effort in relentless improvement, define and implement improvement stories to increase the velocity and quality of the program Proactively identify and eliminate impediments and facilitate flow Monitoring project progress and implementing changes where necessary. Monitoring expenditures in accordance with the budget. Ensuring compliance with objectives, organizational policies, procedures, and standards. Compiling & communicating project control reporting Requirements: Bachelor Degree | Master Degree in Technology, Computer Science, Project Management or related 5+ Years in IT Consulting | Digital Project Management | Software Development Leadership 2+ Years Agile Delivery leading Sprints Experience in Financial Services Technology –Delivery | Operations | Project Management | Development Thrives in a highly collaborative, fast paced environment Deep understanding of the fundamentals of iterative and incremental development Strong knowledge of Scrum theory, rules and practices

Requirements: 3-5 years of experience in developing RESTful APIs using PHP Laravel. Strong understanding and experience in software development as part of a team, including various processes and methodologies. Highly responsible and committed to meeting deadlines. Ability to work on both Proof of Concept (POC) and production projects. Experience in medical-related software development is a plus and will be considered favorably. Responsibilities: Design and develop RESTful APIs for web and mobile applications using PHP Laravel. Collaborate with the in-house research team to plan and coordinate project tasks. Provide guidance and assistance to the development team in problem-solving. Ensure timely completion of assigned tasks and take responsibility for their successful delivery. Possess a flexible mindset and adapt to changes effectively.

We are using Vue.js, HTML5, Boostrape, and DevExtreme Javascript framework to build our frontend. Python 3, CherryPy and SqlAlchemy with Redis to build our backend infrastructure. We are looking for Programmer to Work with our team to build web application frontend and /or backend. Maintain and improve our existing web applications. What you’ll Need: Associate’s or Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field. 1-4 years of experience in IT support, customer service, or a related field. Jobtitle: Oil well casing Data Analysis-Inspection Engineer (Mechanical / Electrical...
column8: Oil well casing Data Analyst (Inspection Engineer) – Oil & Gas, Chemical Industry – (2 Week Rotations – Thailand and Australia / (Only candidates Authorized to work in Australia). We are seeking 3 highly motivated Australian or New Zealand nationals to join our team in the role of Data Analyst with few years or experiences for our state-of-the-art oil well inspection technology. This exciting once in a lifetime opportunity provides the right person with the chance to enter the oil and gas industry and enjoy 2 weeks on and 2 weeks off rotation with off time spent in Thailand and on time spent in Australia. Thai work visa and all associated benefits will be provided including flights to and from Australia for each rotation. You do not need to have specific skills however data analysis. we are looking for bright and enthusiastic people with an excellent attitude and the willingness and ability to learn the process of data analysis. The job will be based out of our Thailand Headquarters in Ban Chang, Rayong. Responsibilities Undergo initial training in data analysis and UT inspection techniques. 2 weeks in Australia on a land-based oil and gas site working with our teams to analyse data from our inspection tools (full accommodation and food provided). Provide technical support to resolve any issues identified during inspections, working closely with engineering and maintenance teams. Being the face of Dexon on site in Australia. Requirements and skills Must have the right to live and work in Australia. Must be able to follow strict guidelines regarding health and safety. The drive to make the most of an amazing opportunity. Must be a team player across all cultures. Switched on, proactive and keen to learn and develop. Graduated from Mechanical / Electrical Engineer What does a Data Analyst do? Oil Rig crews lower our inspection tool into an oil well. When the tool comes back up the data analyst retrieves the inspection data from the tool and analyses immediately on site to give a quick view report to the customer within 2 hours before the data is sent back to Thailand for a full and final analysis by our team. What will life on site be like? Quality of life on Australian mine sites and oil and gas sites is a high priority and is required to keep staff happy in the job and improve retention. You can expect your own room and all meals to be provided along with other activities during site down time. What will be my working hours? You will work 2 weeks on and then have 2 weeks off. Whilst you are on site you will work between 10 to 12 hours per day (never exceeding 12 hours). Who are my career progression opportunities? The career progression opportunities are endless and without boundaries. For driven and successful people there are no limits to your career and with offices all over the world the possibility for international work is endless.

รายละเอียดงาน พัฒนา Mobile application เพื่อรองรับการดำเนินธุรกิจ Support การทำงานของระบบภายในของบริษัทที่เกี่ยวข้อง คุณสมบัติ ไม่จำเป็นต้องมีประสบการณ์ ยินดีรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่ วุฒิการศึกษา: ปริญญาตรี ทำงานวันจันทร์ - เสาร์ (สามารถหยุดได้ 2 เสาร์ต่อเดือน) มีความรู้เกี่ยวกับ technology เกี่ยวกับการพัฒนา Mobile app ถ้าสามารถเขียนภาษา Java หรือ Kotlin หรือ Swift หรือ Dart (Flutter) จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ (ไม่จำเป็นต้องทำเป็น ณ. ตอนสมัครก็สามารถสมัครได้) เป็นคนเปิดกว้าง มีความตั้งใจพร้อมศึกษาและสนใจในการเรียนรู้เทคโนโลยีใหม่ๆ มีความรู้ความเข้าใจในการใช้งาน SQL เบื้องต้น เคยใช้งาน Tools ต่างๆที่เกี่ยวกับการจัดการทั่วไปด้านการพัฒนาโปรแกรม (e.g. git) We offer competitive remuneration package, pleasant working atmosphere , security and long term career growth to the successful candidates. Please send an application letter , together with detailed resume stating present income package to :- บริษัทฯ เสนอผลตอบแทนอย่างงดงาม พร้อมด้วยบรรยากาศการทำงานที่ดี มีความมั่นคง และโอกาสความก้าวหน้าให้กับผู้ที่ได้รับการคัดเลือก กรุณาส่งจดหมายสมัครงาน พร้อมประวัติส่วนตัวโดยละเอียดและระบุเงินเดือนที่ได้รับใบปัจจุบัน มาที่ Mass Marketing Co., Ltd. 905/4 Rama 3 Road, Yannawa, Bangkok 10120  Tel: 0-2683-0333 Fax: 0-2683-0345 บริษัท แมส มาร์เกตติ้ง จำกัด    905/4 ถ.พระราม3 เขตยานนาวา กรุงเทพฯ 10120 โทร. 0-2683-0333 แฟกซ์ 0-2683-0345

Scope of work: As the Head of Business Analyst, you will lead the business analyst team, work closely with clients to clarify business objectives and processes, analyze business requirements, and collaborate with cross functional teams to drive effective solutions and achieve business objectives. Responsibilities: Lead and mentor the business analyst team, fostering a collaborative and productive work environment. Engage with clients to understand their business objectives, processes, and challenges, and clarify requirements through effective communication and active listening. Analyze current business processes, identifying gaps, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, and collaborate with stakeholders to define and recommend enhancements. Collaborate with stakeholders to elicit, document, and prioritize business requirements, ensuring clear and concise documentation. Work with cross-functional teams to design and evaluate solutions that address business needs and requirements, facilitating discussions and providing insights for decision-making and solution selection. Collaborating with HR on recruitment, onboarding, and performance evaluations. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or higher in a related field such as Business Administration, Management, or Information Systems. Or minimum 5 years of experience in business analysis, with at least 2 years in a leadership role. Strong understanding of business analysis methodologies, tools, and techniques. Experience in gathering and documenting business requirements.

MAIN PURPOSE OF THE JOB: We are looking for Solution Architect who can utilize their breadth and depth of expertise with their understanding of the business domain and competitive/technology landscape to design comprehensive solutions across product and organizational boundaries within product line. This position requires working closely with developers and other architects to design and implement/code effective solutions in complex software systems. Responsibilities include leading the design effort in a collaborative environment, evolving design over time, owning significant architecture decisions, and serving as a leader and mentor. QUALIFICATIONS: 7-10 years of experience working in a team environment At least 3 years of experience leading project teams Proficiency at a senior software engineering level, experience in .Net Technology, SQL, and JavaScript Senior-level experience in software design and development, leadership experience, and expertise in software architecture and security concepts Effective English communication, attention to detail, decision-making skills, adaptability, and a positive team-oriented attitude are essential for success in this position. Actively contribute to continuous improvement and stay involved in design, programming, and testing of solutions. We offer excellent career prospects and attractive remuneration package to the right candidates. Human Resources AXA INSURANCE PUBLIC COMPANY LIMITED. 1168/67 Lumpini Tower 23 Floor, Rama 4 Road, Sathorn, Bangkok 10120. (MRT Lumpini) Tel: +66 02118 8195 Visit our website: www.axa.co.th All application will be treated in the strictest confidential. Interested applicants please send application with recent photo and expected remuneration to: Recruitment Team By submitting your CV to AXA, you acknowledge and agree on all the information set forth in the AXA Privacy Policy which can be found at https://www.axa.co.th/en/privacy-candidate-statement Come and join our happy family!

Jobtitle: Sale Project/ฝ่ายขายโครงการ
column8: รายละเอียดงาน ติดต่อ/ประสานงานกับลูกค้าตามโรงงานหรือนิคมต่างๆ ตามที่บริษัทฯมอบหมาย ติดต่อลุกค้าใหม่ ประสานงานการเสนอราคา ติดตามรายการ รวมถึงการส่งของ ดูแลลูกค้าหลังการขาย จัดทำเอกสารเกี่ยวกับงานขาย ทำรายงานสรุปปัญหา จัดทำ Sales Report และ Forecast รวมถึง Daily Report แจ้งงานที่ทำในแต่ละวัน งานอื่นๆที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร วุฒิป.ตรี ขึ้นไป (ไม่จำกัดสาขา) มีประสบการณ์การทำงานอย่างน้อย 2 ปี มีใจรักในการขาย มีทัศนคติที่ดี รักความก้าวหน้า มีความสามารถในการเจรจาต่อรอง มีบุคลิก มนุษยสัมพันธ์ดี มีความรับผิดชอบ ชอบการติดต่อสื่อสาร สามารถทำงานร่วมกับผู้อื่นได้ดี สามารถทำงานภายใต้แรงกดดันและแก้ไขปัญหาเฉพาะหน้าได้ดี ชอบทำงานเป็นทีม หากมีประสบการณ์ทางด้านงานขายในโรงงานอุตสาหกรรม จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ มีใบอนุญาตขับขี่รถยนต์ มีพาหนะของตนเอง เดินทางต่างจังหวัดได้ สวัสดิการ ประกันสังคม วันหยุดประจำปี ชุดยูนิฟอร์ม การปรับค่าเเรง โบนัสประจำปี ประกันอุบัติเหตุกลุ่ม อื่นๆ

Jobtitle: Head of Cloud Service and Infrastructure
column8: Job Purpose Ensure the cloud services and IT infrastructure are available and able to respond to company strategic directions. Provide the strategic vision and execution of IT infrastructure technology to support business departments and external ecosystems. Key responsibilities: Oversee and align infrastructure services vision, enable innovation and leverage IT trends that can create business value consistent with the company’s requirements and expectations Lead and align strategic infrastructure technology initiatives to build and maintain key elements of the company’s enterprise infrastructure, including but not limited to cloud infrastructure , 24x7 data center, servers (IBM AS/400 and Intel Windows), remote access services, wireless networks, enterprise scale messaging environments, active directory multi forest integration, multi carrier WAN, software defined internetworking, database systems and innovative end user computing solutions Manage cloud team and database administrator team to ensure that IT systems can deliver service as agreed with the business. Ensure comprehensive IT systems disaster recovery architecture and plans are maintained and effective, in compliance with the agreed RPOs and RTOs during business continuity events Establish and maintain strong, strategic partnerships with related Group IT, IT vendors and service suppliers Coordinate Infrastructure projects/resources with the IT / Non IT parties. Ensure all project deliverables, budgets, and timelines are met Qualificaiton: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer or IT related fields Certification / License Related certificate would be advantage Working Experience 15+ years of leadership experience in managing IT infrastructure team. Extensive knowledge of Cloud and IT infrastructure

Job Highlights Fixed bonus and performance bonus Hybrid Working and remote teaming Work from Anywhere Equality Welfare & Benefit (LGBTQA+) Global online training modules to personalized learning journey International Opportunities for Career Growth Community Support with Employee well-being resource groups Well designed the efficient, effective and productive project management system. And coordinate with internal and external cross-functional & business teams to track and report project progress to executives and stakeholders, help prioritize projects, develop process improvement for more productivity on the projects and ensure all projects deliverable and support the overall business objectives of the organization. Run PMO team and manages IT portfolio, resources and budget for IT team Key Responsibilities: Work closely across all IT and business teams to foster excellence in implementation and delivery the strategic project Manage and develop processes to ensure timely response and delivery to all requests (e.g. implementation calendar, other project management processes) Evaluating progress and revising as appropriate to meet changing needs, requirements and/or costs Understand basic financial models, P/L and cost-to completion projections to ensure projects are managed and delivered within budget Track project performance, program schedule, budget, quality and risks, specifically to analysis the successful completion of short and long-term goals by using appropriate tools and techniques Ensure all flowcharts, budget trackers, program roadmaps, calendars, etc. are updated on an ongoing basis Creating useful and appropriate data outputs and visualizations tailored for intended audiences as a report on weekly basis Perform risk management to minimize project risks Reflect, facilitate and support to fully complete the strategic project Conducting post project evaluation and identifying successful and unsuccessful project elements Qualification: Information Technology, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Industrial Engineering, Business Management / or related field required. 5 -7 years’ experience as project manager in the insurance business. Strong understanding of formal project management methodologies. Ability to analyzes and reports project status and monitors project performance to maintain the quality of services, deliverables, and content in accordance with PMO standards Ability to work autonomously while also managing aggressive delivery schedules Ability to prioritize multiple tasks and be highly organized Strong problem solving, people-management skills negotiation skills as well as a passion for improving on process and tools.

Company: Metro Systems Corporation Public Company Limited
column8: Responsibilities: Requirement Gathering and Analyze the requirement from business user. Review and prepare all functional requirements, including with data, documents user manuals, comprehensively and clearly. Identify the Fit-Gap. Test the application and collaborate with development team to fixing the customer’s problem. Support and provide application or business process best practice to the customer. Completes the task to ensure delivery of project is on time. Coordinates and consults the project's implementation task with partners (foreign company). Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or higher all fields are welcome. Computer science or Software engineer is a plus. Good command of spoken and written English. Presentation skill is mandatory. Logical thinking and problem solving is mandatory. Willing to travel. ติดต่อฝ่ายทรัพยากรบุคคล บริษัท เมโทรซิสเต็มส์คอร์ปอเรชั่น จำกัด (มหาชน) 400 ถ.เฉลิมพระเกียรติ ร.9 แขวงหนองบอน เขตประเวศ กรุงเทพฯ 10250 Tel. 02-089-4349 Website : http://www.metrosystems.co.th/ [link removed]

Jobtitle: Digital IT strategy Manager/ผู้จัดการอาวุโสแผนกกลยุทธ์เทคโนโลยี
column8: Define our Digital Strategy, taking into account Industry trends, Digital Evolution and emerging technology. Analyze current market situation, competitor analysis, use case analysis. Understand and able to apply new emerging technology with the ongoing business / future businesses. Work with teams across the business to generate innovative digital solutions for products, service, process, customer experience, marketing channels, and business models Own and centrally monitor the digital transformation project portfolio. Focus on any 360 digital global trend including media, technology, product, and services. Research and analyze on customer digital behaviors, digital needs, customer segment.

Scope of work: The Project Coordinator is responsible for overseeing and coordinating various aspects of project management. This includes tasks such as project planning, where they work closely with stakeholders to define project objectives and create detailed plans. They also play a crucial role in team coordination, ensuring effective communication and collaboration among team members. Duties and Responsibilities: Define project objectives, scope, deliverables, and timelines. Collaborate with project managers and team members to develop project plans. Organize meetings and distribute project-related documentation. Serve as a central point of contact for project stakeholders. Facilitate effective communication among team members, project managers, and clients. Provide regular project updates and address project-related queries or concerns. Assist in resource allocation and management. Coordinate with team members to ensure they have the necessary tools and information. Track project expenses and maintain budget documentation. Identify potential project risks and issues. Address risks and resolve issues in a timely manner. Maintain project documentation, including project plans and status reports. Generate progress reports and present project status to stakeholders. Conduct reviews and inspections to verify alignment with project objectives. Manage stakeholder expectations and address concerns or issues. Participate in lessons learned exercises for future projects. Assist with task coordination and conflict resolution. Foster a collaborative work environment and provide support to team members. Other duties may be assigned by the supervisor. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in project management, business management or in a related field. Experience in leadership or management role. Proven experience in project management. Ability to lead project teams of various sizes and see them through to completion. Ability to understand and share the feelings of others. Understand perspectives and experiences of team members. Ability to build trust and create a positive work environment.

Location: Bangkok – near BTS Salary: 60,000 THB up to 90,000 THB + Benefits Cathcart Technology is partnering with a cutting-edge technology startup specializing in delivering high-tech solutions that integrate AI technologies. The company addresses complex challenges for a global client base across multiple countries, providing top-notch services that push the boundaries of what's possible. We are seeking a highly skilled Full Stack Developer with expertise in Django and React.js who is enthusiastic about AI integration. As a key member of the development team, you will be designing, implementing, and maintaining innovative web applications that seamlessly incorporate advanced AI and drone capabilities. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in computer science or computer engineering 3+ years of development experience Proficiency in Django and React.js Experience in AWS and PostgreSQL Experience in Agile methodology Good command of English If you are passionate about technology, thrive in a collaborative environment, and want to be part of a company driving AI and drone advancements globally, this position is for you! Contact me at 02-038-5878 , 094-554-4259 , K. Pimpisa , Open-Source recruitment consultant.

Jobtitle: IT Audit / IT Security Compliance/เจ้าหน้าที่บริหาร/เจ้าหน้าที่บริหารอาวุโส...
Company: The Office of The Securities and Exchange Commission, Thailand
column8: ฝ่ายกำกับและตรวจสอบความเสี่ยงด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ สำนักงานคณะกรรมการกำกับหลักทรัพย์และตลาดหลักทรัพย์ ประกาศรับสมัคร ตำแหน่งเจ้าหน้าที่บริหาร – เจ้าหน้าที่บริหารอาวุโส จำนวน 5 อัตรา หน้าที่รับผิดชอบ: งานแบ่งเป็น 2 ลักษณะ 1. งานด้านวิชาการ : (1) ศึกษากฎหมาย หลักเกณฑ์ และแนวปฏิบัติที่ดีเกี่ยวกับการบริหารจัดการความเสี่ยงด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศและไซเบอร์ เพื่อจัดทำหลักเกณฑ์หรือประยุกต์ใช้ในการกำกับดูแลตลาดทุน (2) พัฒนาแบบรายงานข้อมูลเพื่อการติดตามความเสี่ยงด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศและไซเบอร์ และประมวลผล/วิเคราะห์ข้อมูลจากแบบรายงาน (3) ติดตามข้อมูลข่าวสารด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ ภัยคุกคามทางไซเบอร์ และมาตรฐานสากลในการบริหารจัดการความเสี่ยงด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศและไซเบอร์ 2. งานด้านกำกับและตรวจสอบ : (1) นำกฎหมาย และหลักเกณฑ์ที่เกี่ยวกับการบริหารจัดการความเสี่ยงด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศและ ไซเบอร์ ไปใช้ประกอบการกำกับดูแลและตรวจสอบ เพื่อส่งเสริม และพัฒนาให้มีผู้ประกอบธุรกิจ มีระบบและมีการบริหารจัดการความเสี่ยงด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศและไซเบอร์อย่างเหมาะสม และยกระดับความพร้อมรับมือเหตุภัยคุกคามไซเบอร์ (2) พิจารณาความพร้อมด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ ตามแบบคำขอรับใบอนุญาตในการประกอบธุรกิจ คุณสมบัติ 1. สำเร็จการศึกษาในระดับปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป จากสถาบันที่เป็นที่ยอมรับจากภายในประเทศหรือต่างประเทศ 2. มีความสามารถในการสื่อสาร และถ่ายทอดเรื่องที่ซับซ้อนให้เข้าใจง่าย ในเรื่องเกี่ยวกับการบริหารจัดการความเสี่ยงของการใช้งานเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศของผู้ประกอบธุรกิจในภาคตลาดทุน 3. มีความสามารถในการศึกษาเรียนรู้และค้นคว้าด้วยตนเอง (self-motivated) และต่อยอดความรู้ที่มีเพื่อนำมาปรับปรุง พัฒนา และประยุกต์ใช้กับงานหรือบทบาทหน้าที่ที่ได้รับมอบหมาย 4. มีความสามารถวางแผนงานและจัดลำดับความสำคัญของงานเพื่อให้ปฏิบัติหน้าที่ได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพและทันตามเวลาที่กำหนด 5. ทักษะในการใช้งานโปรแกรมประยุกต์ เช่น Microsoft Excel ในระดับดี คุณสมบัติที่อาจะได้รับการพิจารณาเพิ่มเติมเป็นพิเศษ 1. มีประสบการณ์ในงานที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการบริหารจัดการความเสี่ยงด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ 2. มีประกาศนียบัตรวิชาชีพด้านการตรวจสอบระบบงานด้าน IT เช่น CISA, CISM หรือ CISSP เป็นต้น 3. มีผลงานทางวิชาการในงานที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการบริหารจัดการความเสี่ยงด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ 4. มีประสบการณ์ด้านการกำกับ (compliance) ตรวจสอบ (audit) หรือจัดการความเสี่ยง (risk management) ด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ

Company: TMBThanachart Bank or ttb / ทีเอ็มบีธนชาต หรือ ทีทีบี
column8: Support Head of IT Audit to develop an IT Audit Annual Plan based upon an overall IT risk of Bank’s universes and existing control status. Assess and review adequacy and effectiveness of Controls on IT Governance, IT Services Management Processes supporting IT, Business Strategy, and Operation of the Bank e.g. availability management, access management, or IT service continuity management. Conduct review on IT controls required by Regulatory e.g. Sabanes Oxley act, National Credit Bureau, Bank of Thailand, and Securities & Exchange Commission Thailand, and over management and monitoring of compliance with a range of IT regulations and the Bank's IT policies, standard, and procedures. Provide IT Risk Advisory Services for IT initiatives, and conduct new priority audit activities as requirement by management related to financial services digital technologies, infrastructure technology, IT control over applications and business processes, IT service management, and IT compliance and regulators. Develop and Perform Continuous Control Monitoring (CCM) via programming, script, and method to regularly detect the weakness of control relating to IT risk. Ensure Mitigation Action of IT Residual Risks is performed properly as agreed plan with appropriate acknowledgement of management. Qualifications Bachelor's degree in IT, Information System, Computer Science, Engineering, Accounting, Business or related fields. At least 8-10 years' work experience in IT internal/ external auditor or IT Security. Experience over the control design or/and implementation over IT Risks. Strong testing experience on IT controls e.g., IT Governance, Cyber Security, ISO27001/27002, SAS70, SDLC and Change Management, Network Security, Platform security covering configuration management, etc. Good knowledge in IT Audit, IT Security, IT Risk or IT Compliance. Good English communication. Preferable Certified in CISA, CISM, CISSP, or other related IT Risk certifications.

Job Description: Reporting & Analysis •             Compile, from various data sources and IT systems, the monthly controlling and risk management submissions and ad hoc information requests on time with the required data quality (including data quality checks and variance analysis) •             Analyse monthly data to identify any abnormalities, trends or developments on the business performance and proactively advise management and other departments of any required action •             Review and analyse the company’s operating expenses and communicate deviations to operative departments. •             Adequately monitor, analyse & report risk management KPIs in order to identify and mitigate any potential portfolio risk Data Quality monitoring / analysis both (Controlling) •             Regularly coordinate with (IT and) Financial Controller to conduct data quality assessments, to ensure sufficient data quality to fulfil all internal & external requirements •             Timely delivery of monthly data to HQ and ad hoc data requests for risk review auditors at the required quality. •             Periodically review and update local data and process documentation, including database data dictionary. •             Provide business input to database enhancement projects for more efficient business intelligence and report automation. Data Quality monitoring / analysis both (Risk management) •             Regularly coordinate with (IT and) Manager Financial controlling to conduct data quality assessments, to ensure sufficient data quality to fulfil the requirements of the Portfolio Analysis Policy, Controlling Definition Catalogue and other policy requirements. •             Timely delivery of monthly data to HQ and ad hoc data requests for risk review auditors at the required quality. •             Periodically review and update local data and process documentation, including database data dictionary. •             Provide business input to database enhancement projects for more efficient business intelligence and report automation. Planning & Forecasting •             With input from various departments, conduct the annual planning to simulate anticipated business results under different scenarios and submit to HQ within required deadlines. •             Break down planned expenses into departmental budgets •             Prepare monthly forecasts, by working closely with department heads in forecasting their department’s expectations and summarising these inputs into one interlinked most-likely scenario Pricing analysis and consulting & Financial controlling of incentives •             Pricing committee meeting preparation / follow-ups including but not limited to: •             Simulation of profitability impacts for respective campaigns •             Consult sales department on impact of campaign/ incentive design on the financial performance of the company •             Ensure the integrity of incentive/ performance schemes in order to provide respective controls for payouts Innovation, technology and business intelligence dashboards •             Provide/ maintain business intelligence solutions in order to increase transparency on various business topics, using PowerBI (dashboarding) •             Support and frame the implementation of data science by taking the lead in raw data framing, providing requirements for management dashboards, and by defining the ourBI business landscape •             Gather requirements and derive and drive the implementation by the data scientist •             Develop efficiencies in the standard reporting processes to reduce the time and resources required for the activities.

Job Description: We are seeking a dynamic and creative Employer Branding Specialist to join our team. In this role, you will play a pivotal role in shaping and enhancing our employer brand to attract and retain top talent in the market. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record in employer branding, marketing, and communication strategies. You will work closely with internal stakeholders to build and promote our employer brand, ultimately driving the success of our organization. Key Responsibilities: Immerse in IT One’s culture and able to visualize the company’s EVP and convey the information to the public Develop and execute an employer branding strategy that aligns with the company's values, mission, and culture Collaborate with internal teams to understand the unique selling points of IT One as an employer and translate them into compelling employer brand messaging Create engaging content, including videos, blog posts, and social media campaigns, to showcase our company culture and career opportunities Manage and grow our online presence on professional networking platforms and career websites to attract top talent Organize and participate in employer branding events, job fairs, and other recruitment-related activities to strengthen our presence in the job market Collaborate with the Talent Acquisition team to ensure a seamless candidate experience throughout the recruitment process Develop and maintain relationships with external partners, such as universities and industry organizations, to expand our talent pipeline Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in marketing, Communications, Human Resources, or a related field. Proven experience in employer branding, recruitment marketing, or a related field, preferably within a global organization. Strong creative and strategic thinking skills with the ability to translate complex concepts into compelling content. Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Proficiency in using social media platforms and tools such as Canva, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator, etc. Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced and dynamic environment. Passion for staying up to date with industry trends and best practices in employer branding.

LSEG is an Equal Opportunities employer, we strive to establish teams that are diverse and encourage collaborative working and sharing of ideas! The LSEG Real-Time Distribution System products integrate, distribute, and add value to information from and about the markets. This includes real-time and historical prices from data vendors, exchanges, and brokers; real-time and historical news from the press, the web and internal analysts; as well as internal calculations and other forms of proprietary information used to support crucial decisions. We are seeking a highly motivated Systems Support Engineer with at least 5 years of support experience in the financial industry. As a Lead Support Engineer in our team, you will work closely with an expert development team in supporting our industry-leading Real-Time Distribution System products. Job Responsibilities: Collaborate with globally-based support colleagues to further investigate issues with Real-Time Distribution System software components in internal and external client environments Apply and leverage knowledge and expertise of Real-Time Distribution System software components to provide thorough technical analysis and issue replications of complex issues Work with development teams as needed to bring issues to resolution Participate in Support case reviews Contribute to product and internal documentation Handle multiple complex issues in a challenging, dynamic technical environment Qualifications: 5 or more years of computer software industry experience in real-time, multi-threaded systems, with an emphasis on technical analysis and problem solving Solid, demonstrated experience with Linux and Windows Operating Systems - including shell scripting, system tools, procedures - that aid in operation and troubleshooting of software components that operate in those environments Knowledge and experience in real-time C/C++ programming Experience in network programming (e.g., sockets, TCP/IP, UDP, multicast) Strong, demonstrated analytical troubleshooting skills Strong written and verbal communication skills Financial industry experience a strong plus Bachelor’s degree in CS, Engineering or related is required; masters preferred Sounds exciting to you? Apply now and get connected with us! We believe that creating a diverse and inclusive organisation is fundamental to the way we deliver on our promise of creating essential partnerships and open opportunities. Our open culture is central to how we deliver our purpose - driving financial stability, empowering economies and enabling customers to create sustainable growth - in everything we do. Working with us means that you will be part of a dynamic organisation of 25,000 people across 70 countries. However, we will value your individuality and enable you to bring your true self to work so you can help enrich our diverse workforce. You will be part of a collaborative and creative culture where we encourage new ideas and are committed to sustainability across our global business. You will experience the critical role we have in helping to re-engineer the financial ecosystem to support and drive sustainable economic growth. Together, we are aiming to achieve this growth by accelerating the just transition to net zero, enabling growth of the green economy and creating inclusive economic opportunity. We offer a range of tailored benefits and support, including healthcare, retirement planning, paid volunteering days and wellbeing initiatives. We are proud to be an equal opportunities employer. This means that we do not discriminate on the basis of anyone's race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital status, veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. Conforming with applicable law, we can reasonably accommodate applicants' and employees' religious practices and beliefs, as well as any mental health or physical disability needs. Please take a moment to read this privacy notice carefully, as it describes what personal information we may hold about you, what it's used for, and how it's obtained, your rights and how to contact us as a data subject. If you are submitting as a Recruitment Agency Partner, it is essential and your responsibility to ensure that candidates applying to us are aware of this privacy notice.

column8: หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ จัดทำข้อเสนองานและปิดการขายงานโครงการสำหรับอุปกรณ์ไฟฟ้าสำรองต่อเนื่อง AC & DC UPS รวมทั้งการให้คำปรึกษาพร้อมจัดทำเอกสารประกอบข้อเสนอที่สำคัญต่องานโครงการ นัดหมายเข้าพบลูกค้าเพื่อพัฒนาความเข้าใจในธุรกิจของลูกค้า การเพิ่มโอกาสในการขาย และสร้างความสัมพันธ์ที่ดีในระยะยาวกับฐานลูกค้าของบริษัท รวมถึงการขยายฐานลูกค้าใหม่ตามกลยุทธ์การขายที่กำหนด ประสานงานกับซัพพลายเออร์เพื่อจัดทำข้อเสนอสำหรับงานบริการและงานขายให้มีประสิทธิภาพ สนับสนุน จัดทำและติดตามแผนงานร่วมกับทีมงานเพื่อรองรับงานโครงการหลังการขายเพื่อความพอใจของลูกค้า จัดทำรายงานการขายสำหรับการวางแผนให้บรรลุเป้าหมายทางการขาย ร่วมจัดทำสื่อประชาสัมพันธ์งานบริการของบริษัทตามช่องทางที่กำหนดให้ คุณสมบัติ ปริญญาตรีวิศวกรรมศาสตร์ หากมีประสบการณ์ทำงาน 1-2 ปีจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ สามารถขับรถได้และมีใบอนุญาตขับขี่ ยินดีรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่

Jobtitle: Assistant Data Management Manager/ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการฝ่ายวิเคราะห์ และบริหารข้อมูล
column8: Job Descriptions ช่วยวางแผนการทำงาน ช่วยกำหนดขั้นตอนการทำงาน และตรวจสอบการทำงานของพนักงานภายในแผนก Data ให้มีการทำงานอย่างเป็นระบบ เพื่อก่อให้เกิด master data ที่ถูกต้อง ครบถ้วน ทุกแผนกในองค์กรสามารถนำข้อมูลที่มีในระบบไปใช้ประโยชน์ได้อย่างรวดเร็ว เรียนรู้และทำความเข้าใจต่อข้อมูลต่างๆที่เกี่ยวข้องกับฐานข้อมูลของบริษัทอยู่เสมอ เพื่อตรวจสอบให้มีการเปิดและปรับปรุงข้อมูลลูกค้า ข้อมูลคู่ค้า ข้อมูลสินค้า คุณสมบัติของสินค้า ให้ถูกต้อง ครบถ้วน และสอดคล้องกับข้อกฎหมายที่เกี่ยวข้องเสมอ ตรวจสอบและแนะแนวทางการทำงาน data management admin ให้ดำเนินการสร้างและปรับปรุงข้อมูลต่างๆในระบบ ERP และระบบต่างๆ เช่น HQ POS E-Commerce WMS B2B ให้ถูกต้องและครบถ้วนอยู่เสมอ รวบรวมความต้องการของแผนกต่างๆ เพื่อให้ได้ข้อมูลที่ถูกต้อง ชัดเจน เป็นประโยชน์ในการพัฒนาฐานข้อมูล ให้พร้อมเชื่อมโยงกับระบบใหม่ๆของบริษัท และสามารถสนับสนุนการทำงานของทุกแผนกในองค์กรได้ ช่วยวิเคราะห์ข้อมูลที่เกี่ยวข้อง เพื่อหาแนวทาง ปรับปรุงการทำงาน หรือเพิ่มประสิทธิภาพขององค์กร ช่วยบริหารจัดการทีม DATA Management Officer โดยการส่งเสริมให้พนักงานภายในทีมมีความรู้ ความเข้าใจในการทำงานที่ถูกต้อง ตามขั้นตอนและกฎเกณฑ์ที่บริษัทกำหนด Qualifications ปริญญาตรี หรือเทียบเท่า สาขาเทคโนโลยีและสารสนเทศ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องการบริหารจัดการข้อมูล หรือสาขาอื่นๆ เช่น บัญชี การเงิน การตลาด วิทยาศาสตร์ สาธารณสุข สังคมศาสตร์ เป็นต้น มีความสามารถในการบริหารทีมงาน มีองค์ความรู้ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการจัดการระบบฐานข้อมูล มีความสามารถในการวิเคราะห์ แยกแยะ วางแผน และนำไปใช้ประโยชน์ได้เป็นอย่างดี กฎหมายที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการจัดซื้อและจำหน่ายยาและเวชภัณฑ์ มีความรู้ความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับเอกสารของธุรกิจประเภทต่างๆ โปรแกรมคอมพิวเตอร์ และระบบ ERP / POS / B2B ระบบการจัดเก็บเอกสารหรือฐานข้อมูลต่างๆ

Jobtitle: Specialist – Credit Risk Data and Technology
Company: TMBThanachart Bank or ttb / ทีเอ็มบีธนชาต หรือ ทีทีบี
column8: Main Job ·         Lead the oversight and maintenance of architecture strategies and roadmaps for Data, ETL, BI, and RDT. ·         Develop and enforce technical standards, procedures, and guidelines governing data models. ·         Ensure the quality of credit data and rule metrics, documenting and tracking quality metrics to align with Data Management Bank-Wide standards. ·         Collaborate with IT and MIS teams to design technical aspects, data models, and interfaces between SAS, IFRS9, RDT, and Data Warehouse. Role and Responsibility Governance and Implementation: Implement Credit Risk Data and Rule Governance, Procedures, and Processes. Technology and Planning: Interface with vendors for technology updates. Participate in planning, development, testing, and delivery of data and rules within work streams. Analysis and Coordination: Analyze functional business processes and requirements. Coordinate and support IT/MIS process changes. Training and Management: Provide guidance, coaching, and end-user training. Manage the Credit Risk Data and Rule Knowledge Center. Perform System Integration Testing (SIT) of Data Integration Flows. Provide support to test teams and resolve issues related to test results. Qualification: Master’s or bachelor’s degree in computer science, Information Systems, or related field. 5+ years of experience in risk information or related roles within banking or finance. Proficient in PLSQL (SQL Server), SAS, and OSX Maestro. Expertise in Data Warehouse, BI, Data Analytics, and ETL automation. Strong analytical and design skills for data solutions, including source systems, ETL routines, and resolving Data Quality issues. Hands-on experience in Solution Architecture. Proven ability to identify and manage technical and project risks. Deep understanding of application, data, infrastructure, and network design. Knowledge of financial risk management and BOT-RDT regulations is advantageous. Familiarity with financial database systems. Strong analytical, problem-solving, and project management skills.

Jobtitle: Enterprise Risk Management (Operational Risk or Enterprise Risk)
column8: Job Summary The role is responsible for compiling, reviewing data from Group companies to prepare Group risk dashboard, investigate factors influencing any notable risk trend, monitor compliance to risk limits, thresholds, and controls and ensuring the preparation and testing of Risk Self-Assessment and Business Continuity Plan of SCBX major functions, particularly for shared services provided to Group companies. Job Description Assist CRO in preparation of written risk appetite statements, risk management policies, frameworks and procedures, risk calculation methodologies, and development of risk management and control applications; and cascade them down to Group companies. Ensure that risk taxonomies, measurement and calculation methods are consistently applied throughout the Group Provide advice on risk policies, frameworks, standards, methodologies and best practices to risk counterparts and other functions throughout the Group Review subsidiaries’ risk appetite statements (RAS) and risk management policies and alert CRO of any material non-alignment with or discrepancies from Group’s RAS, policies and frameworks Facilitate implementation of risk mitigation or management plans, and challenge risk control effectiveness as appropriate Review transactions that are exposed to investment, credit, market, and operational risks; quantify the risks and risk-adjusted returns and the consumption of available risk limits Review any other qualitative risk factors associated with the transaction to highlight any material risk for the authorized approving body. Work closely with Business Development in reviewing investment due diligence and identifying due diligence gap in risk assessment Provide risk data and inputs to Finance and Strategy for the preparation of Group’s Regulatory Stress Test and ICAAP Report, and Recovery Plan, review the impact of stress test results on risk appetites and limits Review and follow up on incident escalation and coordinate with Legal & Compliance, Strategy, and Internal Audit in sharing any major incident, non-compliance, and audit issues. Report non-compliance to escalation process to CRO in timely manner Execute strategies and plans to promote and foster strong risk culture throughout the Group Implement risk management systems and tools, incorporating data analytics and AI to facilitate automated and digital process for risk assessment, measurement, controls, follow-up and reporting Organize and prepare presentation materials for meetings, including MCOM, ROC, Technology Committee, Audit Committee, Board of Directors, Centers of Excellence, as well as meetings with Group CEOs and CROs. Prepare and keep records of minutes of meetings Keep abreast on any new or emerging risks, regulatory and compliance changes, business and financial/capital market environment, risk-based capital requirement, technologies and other factors that may affect the risk level of Group companies or the necessity to revise risk appetites and risk management policies and frameworks Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree or higher in Finance, Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, MIS or any related fields Preferred Skills & Experience in Investment analyst, data science and analytics, computer science, digital assets, economist, risk management, compliance, credit analyst, finance, transformation project management Minimum 5 years of experience in risk management or related department in financial institutions or relevant role in financial service industry Equipped with analytical mind and being able to raise relevant questions Good English skills and project management skills

Job Description Lead to shaping and executing of business transformation agendas through technology together with CIO and IT leadership team. Identify most critical problems at the intersection of business and technology, including digital disruption, industry convergence, growth and innovation, global operating models, sustainable cost management, enterprise transformation, and more. Creating strategies and plans to define how technology should be utilized to support an organization's overall business strategy and maximize value creation. This will require understanding of business strategy and affinity with technology to define the strategy, operating model, enterprise-architecture and transformation roadmaps of technology organizations. Key Responsibilities: • Understand the business strategy and contribute in defining the link with technology and the architecture landscape, including organization, information, and infrastructure & applications. • Create blueprints & recommendations and contribute in translating them in actionable roadmaps for complex and large technology environments – building future-proof architectures using modern technologies like cloud, edge computing, next-gen connectivity, event streaming, platform architectures and more. • Throughout the strategy definition, function as a guardian of the architecture to make sure that e.g. initiatives & roadmap build-up comply with the set guidelines without jeopardizing business objectives. • Ensure transformation program to successfully implement through manage IT project portfolio and checking the progress of those projects. • Conducts regular reviews and reporting of IT project portfolio financials to meet commitments. • Manage IT resources and IT budget to be in line with the IT strategy Requirements : • A university degree (Bachelor’s degree or equivalent) and major in Computer Science is preferred • A minimum of 5 years of experience in IT strategy • Knowledge of IT Strategy, IT Governance and Enterprise Architecture frameworks • Experience working with Senior Business Leaders and Technology Leaders to drive IT initiatives and projects. • Proven ability to influence without authority. • Experience working with Senior Business Leaders and Technology Leaders to drive IT initiatives and projects. • Strong communication and presentation skills and a proven ability to work with employees at all levels of the organization; including senior leadership team members. • Proven sensitivity to cultural diversity in the business environment.

About the role TNDS has been in the financial industry for over 35 years specializing in banking systems that are mission-critical and large-scale. With some of the largest banks as our customers, tens of millions of people relyon our work every day. If you have a bank account, there’s a good chance that you are also using our work. From our passion for creatingand delivering great digital services with high-quality, it’sa great opportunity to join TNDS as a Quality Assurance (QA). Our QAs do not only provide quality insoftware or services, but also development processes.You can learn any techniques, strategies, and tools to apply in your work and ensure that all processes and final products meet quality standards. You can foster a “quality culture”, in which all employees will engage in quality for their work. Responsibilities You will join one of our agile software development teams working on mobile and tablet banking, digital lending, or our startup partners. As part of the team, your responsibilities will be to: Review and analyze requirement, specification and technical design to provide meaningful feedback. Manage and assign working task of testing to team member. Design and develop test cases from requirement criteria of each features/products. Review and give feedback of test cases from team member. Prepare test data and perform execute test from test case. Track, analyze and investigate the incident of software. Able to share and motivate a working team to have a knowledge of testing. Develop and monitor a quality for all stages of a software development process. Create and review an automation test script and perform execute an automation test. Requirements Here are basic qualifications we look for : BS/MS degree in computer Science, Engineering or a related subject. Good analytical and reasoning skills. 4-5 years of work experience in software development and software quality assurance process. Strong knowledge of software testing methodologies and process. Experience in writing test case and preparing test data. Experience in implementing an automated test script and have an experience with automated testing tools is a plus. Experience with performance and security testing is a plus. Work Location: Near Chong Nonsi BTS /  Saint Louis BTS (Hybrid Working)

About Us Do you want to be part of Thailand banking transformation? Data is the core of the new financial services era, and we are open for the opportunity to be part to drive this change at the core. SCB DATAx is a new venture of the Siam Commercial Bank (SCB) holdings, a leading financial services and digital services holdings in Thailand and ASEAN. As part of the transformation of SCB into a group of product and technology companies, under the SCBx brand, SCB DATAx is the technology company to centralize data and provides AI and data science services and products to the group. With a leading-edge cloud native data & AI platform, our vision is to support the group to providing everyone in our region with the opportunity to prosper. We work on forward-thinking challenges of centralizing, analyzing and sharing information. We collaborate with companies and experts in many different domains, embrace diversity and all that while having a good laugh and joy in work. Cybersecurity and Privacy Consultant Key Responsibilities and Requirements Work hard and make a difference with ACinfotec Consulting Services. Our team members are intelligent, passionate about cybersecurity and privacy, committed to delivering value to customers, and enjoy how we work. As a Cybersecurity and Privacy Consultant, you will join ACinfotec's dynamic and growing team to provide advice and solve cybersecurity and privacy issues for our customers. You will be in the key position to analyze, design, and execute a range of consulting projects on cybersecurity requirements and the convergence with privacy protection, in line with international best practices and local regulations. Base Qualification Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Information Systems, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related fields. 2-4 years of experience with System admin, IT Operations, IT Risk management, IT Compliance, Information Security, Privacy Protection, IT Program or Project management, and/or Software Development. Preferred Qualification Master’s degree in Information Technology, Information Systems, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related field. 2+ years of experience with System admin, IT Operations, IT Risk management, IT Compliance, Information Security, Privacy Protection, IT Program or Project management, and/or Software Development. Knowledge of cybersecurity and privacy laws, regulations. Knowledge of cloud computing is a plus. Understanding of modern and emerging technology is a plus. Ability to research and analyze cybersecurity and privacy protection best practices, laws and regulations. Ability to identify and understand key technical aspects of cybersecurity and privacy issues, understand business implications, design potential solutions, and recommend the best course of action. Strong verbal and written communication skills. Ability to influence, negotiate with, and persuade others. Flexible and able to demonstrate strong judgment and decision-making skills Ability to work independently in a constantly changing environment Self-starter who can take general direction and produce specific results. Ability to manage multiple projects at once while putting attention to details. Working days/time:  Mon – Fri (8:30 – 17:30), Work from home 4 days Job overview : Assist with business and IT Strategic planning to advise on the impact to business and IT architecture from business strategy decisions. Assist in the innovation initiatives by assessing the impact of innovations on business and IT architecture. Assist with Program/Project Portfolio planning and prioritization to advise the portfolio management team on dependencies between different projects and impact of the project to the overall architecture. Assist with Project execution to review architecture design during feasibility study and project implementation. Identify application portfolio rationalization, identifying overlapping functionalities, support in identifying master applications, and drive the application decommission planning activities. Maintain EA tool and update information to EA tool. Provide EA training about EA concepts, EA tool, EA reference architecture to business and IT. Qualification: 10+ years of experiences IT Architect related roles in large-scale projects in Banking /Financial industries. Experience participating in all aspects of large-scale IT implementation projects including planning and cost estimation through requirements, design, development, testing, implementation, production, and on-going operational support and maintenance. Strong knowledge and understanding of architecture models such as TOGAF, IT governance, key architecture governance models, underlying tools, and supporting processes, IT Development and operations methods (e.g. SDLC, Agile, Scrum, DevOps), security and compliance models Ability to explain complex technical issues for non-technical people. Good judgment within broadly defined practices in obtaining desired results, analytical and problem-solving skills. Job Description Reckitt is looking for the Data Performance Manager who is a self-starter and can manage time on projects and provide detailed activity and performance of daily work results. As a start-up, the Performance Manager is expected to be adaptable and flexible to change as the organization grows as products will change, client accounts will grow, and project tasks will change. Scope of Work Identify areas & build initiative for driving performance suggesting actions of CRM program Use information to help create inspiring activities to achieve key driver benchmarks for winning new projects KPIs & optimizing existing projects Be a key person to data collaborate & utilization from commercial plan with cross functions & CRM partners Lead to analyse identifying issues & opportunities from database reflect to strategy : identifying need state, purchase behaviour Lead to measure full funnel business results of CRM program Manage team to collate and analyse daily, weekly and monthly sales key driver information (ie acquisition, conversion, repurchase) including with cross functions i.e. eCom/ Martech team/ CRM partners Lead to build one view of CRM Dashboard/ report from internal & external data sources Requirements Education background in Marketing, Media, Communications, Business or a related field is preferred 2+ years of experience executing on digital marketing data 2+ years using data visualization/Martech tools to display one view reports and share important findings Analytical and a passion for measuring and assessing results, driving continuous improvement, and A/B testing Knowledge of website functionality, principles, and different providers FMCG experience preferred but not required Digital marketing and advertising platform experience (Google, Facebook, Google Ads, and Google Analytics) required Understanding of consumers insights and analytics to convert insights in bespoke campaigns Experience working with CRM systems, Salesforce preferred but not required User-centric. Highly creative and comes with experience in delivering compelling mobile app and web content for target audiences Build solid relationships and provide excellent customer service Have strong collaboration & teamwork skills. Expected to partner closely with the support team, vendor partners, and clients Use sound judgement and critical thinking skills. Be able to solve complex issues, problems, and solve things on your own Stay up to date with industry trends in digital/ CRM campaigns

What You’ll Do: Work as part of a cross-functional Scrum development team, collaborating with product owner, domain experts and stakeholders to create user-centric designs that meet business requirements and technical constraints. Build and maintain front-end code using web frontend technologies, including implementing user interface components, creating responsive designs, and optimizing for different devices and platforms. Ensure the design is consistent across different devices and platforms, conducting user research to validate design decisions and iterating based on user feedback. Implement and maintain user interface design patterns and interaction design standards, staying up-to-date with emerging design trends and technologies. Work with the Scrum team to ensure that the user experience is technically feasible and meets the desired level of functionality. Identify technical challenges and provide creative solutions to address them, collaborating with developers to implement effective solutions. Participate in Scrum ceremonies, including sprint planning, daily stand-ups, sprint reviews, and retrospectives. Contribute to the development of design systems, including creating and maintaining pattern libraries and style guides. What You Have: A Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. Experience in front-end development and user experience design, or a related field. Strong knowledge of web frontend technologies, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Experience with frontend development frameworks such as React (preferably), Vue.js, or Angular. Proficient with Git and Git workflows. Knowledge of user interface design patterns and interaction design standards. Familiarity with user research techniques, including usability testing, surveys, and interviews. Experience working in an Agile development environment, including experience working as part of a Scrum team. Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams. Problem-solving attitude, especially in identifying technical challenges and providing creative solutions. Collaborative team spirit What we offer: Competitive Salary and Increment every year 5 day work week and 12 day vacations Fixed Bonus Transportation Allowance Provident Fund 3 - 15% Medical Insurance and Annual Medical Check-up Educational Assistance and Financial Assistance Annual Outing, New Year Party, and Team Building Activities Birthday Gift/Celebration Anniversary Benefit Flexible work from home/office

Principal Accountabilities: - Data Quality Management: Lead and oversee data operations, including data collection, storage, processing, and integration across the organization. Define and implement data governance policies, standards, and best practices to ensure data quality and consistency. Develop and maintain data workflow processes and automation for efficiency and reliability. Define and manage Service Level Agreements (SLAs) for data-related services, ensuring performance and availability targets are met. Monitor and report on SLA compliance, and take corrective actions when necessary to maintain data service quality. Establish and maintain data access control policies and procedures to safeguard data privacy and integrity. Monitor and manage user access and permissions to data repositories. Implement audit trails and data control mechanisms to ensure data traceability and compliance. - Data Security and Compliance: Establish and enforce data security policies and practices to protect sensitive information. Ensure compliance with relevant data protection regulations, such as PDPA, or industry-specific standards. Collaborate with security teams to conduct regular security audits and vulnerability assessments. - Data Quality Assurance: Develop and implement data quality standards and procedures to ensure accuracy and reliability of data. Monitor data quality metrics and take corrective actions to address data issues or inconsistencies. Implement data quality tools and solutions to support data cleansing and validation. - Data Platform Management: Oversee the selection, implementation, and maintenance of data management and analytics platforms. Collaborate with IT teams to optimize data platform performance, scalability, and availability. Identify and implement data platform enhancements to support evolving business needs. - Team Leadership: Lead and mentor a team of data management professionals, fostering a culture of excellence and continuous improvement. Provide guidance on data strategy, policies, and best practices. Allocate resources, set objectives, and evaluate team performance. Qualifications: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Data Management, Information Technology, or a related field. Proven leadership experience with a minimum of 8-10 years in data management, data operations, or a related role. Strong understanding of data governance, data security, data quality assurance, and compliance requirements. Proficiency in data management platforms, databases, and data integration tools. In-depth knowledge of Service Level Agreements (SLAs) and their management. Familiarity with industry best practices, standards, and regulations related to data management and security. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Strong analytical, problem-solving, and decision-making abilities. Exceptional organizational and project management skills. Location: True Tower 1, Ratchadaphisek Rd.

About Us DATAx is a new venture of the Siam Commercial Bank (SCB) holdings, a leading financial services, and digital services holdings in Thailand and ASEAN. As part of the transformation of SCB into a group of product and technology companies, under the SCBx brand, DATAx is the technology company to centralize data and provide AI and data science services and products to the group. With a leading-edge cloud-native data & AI platform, our vision is to support the group to provide everyone in our region with the opportunity to prosper. We work on forward-thinking challenges of centralizing, analyzing, and sharing information. We collaborate with companies and experts in many different domains, embrace diversity and all that while having a good laugh and joy in work. About Team As we are on our mission to achieve data democratization and foster value creation from data assets, we're looking for a self-driven and innovative individual with the ability to engage across multiple stakeholders and apply a wide range of experience in data, technology, risk and controls disciplines to champion the enterprise data governance implementation at SCBX Group of Companies. Your Responsibility Develop, maintain and operate Data Governance framework, policy and standards for bank-wide including data privacy control, data access, data usage, data classification, data lifecycle management, cross-border transfer, data exchange with third-party partners, business metadata, data stewardship and data quality management Enable data monetization within legal, compliance, data privacy and market conduct regulations by working closely with senior management and related teams to define strategy, use cases and search for solutions to allow responsible usage Build data valuation framework to drive high-value data generation, data collection and data quality management to accelerate data driven business model Initiate and implement forward-looking data governance measurement, metrics and optimization to reach the top maturity level of data governance maturity model Drive awareness and capabilities of data governance through training programs and communications rollout in collaboration with data governance offices across SCBx Understand and be able to setup Data Governance process and workflow especially in the area of Data Provisioning and Access Develop, expand and automate data governance processes, data quality program, business metadata management and data protection using automated data governance solutions Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in business administration, information systems, computer science, information technology or related discipline. At least 10 years of working experience in governance, risk, data management, or related field. Track record of data management, data protection or business-driven data governance practices implementation. Experience in writing or working with various documents such as policy, standard, procedure, and guideline.

Your Role: You will be making our DevSecOps vision a reality by designing, developing, and integrating all DevSecOps cutting edge technologies into our delivery pipelines. As a DevOps engineer, you will contribute in every aspect of service delivery including designing CI/CD pipeline, provisioning servers, setting up network infrastructure, maintaining a Kubernetes cluster, and monitoring production workloads. You will be exposed with cutting-edge technologies and use them to make Monix’s platform effective and stable Key Tasks & Responsibilities Focus on overall infrastructure and system optimization with security standards while managing the overall system health, performance, and capacity Take care of the whole AWS infrastructure of MONIX; including maintenance of EC2 servers, Elastic Kubernetes Service, Route53, ELK, Kafka, RabbitMQ, RocketMQ, etc. Contribute to Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) solutions in AWS Lead projects through design, pilot and deployment for new security solutions across a large-scale production cloud environment. Implement, configure, and upgrade cloud computer systems, servers, firewall, intrusion detection and network infrastructure using security best practices and incorporating solutions to meet or exceed SOC2, ISO 27001, and other regulatory requirements. Research security trends and emerging technologies, identify our business and technical requirements, perform technical evaluation and support deployment of multi-regional security solutions. Review implementation of security controls and evaluate effectiveness, make recommendations for improvements Develop a strategy for dealing with the increasing number of audits, compliance checks and external assessment processes for internal/external auditors Work with auditors as appropriate to keep audit focus in scope, maintain excellent relationships with audit entities and provide a consistent perspective that continually puts the institution in its best light. Provide guidance, evaluation and advocacy on audit responses Keep abreast of security incidents and act as a primary control point during information security incidents Train internships with Linux, Kubernetes and Security knowledge Qualifications Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or Electrical Engineering is required. or Master’s Degree in Computer Science or Electrical Engineering is preferred. 3 years' experience in Linux systems administration skills including shell scripting, database programming, network administration and managing server infrastructures Well versed in cloud-based architectures, including web, application, and database components such as Nginx, Kafka, ELK, Jenkins, ArgoCD, MySQL, etc. Proficiency scripting in one or more programming languages: Python, Go, Java 2 Years Experience with CI/CD processes and tools such as Jenkins, ArgoCD, Git, Helm, etc. 2 Years Experience with Amazon Web Services (AWS) or Azure platform capabilities and architectural best practices as well as experience implementing security mechanisms and controls in a cloud environment. Familiarity with security forensics and analysis of security threats and events and able to perform vulnerability scans, analyze results and assist with remediation. A mature understanding of the DevSecOps role Feel comfortable working with a global team and work from home Is a plus - Knowledgeable in PCI, HIPAA, SOC, or ISO 27001 security compliance standards, certification, reporting and maintaining process Good command English [oral and written communication] skills with the ability to understand technology sufficiently to clearly communicate the complexity in simple terms for key stakeholders
