IT Project Manager (Max 60,000) ยินดีรับผู้ต้องการเปลี่ยนสายงาน ไม่ว่าจะเป็นสาย BA, SA, Tester หรืออื่นๆ มาสาย Project Management โดยอย่างน้อยต้องมีประสบการณ์ 2 ปี สำหรับสายงานนั้นๆ คุณสมบัติ จบการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี คณะ/สาขา วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์, เทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ, วิศวะคอมพิวเตอร์ หรืออื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีความรู้ความเข้าใจในพื้นฐานของ Software Developement Process มีความสามารถในด้านการสื่อสารกับผู้คนที่เกี่ยวข้องใน Project หรือตำแหน่งงานอื่นๆ มี Positive Thinking และพร้อมรับความท้าทายในการทำงานเชิง Project Management ความรับผิดชอบ ควบคุม Project ที่ได้รับมอบหมาย ให้สามารถดำเนินงานได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ ควบคุมเวลาและคุณภาพของ Project ให้มีคุณภาพตามความคาดหวังของลูกค้าและส่งมอบได้ตรงเวลา ควบคุม Resource ต่างๆ ให้เป็นไปตามงบประมาณที่กำหนดไว้ สามารถสรุปความคืบหน้าของ Project ที่ได้รับมอบหมายกับผู้ที่เกี่ยวข้องได้

Long Description Job description Monitors IT operational processes and procedures using a compliance management methodology to ensure that the company complies with all legal regulations and ethical standards Manages information flow by researching, recording and analyzing data and information with a regular flow of information and conducting compliance risk assessments. Trains and educates staff so that they are informed of any changes and updates to compliance guidelines Conducts regular assessments to determine whether policies are compliant with the law and regulation. Qualification 3-5 years’ experience in infrastructure area will be advantage. Bachelor's Degree or higher in Computer Engineering or Computer Science Good command in English (Both Speaking and Writing) Ability to work independently with limited direction in a fast-paced environment. Be a high-energy, motivated self-starter/learner and be able to learn new technology quickly. Ability to work under pressure and with timeline. Good communication skill and teamwork with cross function Good troubleshooting and problem-solving skills Be able to work up-country as assigned. Work location Surasak Road, Silom

Company: ATA IT (National Bank of Canada Group)
column8: Main Objectives and Activities: Support Network Team Assist the network team in incidents and troubleshooting activities. Provide technical support for network-related issues, diagnosing and resolving problems promptly. Plan and deploy network infrastructure, including routers, switches, firewalls, and other hardware including network cables. Perform capacity planning to anticipate future network needs. Upgrade and expand network infrastructure to accommodate growing organizational requirements. Configuration and Monitoring Configure and monitor network switches (Cisco IOS and NXOS), routers (Cisco, Huawei), firewalls (Palo Alto, CheckPoint, Fortigate), VPNs and load-balancers (F5). Monitoring by using existing tools to track performance, identify bottlenecks, and proactively address potential issues. Generate and analyze reports to assess network health and performance. Compliance with Bank Processes Adhere to bank processes and security policies in all network-related activities. Work Order Handling Manage work orders, including firewall rules requests, firmware upgrades, and network changes. Collaboration Collaborate with senior engineers to provide support for network infrastructure. Collaborate with other IT professionals to address complex network issues. Confidentiality Maintenance Ensure confidentiality in handling information processed, stored, or accessed by the network. Network Documentation Write and maintain comprehensive network documentation. On-Call Support Provide on-call support and address change requests outside of normal business hours. Experience and Skills: Hands-on Experience: Minimum of 3 years hands-on experience in one or more Firewall/IDS/IPS/UTM technologies, such as Cisco FMC, Palo Alto, or Checkpoint. 3+ years of experience in designing secure network architecture. Certifications Possess one or more of the following certifications: CCNA, CCNP, CCIE (preferred). Networking Expertise Expert understanding and hands-on experience with networking (TCP/IP) and the ability to apply this knowledge directly. TCP/IP Understanding In-depth understanding of TCP/IP, including services and ports. Security Expertise In-depth understanding of attack and defense strategies and secure network architecture and firewall security. Analytical and Troubleshooting Skills Extensive analytical and troubleshooting skills. Enterprise System & Network Architecture Strong knowledge of Enterprise System & Network Architecture. Language Proficiency Proficient in English (both written and oral) to effectively work with international customers. Optional Skills: Banking Environment Experience What you will get from ATA IT: 14 days’ vacation in first year Health insurance for staff & families Life insurance Dental fee for staff & families Provident fund Monetary Assistance (Childbirth, Funeral, Basket Visit) Annual Party Monthly Activities- Staff Birthday & Company Activities Annual Health Check Multi-national company with flexible working hours, but professional company culture Work from Home Policy

Company: TISCO Financial Group Public Company Limited
column8: Job Description We welcome talented individuals who have completed a Master's degree in Finance, Management, Accounting, Marketing, Economics, or related fields. The successful candidates will be provided opportunities to experience strategic business projects and be a part of professional team from various units as well as get trained and mentored closely by experienced managers. As part of strategy and product development unit, you will deliver sound and concrete retail banking strategies, realization action plans, and ensure the plan to reach the milestones on time. The talents must be willing to make a long-term commitment and strive to become future leaders of TISCO group. Qualifications - Master's degree in Finance, Management, Accounting, Marketing, Economics or any related fields. - 0-2 years’ experience, new graduates are welcome. - Dynamic, passionate, and self-driven individual who possesses exceptional leadership character. - Excellent analytical and conceptual skills. - Professional manner with strong entrepreneurial, communication and presentation skills. Company Overview TISCO was the first investment bank in Thailand, established in 1969. The name "TISCO" derived from the full company name at first founded, "Thai Investment and Securities Company Limited". TISCO has pioneered several financial services to serve the increasing needs of the Thai growing economy and earned its reputation in integrity and professionalism. In 2005, TISCO was the first finance company to upgrade its status to a commercial bank under the Bank of Thailand’s Financial Master Plan. TISCO has been recognized as a pioneer and sustained its leading role in auto hire purchase, provident fund management, private banking, brokerage and investment banking for over four decades. With its long-year expertise in financial and investment fields, today TISCO Bank engages in banking services for retail, SME and corporate clients through its 52 branch network in strategic location nationwide. TISCO aims to provides a wealth of opportunity to its clients for the realization of their goals. With its believe that "The opportunity can be created", it is here to create opportunities to serve Thai community. Additional Company Information Industry: Commercial Bank, Financial Services Benefits & Others:

Location:  The PARQ Building, Khlong Toei (near Queen Sirikit Convention MRT) Job Responsibilities: Month-end Closing and Financial Accounting Collaboration with GSC for monthly such as month-end closing and prepare journal entry, account reconciliation, and yearly physical count of fixed asset and tagging and analysis report to Finance team. Work with warehouse for inventory disposal process, sampling count with external auditor by location, and inform tax authority for supporting documents. Verify and follow up on tax invoices and filing to comply with regulations. Work on core and critical activities, such as fixed asset coordination, expense report review, SOX and other internal reports, inventory disposal, and investigation report to the Revenue Department Financial Reporting and Analysis Analyze monthly information based on Profit and loss statements and budget monitor and control spending with appropriate activities. Responsible for purchase pricing review & CN/DN to minimize the cost impact. Provide timely and relevant financial analysis to management to support decision-making to enhance shareholder value. Job Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in accounting/finance/data science & analysis >3 years of accounting or tax accounting experience Good command in English Good analytical skill Need to be capable of completing repetitive tasks in a time-constrained manner. Quick learner who grasps concepts quickly and is open to developing new skills. Be able to work in a team environment. – The candidate will report to a team lead but will need to be comfortable asking other members on the team questions Be able to travel to the 3M plant/Distribution center (Quarterly)

Jobtitle: It Security Engineer/Security Administrator / Security Architect
column8: You will be a key person to keep our work environment secured both digitally and physically. Maintaining awareness and best practice to keep our content secure. Jobs Description: Current understanding of common risks and vulnerabilities both in Cyber security and Physical security. Maintaining awareness and knowledge of security best practices, procedures and methods to ~400 operators. Conduct security incident handling, investigation, and propose management change to Executives. Manage internal, 3rd party and vendor security audits, report directly to Executives. Your will work with Security guards, Engineers, Software Developers and System Administrators. Optional Key Qualification: Potential candidate with Cyber security Certification Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH) Certified Informational Security Auditor (CISA) Fluent in English communication. Detail-oriented work methodically. Eagerness to dig into technical questions and examine them from all sides. Enthusiasm analytical and diagnostic skills. Benefits and Allowances : Annual Leave 14 days Scholarship Support Health Insurance Life Insurance Funeral benefits Shuttle Bus Monthly Movie Night Birthday Gift Annual and Performance Bonus Board games, Books and DVD Libraries Food Truck & Special Meal Sports budget Annual Health Check Up OT Payment & OT Meal Supported Influenza Vaccine Coffee & Tea Seasonal fruits

Jobtitle: IT Director - for QSR, FMCG, Food industry
column8: Key Responsibilities: IT Strategy and Planning: Develop and execute the IT strategy aligned with the company's objectives and growth plans. Assess and recommend technology solutions to drive operational efficiency and business performance. System and Network Management: Oversee the management and maintenance of the company's IT infrastructure, including servers, networks, and cloud services. Ensure data security, integrity, and disaster recovery plans are in place and regularly tested. Software and Application Management: Evaluate, select, and implement software and applications that support QSR operations, including point of sale (POS) systems, inventory management, and customer engagement tools. Manage software updates, patches, and integration of new solutions. Cybersecurity: Develop and enforce cybersecurity policies and procedures to protect sensitive data and customer information. Stay updated on the latest cybersecurity threats and technologies to implement effective security measures. IT Budget Management: Prepare and manage the IT department's budget, ensuring cost-effective solutions and resource allocation. Vendor Management: Manage relationships with IT vendors, negotiate contracts, and monitor service-level agreements (SLAs). Evaluate and select third-party IT service providers when necessary. Team Leadership: Lead, mentor, and develop the IT team. Foster a collaborative and innovative culture within the IT department. Compliance and Regulations: Ensure the organization's IT practices comply with industry regulations and standards. Stay informed about changes in regulations that may impact IT operations. Innovation: Identify and implement emerging technologies and trends that can provide a competitive advantage. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in information technology, computer science, or a related field (Master's degree preferred). Proven experience in IT leadership, preferably in the QSR, FMCG, Food industry. Strong knowledge of IT infrastructure, cybersecurity, and software solutions. Excellent project management and budgeting skills. Strong communication and interpersonal skills. Ability to align IT strategies with overall business objectives. Familiarity with QSR, FMCG, Food industry -specific technologies, such as POS systems and mobile ordering platforms.

Job Purpose/Role IT support officer monitor and maintain the computer systems and networks You could be installing and configuring computer systems, diagnosing hardware and software faults and solves technical and applications problems, either over the phone or in person Key Responsibilities - Setup, installation, configuration, and ongoing usability of desktop computers, peripheral equipment and software such as Windows setup, application & patch deployment, virus/malware protection and removal - Responsible for on-boarding process, including creation of accounts, email and other user request service - Coordinate the needs of in-house IT experts and vendors and contractors - Maintain inventory of IT-related assets Key Requirements/Skills/Experience - 3 years+ experience in the IT support field - Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineer or Related fields. - Strong knowledge of Windows and MacOS environment - Comfortable working independently, but has experience working in a team environment - Good command in English

Scope of work : As a Software Development Supervisor, you will be responsible for designing, developing, code and logic for applications. This position requires excellent communication and interpersonal skills and requires you to take advantage of opportunities to learn new technology and best practices of software development. You should have strong coding skills and a passion for building efficient and scalable systems. You should also have excellent problem-solving and communication skills and be able to work effectively in a team environment. You will work closely with the developers, SA, and project managers to implement and support the core functionality of the application. You should have strong problem-solving skills and a good understanding of computer technologies. You should have leadership skills and be able to motivate and manage a team. Responsibilities: Developing and maintaining code and logic for applications. Implementing and optimizing database structures and queries. Integrating with third-party systems and APIs. Implementing security and data protection measures. Optimizing the performance and scalability of the application. Ensuring that back-end systems are secure and reliable. Troubleshooting and debugging issues as they arise. Staying up to date with the latest computer technologies and best practices of software development. Providing technical guidance and mentorship to junior developers. Other duties may be assigned by the software development manager. Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in computer science or computer Engineering or a related technical field. Minimum 5 years’ experience in software development. Strong knowledge of computer programming languages such as Golang, Python, Java, PHP, Node js, C#, etc. Experience with databases such as MySQL, Microsoft SQL, MongoDB, or PostgreSQL, etc. Have knowledge with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, GCP, etc. Ability to develop and maintain code and logic for applications. Ability to design and implement optimized database structures and queries. Ability to integrate with third-party systems and APIs. Ability to implement security and data protection measures. Good problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Strong communication and collaboration skills. Familiarity with agile development methodologies. Ability to stay up to date with the latest computer technologies and best practices of software development. Ability to design efficient and scalable systems that meet the needs of users. Ability to troubleshoot and debug issues and complex problems. Ability to provide guidance and mentorship to junior developers and lead projects.

Company: Siam Commercial Bank Public Co., Ltd. (SCB)
column8: Job Summary Be a member of the team to lead in Security Intelligence and Operation practice. This person will continuously monitor and analyze relevant cyberattack events through the information available from centralized event log collection, threat intelligence reposition, and through the execution of the state of Art machine Learning (ML) and necessary data analytic components Job Description: Conduct Cybersecurity monitoring and event analysis Support on improving Threat detection and security protection model (ML, AI, Condition base) (depending on experience) Ensure all the identified anomaly event under responsibility are promptly investigated Perform threat intelligence analysis and communicate the result to stakeholders in order to improve people, process and technology. Support the organization as one of the advisors in cybersecurity event collection, cybersecurity analysis and cybersecurity response Perform Research and Development in the area of ‘Defense Security’ and assist the unit in development the practice roadmap Qualification: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, MIS, Information Security or IT related field. Knowledge in Security Operation Center, Cybersecurity analysis. CSOC-related technologies such as SIEM, UEBA, SOAR and Threat Intelligence are familiar. Basic knowledge of enterprise security architecture, security frameworks (NIST, ISO, etc.), and digital forensics. Knowledge in Digital forensic, Machine learning, Stat, Cloud technology is a plus. Relevant security certification is a plus, e.g. Cybersecurity incident handling, CISSP, CEH, GIAC. Strong leadership, security analytical and problem-solving skill. Good command in English.

Good experience and knowledge in Web service technologies (SOAP, REST, JSON, XML, OAuth) Technical background with on-premises, cloud, and hybrid technology stacks as well as best practices for adopting and implementing a highly automated DevOps culture is an advantage. Good personality with excellent negotiation skills. Having a good attitude toward teamwork and willing to work hard. Self-motivation and initiative. Talent Acquisition Team, Human Resources Management Department (Head Office) Muang Thai Life Assurance Public Company Limited 250 Ratchadaphisek Rd., Huaykwang, Bangkok 10310 Website : www.muangthai.co.th [link removed] Line Official Account : @mtlcareer LinkedIn : Muang Thai Life Assurance Public Company Limited

Company: Bank of Ayudhya Public Company Limited (Ayudhya Capital Auto)
column8: Position: Technical Leader – Software engineer Job description: Work with teams to translate the business requirements into solution and scalable / extensible. Mentor developers and assist them to solve issues in selected solutions. Coordinate and work with QA to maintain good quality of code. Work with DevOps, Security and Infrastructure team to manage and solve issues in the environment. Manage and maintain the CI/CD process for fully automated build. Innovate / research / design and develop / adopt technology, solutions, framework to apply in business. Manage related infrastructure on Cloud (ex: AWS) and on-Premised. Provide expertise in advanced programming concepts. Accountability on production incident, communicate to impacted party, impact and resolution analysis, following Change Control process, patching to production environment. Creatively solve complex problems. Develop web and mobile application platform. Feedback, recommend, participate to improve software development process, tools, working environment to be a happy workplace. Qualifications: Least 8 years of experience in software developments. Strong experience in working with Business Analysts or Business Customers for requirements definition and transforming these into technical design. Experience in agile: SCRUM and/or Kanban. Comfortable to work in dependently and good teamwork. Working experience with Jira, Confluence, Maven, Jenkins, Git and GoCD will be a plus. Very good command of English language. Technical experience in: Mobile technology : iOS, Android, Flutter Web technologies such as : Vue.js - single page applications framework Micro services API on : python, Spring Boot, Spring Framework (Rest, Security, Data), JPA Databases : noSQL and rdbms, elastic search AWS services such as : Lambda, containers, SQS, dynamoDB, S3, api gateway BDD and TDD and Automation Testing Krungsri Auto Human Resources Department 550 30th Floor, Krungsri Ploenchit Office (KSPO), Ploenchit Road, Lumpini, Pathumwan, Bangkok 10330 Tel: 02-708-8899

Jobtitle: Application Support/พนักงาน - คอมพิวเตอร์
Company: Eastern Water Resources Development and Management Public Company Limited
column8: หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบ : วิเคราะห์ ออกแบบ พัฒนา ปรับปรุง ดูแล ระบบสารสนเทศ (Application) และระบบฐานข้อมูล (Database) ตามความต้องการใช้งาน จัดการสิทธิ์การเข้าใช้งาน Enterprise Application ได้แก่ ระบบ SAP สนับสนุนการทำงานให้กับผู้ใช้งาน (IT Support) แก้ไขปัญหาทางด้านซอฟท์แวร์ที่เกิดจากการใช้งาน Enterprise Application และ Web Application จัดทำแผนปฏิบัติงานประจำปีในงานที่รับผิดชอบ และรายงานความก้าวหน้าของการดำเนินงานต่อผู้บังคับบัญชา จัดอบรม พัฒนาความสามารถพนักงานด้านการใช้งานเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ ประสานงาน และหรือประชุมโครงการที่ได้รับมอบหมาย คุณสมบัติ : จบการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี/โท สาขาสถิติ, สาขาวิทยาศาสตร์ข้อมูล สาขาวิทยาศาสตร์คอมพิวเตอร์/เทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ มีประสบการณ์ในงานด้าน SAP S/4 HANA  หรือ SAP EC , FI-CO Module หรือ MM Module S มีประสบการณ์ทำงานไม่น้อยกว่า 3 ปี ในการสนับสนุน ดูแลระบบสารสนเทศ มีความรู้ในการติดตั้งระบบปฏิบัติการ โปรแกรมสำเร็จรูป ดูแลรักษาและกำหนดสิทธิการใช้งานเว็บแอพพลิเคชั่น ดูแลแก้ไขปัญหาการใช้งานระบบสารสนเทศ และวิเคราะห์ปัญหาที่เกิดขึ้น และหาวิธีการแก้ไขปัญหานั้นได้อย่างถูกต้องและรวดเร็ว ให้กับผู้ใช้งาน สามารถใช้คอมพิวเตอร์ได้เป็นอย่างดี สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : East Water สำนักงานใหญ่ กรุงเทพฯ สวัสดิการ : ค่าสมาชิกศูนย์กีฬา/การออกกำลังกาย ค่าท่องเที่ยวและพักผ่อนของพนักงาน ค่าเล่าเรียนบุตร ฝึกอบรมหรือเรียนเพื่อพัฒนาตนเอง ประกันชีวิต และประกันอุบัติเหตุ ประกันสุขภาพพนักงาน และครอบครัว ค่ารักษาพยาบาล ค่าทันตกรรม พนักงานและครอบครัว โบนัสประจำปีตามผลประกอบการ กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ เงินช่วยเหลืองานมงคลสมรส เงินช่วยเหลือคลอดบุตร เวลาการทำงานยืดหยุ่น ทำงานสัปดาห์ละ 5 วัน วันหยุดพักผ่อนประจำปี 10 วัน, ลากิจ 5 วัน วันหยุดตามประเพณีไม่ต่ำกว่า 13 วัน Smartphone พร้อมซิมการ์ดสำหรับใช้ปฏิบัติงาน ฯลฯ การเดินทางมายังอาคารอีสท์วอเตอร์ : รถเมล์สาย 24, 69, 92, 107, 129, 138, 187, 504, 555 รถไฟฟ้า ฺBTS สถานีหมอชิต รถไฟฟ้าใต้ดิน MRT สถานีจตุจักร %MCEPASTEBIN%

Responsibilities Respond to requests for technical assistance in person, via phone, chat or email Diagnose and resolve technical hardware and software issues Research questions using available information resources Provide consultation to user on appropriate action Follow standard help desk procedures. Identify and Escalate situations requiring urgent attention Track and route problems and requests and document resolutions Resolve technical problems with on our networks, add on service. Prepare activity reports Manage the day-to-day planning and operational aspects of the project to ensure deliverable timelines are met. Be familiar and work closely with ICT team to ensure smooth After-Sales Support Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in related field or equivalent experience 2-3 years of prior IT experience, Add on service, Network, Cloud Platform, Firewall Prior experience working for a service provider is a plus VM ware, office 365, Amazon, Google. ICT Solution Good interpersonal skill and service minded Good problem solving and communication skill Passion, Positive and Creative to continue development the personal skills Good command of English Able to work on shift

Company Overview SkillLane is a digital learning solution that provides instant access to on-demand skills and knowledge taught by renowned industry experts.We've been helping over 600,000 learners and 50 well-known companies to acquire new skills and become the aspired version of themselves.Recently, we're ranked #1 fastest growing education company in Financial Times APAC High-Growth Companies in 2021 and 2023. With over 90 team members from 4 business units, we’re the only few Thai startups that generated over 100M THB annually while being profitable for several years in a row. If this excites you, why don't you just apply for one of our open roles? The Data Analyst will be part of the Strategy & Enterprise Solution team and work to ensure the team has the tools, models, data sources, and technical knowledge they require, with an emphasis on dashboarding, data visualization, and building models to drive strategy. This person should enjoy managing high volumes of commercial, financial, and operational data and be comfortable creating dashboards and providing insightful analyses. They will have the opportunity to directly influence senior management, and their contributions will have a wide-ranging impact on the commercial decisions of our business. The team’s culture is centered around rapid iteration with open feedback and debate along the way, plus strong collaboration with product, content, business, and marketing partners Essential Duties and Responsibilities : I. Visualization Turn complex data from varying sources and formats into informative and actionable insights Build dashboards, self-service tools, and reports to analyze and present data associated with customer experience, product performance, business operations, and strategic initiatives. Provide coverage on ad-hoc analysis from diverse partners and automate those needs over time Successfully bridge analytics and business, the ability to speak the language of both. II. Data Solution Streamline reports, processes, and procedures, and implement best practices for the team Engage with Product, Business, Engineering, and Marketing teams to capture requirements, influence the end-state way we make decisions, and craft BI tools to support those partners Closely partner with our technology team to develop global BI dashboards, data pipelines, sophisticated security controls, and scalable ad-hoc reporting including infrastructure investments in support of BI needs III. Quality Control & Monitoring Provision, management, and maintenance of dashboards and reports, as well as underlying data sources Identification of data quality problems and significant emerging trends at the earliest possible opportunity Improvements in the processes, methodology, and accuracy of forecasts and reports Qualifications: I. Required Attributed Excellent analytical and quantitative skills with strong attention to detail. 3+ years of experience in a Data Analyst, Data Visualization, or Data Scientist role, preferably for a digital subscription business. 3+ years of experience with BI & analytics tools (SQL, Tableau, Google Data Studio, Google Analytics, or similar) Strong ability to write complex SQL queries and manage databases Work professionally to understand business questions or requests and be able to suggest proper BI solutions which are measurable and scalable You are energized by translating raw data into decision-relevant insights and thrive providing your internal customers with what they need to excel II. Nice to have Advanced Excel modeling (VBA is a plus) Solid technical/functional knowledge in statistics; experience with R, Python, or similar Experience with MongoDB or Google BigQuery Accounting/Financial knowledge and commercial acumen Work location: Near BTS Saint Louis More info : 061-419-0701 (Team People)

Jobtitle: Data Management Specialist - SCGP (Data-Driven Change Management)
Company: The Siam Cement Public Company Limited (SCG)
column8: Job Summary: Responsible for conduct change management program and implementing change initiatives with collaborate with stakeholders and data teams and Identify skill gaps through data analysis and provide targeted training programs to equip employees with the skills needed to adapt to the changes. and utilize data to inform decision-making throughout the change process. To ensure the success of data-driven culture and build data capabilities, data literacy across the SCGP Responsibilities: Work with related stakeholders to define the data competency for employee and data citizen. Conduct the data-driven training program to ensure focus group is able to perform a new way of work. Conduct the data-driven showcase execution to ensure the self-service data analytics bootcamp has been performed. Manage the data-driven culture execution to ensure the data analytics capability building has been performed, adoption and data community. Qualifications: Bachelor/Master degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology, MBA, MIS (Bachelor G.P.A. > 2.70, Master G.P.A. > 3.30). Proficient in English (TOEIC score at least 550). 5-10 years of experience related to change management & project management. Knowledge of Change management methodologies and practices with focus on integrating data-driven. Knowledge of Data Management and Governance, Data Analysis and Reporting, Data-Driven Organization. Analytical skills and proficiency in data analysis and data analytics tools. Effective communication & interpersonal skills to engage with diverse stakeholders. Project Management , Training and Development, Stakeholder Awareness and Engagement. Leadership and influence skill.

column8: Our client is the leading companies and currently we have few positions which the working locations are in Rayong area. We are looking for a qualified candidate as below information. Working days/time:  Mon – Fri (8:00 – 17:00) Job overview : System Planning: Conduct interviews and business analysis of each department to promote improvement of business processes. Core system construction, operation, and maintenance: Propose system improvements and restructuring based on business knowledge and internal user requests, as well as maintenance and operation of existing systems. Infrastructure construction, operation, and maintenance: Review and evaluation of new technologies and products to improve services. Network and server operation, monitoring, and troubleshooting. Reinforcement of security measures and data protection systems. Jobtitle: Senior Product Development Specialist (Enterprise Data Services)
Company: Advanced Info Service Public Company Limited (AIS)
column8: Senior Product Development Specialist  ( Enterprise Data Services ) - Onsite Key Responsibilities - Develop a deep understanding of market trends, customer needs, and competitive landscape to shape the product strategy for network, SD-WAN, network security, and WiFi solutions. - Define product roadmaps, features, and enhancements based on strategic goals and customer feedback. - Collaborate with internal stakeholders to align product plans with overall business objectives. - Lead the end-to-end product development process, from concept to launch, ensuring products are delivered on time and within budget.  Work closely with cross-functional teams to translate product requirements into technical specifications for engineering teams.  Conduct regular reviews of product development progress, identify bottlenecks, and implement solutions to ensure timely delivery. - Stay current with industry advancements, emerging technologies, and best practices in network, SD-WAN, network security, and WiFi domains.  Drive innovation by proposing and evaluating new features, technologies, and approaches to enhance product offerings. - Foster effective collaboration between engineering, marketing, sales, and customer support teams to ensure alignment and successful product launches. - Oversee quality assurance and testing processes to ensure that products meet high standards of reliability, security, and performance.  Collaborate with testing teams to identify and resolve product issues in a timely manner. - Conduct market analysis and gather customer insights to identify new opportunities for product enhancements or new offerings. Utilize customer feedback and data to refine existing products and guide future development efforts. Qualification - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Business, or related field (Master's degree preferred). - 5-10 years of experience in product management or product development roles within the network, SD-WAN, network security, or WiFi domains. - Strong technical background with a proven track record of delivering successful products in complex technology environments. - Excellent project management skills, including the ability to prioritize tasks, manage schedules, and lead cross-functional teams. - Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities, with a data-driven approach to decision-making. - Outstanding communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with both technical and non-technical teams. - Demonstrated ability to drive innovation and stay current with industry trends and emerging technologies. - Relevant certifications (e.g., CCNA, CCNP, CISSP, CEH, CISSP, CISM, CCSP, CWS) are a plus. - Experience with agile development methodologies is highly desirable. - English Professional Working Proficiency is required. (This position reports to an expat manager.) Why Join Us: - Opportunity to play a critical role in shaping the future of Enterprise Data Services. - Work in a collaborative and dynamic environment that encourages innovation and professional growth. - Be part of a company committed to delivering top-tier solutions to clients worldwide.

At Alstom, we understand transport networks and what moves people. From high-speed trains, metros, monorails, and trams, to turnkey systems, services, infrastructure, signalling and digital mobility, we offer our diverse customers the broadest portfolio in the industry. Every day, 74,000 colleagues lead the way to greener and smarter mobility worldwide, connecting cities as we reduce carbon and replace cars. Could you be the full-time Software Principal Architect in Bangkok we’re looking for? Your future role Take on a new challenge and apply your engineering expertise in a new cutting-edge field. You’ll work alongside passionate, motivated and dedicated teammates. You'll contribute to the definition of the organization’s software strategy and roadmap. Day-to-day, you’ll work closely with teams across the business ensure the deployment of the organization’s software strategy and roadmap in the software systems in their scope and domain and much more. You’ll specifically take care of develop and lead continuous improvement and best practices to ensure software engineering efficiency and effectiveness. We’ll look to you for: Report on the progress of the deployment of the organization’s software strategy and roadmap. Ensure the architectural, technological, and technical consistency in the software systems in their scope and domain. Demonstrate that the design and architecture of the software system in their scope align with the business goals. Mentor the software architect team and provide technical leadership. Chair the design reviews of the software in their scope. Technically coordinates task forces and ensure appropriate return of experience is done. Support sourcing and tenders on software topics Keep informed of the evolution of technologies through techno watch. All about you We value passion and attitude over experience. That’s why we don’t expect you to have every single skill. Instead, we’ve listed some that we think will help you succeed and grow in this role: Degree in Software Engineering, Computer Engineering, Information Systems or a related field. Strong leadership and effective stakeholder and vendor relationship management skills. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills to solve complex software design and architecture issues. Excellent verbal English communication skills, with the ability to communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders. Deep understanding of software architecture principles, models, and methodologies. Experience in critical software design and architecture. Things you’ll enjoy Join us on a life-long transformative journey – the rail industry is here to stay, so you can grow and develop new skills and experiences throughout your career. You’ll also: Enjoy stability, challenges and a long-term career free from boring daily routines Collaborate with transverse teams and helpful colleagues Contribute to innovative projects Utilise our hybrid working environment Steer your career in whatever direction you choose across functions and countries Benefit from our investment in your development, through award-winning learning Benefit from a fair and dynamic reward package that recognises your performance and potential, plus comprehensive and competitive social coverage You don’t need to be a train enthusiast to thrive with us. We guarantee that when you step onto one of our trains with your friends or family, you’ll be proud. If you’re up for the challenge, we’d love to hear from you! Important to note As a global business, we’re an equal-opportunity employer that celebrates diversity across the 70+ countries we operate in. We’re committed to creating an inclusive workplace for everyone.

SAP Basis consultant provides operational Excellence in the areas SAP HANA, SAP Administration, SAP Basis, Monitoring, All Database, Operating System and Scripting and other infrastructure elements. Job Responsibilities: Management of SAP Basis activities, SAP Installation, SAP Upgrade, SAP Migration, Solution Manager, SAP HANA implementation in an SAP ERP, HANA, BW, BOBJ, PI/PO, Portal, Fiori, HANA Cloud Platform, etc. Emphasis in configuration, analysis, and troubleshooting. Extensive experience with Linux Virtualization, and Oracle RAC, as well as Solution Manager required. Experience with performance tuning, support/enhancement packs and patches and design SAP Architecture and Landscape. Install and Configure SAP Router. SAP System and Client Management Configure Transport Management System Setup SAP User and Authorization Design and Setup SAP Backup and Recover Monitor, Analyze, and Maintain Administration and System Performance Tuning. Provided Technical support, analysis and solved system problems. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or Higher in IT, Computer Engineering, or equivalent work experience Experience in performing a role as a Technical Consulting at least three end-to-end projects (Migration, Upgrades, Implementations) Require Functional/technical proficiency with at least 5 years SAP Basis consulting experience, with min 4-7 Full Cycle Project Implementation experience in a consulting environment. Experience in SAP Basis on multiple SAP Environments (Linux, Unix, Windows) Implementation experience of SAP applications (S/4HANA, ECC, PO, BW, CRM, SRM, BOBJ, etc.) Experience in SAP landscape strategy, providing SAP System maintenance, Client strategy, SAP Code migrations on schedule basis, Transport Management Systems, change management, workflow. Analysis and technical recommendation and application of OSS Notes Day to day maintain SAP batch job schedule, monitoring and interfaces jobs. Experience in SAP Disaster Recovery system testing and procedures Proficient in the administration and maintenance of multiple SAP systems and expertise in system landscape design Very Strong SAP Basis skills including installation, upgrade, patching, backup/restore, and Basis troubleshooting (ABAP & J2EE stacks) SAP Basis Administration including system refreshes and SAP HANA Administration Familiar with SAP ECC and HANA environments. Can document SAP processes, procedures, and plans; including changes, upgrades, and new services. Relevant SAP Certification would be a plus. Experience in SAP on cloud platforms would be a plus Ability to travel to client sites (local or overseas) Excellent leadership, communication (written and oral) and interpersonal skills Interested applicants please submit your CV with recent photo and identify Salary Expectation by click " Apply Now " Contact: Khun Patcharee (Lyn) Senior Human Resources 02 237 0553  Ext. 503 For more information, please visit our website at: www.nttdata-solutions.com

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: Be the coordinator between frontline and development team to ensure that the work process is smooth and users are able to use Conicle’s product perfectly Prioritize and delegate case and problem to the related team and ensure that all case and problem are all solved Support internal team for their work such as demo Other task as assigned KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND ABILITIES: Good knowledge and understanding for both users and internal team Excellent communication and problem solving skills Be a  proactive, organized and flexible person Love to update and learning new technologies EDUCATION AND EXPERIENCE: Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Computer engineering, Information Technology or Related Fields Experience in technical support at least 3 years in platform industry Experience in programming, QA Tester is a plus

At Alstom, we understand transport networks and what moves people. From high-speed trains, metros, monorails, and trams, to turnkey systems, services, infrastructure, signalling and digital mobility, we offer our diverse customers the broadest portfolio in the industry. Every day, 74,000 colleagues lead the way to greener and smarter mobility worldwide, connecting cities as we reduce carbon and replace cars. Could you be the full-time Project Cyber Security Manager in Bangkok we’re looking for? Your future role Take on a new challenge and apply your engineering expertise in a new cutting-edge field. You’ll work alongside passionate, motivated and dedicated teammates. You'll analyze Project / Program security needs (including laws and local regulations), determine security objectives and main security risks strategy. Day-to-day, you’ll work closely with teams across the business Cybersecurity Architecture definition and requirement allocation and much more. You’ll specifically take care of cybersecurity context, and Cybersecurity Risk Analysis. We’ll look to you for: Plan security activities within development life cycle, estimate costs and duration, their impacts related to project program execution, Identify training needs Provide support during technical design meetings for cybersecurity activities Obtain agreement from Project/Program/Customer  about on the set of security measures to be implemented Promoting the Alstom Code of Ethics and adhering to the highest standards of ethical conduct. Report on Program / Project Cybersecurity status All about you We value passion and attitude over experience. That’s why we don’t expect you to have every single skill. Instead, we’ve listed some that we think will help you succeed and grow in this role: Degree in Computer Engineering, Software Eingineering Experience with direct responsibility for hands on architecture, design, development Experience related to Cybersecurity in general, deployment experience of security technologies. Knowledge of Alstom Products & Solution Portfolio Experience in embedded or industrial systems (railway / aeronautics) Knowledge of some Cybersecurity solutions and areas Architecture concepts and techniques of systems and networks, operating systems and associated programming languages. Knowledge of main Cybersecurity standards and regulations, such as: ISO 2700X, 62443, NIST, NIS, French LPM Things you’ll enjoy Join us on a life-long transformative journey – the rail industry is here to stay, so you can grow and develop new skills and experiences throughout your career. You’ll also: Enjoy stability, challenges and a long-term career free from boring daily routines Collaborate with transverse teams and helpful colleagues Contribute to innovative projects Utilise our hybrid working environment Steer your career in whatever direction you choose across functions and countries Benefit from our investment in your development, through award-winning learning Benefit from a fair and dynamic reward package that recognises your performance and potential, plus comprehensive and competitive social coverage You don’t need to be a train enthusiast to thrive with us. We guarantee that when you step onto one of our trains with your friends or family, you’ll be proud. If you’re up for the challenge, we’d love to hear from you! Important to note As a global business, we’re an equal-opportunity employer that celebrates diversity across the 70+ countries we operate in. We’re committed to creating an inclusive workplace for everyone.

Responsibility: Mobile Platform Development: Lead and manage a squad of mobile platform developers, designers, and testers to deliver high-quality mobile platforms. Collaborate with product managers, UX/UI designers, and stakeholders to define platform requirements, features, and user stories. Oversee the entire mobile platform development lifecycle, from planning and design to development, testing, and deployment. Ensure adherence to mobile platform development best practices, coding standards, and UI/UX guidelines. Monitor platform performance and user feedback, identifying opportunities for optimization and enhancement. Mobile Backend Development: Coordinate with backend developers to design and develop robust and scalable mobile backend architectures. Collaborate with the backend team to define APIs and data models to support platform functionality and data exchange. Ensure seamless integration between the frontend and backend components of the mobile platform. Monitor backend performance, scalability, and security, identifying areas for improvement and optimization. Agile Project Management: Implement Agile methodologies (e.g., Scrum, Kanban) to manage the squad's work and facilitate efficient project delivery. Collaborate with product owners to prioritize the backlog, plan sprints, and define sprint goals and deliverables. Conduct daily stand-up meetings, sprint planning, sprint review, and retrospective sessions with the squad. Facilitate the squad's understanding and adherence to Agile principles and practices. Track and communicate project progress, risks, and impediments to stakeholders and management. Team Leadership and Collaboration: Provide guidance, mentorship, and support to the squad members, fostering their professional growth and development. Foster a collaborative team culture, promoting open communication, knowledge sharing, and cross-functional collaboration. Coordinate with other squads, product teams, and stakeholders to align priorities, resolve dependencies, and optimize resource allocation. Serve as a point of contact for the squad, addressing questions, concerns, and escalations from team members or stakeholders. Promote a culture of continuous improvement, encouraging innovation and identifying opportunities for process enhancement. Performance and Quality Management: Monitor and evaluate individual and team performance, providing regular feedback and coaching to enhance productivity and quality of work. Conduct performance reviews and set performance goals in alignment with company policies. Ensure adherence to quality standards and best practices in mobile platform and backend development. Identify training and development needs of team members, coordinating appropriate learning opportunities. Implement process improvements to enhance efficiency, productivity, and the quality of mobile platform and backend deliverables. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent work experience). Proven experience in leading and managing mobile platform development teams. Strong knowledge of mobile platform development processes and frameworks. Experience in designing and developing mobile backend architectures and APIs. In-depth understanding of backend technologies and concepts (e.g., RESTful APIs, databases, server-side languages). Strong understanding and practical experience with Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban). Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, both written and verbal.

Company: Ngernturbo Co., Ltd. / บริษัท เงินเทอร์โบ จำกัด
column8: Job Summary PMO works across the organization to align on common practices in delivery of high-quality pojects while driving and maintaining a strategic direction. We are seeking an experienced project manager in consultant, banking, to join team. The ideal candidate will have a strong track record of successfully managing complex projects from conception to completion. Aside from working on projects, the PMO manager is also responsible for leading a team of project managers and ensuring the team delivers their projects in a timely and cost efficient manner. Moreover, as a manager, you need to oversee end-to-end process from ideation to project deployment if it works most efficient and initiate changes if needed. Job Responsibilities Provide leadership and direction to a team of project managers who implements the combination of agile, waterfall practice and the scrum methodology for planning, execution, and delivery of projects. Able to work with senior management or C-Level leaders to deliver corporate strategic projects and other BAU projects. Standardize how, what, when to conduct the steering committee to make sure everyone is on the same page with latest information, visualize the state and clarify risks of the project. Able to initiate, implement, and consolidate only best practice, processes, and tools within technology team and across the organization. Lead project portfolio generation, conduct reviews, and use strong data analysis to manage risk and address escalated impediments Responsible for coaching and mentoring on Agile/Scrum methodologies/ and other principles and practices Qualifications Bachelor or Masters degree in Business Administration, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or any related field. Hands on and background in digital banking, software development. 3+ years of experience as a project manager. Excellent soft skills (Communication and presentation) and analytical thinking skills Working Location: Pak kret, Nonthaburi (On-site) Contact: K.Vanatip (Bua) 096-776-0675 - Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted -

General Purpose of the Position: Network Engineer will monitor the health monitoring and event investigation of the customer and internal connectivity services/infrastructure. This position is also responsible for providing customer service technical support. By working closely with Senior Network Engineer, this position will configure, deploy, maintain and provide documentation of the network infrastructure as well as be part of escalation. Supervisory Responsibilities: There are no supervisory responsibilities. Essential Duties and Responsibilities: Troubleshoot and resolve customer tickets. Works closely with the customer or with the vendor until resolution. Create and maintain diagrams and technical documents. Participate in IT projects and effectively meet deadlines with minimum supervision. Provide input and feedback for the use and optimization of internal network/system management, NOC processes, and procedures. In the event of a critical situation or major service outage, will perform crisis management. This includes activating a conference bridge and coordinating with a cross-functional team in English. Internal IT support for related IT equipment, data center network, and system infrastructure. Other Duties: Required to work on the day and night shifts. Required to work a flexible schedule/on-call rota according to business needs/events. Physical Demands Other duties as assigned. Required Job Skills: Able to read, write and communicate well in English and Thai. Excellent oral and written communication and interpersonal skills. Must be able to accurately communicate complex issues using easy-to-understand terminology. Ability to interact with staff (at all levels) in a fast-paced environment, sometimes under pressure, remaining flexible, proactive, resourceful and efficient, with a high level of professionalism. Experiences with one or more of the following security technologies will be a plus: Firewalls, Network Intrusion Detection Systems, Vulnerability Scanners, Virtual Private Networking, Virus protection technologies, Log Management, network access control, proxy servers, and data loss prevention. Servers & Storages appliances / cloud-based Compliance assessment/analysis software Common enterprise software and services such as MS365, AD, Telephony systems, etc. Education and Experience: Bachelor’s degree in, Computer Science, Computer Information Systems, IT management, or higher education. At least 2 years of experience within the Information Technology field or related educational background. IT Networking Related Certifications Physical Demands: While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to sit, stand, walk, bend, use hands, operate a computer, and have specific vision abilities including close and distance vision, and the ability to adjust focus working with computer and business equipment. If your position requires you to work in the field and/or warehouse, it is mandatory that you wear approved Personal Protective Equipment.

Job Details Rapid4Cloud are the global leaders in Intelligent Cloud Automation Software. For both new and existing users of Oracle Cloud Applications, our software accelerates the journey to the cloud, helping them set up, manage, and maintain their Oracle Cloud environment. Since 2003 we supported over 400 Oracle Applications users in more than a dozen countries to help them optimize the implementation of their solution and maximize the return on their investment. Our products use the very latest Artificial Intelligence and Robotic Process Automation technology to deliver a unique solution that is used by many of the world’s leading IT companies and system integrators. Our customers include companies from across the spectrum of industries, who all rely on Rapid4Cloud solutions to quickly enable the new ways of working inherent in Oracle’s ERP and HCM Cloud. We are dedicated to the success of your Oracle ERP and HCM Cloud projects and have experienced E-Business Suite and Cloud consultants who understand every aspect of an implementation. We’ve done over 400 of them! At Rapid4Cloud, our objective is to make it easier to implement and maintain Oracle Cloud Applications. Our team creates and delivers easy-to-use solutions that deliver extraordinary value for our customers. Automation is not new. Join the FUTURE OF THINGS and you will have an opportunity to be part ofthe team that takes intelligent hyper-automation to everywhere in the world. WHAT WE NEED: Experience with Oracle ERP, HCM Cloud solutions would be an advantage. As our customers are overseas the passion of achieving your deadlines is important but we do have an international team in Bangkok, USA and the UK to help. YOUR ATTRIBUTES: OWNERSHIP: You take responsibility for your tasks, organize the best way to get the job done, solve the problems, drive the tasks through to completion within the company. LEADERSHIP: At all levels from a graduate to a senior we are looking for leadership qualities. Know when to lead and when someone else has a better idea and help them succeed. ABILITY TO LEARN: You will learn new things in hours not days or weeks. Locate the different sources of knowledge, put it together and work out the next step. EXPERIENCE AND EDUCATION: Please provide any details you think relevant but also focus on showing how the required attributes either have or can be attained. Job Description: Consultants will have responsibility for: Provide functional expertise with the development of our software. Provide a strong consulting approach on engagements that are including automated solutions for the new functionality, Increasing the scope of existing modules, dealing with quarterly releases and Constantly striving for human free operation of our software. Be part of quality assurance to ensure the customer gets the best quality product possible. Conduct Super User or Partner training and able to apply various business cases. Coordination of activities across teams (Product Development, SQL, JAVA team) Work alongside Global system integration companies and our own overseas teams Requirements: A degree or higher. Oracle ERP Consultant Experience in Implementation of Oracle ERP cloud, HCM will be an advantage. To be an expert in the functional modules you are familiar with To have excellent problem solving Abilities to work remotely. Strong interpersonal & communication skills. Benefits: Security insurance Health insurance Annual Leave Annual salary adjustment

Company: Kasikorn Technology Group Secretariat Co., Ltd.
column8: POSITION: CYBER SECURITY: VULNERABILITY ANALYST & PEN-TESTER WHY WORK WITH US KBTG is a tech organization in Southeast Asia that focuses on digital business innovation. It branched off from KBank, one of Thailand's leading commercial banks, and aims to become the best tech organization in the region. KBTG is committed to revolutionizing financial experiences by developing and innovating financial technologies with a "Customer First" mindset and new generation thinking. Its vision is to become the future of digital banking, empowering customers with easy, quick, and secure access to all financial services in every ecosystem. WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT FROM US We value our people and aim to attract, develop and retain exceptional talent. We work in a truly agile and collaborative environment where opinions are actively encouraged. …. we have no time for finger-pointing and politics; instead, we test & learn and celebrate successes as a team. We will provide a training and coaching program to all our team members tailored to your development needs and aspirations. This can cover a wide range of skills, like mastering new technologies, developing your skills in presenting to a non-technical audience, or supporting your growth in a leadership position. DIVERSITY, EQUITY & INCLUSION AT KBTG Our DE&I policy is the synergy of our employees’ diverse genders, generations, races, cultures, backgrounds, experiences, perspectives, and practices to create a work environment where differences are respected and valued to achieve the organization’s vision of becoming a leader in digital infrastructure that fully connects people, organizations, economies, and societies to create sustainable value for life. WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING The Vulnerability Analyst & Pen-Tester (VAPT) is responsible for identifying threats and vulnerabilities and their associated security risks within KBank by performing vulnerability testing and penetration testing across the CSOC constituency and provides advice on how to remediate the vulnerabilities discovered. Performs security vulnerability assessment and penetration testing of internal, perimeter, external and wireless network and web and mobile application Characterizes threats and provides recommendation for remediation Advises appropriate business units on technical configuration and process changes, remediation, and best practices to adapt to changing threat, vulnerabilities and new attack method. Performs vulnerability assessment and penetration testing as business as usual (BAU) tasks. WHAT YOU NEED TO SUCCEED Two (2) years or more of Penetration testing and/or secure application development Good working knowledge of security concepts for both Windows and UNIX related operating Systems Familiar with application and infrastructure vulnerabilities Good working experience using various assessment tools, such as scanners, administrative utilities, local proxies, debuggers, fuzzier, etc Good working knowledge of web technologies, solutions and attack vectors that apply to application technologies, such as OWASP Familiar with application reverse engineering techniques and procedures BENEFIT AND PERKS Group Insurance, Annual Physical Check-Up, Spending Account 6,000/ year, Flexible Benefit, Provident Fund 13%, Housing Loan, Maternity Allowance, KBTG, Business Travel Benefits Policy, Leave and Vacation, Grab for Business, KBTG Academy (Skillane Training Class), Nap room. Talent Acquisition, KBTG Know us more via http://www.kbtg.tech *All applications will be accepted by mail or attached in MS. Word or PDF only.*

We are looking for Software Tester (Manual/Functional) Automate Tester (Robot framework/Cypress) Performance Tester (LoadRunner/Jmeter) Job Description: • Design test case and implement system test • Record/analyze test result and provide feedback to development team • Perform reporting the defect to the bug tracking system • Create automate test script by using Robot framework and Cypress for Automate test position • Create performance test script  by using LoadRunner and Jmeter for Performance test position • Co-ordinate with Developers , SA, and PM to solve software error • Develop project-related documents such as user acceptance test document and user manual • Coordinate and facilitate the User Acceptance Test Qualifications: • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science or related field • 0-3 years’ experience in Software Testing for Junior • Minimum 3 years’ experience in Software Testing for Senior • Knowledge of automate and performance testing tool would be an advantage • Knowledge of SQL Statement, Store Procedure, Query and Oracle PL/SQL is a plus • A proactive, team player with ability to work in dynamic environments • Able to work on site • Experience in Automation Testing and/or Holding ISEB/ISTQB would be a plus • Good Thai and English communication skills Based office location near MRT Jatuchak Park and BTS Mo Chit For more information about us please visit https://playtorium.co.th/

จัดทำแผนปรับปรุง ป้องกัน และหาแนวทางแก้ไข กรณีเกิดปัญหาขัดข้องที่เกิดจากระบบคอมพิวเตอร์และโครงสร้างพื้นฐาน (System) จัดทำแผนดูแล ติดตาม บำรุงรักษา เครื่อง Server ระบบคอมพิวเตอร์และโครงสร้างพื้นฐาน (System),ระบบ Data Center ให้พร้อมใช้งานอยู่เสมอทั้งภายในสำนักงานใหญ่และตามโครงการ วิเคราะห์และวางแผนการปรับปรุงพัฒนาประสิทธิภาพการทำงานของระบบปฏิบัติการคอมพิวเตอร์ให้สามารถทำงานได้อย่างรวดเร็ว ออกแบบ พัฒนาระบบป้องกันไวรัสและการบุกรุกเข้าใช้ระบบและเครือข่ายจากบุคคลภายนอกให้มีประสิทธิภาพเป็นปัจจุบัน จัดทำแผนทดสอบความพร้อมด้านระบบเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศและนำไปปรับใช้กับเหตุการณ์ฉุกเฉินได้ รวบรวมข้อมูล Feedback ของผู้ใช้งาน (User) จัดทำรายงานผลการปฏิบัติภาพรวมของทีม พร้อมข้อเสนอแนะหรือแนวทางแก้ไขปัญหาเสนอผู้บริหารของหน่วยงาน ผลักดันและประสานความร่วมมือกับส่วนงานที่เกี่ยวข้องทั้งภายในสายงานและภายนอกสายงาน เพื่อให้งานที่ได้มอบหมายเสร็จตามแผนงานที่กำหนด คุณสมบัติ : วุฒิการศึกษา ปริญญาตรี สาขาบริหารคอมพิวเตอร์ธุรกิจ,วิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์ IT,MIT หรือที่สาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ ดูแล/ ติดตั้ง ระบบปฏิบัติการคอมพิวเตอร์ (Server and System) และระบบฐานข้อมูล (SAN and Database) อย่างน้อย 7 ปีขึ้นไป มีประสบการณ์ บริหารจัดการห้อง Data Center และ มีอุปกรณ์ Network ไม่น้อยกว่า 50 Devices มีทักษะการใช้งาน, Microsoft Visio 2007 ขึ้นไป, Microsoft Project 2007 ขึ้นไป, Windows Server 2008 ขึ้นไป, Exchange Server 2010 ขึ้นไป, Microsoft SQL 2008 ขึ้นไป, Redhat Ent5 ขึ้นไป, ระบบ VMware 4.1 ขึ้นไป, EMC Storage, SAP Basis" มีทักษะในการคิดวิเคราะห์ การตัดสินใจ และนำเสนอขบวนการแก้ปัญหาได้อย่างเป็นระบบ มีความรับผิดชอบ ทำงานเป็นทีมได้ ทำงานภายใต้สภาวะกดดันและภายในระยะเวลาที่กำหนด มีทักษะการสื่อสารที่ดีมีประสิทธิภาพ มีใจรักในการให้บริการ มีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์ที่ดี คล่องแคล่วในการทำงาน เรียนรู้เร็ว ละเอียดรอบคอบ

About Bluebik – Ambition to Reality Bluebik is the leading consultancy focusing on comprehensive advice on digital transformation to transform the capabilities of our clients through technological application. We provide transformation consulting consists of Management Consulting – advice on strategies and management, Digital Excellence & Delivery covering in-depth recommendations on digital and technological development within organizations, Strategic PMO – advice on tangible benefits and significant cost saving through clients’ business process, Big Data & Advanced Analytics – provide end to end solution for Big Data & Advanced Analytics from strategy to implementation. Work you will do Responding to queries via email, phone, or other agreed communication channels within the agreed SLA Troubleshooting and diagnosing incidents Resolving the common incidents following the guidelines Escalating the issues to Tier-2, Developing Team, or 3rd Party vendors and coordination between users to ensure full resolution of issues Monitoring and following up with users to ensure the status if issue tickets is updated by the appropriate parties Creating the detail incident report and monthly incidents summary reports Verifying systems to ensure system are working correctly after the regular maintenance activities Follow the security guidelines and working procedures Develop User Guide documents, FAQ, and related documentation. Let us Talk About You If you are someone with: Bachelor/ Master’s degree in computer related field Minimum 3 years’ in application helpdesk support Experienced in multiple issue tracking tools Strong analytical and Problem-Solving skills. Ability to prioritize and complete multiple tasks in a fast-paced, technical environment Having programming background and preliminary middleware knowledge Ability to working in shift and on holidays Ability to Troubleshoot and Diagnose problems Ability to Communicate Effectively to help users fix their issues and feel satisfied with the experience, Writing and Editing Skills to create incident reports Ability to do system operating following the troubleshooting guideline Being flexible and open to regular changes Desire to continue learning and improving Why work with us We are a team of experts in a talented community, a collaborative atmosphere where creativity is encouraged. People First, by putting people at the heart of our priorities, we foster a work environment where you can excel and grow personally and professionally. Bluebik is strived for growth and expansion, and you can be part of our success story. We combine strategy, digital delivery excellence and deep technology advisory to help our clients transform their business. At Bluebik, your career advancement starts with actions. You can manage your own career and will advance based on performance. We collaborate to create unique and outstanding experiences with our talents to empower learning and growth opportunities. Whatever your ambitions, Bluebik offers you with a highly inclusive community of talents from both tech and business worlds to realize your full potential. What we offer We offer impactful and challenging work with mentorship and support from direct managers and subject matter experts. You will have autonomy to manage your career path with endless opportunities for professional growth. Our comprehensive benefit package covers medical insurance, life, accident and disability insurance, wellness allowance, vaccination allowance, providence fund, flexible working arrangement, and Professional certification. Bluebik provides opportunities to become the best version of yourself! Equal opportunity Bluebik is an equal opportunity employer. We owe our success to the talents of our diverse team and the varying perspectives they add to our thriving community. Recruitment agencies Bluebik does not accept unsolicited resumes sent by recruiting agencies. Please do not forward resumes to our job postings, Bluebik employees or other parts of the business. Bluebik will not be liable to pay any fees to agencies for candidates hired as a result of unrequested resumes.

Develop meaningful and lasting relationships with partners for optimized systems integration and respond to questions and concerns from managers and executives. Experience in generating process documentation and reports Excellent communication skills, with an ability to translate data into actionable insights Preferred skills : Bachelor’s degree or Master’s Degree in information technology or computer science. Strong working knowledge of relevant Microsoft applications, including Agile. Proven ability to manage projects and user testing. Extensive experience with data visualization. High proficiency in technical writing.

DRIVEN BY POSSIBILITY Gates Corporation is a leading manufacturer of application-specific fluid power and power transmission solutions. At Gates, we are driven to push the boundaries of materials science to engineer products that continually exceed expectations. We don’t rest on our rich heritage of innovation. We leverage it to inspire solutions that will power the next hundred years. We invest continually in R&D and technology, so our products not only outperform industry standards; they exceed our customers’ demanding expectations. We invest in our people, bringing real-world experience that enables us to solve our customers’ diverse challenges of today and anticipate those of tomorrow. And we are constantly expanding our product catalog and value-added service offerings to support every facet of our customers’ operations. In the most extreme environments and those more familiar, Gates is there with the right product, in the right place at the right time. Whether building original equipment or maintaining products in the aftermarket, we enable companies in every industry to be more efficient, productive, and profitable. We are Gates. POSITION SUMMARY: We are searching for a Regional Project Manager VAVE to deliver the project end-item within budget and time limitations, in accordance with technical specifications and in fulfilment of profit objectives. YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES / ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES : Accountability #1: Customer (Internal / External Stakeholders) Interfacing with and influencing stakeholders. Conducting VAVE workshop with key stakeholders to Identify the areas of high costs and to eliminate them with the help of team. Accountability #2: Process / Performance Ability to gather and analyze data, perform cost analysis to support regional management to make informed decisions based on data driven insights and get business case approval for the ideas. Identification of the right products with good potential for subsequent VA/VE activities. Applying framework-based approach to product cost improvement through idea generation and implementing engineering change. Cost estimate on Bought Out Parts and challenge supplier / internal stakeholders to get optimized / realistic cost. Should have fair process knowledge on casting, stamping, and machining process such as turning, milling, hobbing and broaching process and basic knowledge on surface finish & treatment. Monitoring project status. Identifying technical and functional problems. Solving problems directly or knowing where to find help. Dealing with crises and resolving conflicts. Recommending termination or redirection of efforts when objectives cannot be achieved through established Gates Review System (VA-VE CRB / GPMS). Accountability #3: People Negotiating with and integrating functional managers, suppliers, and top management. KEYS TO SUCCESS: Well organized and disciplined individuals. SUPERVISORY RESPONSIBILITIES: This is an individual contributor role that works with multi discipline team to drive cost of optimization initiative. YOUR QUALIFICATIONS/ QUALIFICATIONS & PREFERRED SKILLS : To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily.  The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Minimum 5 years, proven track record in automotive aftermarket industry, deep understanding of automotive aftermarket value chain (from suppliers to end users). Have a strong experience in cost reduction projects. Proficient in handling project management tools & principles (requirements, scheduling, risk mitigation, budget, and metrics). REQUIRED SKILLS: Expresses oneself clearly and concisely in both written and oral communications in English. Flexible and adaptable, preference for initiative and leadership. Effective communicator and integrator. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, strategic mindset and strong business acumen. Ability to translate business requirements into project requirements. Able to balance technical solutions with time, cost, and human factors. A generalist rather than a technical specialist. Able to devote most of his time to planning and controlling. PHYSICAL DEMANDS: (travel, etc) While performing the duties of this job, the employee is frequently required to sit; use hands to finger, handle, or feel objects, tools, or controls; and talk or hear. The employee is occasionally required to stand, walk, and reach with hands and arms. Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision. Ability to travel up to 50% of the time, including international travel. We are firmly committed to the equitable treatment of all our employees and qualified applicants for employment.  Equal opportunity in all aspects of employment is one of our firmest and most basic beliefs and we will not tolerate any illegal discrimination, harassment, or retaliation.  The Company will not tolerate discrimination or harassment on the basis of race, religion, national origin, sex, age, physical or mental disability, marital status, sexual orientation or any other protected class. Please be advised that Gates Corporation does not accept resumes from third-party recruiters.

column8: Job Responsibility : รับผิดชอบในการปรับปรุง ออกแบบ และติดตั้ง ระบบการให้บริการทางเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ (IT Service Management) ครอบคลุมในส่วนงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง (IT Operation, IT Infrastructure and IT Development) ให้เป็นไปตามมาตรฐานของ ITIL Framework รับผิดชอบในการปรับปรุงขั้นตอนการปฏิบัติงานในส่วนงานที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการให้บริการทางเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ (Standard Operation Procedures) ให้มีความสอดคล้องกับมาตรฐาน ITIL Framework และข้อกำหนดของ Regulators รับผิดชอบและวางแผนการพัฒนาทักษะของทีมที่เกี่ยวข้อง ให้สามารถปฏิบัติงานได้อย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ ช่วยงานผู้อำนวยการฝ่าย ในการปรับปรุง IT Governance ติดตาม วัดผล และแก้ไขปัญหาต่างๆ และควบคุมการพัฒนาฯ ให้ได้คุณภาพและสำเร็จลุล่วงตามกำหนด ให้คำปรึกษาและแก้ไขปัญหาให้กับบุคลากรในสังกัด รวมถึงผู้เกี่ยวข้อง ประสานงานกับหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้อง Job Qualification : จบการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี หรือปริญญาโทในสาขาวิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์ หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง หรือมีประสบการณ์ตรงตามลักษณะงาน มีประสบการณ์การทำงานในสาย IT Operation มาไม่ต่ำกว่า 10 ปี มีความรู้ความเข้าใจในการบริการ Data Center จะรับพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ มีประสบการณ์การทำงานใน IT Service Management,  IT Governance

Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Technology or IT related field At least 2 years works experienced in IT support, Network system and System administration etc., Knowledge in Win10/11, Office365, VMware Knowledge in Networking, including LAN and WLAN and remote access technology. Good in problem solving, organizational, communication inter personal skills and service mind. Good communication in English Skill include writing, speaking and reading. Service minded, Team Player and able to work under pressure. Able to work with multinational company. Responsibilities: Monitors and maintains the company computer/network systems. Setup operation system, software maintenance and upgrade (Office 365, Security Program, several external programs) Support/Installation/Maintenance  and manage IT infrastructure, file server, PC’s and Laptops, copy machine, printer, access control, server room, IT peripherals, telephone and mobile devices and any IT equipments. Performing remote troubleshooting through diagnostic techniques and questions. Provide support, including procedural documentation and relevant reports. Stand-by for emergency support and co-ordinate with IT Emergency on Call, Conduct electrical safety checks on computer equipment. Overlook and installation Lan, wireless Lan, Internet. Setup VPN connection, Firewall maintenance. IT warehouse product management. Other assignments by immediate supervisor. Be a team player in a young team, which support our new reservation program. You will be responsible for the support with our departments all over Thailand, working closely with all the staff in our company  and also with our partners all over the world. Be a part of our growing system. Interesting and challenging tasks will be a part of your everyday work. Join our young team and international colleagues. We are waiting for you. Jobtitle: Senior Manager: Corporate Strategy & Business Intelligence
column8: Responsibilities Conduct a thorough research on business trends, economic development, competitor dynamics, and current events to provide relevant business insights and actionable recommendations. Coordinate with business units to develop initiatives as key growth strategies to support business growth, sustainability, and capability enhancement while enhancing cross-business synergies. Apply analytical frameworks to evaluate overall performance against targets, including feasibility analysis and financial statement analysis. Deliver ad-hoc analysis and special projects as requested. Qualification Bachelor's degree or higher in Business Administration, Finance, or Economics or a related field. 8–10 years of experience in Corporate Strategy, Business Analysis, and Planning. Have a strategic mindset with strong analytical skills. Understand the big picture. Experience in the hospitality business is an advantage. Good command of English, both writing and speaking. Excellent communication and presentation skill. Good interpersonal skill.
