System Analyst  (contract) Job description • Analyzing and gathering customer requirements. • Documenting system design aspects, such as Requirement Spec, Data Dictionary, DFD, ERD, UML, Program Checklist, Program Flow, Application Specification, etc. • Offering viable alternatives for the developed system, serving as a consultant in Systems Design. • Collaborating closely with Business Users to align the project with customer Business Needs. • Coordinating with the Project Manager to ensure smooth collaboration, excellent service, and customer satisfaction. • Preparing Test Case and Test Scenario for system testing. • Controlling system installation and conducting system testing to meet customer needs before project delivery. • Investigating and resolving intricate systems issues across applications. • Preparing training materials and documentation, including User manuals and System manuals. • Creating a project plan suitable for team use. • Supervising and educating relevant staff. • Maintaining and managing available resources for efficient and seamless work, including conflict resolution within the team. • Coordinating, demonstrating, and reporting progress status to the team leader. • Researching new technologies to meet the on-demand needs and requirements of the product. Qualifications: • Holds a bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, or a related IT field. •  Understanding of the SDLC concept. • Capable of working under pressure with defined deadlines while maintaining high standards of quality.

Jobtitle: Cloud Solution Engineer - AWS (Infra | DevOps | Data | Security)
column8: ภาพรวม ที่เดลิเทค, ทีม Solution มุ่งมั่นที่จะปูทางการปฏิวัติในวิธีการทำงานของลูกค้าบนแพลตฟอร์มคลาวด์. เราเสนอบริการที่ครอบคลุมเริ่มต้นจากการสรรหาและวางแผนสถาปัตยกรรม, ออกแบบระบบ, กำหนดค่า, และการเสริมสร้างความรู้ในการใช้งานคลาวด์. การเข้าร่วมกับทีมเราสามารถเปิดโอกาสในการสัมผัสประสบการณ์ทางธุรกิจจากหลายเซกเตอร์, พร้อมได้รับความท้าทายทางเทคโนโลยีในด้านเน็ตเวิร์ก, ความปลอดภัย, แอปพลิเคชัน และการจัดการข้อมูล. เรากำลังมองหาผู้มีแรงบันดาลใจในการแก้ปัญหาและทำงานร่วมกับลูกค้า, คนที่หากว่าตนเองท้าทาย, และมีความคิดสร้างสรรค์อย่างล้ำเลิศ. คุณสมบัติที่เราค้นหาได้แก่: มีความรู้พื้นฐานทางด้านคอมพิวเตอร์, เชี่ยวชาญระบบปฏิบัติการ Linux และ Windows, มีความตระหนักเรื่องความปลอดภัย, และความยินดีที่จะทำงานเป็นทีมเพื่อสร้างประสบการณ์สุดพิเศษให้กับลูกค้าของเรา. รายละเอียดเพิ่มเติม คุณจะได้ทำอะไร - คุณจะได้ส่งมอบความเชี่ยวชาญในการออกแบบ, การตั้งค่าระบบ, และการเสนอแนวทางปฏิบัติที่วิธีการขั้นสูง และจัดทำเอกสารที่ครอบคลุมการส่งมอบ. คุณจะมีโอกาสจัดเวิร์คช็อปเพื่อแนะนำลูกค้า, และร่วมมือในการแก้ปัญหาของพวกเขา ในฐานะผู้เชี่ยวชาญ, คุณยังจะได้ประยุกต์ใช้ทักษะในการเขียนโปรแกรมสคริปต์และใช้งาน Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) ที่มุ่งเน้นไปที่ความปลอดภัย, เสถียรภาพ, และความประสิทธิภาพ เพื่อสร้างสิ่งที่ลูกค้าสามารถดูแลและจัดการต่อไปได้ ด้วยการให้คำปรึกษาที่ตรงจุด และทำให้โครงการเป็นคุ้มค่ามากยิ่งขึ้น ทำไมงานนี้ถึงสำคัญ - การสร้างและการตั้งค่าที่คุณทำขึ้นจะถูกนำไปประยุกต์ใช้ในแอปพลิเคชันที่มีความสำคัญในระดับประเทศและบนเวทีนานาชาติ อะไรเป็นความท้าทาย - การทำงานในฐานะผู้สร้างโซลูชั่นนั้นเปิดโอกาสให้คุณเผยแพร่ศักยภาพในเขตขอบที่กว้างและต้อนรับการเปลี่ยนแปลงตามเทคโนโลยีคลาวด์ที่รักษาความเป็นสิ่งมีชีวิตอยู่เสมอ คุณจะได้ฝึกฝนการตัดสินใจและความยืดหยุ่นในการออกแบบโซลูชั่นที่สอดคล้องกับความต้องการที่เฉพาะเจาะจงของลูกค้าและการพัฒนาของเทคโนโลยี ในขณะที่ความท้าทายที่ซับซ้อนจะปรากฏตัวในการเริ่มต้น, กับประสบการณ์ที่คุณสะสมมา คุณจะได้เผชิญหน้ากับปัญหาที่มากยิ่งขึ้นในระดับความซับซ้อน คุณจะได้เป็นผู้สร้างและนำอนาคตในการตอบสนองและสร้างสิ่งใหม่ในการเซอร์วิสให้กับลูกค้า, และจะได้สัมผัสกับความท้าทายใหม่ๆ ในแต่ละวัน. คุณสมบัติขั้นต่ำ ผู้สมัครควรมีวุฒิการศึกษาไม่ต่ำกว่าปริญญาตรี หรือปริญญาโท ในสาขาคอมพิวเตอร์หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง ต้องมีความรู้และเข้าใจด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศและการสื่อสารอย่างละเอียด ควรสามารถใช้ภาษาอังกฤษเป็นอย่างดีเพื่อการสื่อสารในการทำงาน มีความสนใจและ/หรือมีประสบการณ์ทางด้าน Amazon Web Services คุณสมบัติพิจารณาเพิ่มเติม ประสบการณ์ในการออกแบบและการใช้งานระบบบน AWS หรือแพลตฟอร์มคลาวด์อื่น มีความเชี่ยวชาญทางด้านระบบ, เครือข่าย, และมาตรการความปลอดภัย มีความชำนาญในการใช้เครื่องมือของระบบปฏิบัติการ Linux/Unix ประสบการณ์ในการออกแบบและดูแลระบบขนาดใหญ่ ประสบการณ์ในการให้คำปรึกษาด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ คุณสมบัติส่วนตัว มุ่งมั่นในการเรียนรู้และพัฒนาความรู้ความสามารถอย่างต่อเนื่อง มีความอดทนและมุ่งมั่นในการแก้ไขปัญหาที่พบ สามารถทำงานร่วมกับทีมได้ดีและสนับสนุนคณะทำงาน เปิดรับและยืนยันต่อการเปลี่ยนแปลงทางด้านเทคโนโลยีและนวัตกรรม เพิ่มเติม โปรดคลิกที่ ลิงก์นี้ เพื่อศึกษารายละเอียดเกี่ยวกับการทำงานกับเรา [link removed] Overview At DailiTech, the Solution team is dedicated to paving the way for a revolution in how customers work on cloud platforms. We offer comprehensive services starting from recruitment and architectural planning, system design, configuration, and enhancing knowledge in cloud usage. Joining our team opens opportunities to experience business across various sectors, along with the challenge of dealing with technology in networking, security, applications, and data management. We are looking for individuals inspired to solve problems and work with clients, those who challenge themselves and possess outstanding creative thinking. The qualifications we seek include: basic computer knowledge, expertise in Linux and Windows operating systems, awareness of security issues, and a willingness to work as a team to create an exceptional experience for our clients. More Details What you will do - You will deliver expertise in design, system configuration, and propose best practices in advanced methodologies, along with preparing comprehensive documentation for delivery. You will have the opportunity to conduct workshops to guide clients, and collaborate in solving their problems. As an expert, you will also apply your skills in scripting and using Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC) with a focus on security, stability, and efficiency to create solutions that clients can maintain and manage. By providing targeted consultation, you make the projects even more valuable. Why this job is important - The setups and configurations you create will be applied in applications that are important at both national and international levels. What the challenge is - Working as a solution builder opens opportunities for you to unleash your potential in a broad and ever-changing technological landscape, especially in cloud technology that is always evolving. You will practice decision-making and flexibility in designing solutions that align with the specific needs of clients and technological advancements. While complex challenges may appear at the start, with your growing experience, you will face increasingly complex problems. You will be a creator and lead the future in responding and innovating in services for clients, encountering new challenges every day. Minimum qualifications Applicants should have a minimum educational qualification of a Bachelor's degree or a Master's degree in Computer Science or a related field. Must have knowledge and a detailed understanding of information technology and communications. Should be able to use the English language proficiently for communication in a work environment. Have an interest and/or experience in Amazon Web Services. Additional qualifications considered Experience in designing and operating systems on AWS or other cloud platforms. Expertise in systems, networks, and security measures. Proficient in using tools of Linux/Unix operating systems. Experience in designing and managing large-scale systems. Experience in providing IT technology consulting. Personal qualifications Committed to continuous learning and development of skills and knowledge. Possesses patience and determination in solving encountered problems. Able to work well with a team and support the working group. Open to and embracing changes in technology and innovation. Additional information Please click on this link to learn more about working with us. [link removed]

Company: PCS Security and Facility Services Limited
column8: Main Duties & Responsibilities of the Role Prospect for new customers and opportunities through a variety of channels, including calls, emails, LinkedIn, and events. Manage the full sales cycle: prospect, qualify opportunities, present solutions and demos, progress deals, create proposals, negotiate and close deals. Establish a clear activity plan for the target opportunity leads. Arrange meetings with potential customers, gain Customer Intelligence and understand customer needs and pain points. Conduct site visits, prepare scope of work, costing and contract drafts. Together with our technology partners, develop solutions that add value to the customer (utilizing technology and data for efficiency and improved decision making). Attend key industry functions, such as association events and conferences, and provide feedback and information on market trends. Keeping up to date with market, industry and competitor trends to identify opportunities for new business growth and help develop the company’s unique selling propositions and differentiators. Develop sector specific solutions and value propositions based on our technology solutions and overall strategy that capitalizes on opportunities to benefit customers. Work with internal technical staff and partner organizations to meet customer needs and resolve customer pain-points. Work closely with colleagues across all Business Units within sales and operations to jointly identify and pursue opportunities. You have Minimum of 3 years’ Experience in a quota-carrying Business Development role managing the full sales-cycle for technology-based solutions. Bachelor’s Degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Facility Management or related field. Good knowledge of networking, IP-based technologies and applications. Effective and strong English and Thai Communication Skills (listening, speaking, reading, writing) with the ability to build rapport and nurture relationships. Strong presentation and negotiation skills. Computer literate in Microsoft Office and ability to work in CRM systems (i.e. Salesforce). A proven ability to exceed targets. You are A confident, self-motivated, curious and ambitious self-starter and team player. Possess a pro-active approach to sales and business development. Possess the ability to listen, understand and articulate client needs clearly. Creative and resourceful in addressing ambiguity, challenges and setbacks with a GROWTH mindset. Commercially aware with an unwavering commitment to delivering customer service and excellence. Possess good organizational skills and are able to handle multiple priorities. Exhibit good core values. Benefit Salary 50,000THB Social Security Fund Medical Insurance Provident fund Five-day work week Flexible working hour

Company: Regional Container Lines Public Company Limited
column8: Responsibilities: Providing Application maintenance for RCL's Core business application, by becoming an expert on all aspects of these systems. Delivering support to existing business users and investigating and resolving application errors. Establish Test cases for application testing when new build or patches applied. Responsible for Application Testing for enhancement of existing modules and also for new modules. Working with the Business Teams and Business Process Teams in identifying and proposing application system changes, better users, enhancements and developments and liaising with appropriate in-house development and vendor development teams and also be responsible for communicating with users. Able to generate ad-hoc reports as and when required by business users. Qualifications: Bachelor's or Masters degree in Computer Science / Software Engineering or related Minimum 3 years of experience in programming especially PL/SQL Good knowledge of Oracle Database. Extensive knowledge of Query scripts and Procedures. Strong analytical and problem skill, also knowns of problem statement and decision making Knowledge of extensive analysis to do to understand what needs to happen and what needs to do next step.

Jobtitle: Corporate Strategy - IT Planning and Strategy
Company: Kasikorn Technology Group Secretariat Co., Ltd.
column8: POSITION: CORPORATE STRATEGY WHY WORK WITH US KBTG is a tech organization in Southeast Asia that focuses on digital business innovation. It branched off from KBank, one of Thailand's leading commercial banks, and aims to become the best tech organization in the region. KBTG is committed to revolutionizing financial experiences by developing and innovating financial technologies with a "Customer First" mindset and new generation thinking. Its vision is to become the future of digital banking, empowering customers with easy, quick, and secure access to all financial services in every ecosystem. WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT FROM US We value our people and aim to attract, develop and retain exceptional talent. We work in a truly agile and collaborative environment where opinions are actively encouraged. …. we have no time for finger-pointing and politics; instead, we test & learn and celebrate successes as a team. We will provide a training and coaching program to all our team members tailored to your development needs and aspirations. This can cover a wide range of skills, like mastering new technologies, developing your skills in presenting to a non-technical audience, or supporting your growth in a leadership position. DIVERSITY, EQUITY & INCLUSION AT KBTG Our DE&I policy is the synergy of our employees’ diverse genders, generations, races, cultures, backgrounds, experiences, perspectives, and practices to create a work environment where differences are respected and valued to achieve the organization’s vision of becoming a leader in digital infrastructure that fully connects people, organizations, economies, and societies to create sustainable value for life. WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING As an IT Planning and Strategy, you will be responsible for managing the strategic planning, corporate performance, and strategic communication. Strategic Planning Overseeing and formulating the annual IT strategic roadmap that aligned to KBTG mission/vision, and KBank direction. Defining OKR at company level and communicating to all subsidiaries and departments. Facilitating meetings and workshops that related to strategic decision. Working closely with chairman office on assignments. Acting as a change agent to support changes as well as transformational ones. Corporate Performance Preparing progress update and corporate performance to top managements. Overseeing risks & issues that might affect performance of the company. At times, acting as a consultant for evaluating, designing, and troubleshooting to critical company-wide problems. Strategic Communication Redefining existing management system in place for continuously improve company status reporting and communication flows. Managing management committee forum from registration to actions cascading. Cooperating with external stakeholders’ team (e.g., Investor Relation) to communicate KBTG direction, key initiatives, progress update to analysts and investors. WHAT YOU NEED TO SUCCEED Bachelor/Master/Doctoral in Business Management, Finance, Management in Information System (MIS) or any relevant fields. At least 3 years of experience related in strategic planning / financial industry / technology /professional consultancy. Technology enthusiasts with systematic & creative thinking mind, as well as attention to the details. Keep up to date of strategy and technology best practices and trends. Passion and energy to the excellence. Eager to learn and tackle new opportunities and challenges. Ability to efficiently navigate through the implementation process to overcome obstacles, win buy-ins, and encourage cooperation. Excellent communication, presentation, and project management skill. Being relentless in pursuit of growth under time pressure. Strong in both writing and speaking in English. Fresh Grads with exceptional achievements and strong analytical skills are also welcome BENEFIT AND PERKS Group Insurance, Annual Physical Check-Up, Spending Account 6,000/ year, Flexible Benefit, Provident Fund 13%, Housing Loan, Maternity Allowance, KBTG, Business Travel Benefits Policy, Leave and Vacation, Grab for Business, KBTG Academy (Skillane Training Class), Nap room.

Company: Siam Commercial Bank Public Co., Ltd. (SCB)
column8: Job Summary We are seeking a Senior Business Reengineering officer to join our team. This role is responsible for leading process improvement projects, analysing business processes, and creating strategies for improving overall efficiency and effectiveness. The ideal candidate will have excellent communication and leadership skills, the ability to drive change, and a strong understanding of different industries and business processes. Job Description Consult with external and internal stakeholders to define the vision for an assigned reengineering project Analyze current company processes for inefficiencies and other areas for improvement Redesign business processes to increase efficiency, lower costs, and improve overall business performance Develop insightful suggestions on strategic opportunities and operational efficiency by identifying cases for opportunity Keep stakeholders informed and involved by collecting feedback and discussing progress on the reengineering project Collaborate with stakeholders across the bank to implement change and produce results through the reengineering process monitor and measure performance against goals to guarantee that the new processes are producing the desired results Contribute to the success and growth of the project team Qualifications Bachelor’s degree or higher in Business Administration, Finance, or relevant fields with business and IT acumen 5+ years of experience in Management Consulting, Business Development or Digital Transformation Excellent written and verbal communication abilities in both Thai and English Strong business knowledge, positive attitude, and excellent team player Computer literacy in Microsoft Office

The Customer Identity Access Management (CIAM), Administration, Rights & Entitlements Technology group provides a secure, reliable, and scalable platform allowing LSEG, our customers, and our partners to provision and access our products, services, and the content within them. We are evolving our Reliability Engineering team to move beyond support and operations. As a Site Reliability Engineer (SRE), you will be part of a diverse and inclusive organization that has full ownership of the availability, performance, and scalability of one of the most critical shared services at LSEG. WHAT YOU'LL BE DOING: Manage projects to ensure improvement of the availability, scalability, latency and efficiency of CIAM application and production services. Mentor the team and establishes credibility through quality technical execution. Partner with architects to decompose a solution for technology systems and products. Manages end-to-end availability and performance of key services and build automation to scale systems sustainably, prevent service issues, or when they occur, quickly recover service. Maintain Service Level Objectives for the systems they own. Constantly measuring and improving availability, latency, and overall system health is at the core of our team's purpose. Write and review highly optimized code for LSEG products and solutions and provide feedback and suggested improvements to team members. Be the point of contact in CIAM domain by showing significant depth of knowledge and expertise in technology and develop knowledge of other domains to act on linkages and dependencies. Support the CIAM production environment, including the applications, production processes, and troubleshoot issues related to the critical components of CIAM with appropriate escalation to Developers as needed. Provide Level 2 on-call Production Support for the Engineering team, with the ability to handle any technical issues and make business decisions regarding the Production cycle. Partner with development teams to improve system reliability, observability, and release velocity. Implement new / improved site reliability processes and best practices, as required by Group or departmental Heads. Lead sustainable incident response and production improvements for LSEG. Be a vocal advocate of strong/sound engineering practices that allow us to build, deploy, and run scalable, reliable, and performant services. WHAT YOU'LL BRING: Bachelor's degree in computer science, a related technical field involving software/systems engineering, or equivalent practical experience. Experience with Object Oriented programming languages such as: Java, C#, Python, or Go. Experience with Unix/Linux and Windows operating systems. Experience with one of the following cloud platforms: Azure, AWS, or GCP. Experience with algorithms and data structures, relational databases and Bigdata technologies. Experience in Observability practices with logging, metrics, tracing, and alerting. Experience with Infrastructure as Code. Understanding of authentication and authorisation protocols, identity and access management, and application security. Ability to deploy agile best practices as appropriate throughout the software development lifecycle. Experience working in client-supporting services. Ability to create, apply, and implement technologies to deliver and produce services with minimal human intervention, to improve the efficiency, reliability, and speed tasks. Enthusiastic in seeking new ways of working continuously to make processes run smoother and faster. Strong communication skills. Experience as an Engineer, and a demonstrated proficiency in interfacing with and handling client related and impacting technical issues. Possess knowledge of features and facilities for integration, and communication among applications, databases, and technology platforms to bring together different components and form a fully functional solution to a business problem. Communicate with clarity and precision, presenting complex / technical information in a concise format that is audience appropriate. Partner with clients and resolve issues by diagnosing problems, determining possible resolutions, and implementing effective solutions. Knowledge in the following is a plus: Cloud operations, application support, Kubernetes, Terraform, Datadog, BigPanda, Ping Identity, Okta, and process automation. WHAT YOU’LL GET IN RETURN: Career growth by leading a high-profile business technology service. Cutting edge development on AWS platform. Real-world experience working on client-facing financial applications. Does this sound like a challenge you'd be interested in taking on? Join us! We believe that creating a diverse and inclusive organisation is fundamental to the way we deliver on our promise of creating essential partnerships and open opportunities. Our open culture is central to how we deliver our purpose - driving financial stability, empowering economies and enabling customers to create sustainable growth - in everything we do. Working with us means that you will be part of a dynamic organisation of 25,000 people across 70 countries. However, we will value your individuality and enable you to bring your true self to work so you can help enrich our diverse workforce. You will be part of a collaborative and creative culture where we encourage new ideas and are committed to sustainability across our global business. You will experience the critical role we have in helping to re-engineer the financial ecosystem to support and drive sustainable economic growth. Together, we are aiming to achieve this growth by accelerating the just transition to net zero, enabling growth of the green economy and creating inclusive economic opportunity. We offer a range of tailored benefits and support, including healthcare, retirement planning, paid volunteering days and wellbeing initiatives. We are proud to be an equal opportunities employer. This means that we do not discriminate on the basis of anyone's race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital status, veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. Conforming with applicable law, we can reasonably accommodate applicants' and employees' religious practices and beliefs, as well as any mental health or physical disability needs. Please take a moment to read this privacy notice carefully, as it describes what personal information we may hold about you, what it's used for, and how it's obtained, your rights and how to contact us as a data subject. If you are submitting as a Recruitment Agency Partner, it is essential and your responsibility to ensure that candidates applying to us are aware of this privacy notice.

column8: Job Description: Strategic leadership Review and investigate complex cases arising from the bank’s various AFC surveillance sources/systems/models and liaise with the relevant stakeholders (e.g., BUs) for necessary follow-up actions Customise approach for assigned cases, extract relevant data/intelligence from various internal and external sources (e.g., bank systems, commercial databases, etc.), and conduct self-directed analysis Follow-up with necessary points of contact to identify additional information to investigate cases Assess the merits of consolidated evidence and formulate initial recommendations (e.g., STR filing, account closure, freezing of funds, exit etc.) Capture investigative findings in comprehensive, easy-to-digest documents and reports Consult with Senior Reviewer throughout the investigative process and when required, escalate cases to Senior Reviewer for feedback/guidance As and when required, support the investigation/resolution/remediation of other cases or alerts which may arise from various internal or external surveillance systems/sources/models Collate and provide feedback to the Analytics team on the usefulness and effectiveness of Analytical model outputs as a model user and from the perspective of complex investigations Support regulatory reporting by ensuring all complex investigations are concluded adequately and documented appropriately Senior Management engagement Keep abreast of the latest regulations and trends in AFC and investigative techniques Support Senior Reviewers in documenting best practices and emerging intelligence on AFC trends and evolution, including emerging AFC/AML typologies in corridors or areas where UOB has a presence Team and capacity management Support user acceptance testing for AFC models developed/acquired by the bank and provide robust feedback from an end-user perspective to the relevant teams on model performance Work to identify patterns and behaviors for wider intelligence-led thematic investigations Identify inefficiencies in current investigative processes and provide feedback to Senior Reviewers to drive operational excellency within complex investigations team Support the refinement of complex investigative processes based on new typologies/red flags or new business requirements or feedback received from relevant stakeholders such as the business and Group Compliance Support Senior Reviewers in executing special projects as needed Job Requirement: 3 – 5 years of experience in an anti-financial crime role or in law enforcement, forensic accountancy, compliance, audit, or similar fields where investigative skills and approaches are employed Demonstrable experience in conducting self-directed analysis and investigative work Ability to exercise strong analytical and problem-solving skills, considerable intellectual curiosity, judgment and critical thinking in scenarios that are complex and highly sensitive Ability to work under tight deadlines, make sound/well-reasoned recommendations backed by evidence, and be proactive and self-driven Ability to work well as part of a large, high-performing team Proficiency in investigating and assessing complex financial data as well as business structures and transaction flows, including using tools like MS Excel, Power BI, or other financial analysis tools Deep understanding of the banking industry or segments within it (e.g., wholesale or commercial banking) is a big plus Diploma/degree in Finance, Business or any related field Certification as a Money Laundering Specialist (ACAMS) or a Diploma in AML with International Compliance Association is a big plus Proficiency in a foreign language (esp. SEA languages) is a plus

Jobtitle: IT Project Manager - Drive Retail Solutions with Modern Digital Platforms
column8: Cathcart Technology is partnering with a leading retail company in Thailand. They have a vision to deliver the best quality of retail services solutions and customer experience. They are expanding their teams and seeking a professional IT Project Manager to lead the development of modern digital platforms that will transform their retail operations. Role and Responsibility: In this role, you will demonstrate the roadmap for the project portfolio for digital retail solutions. You will work alongside the business and technical teams to develop cross-platform digital products. You will also manage projects from inception to completion, overseeing resource allocation, budget management, and risk mitigation. In addition, you will work closely with business users to define and prioritize requirements to achieve platform transformation goals. By taking the lead and managing projects from the business process, you will pave the journey of the multichannel platforms, assisting the technical and functional teams to deliver projects to align with the business roadmap. Required Skills and Qualifications: 5+ years of experience in agile project management . Proven track record of successfully delivering web and mobile applications . Experience managing and executing digital solution development projects. Familiarity with eCommerce or retail projects (POS, CRM, online payments, omnichannel) preferred. Adept working in an agile environment and proficient in PM tools (e.g., Jira, Trello). Excellent interpersonal skills and confident English communication. This role offers a unique opportunity to make a tangible impact on a retail business. If you're a passionate and results-oriented IT Project Manager with a vision for digital transformation, apply now or call K. Jung of Cathcart Technology at 063-328-7659 for more information.

Please note this role adopts on-call support during non-business hours and weekends on a rotation basis. Key Responsibilities Provide 2nd level of technical support for all application systems and software components. Troubleshoot and investigate the root cause of incidents that happen within application systems. Work closely with application development teams and platform team to investigate and fix issues. Monitor, update and maintain application systems to ensure they are working as operational. Understand and be able to study and apply new technology to support business requirements. Continuously improve work scope and reduce manual work. Coordinate with other technical teams (service & infrastructure teams, software development, and 3rd-party vendors) in troubleshooting and resolving issues. Key member of the incident response team. Provide on-call support during non-business hours and weekends (on a rotation basis) Essential Skills & Prerequisites A positive, can-do attitude, that naturally expresses a high degree of empathy to others. Require strong technical, analytical, interpersonal and organizational skills. Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience. We are more interested in passion for technology and what you are capable of, than we are in academic qualification. 2 - 5 years of relevant work experience. Experience in troubleshooting and investigating IT system/application incidents, structured approach to problem solving. Self-motivated and able to work in a fast paced work environment with minimal supervision. Good interpersonal communication, high responsibility, enthusiastic to explore new technologies. Excellent service mind and good customer service skills. Able to work under pressure. Good command of spoken and written Thai and English. Experience with a broad mix of technologies, including a strong subset of: Familiarity with Linux and Unix operating systems. Prometheus, Grafana. Hand-on Unix/Linux skill and shell programming is a plus.

Responsibilities : Running risk assessment and security tests and designing countermeasures to eliminate as many potential risks as possible. Identifying possible security threats and determining the appropriate security measures to aligned with various environment. Designing, implementing, and updating security policies, standards, procedures, requirements and technical requirements to cover all possible security threats, data privacy and regulations. Ensure continued compliance to various regulations such asPDPA, FedRamp, ISO27001, SOC2 and etc. Planning, studying and then designing a resistant security architecture or blueprint for various IT projects and new emerging applications or technologies. Meeting with users to discuss and review security design including measures, provide technical advice, recommendations and consultancy on networks, infrastructure, products, and explained the designed system. Review and providing assurance an application's specification and design against security best practices, threat modeling and design patterns. Acting as a gatekeeper to ensure that all security measures and Security Acceptance Test (SAT) are completed before production launch. Training staff to aware, recognize and defend against security breaches and risks. Performing third party reviews and on-going monitoring all third party related to cybersecurity risk. Analyzing system services, spotting issues in code, networks and applications that align with Shift left security concept. Qualifications : Bachelor’s degree/Master’s degree in Management Information System, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, IT, Business Administration or related fields. Minimum 6 - 10 years in security advisory or security architecture role. Strong security advisory, analytical, decision-making and problem-solving skill. Excellent technical skills for building security architecture aligned with the business's requirements. Familiar with emerging technology such as mobile application, API, blockchain and etc. Experience in technology risk management, including roles related to business continuity, internal audit, risk management or financial crime would be an advantage. Experience in IT Governance, Risk management, and Compliance (IT GRC), Project Management, Lead Auditor/Lead Implementer, or similar is preferred. Familiar with BOT regulations and international standard like ISO 27001 and best practice like OWASP. Experience in relevant local and international security standards and best practices such as ISO 27001, NIST, COBIT, COSO, PCI DSS, ISO 27001/2, ITIL, and SOX Compliance. Professional Information Security certifications/degrees related to cybersecurity will be an advantage (CISA, CISM, CISSP, CCSP, CIPP, CIPM, etc.) Strong leadership, project management and team-building skills, including the ability to lead teams and drive initiatives in multiple departments. Experience in implementing, and updating security policies, standards, procedures, requirements and technical requirements to cover all possible security threats and regulations.

As an Account Executive, you will be responsible for managing key client accounts and driving sales growth within the assigned territory. Your primary objective will be to build and maintain strong relationships with existing clients, understand their business needs, and identify opportunities to upsell and cross-sell our IT solutions. You will work closely with the sales team, technical experts, and other internal stakeholders to deliver outstanding customer service and achieve sales targets. Responsibilities: Execute account plans to achieve sales targets and revenue growth. Build and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers and stakeholders at client organizations. Understand clients' business objectives, challenges, and IT requirements to identify opportunities for SIRIUS solutions. Present and demonstrate SIRIUS products and services to clients, showcasing their value proposition and benefits. Collaborate with the technical team to design and propose customized solutions that address clients' specific needs. Prepare and negotiate proposals, contracts, and pricing agreements in collaboration with the sales team and management. Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and industry developments to identify new business opportunities. Provide regular updates on account progress, sales forecasts, and market insights to the sales team and management. Ensure timely resolution of customer issues and concerns, serving as a point of escalation for critical situations. Foster a customer-centric culture within the organization, ensuring the highest level of customer satisfaction. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field. Proven experience as an Account Executive or in a similar sales role within the IT industry. Experience as an Account Executive in the FSI Industry. In-depth knowledge of IT solutions, products, and services, with a strong understanding of current technology trends. Demonstrated ability to build and maintain strong client relationships. Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Results-oriented mindset with a track record of meeting and exceeding sales targets. Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment. Strong organizational and time management skills. Proficiency in CRM software and MS Office Suite. Excellent communication skills, both oral and written in English with attention to detail.

TRANSTRON (THAILAND) Co., Ltd. is seeking a highly experienced and technically proficient Technical Software Project Manager to lead the development and successful implementation of its new fleet management system. As the Technical Project Manager, you will leverage your deep understanding of software development and technical expertise to provide leadership and guidance to the development team, ensuring the project stays on track and meets all technical specifications. Responsibilities : Lead the development team in designing, developing, testing, and implementing the fleet management system. Break down complex technical requirements into clear and actionable tasks for developers. Estimate project timelines and resources accurately. Implement and manage development methodologies. Manage and track project dependencies and risks proactively. Conduct regular technical reviews and code walk-throughs. Mentor and guide junior developers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and QA testers. Maintain strong communication and transparency with all stakeholders. Manage project budgets and resources efficiently. Stay up-to-date with the latest software development technologies and trends, particularly those relevant to fleet management and the Internet of Things (IoT). Document technical specifications, designs, and architecture. Oversee the integration and testing of various system components. Identify and resolve technical issues and roadblocks. Monitor system performance and identify areas for improvement. Ensure the system complies with all relevant security and regulatory standards. Report project status, schedules, timelines, issues and other aspects to Manager / General Manager. Qualifications : Bachelor's degree or higher 5-7 years of experience in software development project management. Proven track record of successfully leading and delivering complex software projects. Strong technical expertise in software development principles, methodologies, and best practices. Expertise in at least one programming language (e.g., Java, Python, C++, JavaScript). Experience with relational databases (e.g., SQL) and cloud technologies (e.g., AWS, Azure) is a plus. Excellent communication,collaboration, and problem-solving skills, leadership, and organizational skills. Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities. Ability to prioritize tasks, manage deadlines, and work effectively under pressure. Detail-oriented and organized with a strong commitment to quality assurance. Experience with project management tools and methodologies (e.g., MS Project, Jira). Ability to work independently and as part of a team. Strong analytical and critical thinking abilities. Good command in English and computer literacy. (Optional) Good command in Japanese language.

Job Summary We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated individual to join our organization as an IT/Security Governance Specialist. The primary responsibility of this role is to ensure the effective implementation and adherence to IT and security governance frameworks, policies, and procedures. The IT/Security Governance Specialist will play a critical role in managing IT risks, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements, and maintaining the overall security posture of the organization. Responsibilities: • Develop and implement IT and security governance frameworks, policies, and procedures. • Monitor and evaluate the effectiveness of existing IT and security controls and recommend improvements as necessary. • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment of IT and security practices with organizational goals and objectives. • Conduct regular risk assessments to identify and mitigate potential threats. • Stay updated on industry best practices, emerging technologies, and regulatory requirements related to IT and security governance. • Participate in IT and security audits and compliance assessments. • Coordinate with internal and external stakeholders to ensure timely resolution of IT and security issues. • Provide guidance and support to IT and Security teams in implementing and maintaining effective governance practices. • Prepare and present reports and recommendations to senior management regarding IT and security governance initiatives. Requirements: • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related field. • Minimum 3 years of proven experience in IT and security governance, risk management, and compliance, including dealing with external audits. • Strong knowledge of IT and security frameworks and standards, such as ISO 27001. • Excellent understanding of IT infrastructure, systems, and security controls. • Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment. Nice to Have: • Familiarity with regulatory requirements, such as PDPA or PCI DSS. • Familiarity with Thailand’s Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) and financial regulations. • Certifications, such as CISA, are highly desirable. If you are passionate about IT and security governance and have a strong commitment to maintaining the highest standards of security and compliance, we encourage you to apply for this position. Join our team and contribute to the ongoing success and protection of our organization's IT infrastructure and assets.

Jobtitle: SAP Consultant (FI, CO, FICO) (Consultant - Senior manager)
column8: Job Description: The SAP Functional Consultant assists our clients in the deployment or upgrade of SAP solutions by supporting project teams and clients in aligning business needs with module and solution functions. They are actively involved in project phases and technological solution support. Main role and responsibilities : Help clients in defining their needs and direct them to the corresponding modules and functionalities Conceptualize functional analyses and the modeling of business processes in relation to project targets. Ensuring a cross-sectional view of the client's functional needs. Ensure the correlation between the development of solutions and the functional needs of the client. Perform the configuration of modules according to the business needs of the clients. Provide support and important technical and functional support during the deployment phases. Develop and provide leadership during testing and quality assurance phases Maintain technical documentation and transfer knowledge related to its responsibilities. Act as a consultant in their area of ​​expertise and represent their department when interfacing with decision-making and technical bodies. Provide an monitoring role in order to understand and anticipate trends in their area of ​​expertise, and make appropriate recommendations in terms of developing best practices for the company. Qualification : More than 3 years and above in SAP deployment, support and/or upgrade projects on one or more of the following modules: FI, CO, ideally acquired in the consulting world. Possess a strong knowledge and experience in SAP configuration. Know the integration points and 'tie-ins' with other modules Have developed very good interpersonal communication and user support management skills. Possess strong analytical, incident resolution and problem-solving skills Make quality decisions Good Communication in English

Job Summary: Responsible for planning and leading teams to deliver projects that span across teams from internal and external. Manage resources, schedules, and budget. This also includes management of issues, risks and project change requests to ensure successful commitment with quality and on-time project delivery. Contribute to process improvement initiatives as it relates to improving project delivery. Senior Project Manager might be required to coach and mentor junior staff and ensure that they can manage the projects properly. Job Responsibilities: Work with stakeholders to define project scope, objective, dependencies, and timeline. Estimate resources and cost to reach objective and manage resources in an effective and efficient on resources capability. Prepare budget and track project costs to meet budget plan and prepare the financial and procurement documents for both purchaser and vendor contract. Work with project teams to develop and manage a detailed project plan for all phases of the projects. Manage teams to find solutions with relevance and related teams. Manage backlogs prioritization, resources utilization and change management. Organizing meeting projects/sprints grooming, planning, project progress update, demo, and deployment. Minutes on key summarization, issues, and actions. Monitor, track, and control project progress, resolve issues, blockers, conflicts, dependencies, and critical path deliverables. Manage projects quality for both functional and non-functional following the standard that being defined. Communicate project progress status update regarding project milestones, deliverable, dependencies, risks, and issues including proposed mitigation plan to stakeholders. Build and motivate project team members to meet project goals, adhering to their responsibilities and project milestones. Measure project performance to identify areas for improvement. Process improvement, projects/sprint retrospective to continue improve process and project team quality. Qualifications: Bachelor's Degree / Master's Degree in IT, Computer Engineer, Computer Science, Management Information System or related fields. 3-7 years’ experience in IT project management, IT Software delivery or IT consulting. Knowledge of fundamental Project Management processes, methodologies, tools, and techniques. If have Project Management Certificate such as PMP or Agile certificate is plus. Experience in Software Project Management in Banking or Financial / Insurance Industry. Ability to encourage and enable people to work together as a team to accomplish the project. Strong communication and presentation skills. Strong problem solving and analytical skills. Description As a Sales Development representative, you will be responsible for identifying robust sales opportunities, profiling prospective customers, discovering their needs and driving new business through various outbound and inbound campaigns focused on security. You will help businesses work better together, move fast and innovate. As a member of the Sales Development team, you will be the first point of contact for hundreds of businesses, proactively engaging them to build enthusiasm while identifying and qualifying their security business needs to propose adequate solutions and send them on the most appropriate Sales path. You will work towards individual targets but will also be part of a larger sales team with a focus to grow our customer base across APAC. You will be in a phone-based environment, where you will interact with customers primarily via outbound calls. Responsibilities Hit quarterly Key Performance Metrics, and hit a target level of activity daily and weekly Manage a portfolio of assigned accounts to identify high potential prospects, both new business and upsell Execute outbound prospecting to source, contact, and engage prospective customers Educate customers on what we have to offer Execute daily outbound phone calls and emails (mostly cold calling), contact C-level decision makers, build quick rapport and assess needs. Understand prospects' pain points, gather technical requirements, correlate business needs to available Cloud security solutions (solution-selling) and build value for next steps in the sales process Update and maintain prospect and customer data in Salesforce.com [link removed] (CRM database). Manage leads, contacts, accounts, opportunities and activities in Salesforce.com [link removed] Work towards team and individual goals for key performance indicators like productivity, conversion rates, opportunities and pipeline Requirements BA/BS degree, technical degree desired Fluent in the language of the market, spoken and written Ability to speak and write English fluently and idiomatically Min. 2 years B2B Sales or Business development experience in outbound sales in the IT industry Some understanding of cloud computing concepts, in particular Google Cloud Platform Ability to connect business needs with adequate solutions, strong business acumen Strong interpersonal skills, team player and a high level of integrity and professionalism Comfortable working against an assigned quota in a phone based environment Thrive in a fast-paced, high-growth, rapidly changing environment Knowledge of CRM systems, ideally Salesforce Analytical mindset and go-getter attitude; self-motivated to achieve personal goals and goals set for the team Organized and has pipeline management, time management skills and prioritization skills IT skills: essential computer skills to navigate efficiently a computer based job Desirable Cloud certification or Cyber Security certification B2B sales experience within Cyber Security Goal oriented, self-motivated individual who is proactive, confident competitive and tenacious Understanding of local market and local business environment

Principal Accountabilities: - Products Management: Understand and manage product life cycles, new product development ideation and process management Owns the product profitability and drives positive revenue and gross margin growth Integrate customer requirement and deliver on customer needs on time and budget - Program & Project Management: Establish/maintain a project management framework in line with strategic objectives; Direct and control the on-time delivery of programs and projects - Strategy & Planning: Own the product planning process including new product additions, sunset current products; product pricing Integrate inputs to develop distinctive product plans with outstanding financial outcomes for strategy planning cycle - Pricing: Develop dynamic pricing strategies based on value delivered, input costs, market trends and forecasts - Customer Engagement: Communicate the value of the product to customer; Effectively translate customer and business needs into actionable product requirements Provide appropriate information of products (specifications, documentation, pricing, lead times etc.) to support sales process and customer inquiries Qualifications: Bachelor’s degree or MBA in a related field, Business Administration, Engineering Undergraduate degree in an analytical (e.g., economics, math, etc.) or technical discipline (e.g., computer science, engineering, etc.) is required. A minimum of 4 to 6 years’ experience in product management and success in leading the product. Must have experience working in IoT solutions under responsibilities. Strategic Skills: Understanding and experience with the ability to practically apply to their product line. Must link strategies to financial results. Leadership: A confident, mature professional with the ability to connect with others. Ability to lead projects and teams that successfully achieve milestones and complete deliverables. Results-Oriented: A driver who possesses the ability to take actions and implement effective solutions in a timely manner Problem Solver: A creative yet pragmatic problem solver. Methodical and hands-on as well as detail-oriented Analytical Thinking and Decision-Making: A “conceptualizer” of enterprise and market trends/issues who can then integrate that thinking into product and business strategies. Decisive and logical at thoroughly evaluating issues. Excellent planning, execution, and project-management skills. Teamwork and Interpersonal Skills: A team player and builder, receptive to ideas from others. Shares information and keeps team members and partners informed. Works effectively with others to identify and resolve issues. Excellent interpersonal skills and an ability to interact successfully with a diverse workforce. Ethics: Highest level of professional integrity and honesty as well as personal credibility. Location: True Digital Park

Job Overview/Summary: The Information Technology department supports the organization’s work by providing reliable and scalable application development and infrastructure for the IRC’s offices in the US and around the world, including many technologically challenging locations. The Service Desk Technician will provide IT support to the end-users globally with special attention to the Asia region, and handle escalations from tier 1 to tier 2 support. Daily tasks may include: Incident logging, categorization, prioritization and response Provide resolution of service incidents in partnership with other IT departments globally Conduct testing as part of the building, designing, or upgrading to ensure smooth transitioning and implementation of the new systems and services. Responsible for timely ticket resolution and escalation to ensure that service-level agreement (SLA) is met. Monitor incident trends and create problem tickets as needed to ensure engagement of necessary IT departments to identify root causes and resolution. Mentor and oversee less experienced colleagues to build a high-performing team. Major Responsibilities: Customer Service and Communication Demonstrate an ability to communicate technical terms, IRC IT policies to end users in a service-oriented fashion; provide technical advice and guidance relative to problems involving technical user issues. Provide exemplary customer service across all levels of the organization. Exercise discretion and independent judgment to act upon urgent requests, such as immediate terminations, or security breach incidents. Ability to effectively handle cyber security incidents and engage with InfoSec teams to ensure necessary attention to prevent further data loss or breach. Ability to effectively collaborate with Global IT team… Work with Business Relationship Management team to craft communication pertaining to outages or change in services that affects IT and/or staff globally. Technical Skills Troubleshoots and restores routine technical service and equipment troubles by analyzing, identifying, and diagnosing faults and symptoms using established processes and procedures. End User Device administration/configuration/support/troubleshooting Responsible for the implementation, installation, maintenance, and support of End User Infrastructure Support equipment, software and connectivity for Windows workstations, PDAs, PCs Macintosh and printers, LAN, AV, Video conferencing, telephone. Provide over-the-phone and on-site Level 2 assistance to users: problem identification, instruction, and resolution of problems and escalate when necessary. Design technical solutions for modules of a project, or to resolve most problems and select appropriate work procedures or approaches to address technical challenges. Conducts complete diagnostics of most business problems; anticipates implementation obstacles. Provide token support to Multifactor Authentication, VPN client based remote access, password/account recovery using SSO (Single Sign On) verification. Provide troubleshooting for Microsoft office and other business applications. Troubleshoot VPN connections, network printers, email setup, and connectivity issues and escalate tickets to tier 3 as needed. Administrative Tasks & Record Keeping Responsible for creating and validating new, updating and publishing existing business-facing and technical knowledge articles; work with Manager and Quality Analyst to establish quality control to ensure adoption and accuracy. Ensure documentation of incidents by entering sufficient technician work notes in the tickets Analyze service request/incident trends and common complaints and problems, and serve as escalation point to provide the resolution of various service problems within SLA;  anticipate potential problems to identify and deliver new solutions for proactive resolution and process improvement Manage IT inventory, licenses, services, and support incidents; log real time written journal entries documenting actions taken on all ticket requests. Supervise the prioritization of tickets, queue management, scheduling, and resource planning as per Service Desk Manager. Mentoring / Management Mentor and supervise less-experienced staff with responsibility for their technical development, including internship programs. Provide statistical and performance feedback and coaching on a regular basis to team members. Participate in Performance Management Reviews and report any trend of common issues that may require creation of a Problem ticket. Key Working Relationships: Position Reports to: Team Lead Global Support Indirect Reporting: Regional IT Director Position directly supervises : None. Other Internal and/or external contacts: The technician will work independently and, in a team, on a daily basis. He/she will interact with vendors    as needed. Internal: Team Leads, Technicians, System Engineer, Desktop Engineer, Network Engineers, Knowledgebase Manager External: Vendors: Phone vendor, Printer Vendor, MAC support, Microsoft Support, and others as needed. Job Requirements: Education: College degree or equivalent certification: A+ Certification, Network+ (CompTIA), Active Directory and ADManager Plus, PowerShell, Network experience (TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, VPN etc.), Office 365, Sophos, Proofpoint, MS phones, MS Intune Management, ITIL, SCCM Work Experience: At least 3 years of experience in help desk/desktop support role Excellent consultative and communication skills, analytical ability, decisiveness, strong judgment, and the ability to work effectively with clients, IT management, staff and vendors. Strong organizational skills, able to prioritize and multitask. Strong interpersonal skills and customer service skills. Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment. Must be dependable and have excellent written and verbal communication skills. Ability to interact with various levels of employees throughout the organization, VIP support included. Ability to relay technical information to non-technical business units. Strong documentation skills. Working Environment : The position will work in the Seoul, South Korea or Peshawar, Pakistan office and should have the capacity to work from home.  Occasional domestic or international travels may be required. Must have flexibility to work on holidays or weekends as required to support country programs that work on Sundays. Gender Equality: IRC is committed to narrowing the gender gap in leadership positions. We offer benefits that provide an enabling environment for women to participate in our workforce including parental leave, gender-sensitive security protocols and other supportive benefits and allowances. Equal Opportunity Employer: We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, gender, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status. We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request accommodation.

**Job Title:** UX/UI Designer 1 year contract  ( 50K-70K) **Company:** Beauty Mobile Application by well-known hospital **Location:** Aree Area **About Us:** Beauty Mobile Application is a cutting-edge company in the beauty industry, dedicated to revolutionizing the way individuals experience beauty consultations. We leverage technology to provide seamless and personalized beauty consultations through our mobile application. As we continue to grow, we are seeking a talented UX/UI Designer to join our dynamic team and contribute to the enhancement of our user experience. **Job Overview:** We are looking for a creative and detail-oriented UX/UI Designer to play a key role in the development and improvement of our beauty mobile consult application. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating visually appealing and intuitive user interfaces, ensuring a delightful user experience that aligns with our brand identity. **Responsibilities:** 1. **User Research and Analysis:** - Conduct user research to understand user needs, behaviors, and pain points. - Analyze data and user feedback to identify opportunities for improvement in the user experience. 2. **Technical skill:** - Create wireframes, prototypes, and user flows to visualize and communicate design concepts and prefer candidate who have knowledge of frontend. - Iterate designs based on feedback and user testing results. 3. **UI Design:** - Develop visually appealing and consistent user interfaces that align with the brand identity. - Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate user interface designs into the development process. 4. **User Testing:** - Conduct usability testing to gather feedback and validate design decisions. - Iterate designs based on user testing results and feedback. 5. **Collaboration:** - Collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to ensure design solutions meet business requirements. - Maintain open communication and incorporate feedback throughout the design process. 6. **Stay Updated:** - Stay informed about industry trends, design tools, and best practices. - Share insights and contribute to the continuous improvement of design processes. **Qualifications:** - Bachelor's degree in Design, Human-Computer Interaction, or a related field. - Proven experience as a UX/UI Designer in the mobile application space. - Proficient in design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Sketch, Figma, etc. - Strong portfolio showcasing a range of UX/UI design projects. - Knowledge of current design trends, user interface guidelines, and best practices. - Excellent communication and collaboration skills. **Benefits:** - 1 year contract with competitive salary - Health and wellness programs - Hybrid work (1 per week at office) - Dynamic and inclusive work environment If you are passionate about creating exceptional user experiences and want to be part of a company that is reshaping the beauty industry, we invite you to apply for this position please send me CV to sarawan.w @ 360qm.co.th for more information please call/line 065-232-4155

Jobtitle: Infrastructure System Engineer / Infrastructure Network Engineer
column8: Who is Cloud HM? Founded in 2014, we are the industry leader in the Thai cloud market. Over 1,000 enterprises trust us for our multi cloud, DevSecOps and big data services. We offer cutting edge technology to help our customers grow their business. Our revenue has been growing 2x yearly. We expect our revenue to hit 400 MB (12 mn USD) in 2023. We are looking for people to come further develop our business. Infrastructure System Engineer What are the responsibilities of an engineer? Implement VMware technology solutions for virtualization, networking, and storage infrastructures to meet business requirement. Deploy and manage vCloud Director, vCenter, ESXi, NSX, Tanzu and others relate VMware products. Perform VMware environment upgrade Perform hardware upgrade such as Server, Storage Provide technical support to customers, tier 1 engineer and stakeholders. Maintain knowledge of VMware products and industry trends. Others assigned by supervisor What kind of engineer do we need? Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, IT, or equivalent experience Overall 5 years or more experience with VMware technology Eager to learn new technologies Experience working with multiple hardware and software Vendors such as DELL, HP, NetApp ,VMware, etc. Familiar with change management process Able to work as a team Can-do and positive attitude Ability to multi-task, prioritize, and manage time effectively Able to support 24x7 Good command of English Infrastructure Network Engineer What are the responsibilities of an engineer? Contributes to long term network architecture planning for specific network services. Contributes to short- and long-term planning to meet business requirements. Facilitates efforts to establish and review network architecture, standards, and best practices for network design and implementation. Executes regular planned maintenance and testing activities. Ensures network infrastructure is fully compliant with security guidelines. Anticipates changes and issues with existing network services to proactively implement solutions before they impact Cloud services. Monitor network usage, anticipate problems and suggest solutions. Analyzes network activity and network problems to discover and prevent systematic errors. Documents architectures, processes, as-builts, projects, standards, and root cause analyses both in text and diagram form. Contributes to the formulation and implementation of installation standards and procedures. Evaluates services provided by network vendors and recommends changes. What kind of engineer do we need? Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, IT, or equivalent experience Overall 5-7 years or more experience with Network Experience in TCP/IP, routing/switching concepts, and common routing protocols Experience in Arista, Cisco and/or others related network products for Systems switches and routers Experience in IDS/IPS technologies Firewall experience including TCP/IP filtering, NAT, and stateful inspection Demonstrated experience in data center network architecture and best practices Knowledge proficiency with Cisco IOS and NX-OS, Arista EOS, and PAN-OS with hands-on experience configuring routers, switches and firewalls Knowledge proficiency with TCP/IP, BGP, OSPF and VXLAN Eager to learn new technologies Able to work as a team Can-do and positive attitude Ability to multi-task, prioritize, and manage time effectively Able to support 24x7 Good command of English

column8: Job Summary: The Head of IT Project Management will be responsible for overseeing the implementation of an SAP system within the organization. This position requires excellent leadership, communication, and project management skills. The successful candidate will manage the project team and work closely with all departments to ensure the project is completed on time, within budget, and to the satisfaction of stakeholders. Key Responsibilities: • Oversee the implementation of an SAP system, ensuring that it is completed on time, within budget, and to the satisfaction of stakeholders. • Manage the project team, ensuring that they are working effectively and efficiently. • Develop and maintain project plans, ensuring that all tasks are assigned, tracked, and completed on time. • Provide regular status updates to the executive team and other stakeholders, ensuring that they are informed of project progress and any issues that may arise. • Work closely with all departments to ensure that their needs are met and that the SAP system is tailored to their requirements. • Develop and implement project management processes and procedures to ensure that projects are completed on time and within budget. • Identify and manage project risks, ensuring that they are addressed in a timely manner. • Ensure that project deliverables are of high quality and meet the expectations of stakeholders. • Foster a culture of collaboration, teamwork, and continuous improvement. Qualifications: • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field. • At least 10 years of experience in project management, with a focus on SAP implementations. • Proven experience in managing large, complex projects. • Excellent leadership, communication, and project management skills. • Strong understanding of SAP systems and implementation methodologies. • Ability to work collaboratively with all levels of the organization. • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. • Experience with agile project management methodologies is a plus. • PMP certification is a plus. Interested candidates please send application letter with your resume stating full qualifications, experience, current as well as expected remuneration and a recent photograph by click Apply Now BG CONTAINER GLASS PUBLIC COMPANY LIMITED 47/1 Moo 2, Rangsit-Nakhon Nayok Rd, Bueng Yitho, Thanyaburi, Pathumthani 12130 Thailand Tel: 02-834-7000 Website: www.bgc.co.th [link removed]

column8: Job Description Collaborate with BI Solution Architect and Business Analyst to convert requirements into technical specifications Establish both batch and real-time data pipelines, primarily using Kafka-Spark Streaming for ETL processes o   Transfer data from multiple sources to a centralized area for data scientists, engaging in discussions with data scientists to determine the preferred data format o   Move modeling results to the target front-end application, consulting with Business Units and Business Analysts for specific requirements o   Generally, load data into a database or designated storage; in rare cases, develop REST API services for front-end applications to access real-time data Document source-target mappings within the created pipelines Maintain and monitor data pipelines to ensure correct, available, and restricted access to authorized personnel Adhere to the SCB SDLC process by collaborating with various teams, including Architects, IT security, Quality Assurance, and Change Qualifications Preferred academic background: BSc or MSc in computer science, software engineering, or information technology Proficient in Spark, SQL, Python, or Scala Experience in software development life cycles: coding, unit testing, using git or other SCM, CI/CD pipelines, and monitoring logs or service resource usage Fundamental knowledge in computer engineering: systems, networks, and security Strong communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with both technical teams (scientists/engineers) and non-technical business units Preferred Qualifications Prior work experience in roles such as ML Engineer, Data Engineer, Fullstack or Backend Software Engineer, Solution/Cloud Architect, or related positions. Experience with Kubernetes, Kafka, Hadoop, Hive, and sFTP Experience with cloud platforms, with a preference for Azure: Azure Storage, Azure Data Factory, and Databricks Experience in developing data warehouse, big data, and business intelligence applications, particularly in a competitive service industry, preferably in banking, financial services, or telecom Have data privacy and PDPA awareness

column8: Job Summary: In this role, you must have wide knowledge of digital world and other emerging technology platforms (ex: blockchain, DeFi , Metaverse, etc). You excel at out of the box thinking and are creative yet methodical in your approach at reaching specific market targets by using different digital mediums. You understand cardX customer target/segment and how they interact with digital media. You know what’s hot in the digital world before anyone else does and you closely follow trends related to how consumers are accessing content/info Job Descriptions: • Define our digital strategy, taking into account industry trends, digital evolution and emerging technology • Analyze current market situation, competitor analysis, use cases analysis • Understand and able to apply new emerging technology with the on going businesses/future businesses • Focus on any 360 digital global trend including media, technology, product and services • Research and analyze on customer digital behaviors, digital needs, customer segment Qualifications: • Bachelor’s degree or higher in related fields. • At least 5 years of working experience in Digital project development, Digital Strategy • Strong entrepreneurial, analytical, strategic thinking & planning, presenting, and interpersonal skills. • Strong interest in crypto market, blockchain technology, NFTs, and new business. • Good written and verbal communication skills in English and Thai.

Experience in configuration and administration of Hardware Server, Blade server. Familiar with Network infrastructure, Security and Risk Management Other requirements Good communication skill Positive working attitude with high integrity Ability to work efficiently and independently in a fast-paced, governmental environment. Jobtitle: Junior/Senior QA Automation Engineer/Software Quality Assurance
column8: Position : Junior/Senior QA Automation Engineer Experience: 1+ years Salary Range: THB 40,000 - 100,000+ Job Description: We are in search of QA Automation Engineer. The individual will have a solid track record of planning comprehensive test strategies for enterprise SaaS solutions and executing them to perfection. Responsibilities: Develop, implement, and monitor test strategies for our enterprise SaaS solutions, ensuring product robustness and reliability before release. Utilize various automation test tools such as Cypress, Selenium, Playwright, Robot Framework, and JMeter to ensure our software's consistency and functionality. Create, maintain, and execute automation test scripts using the aforementioned tools. Provide leadership, coaching, and management to less experienced team members, fostering a collaborative environment and promoting continuous learning. Contribute to the team's shared understanding and application of testing methodologies and automation tools. Communicate effectively with team members and stakeholders, providing timely updates and responding constructively to feedback. Qualifications: Strong experience planning and implementing test strategies for enterprise SaaS solutions, ensuring their robustness and reliability before release. Proven expertise in multiple automation test tools such as Cypress, Selenium, Playwright, Robot Framework, and JMeter. Ability to develop and maintain automation test scripts for the mentioned tools, ensuring our software's consistency and functionality. Comprehensive understanding of web technologies, APIs, and databases to facilitate in-depth and effective testing. Extensive experience working in Scrum teams, promoting agility and responsiveness. Experience in leading, coaching, and managing less experienced team members, fostering a collaborative environment and promoting continuous learning. Exceptional team player skills with a drive for continuous improvement and a shared vision of success. Interest in Financial and investment IT systems is considered a plus. Excellent English language skills, both written and verbal, are vital. Exceptional communication skills that facilitate clear and effective dialogue with team members and stakeholders alike. Good in English
