Company Description Minor Hotels is an international hotel owner, operator and investor with a portfolio of more than 540 hotels in operation. Minor Hotels passionately explores new possibilities in hospitality with a diverse portfolio of properties designed intelligently to appeal to different kinds of travellers, serving new passions as well as personal needs. Through our Anantara, Avani, Oaks, Elewana, Tivoli, NH Hotel Group, Four Seasons, St. Regis, Marriott and Minor International properties, across Asia Pacific, the Middle East, Africa, the Indian Ocean, Europe and South America. Job Description Do you thrive on translating business challenges into data-driven solutions? Are you passionate about turning complex projects into actionable insights? If so, then this is the role for you! A rare opportunity exists to join our dynamic Commercial Operations team. You will be an integral part of our global expansion. This role will be the vital link between our information technology capacity and our business objectives. You will be working closely with different commercial functions where you will see your data turn into insights and insights turn into actions. You will be expected to be innovative, and help us continue to develop, implement, and constantly refine how we work with the evolving world of data. Responsibilities: * Identify and initiate data projects: Deep dive into business challenges and identify opportunities where data can provide valuable insights and solutions. Gather and document data product requirements. Collaborate with stakeholders to understand their needs and translate them into clear, actionable requirements for data-driven solutions. * Design and manage data projects: Break down complex projects into manageable tasks, develop detailed project plans, define scopes and risks of the projects, assign ownership to resources, monitor progress against goals, maintain and enhance the projects. * Develop and implement data models and pipelines: Ensure efficiency and automation of data acquisition and/or business processes, cleaning, and transformation to support your projects. * Champion data adoption: Be a passionate advocate for data-driven practices. Educate and influence data users to adopt new tools and methodologies that unlock the full potential of data. * Stay at the forefront of data trends: Continuously learn and adapt to the evolving data landscape, exploring new tools and technologies to enhance your skillset and impact. Qualifications * Proven experience in data analysis and project management. * Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously. * Experience in data analysis, modeling, or related fields. * Fluent in SQL and Python or R. * Ability to collaborate with partners and drive analytic projects from end-to-end. * Strong analytical competencies and attention to detail. * Passion for influencing change and driving adoption. * Ability to work collaboratively and autonomously in a creative and agile environment including full data product lifecycle from design to development, testing, and deployment. * Excellent creative problem-solving skills. * Enthusiasm for learning and staying ahead of the curve in the ever-evolving data landscape. * Strong English communication skills, both verbal and written. * Bachelor’s or Advanced degree in Statistics, Computer Science, or other technical disciplines. * 3-5 years of experience in the related fields.

#BeMore Do you aspire a rewarding career that lets you do more and achieve more? Unleash your full potential at work with TDCX, an award-winning and fast-growing BPO company. Work with the world’s most loved brands and be with awesome, diverse people. Be home, belong, and start your journey to #BeMore! Top reasons to work with TDCX Attractive remuneration, great perks, and performance incentives. Comprehensive medical, insurance, or social security coverage. World-class workspaces. Engaging activities and recognition programs. Strong learning and development plans for your career growth. Positive culture for you to #BeMore at work. Easy to locate area with direct access to public transport. Flexible working arrangements. Be coached and mentored by experts in your field. Join a global company, winner of hundreds of industry awards. What’s your mission? You’ll help us deliver excellent service to our partner brands by performing these tasks: As part of international team, you will support one of the leading social media platforms You will help build safe communities for millions of people around the globe Assist our community members accurately and on time Investigate and resolve issues that are reported on platform such as requests for account support and reports of potentially abusive content Review reported content and respond to user inquiries with high quality, speed, empathy, and accuracy Who are we looking for? Fluency in written and spoken English , and Lao Bachelor's Degree, or Master's Degree is required More than 3 years' experience in any field A deep interest and understanding of online media and social networks Awareness of current cultural, political, and social events in Thailand Goal-oriented work approach and flexibility Able to work in Shifts Benefits & Others: Dental insurance Life insurance Medical insurance Performance bonus Work Location : Sala Daeng BTS Station / Si Lom MRT Station Who is TDCX? TDCX (NYSE: TDCX) provides transformative digital CX solutions, enabling world-leading and disruptive brands to acquire new customers, build customer loyalty, and protect their online communities. TDCX helps clients, including many of the world’s best brands, achieve their customer experience aspirations by harnessing technology, human intelligence, and our global footprint. We serve clients in fintech, gaming, technology, home sharing and travel, digital advertising and social media, streaming, and e-commerce. Our expertise and strong footprint in Asia have made us a trusted partner for clients, particularly high-growth, new economy companies looking to tap the region’s growth potential. We pride ourselves on discovering and employing the best professionals to join us as we transform the outsourced CX industry. Our commitment to #BeMore for our people, our clients, and our community has led to us winning several hundreds of industry awards, including being one of the best companies to work for in Asia. From our first-rate workspaces, above-industry-average compensation packages, career opportunities, to our workplace perks, find out what else is in store when you embark on a career with TDCX.

We are looking for a savvy Data Engineer to join our growing team of analytics experts. The hire will be responsible for expanding and optimizing our data and data pipeline architecture, as well as optimizing data flow and collection for cross functional teams. The ideal candidate is an experienced data pipeline builder and data wrangler who enjoys optimizing data systems and building them from the ground up. The Data Engineer will support our data analysts and data scientists on data initiatives and will ensure optimal data delivery architecture is consistent throughout ongoing projects. They must be self-directed and comfortable supporting the data needs of multiple teams, systems and products. Responsibilities for Data Engineer · Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture, · Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements. · Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc. · Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources into Data Warehouse. · Work with stakeholders including the Executive, Product, Data Analyst teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs. Qualifications for Data Engineer · Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases. · Experience building and optimizing data pipelines, architectures and data sets. · Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement. · Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets. · Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management. · A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets. · Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment. · We are looking for a candidate with 3+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, who has attained a Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field. They should also have experience using the following software/tools: Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases. Experience with enterprise data warehousing tools: Snowflake is preferred. Experience with data pipeline and workflow management tools: Airflow is preferred. Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python or Java is preferred. Experience with data infrastructure components including Kubernetes and Docker. Experience with DevOp practices, CI/CD. Experience with AWS cloud services: EC2, EMR, RDS, Redshift, Glue. Experience with Azure cloud services: Data Factory, Databricks, Blob Storage, Data Lake Storage. We believe that creating a diverse and inclusive organisation is fundamental to the way we deliver on our promise of creating essential partnerships and open opportunities. Our open culture is central to how we deliver our purpose - driving financial stability, empowering economies and enabling customers to create sustainable growth - in everything we do. Working with us means that you will be part of a dynamic organisation of 25,000 people across 70 countries. However, we will value your individuality and enable you to bring your true self to work so you can help enrich our diverse workforce. You will be part of a collaborative and creative culture where we encourage new ideas and are committed to sustainability across our global business. You will experience the critical role we have in helping to re-engineer the financial ecosystem to support and drive sustainable economic growth. Together, we are aiming to achieve this growth by accelerating the just transition to net zero, enabling growth of the green economy and creating inclusive economic opportunity. We offer a range of tailored benefits and support, including healthcare, retirement planning, paid volunteering days and wellbeing initiatives. We are proud to be an equal opportunities employer. This means that we do not discriminate on the basis of anyone's race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital status, veteran status, pregnancy or disability, or any other basis protected under applicable law. Conforming with applicable law, we can reasonably accommodate applicants' and employees' religious practices and beliefs, as well as any mental health or physical disability needs. Please take a moment to read this privacy notice carefully, as it describes what personal information we may hold about you, what it's used for, and how it's obtained, your rights and how to contact us as a data subject. If you are submitting as a Recruitment Agency Partner, it is essential and your responsibility to ensure that candidates applying to us are aware of this privacy notice.

Company: Siam Commercial Bank Public Co., Ltd. (SCB)
column8: Job Summary We're looking for a Security Program and Posture Management Specialist. In this role, you'll take charge of defining and maintaining our cybersecurity strategy. Your responsibilities will include overseeing cybersecurity transformation initiatives, managing programs, and closely tracking activities to guarantee that our cybersecurity posture consistently meets the agreed-upon standards set by our stakeholders. You'll also be responsible for ensuring that our cybersecurity aligns seamlessly with our planned security architecture and our cyber fraud application. Beyond this, you'll play a leadership role as a co-leader in the operations and execution of Threat Intelligence. Job Description: Co-lead/assist in cybersecurity priorities and strategy, reporting to Head of Cybersecurity Program & Posture Management Specialist Co-lead/assist in Cybersecurity Posture Management in coordination with other Technology Security leaders to guarantee that a good cybersecurity posture is consistently maintained at an acceptable level. Liaison with external audit, internal audit, financial crime and associated consultants, and the group firm for the establishment of cybersecurity programs Run program technical development for Cyber fraud prevention to strengthen application defense against cyber fraud Liaison with Business coordinators and Technology Security leadersto develop a roadmap for cybersecurity solution and platform replacement, including end-to-end asset life cycle management Liaison with Business coordinators and the other Technology Security team leaders for Cybersecurity service catalogue to third parties, as well as the end-to-end service billing scheme and tracking Co-lead/assist technology security team leaders/others in responding to cybersecurity incidents that have an impact on cybersecurity posture in order to guarantee quick reaction, tracking, and proper maintenance Co-Lead/Assisting Cybersecurity Threat intelligence operation and 3rd party cybersecurity posture monitoring and maintenance in collaboration with Security Team leaders and members. Publication and communication are required time-to-time for threat intelligence analysis and distribution for designated stakeholders. Co-Lead/Assist in R&D and innovation on cybersecurity technology and approaches for continuous cybersecurity uplift Analyze and assess personnel actions and KPIs pertaining to cybersecurity projects, initiatives for cybersecurity transformation, and cybersecurity activities that influence the maintenance of our cybersecurity posture and strategy. This evaluation encompasses both proactive and reactive measures Generate Ad Hoc Reports and Lead Communication Efforts. Prepare any necessary on-the-spot reports, take the lead in conducting briefings, craft presentations, compose speeches, and take responsibility for addressing a wide range of organizational and strategic cybersecurity posture matters and concerns Maintain and update the cybersecurity posture program and measurement dashboard to ensure ongoing progress and the current state of the posture Program Coordination Acts as the primary point of contact for cybersecurity programs and transformation projects that are critical to the functional and strategic success of Technology Security Supervise and lead the course of cybersecurity changes and cybersecurity elevating projects Provide strategic direction and oversight for cybersecurity projects, people capabilities, process improvement, and cybersecurity posture agendas Conducts project status meetings with the Head of Technology Security and the leadership team to support the organization's cybersecurity goals Qualification: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, MIS, Information Security or IT related field. At least 2-3 years of experience in information security or a related field Knowledge of security advisory, security technology selection & management, e.g. WAF, EDR, IAM, SOC, Security posture and Vulnerability Management are a plus Strong understanding of industry best practices and standards, including ISO 27001, NIST, and CIS are plus Excellent communication and problem-analytical skills, with the ability to communicate complex security issues to non-technical stakeholders. Effective English for verbal, written communication is a must Knowledge of cloud security Relevant certifications such as CISSP, CISM, or CISA are a plus Experience in Cybersecurity uplifting/ Transformation program management, Cybersecurity Leaders are plus Excellent English both written and verbal communication skills Energetic, good interpersonal skills

column8: Responsibilities: Oversees the day-to-day support, maintaining and monitoring for all IT operations on GMOZ Infrastructure. Ensure that system patch and anti-virus are updated for GMOZ servers, PCs and Laptops Manage IT Assets. Lead disaster recovery and business continuity planning efforts for the business's IT systems. Support external BCP/DR tests such as SET, Settrade etc. Manage security systems and assess security vulnerabilities to ensure that the information system are protected and prevented. Develop and implement IT and security training programs for employees to promote IT and security awareness and best practices. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree or higher degree in Computer Science, Technology, Engineering or related field. 0-2 years of experience on Infrastructure or System support. Have knowledge in operating systems (e.g., Windows Server, Linux), networking (TCP/IP network protocols), and cloud computing (AWS, Azure). column8: We are looking for Data Engineer is focused on designing, developing, and maintaining the data infrastructure and systems that support the collection, storage, processing, and analysis of large volumes.Providing insights to various stakeholders within the organization. Responsibilities Data Architecture: Design, develop, and maintain the overall data architecture and data pipeline systems to ensure efficient data flow and accessibility for analytical purposes. Data Integration: Integrate data from multiple sources, including point-of-sale systems, customer databases, e-commerce platforms, supply chain systems, and other relevant data sources, ensuring data quality and consistency. Data Modeling: Design and implement data models that are optimized for scalability, performance, and flexibility, taking into account business requirements and data analysis needs. Data Transformation and ETL: Develop and maintain efficient Extract, Transform, and Load (ETL) processes to transform raw data into a structured format suitable for analysis and reporting. Data Warehousing: Build and maintain data warehouses or data marts that enable efficient storage and retrieval of structured and unstructured data for reporting and analytics purposes. Data Governance and Security: Establish and enforce data governance policies and procedures, including data privacy and security measures, to ensure compliance with industry regulations and protect sensitive data. Data Quality and Monitoring: Implement data quality checks and monitoring mechanisms to identify and resolve data inconsistencies, anomalies, and issues in a timely manner. Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, business analysts, and software engineers, to understand their data needs, provide data solutions, and support their analytical initiatives. Performance Optimization: Optimize data processing and query performance to ensure efficient data retrieval and analysis, considering factors such as data volume, velocity, and variety. Documentation: Maintain documentation of data processes, data flows, data models, and system configurations, ensuring accuracy and accessibility for future reference. Qualifications Bachelor's or master's degree in computer science, information systems, or a related field. Strong programming skills in languages such as Python, SQL. C++ is plus. At least 3 year experience with data modeling, database design, and data warehousing concepts. Proficiency in working with relational databases (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL) and big data technologies (e.g., Hadoop, Spark, Hive). Familiarity with cloud-based data platforms, such as AWS. Knowledge of ETL tools and techniques for data integration and transformation. Understanding of data governance, data security, and regulatory compliance requirements. Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail. Strong communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple projects simultaneously. Location: BTS Ekkamai Working Day: Mon-Fri (WFA Every Friday)

Analyze, design and plan to provide technical solutions to management and business Report DX activity to top management Requirement : Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or MBA 8-10 experience in IT division on DX promotion (DX = Digital Transformation) At least 5 years’ Management experience in IT division on DX promotion Strong skill set in data warehousing, business intelligence, data modeling, data integration Strong knowledge in cloud technology, virtualization, RPA, mobile application, BotNet Experience in machine learning, AI, data science, e-commerce platform, IOT Knowledge and experience in K2 Platform , Smartform, SQL Server, Reporting Services English communication skills with TOEIC score 730 up (Be able to submit after getting offer) *All applications will be treated in strict confidence. Requirements; Strong analytical and problem-solving skill 3+ years of strong software development experience with problem-solving skills Sprint & Agile experience. IT educational background and work experience Service-minded Exposure to Node.JS, Java, my SQL is a plus Quick learner and ability to troubleshoot complex code issues Good communication skill Job Description; Troubleshoot and resolve issues and incidents that occurred Participate in the entire application lifecycle, focusing on coding and debugging Assist Tier 1 customer service representatives, Key Account CSMs, and the Channel Partner Team with escalated issues Determine root cause of errors/bugs -- use the data and tools we have to trace the origin of data inconsistencies and bugs and report them to the parties concerned Perform analysis of data to determine the impact and set the priority Gather and address technical and design requirements Liaise with developer designers and system administrators to identify new features Utilize tools developed by the software engineering team to resolve support issues. Speak with customers if needed for escalated, urgent inquiries to minimize customer churn Create and contribute to Knowledge base & documentation Accurate technical documents and ensure that our developers and related parties understand technical (Code review related) Provide technical training to other members of Support and teams within the company Assist Tier 1 agents with technical questions and provide constructive feedback for training purposes Others as assigned by the Supervisor Benefits: Working with a dynamic team, young people, you will have a chance to learn new skills and to gain valuable experience Performance Bonus Average at 1.5 month Provident Fund 6% of salary Annual Salary Increase 2 Times / Year Group InsuranceAccident (THB 9,000/Accident) IPD (THB 3,000/Day) OPD (THB 1,000/Call/Day) Dental (THB 3,000/Year) TGIF(Thanks God It’s Friday)Party THB 300 per week Notebook Provided Company Trip Annual Leaves 10 Days / Year Passing Toeic speaking, you will get 2,000THB/ month (Add to your salary) AppMan Co.,Ltd. 2525, FYI Center building, Tower 2, 8th floor, Unit 801-807, Rama 4 Road, Khwaeng Klongtoey, Khet Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110

The role of Service Delivery Manager oversees the coordination of multidisciplinary IT functional teams in the governance, assurance and improvement in service delivery. With an eye for perfection, and attention to detail and the ability to influence people the role will oversee IT service improvements in ITIL, in KPI, help to shape Service level agreements and service delivery. Key responsibilities The role will need to listen to customer feedback, to be capable of negotiating packages of work for service improvement. The service improvements will be picked up to manage by a project manager where the Service Delivery Manager helps to steer the governance, metrics and return on the efforts made. The role will analyse service reports from other functional teams, to identify trends, problems and set out internal improvement objectives. The Service Delivery Management will need to be able to present findings and updates to senior management. The candidate will need to demonstrate a can do attitude, is goal orientated to see objectives through to their conclusion. The role is a position of influence binding many teams together in successful service delivery Key requirement Graduate Degree in computer science, information technology, or similar field, plus recent computer application programming experience, or an equivalent combination of education and experience. 8 years of experience as an IT professional 2 years of experience as a team leader Strong knowledge of IT Service Management Experience presenting, negotiating with customers and senior stakeholders ITIL Qualified v3 /v4 – mandatory Project management – desirable IT security awareness – desirable Datacenter, cloud, workplace, network fundamental knowledge - desirable IT governance/assurance background - desirable Customer & stakeholder management skills Good presentation skills Negotiation and assertiveness skills Continuous improvement mindset Attention to detail and ability to analyse data Innovative thinker Good skills in both excel and PowerPoint to support customer discussions. ServiceNow knowledge – optional/desirable Fluent in English

Provide solutions to customers via phone. Record incident/ticket in Jira system management tool. Problem management Provide remote diagnostic to customer system Monitor progress of calls Escalate call which exceed the “Service Level Agreement” criteria Reporting Prepare call log data for manage service report Maintenance of call log data Manage and document end user manual On-site service Provide engineering on-site service according to SLA. Maintain inventory of IT hardware and software IMACD (Install, Move, Add, Change, Delete) Qualifications: Bachelor’s Degree in computer engineering or any related fields. 1-5 year in service and support of Computer equipment, Basic Network, IT Service management. Knowledge in Windows Server, MS SQL would be advantage. Good communication. Work on shift. Ability to work flexible. Service-mind and interpersonal skill is a must. Here, we are very open where you can communicate to anyone, express any opinions, as we believe that there are no boundaries and possibilities are limitless. Jobtitle: Data Development Manager/ผู้จัดการฝ่ายพัฒนาข้อมูล
column8: Responsibilities: ควบคุมและตรวจสอบ Master data ให้ถูกต้องตามมนโยบายที่บริษัทกำหนด พัฒนาโปรแกรมที่เกี่ยวข้องกับทำงานให้มีความรวดเร็ว ใช้งานง่ายและตอบโจทย์การใช้งานของแต่ละส่วนงาน รับผิดชอบในการ Migrate data ขึ้นระบบ ประสานงานและแก้ปัญหาที่เกี่ยวข้องกับ Master data รายงานผลและจัดทำรายงานให้ผู้บังคับบัญชา แก้ไขและปรับปรุง Process ที่เป็นความเสี่ยงในการทำงานที่จะทำให้ Master ผิดพลาด กำหนดนโยบายการทำงานที่เกี่ยวข้องกับ Master data เพื่อให้ได้ข้อมูลที่ถูกต้องและลดความเสี่ยงของการผิดพลาดข้อมูล Qualification: วุฒิการศึกษา  : ปริญญาตรีขึ้นไป สาขาวิทยาการคอมพิวเตอร์/วิศวกรรมคอมพิวเตอร์ / เศรษฐศาสตร์ / สถิติ หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ทำงานที่เกี่ยวข้องกับ Data Engineer และการจัดการข้อมูล มีความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับกระบวนการและพัฒนาระบบ มีทักษะในการจัดการและปรับปรุงข้อมูล มีความคิดวิเคราะห์และการแก้ไขปัญหา ทักษะการสื่อสารที่ดีเพื่อสื่อสารกับทีมทำงานและกับผู้บริหาร Contact : K.Wanna ( 087-6553722 ) DOHOME COMPANY LIMITED 60 Dindaeng Road, SamsenNai, Phayathai, Bangkok  10400

Job Description พัฒนาโปรแกรมระบบ Web and Mobile application, Oracle Developer, PL/SQL ตาม Project ที่ได้รับมอบหมายตามระยะเวลาที่กำหนดและให้เกิดประสิทธิภาพสูงสุด รับข้อกำหนดและความต้องการของ System Analyst หรือ ผู้ใช้งาน พัฒนา,แก้ไข,ทดสอบ,ติดตั้ง, อบรม และสนับสนุนการใช้งาน สามารถแนะนำและแก้ไขปัญหาในการใช้งานซอฟต์แวร์ประยุกต์ได้ ดูแลระบบฐานข้อมูล และค้นคว้าวิจัยเทคโนโลยีใหม่ๆ Qualifications: •วุฒิปริญญาตรีขึ้นไปในสาขา Computer Science, Computer Engineering, IT หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้อง มีประสบการณ์ในการพัฒนาweb application/ mobile application (Javascript,  React.js, Node.js, SQL, NoSQL, PHP, VB.net,  JSP, C++, SQL Server, Oracle, Unix) ความสามารถในการทำงานภายใต้ความกดดันและข้อจำกัดด้านเวลา ทักษะการวิเคราะห์และการแก้ปัญหาที่ดี Benefit: กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ จัดสรร % สมทบตามอายุงาน ทำงานสัปดาห์ละ 5 วัน โบนัสประจำปีตามผลประกอบการ งานเลี้ยงสังสรรค์ตามเทศกาลสำคัญประจำปี วันพักร้อนประจำปี เริ่มต้น 6 วันต่อปี  สูงสุด  20 วันต่อปี

Job Summary You will be responsible for overseeing the planning and implementation of an entire project through budgeting, managing project human resources, sourcing suppliers and planning the project release. Key Responsibilities Drives the project teams across all technical and functional areas to achieve the project goals. This should include forming, recruiting, selecting, coaching, counselling, delegating, scheduling and disciplining employees. Enforces project financial discipline, including budget allocation and presentation, and payment milestones and assists financial department on billing/collection. Meets project financial objectives / KPI, by forecasting requirements, preparing project budget in its entirety, scheduling expenditures including OPE, analyzing the financial impact variances and initiating corrective actions. The project manager will also work alongside the Project Director and HOD on other project management related duties, which include but are not limited to participating in assisting the delivery team, sales, and solutions to organize company level project evaluation work. Qualifications At least 5 years of Project Management working experience in the related field. Possesses Core Banking and IT background are required. Possesses fluent understanding and application of end-to-end Project Management methodology, deliverables in SDLC processes. Certified as Project Management Professional (PMP) is added advantage. Experience in managing Global Team is definitely advantage. Working language: Fluent English and Thai in both Written and Speaking.

Job Description Manage and develop databases in Excel by integrating data from multiple sources to support business analysis. Forecast sales volume under various scenarios Analyze customer data, market trend and compettitor activity to support business decision. Produce presentation about business performance and present to management. Manage and develop customer data in excel spreadsheet. Prepare documents related to financial campaign. Promptly to support ad-hoc. Qualifications Bachelor's degree or higher in Business, Finance, Economics, or a related field Strong business acumen. Good logical thinking and a positive attitude toward problem-solving. Good presentation skills. Intermediate to advanced proficiency in Microsoft Office, especially in Excel and PowerPoint. Ability to work effectively under pressure and consistently deliver results on time. Able to communicate in English both written and spoken. We offers attractive remuneration packages (bonus, provident fund, medical allowance, yearly physical check up, Honda car hire purchase etc.) Only short-listed candidates will be notified. Interested applications should send an application letter and resume including full details of work experience, expected salary and a recent photograph via "Apply Now" Human Resources Section Honda Leasing (Thailand) Co.,Ltd 4345 Bhiraj Tower at Bitec, 25th Floor, Sukhumvit Road, Bang Na Tai, Bang na, Bangkok, 10260 Website : http://www.hondaleasing.co.th All applications will be treated in strict confidence

JD/Success profile: Scrum master Be a servant leader and coaches an agile team to achieve squad objectives Responsibilities Coach team on Agile practices and encourage adaptation and iteration and an environment that fosters Agile Collaborate across teams in IT and the business as required to remove impediments and deliver on time for all Sprints Ensure deliverables have met quality standards at the end of each sprint Facilitate sprint planning, daily stand-up meetings, reviews/demos, retrospectives, and release planning meetings Track and communicate team commitments, velocity and sprint/release progress Coach and support continuous improvement within the team Key skills Significant experience acting as a servant leader in a fast-moving tech environment Good knowledge of Agile principles and the flexibility to adapt their experience to new and evolving environments Experience making teams accountable and motivated to strive for continuous improvement Scrum Master certification is beneficial Can communicate in English effectively Passionate problem solver  who  succeeds in ambiguous situations Active coach and mentor whose goals are to grow and maximize the team’s potential Strong communication skills with ability to communicate complex messages and teach new  concepts Passionate about understanding people / teams in various  stages of Agile environment Believes in a non-hierarchical culture of collaboration, transparency, and trust across the  team Relevant education background from a reputed university

Responsibilities - Working with team to design overall customer experience and features for product and services by analysing business requirement, conducting user research and prototyping. - Managing product backlog and release plan based on Minimum Viable Product. Creating software requirement document for software development including acceptance criteria. - Acting as product owner and represent the customers during development stage. This includes tracking software development progress as well as cost. Requirements - Bachelor’s Degree or higher in any subject. We welcome every discipline. - At leate 3 years of work experience . - Ability to understand and translate complex subject into easy-to-understand documents and diagrams such as flow diagram and service blueprints. - Basic understanding of software development life cycle (SDLC). - Good communication skills in both written and verbal. - Good command of English is a plus.

Responsibilities Develop test scenarios and test cases by automated testing tool including provide test data requirements based on functional design & business processes for automation scripts. Determine test peripheral requirements. Execute all levels of testing (System, Integration, and Regression) Execute test according to test execution plan and document test execution results. Log defects including provide required information. Qualifications Bachelor's degree in computer science, computer engineering, IT or a related field. Experience 1 - 3 years in related fields Background in application testing, system testing concept and/or software testing methodologies would be an advantage. Experience inTest automation tool, Robot Framework, test script creation and modification. Good analytical, problem solving, prioritization, decision-making and conflict resolution skills are required. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment with minimal supervision. Excellent interpersonal and communication skills. A good command in English.

Responsibilities Serve clients in terms of marketing and advertising supports in order to build clients' brands in the market successfully Co-operate with both internal and external parties to complete services Present effective marketing and advertising support activities to clients Report current situation/performance to clients' top executives Follow up job progress, control time schedule, manage/propose budget Arrange meeting, prepare agenda, manage client expectation, and summarize the minute of meeting Maintain good relationship with clients and team Qualification Bachelor/Master Degree in Communication Arts or Marketing or Advertising or Related Fields At least 2-5 years experience in Digital Marketing Agency is a must! Good communication in Thai (English is an advantage) Strong communication and presentation (storytelling) skills Pleasant personality and service mind Energetic, well handle multi-tasking, self-motivated, and looking for a challenge Excellent problem solving, positive thinking, reasonable decision making, willing to collaborate with people

Job Description ตรวจสอบการออกแบบระบบสารสนเทศและการทำงานของผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชาบริหารเป้าหมาย KPI ของแผนก ให้บริการแก่ลูกค้าทั้งภายในและภายนอก ศึกษา นำเสนอ กำหนดมาตรฐานเกี่ยวกับเครื่องคอมพิวเตอร์ อุปกรณ์ต่อพ่วง ระบบงาน IT Infrastructure เครือข่ายและเครื่องแม่ข่ายที่ให้บริการผู้ใช้งาน ปฏิบัติงานให้สอดคล้องกับมาตรฐานการทำงาน SOX, Honda Policy, GITSP, GCP, GPP, กฎหมาย ดำเนินการตามโครงการทางด้านสารสนเทศและดูแลทีมงาน จัดทำ System Design, Backup System and Recovery Manual ของระบบทางด้านสารสนเทศ ประสานงานกับ IT Outsource ในการดำเนินการต่างๆเกี่ยวกับสารสนเทศเช่น Data Center, DR site, Off-side backup media เป็นต้น จัดทำรายงานรายวัน การดำเนินการตรวจสอบระบบทางด้านสารสนเทศทั้งสถานะ ประสิทธิภาพ รวมถึงปัญหาและการแก้ไข ดำเนินการอบรมเพื่อเพิ่มทักษะและความรู้ของระบบสารสนเทศให้กับทีมงานและพนักงาน การจัดการควบคุม Hardware และ Software รวมถึงการต่ออายุ MA และซื้อใบอนุญาต License ดูแลเรื่องระบบ HA, Backup ทั้งในส่วนของการกำหนด ดูแล การทดสอบการ Restore การจัดเก็บ Backup media วางแผนและจัดเตรียมการทดสอบ แผนสำรอง (Disaster Recovery Plan) ดำเนินงานตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายจากผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชา ปฏิบัติงานตาม Role Assignment (SOX,ITGC) Job Competencies ความรู้ (Knowledge) มีความรู้เกี่ยวกับ SOX มีความรู้เกี่ยวกับธุรกิจเช่าซื้อ มีความรู้เกี่ยวกับการทำแผนสำรอง Disaster Recovery Plan (DRP) และ HA ทักษะ (Skills) -      มีความเข้าใจ Windows Server, AS400, Linux, SQL Server, Oracle, DB2, AD, Radius, Firewall, Web Server, Router, Network, VPN, WAN, WLAN, VMWare, SAN, DLP, Antivirus, Endpoint Control -      มีความเข้าใจ มีประสบการณ์ในการ Backup/Restore (Symantec, EMC, Veritas, Acronis, Arc Server หรืออื่นๆและการ Clone images -      มีความเข้าใจ User Management และการกำหนดสิทธิ์ในระบบงานต่างๆ เช่น Windows OS, SQL Server, DB2, AS400 เป็นต้น -      มีประสบการณ์ในการทำ Hardening Security, IIS, SQL Server, EDI, E-Doc, CRM, Telephony, VoIP -      มีความรู้ทางด้านการออกแบบระบบที่มีความเสถียร และมีความปลอดภัยสูง -      มีความสามารถจัดทำเอกสาร วิเคราะห์และนำเสนอโครงการได้ มีประสบการณ์ในการติดต่อประสานงาน IT Outsource

The Role As a Senior Agile Project Manager, you will be responsible for providing strong background in Agile methodologies, project management, and software development. You will lead the delivery of agile product teams as well as traditional projects. This includes acting as a scrum master for a scrum team, but also managing and reporting progress on the deliverables as a traditional project manager. Responsibilities Lead and Coach Agile Teams -Take charge of the Scrum team, ensuring they adhere to Scrum methodology and practices.-Provide guidance to the  product owner and development team to ensure on-time delivery and customer satisfaction. Promote Self-Organization -Encourage and lead the Scrum team in self-organization, fostering an environment where team members take responsibility and make decisions collectively. Impediment Resolution -Identify and remove impediments that hinder the team's progress. Coach the Scrum team on problem-solving and overcoming obstacles. Agile Framework Development -Collaborate with the Scrum and development teams to identify and address gaps in the Agile framework. -Continuously improve Agile processes. Conflict Resolution -Proactively resolve conflicts and issues within the team, promoting a harmonious and productive work environment. Scrum Maturity -Work towards improving the team's level of Scrum maturity, helping them become more effective and efficient in their processes. Support Product Owner -Offer support to the product owner as needed, ensuring alignment with Agile principles and practices. Team Protection -As an experienced Scrum Master, protect the team from internal and external negative influences, enabling them to focus on their tasks. Progress Reporting -Regularly report on the team's performance and the completion of deliverables to stakeholders. Risk Management -Track and manage issues and risks related to the team's deliverables, taking proactive steps to mitigate them. Decision Documentation -Document and manage key decisions that impact the team's work, ensuring transparency and accountability. Contractual Compliance -Monitor and track deliverables against contractual agreements, ensuring compliance and timely delivery. Qualifications Native Thai speaker is mandatory, and a good command of written and spoken English is essential. Minimum 5 years of experience in delivering both Agile and non-Agile projects as a Scrum Master or Project Manager. Proven experience in managing project teams and achieving project goals. Thorough understanding of Agile and Scrum principles, with a track record of successfully implementing them in real- world projects. Highly structured, detail-oriented, and well-organized. Outstanding communication skills, both written and verbal. Ability to adapt to a dynamic and changing environment. Self-starter who can work independently and prioritize tasks effectively. Familiarity with both Agile and Waterfall Project Management practices. Scrum Master Certification is required, and additional Project Management certifications such as PMI or Prince are advantageous. Experience working with enterprise clients, financial services, and large-scale custom software projects. Experience with scaled Scrum (e.g., SAFe) is an advantage. Benefits: 10(15) days annual paid vacation Flexible working hours Hybrid working policy Health insurance Life insurance Provident fund Learning support Free Lunch every Tuesday & Thursday An office in the heart of Bangkok, connected with MRT Queen Sirikit station International work environment with over 20 different nationalities in the team Working with a wide and interesting portfolio of clients in SEA and globally Help with the international relocation, VISA and work permit process from start to finish Opportunity to visit events and conferences Standard perks such as free drinks and snacks in the office, team activities, trips and great parties

Job Purpose Build the Supply Chain Network models (digital twins) for strategic and tactical network optimisation. Integrate network design models in the regional supply chain functions to ensure repeatable review of supply chain network design and configuration. Develop the capability for Supply Chain network design and Supply Chain strategy in AkzoNobel by setting standards for modelling and data management as well as developing people. Support various network optimisation projects across AkzoNobel, based on ISC and business needs. Key Accountabilities Perform projects to develop Supply Chain network models and optimisations for Akzo Nobel: •     Identify Supply Chain and business requirements for network models •     Data collection, validation and modelling •     Develop and validate baseline Network model (operational and financial validation) •     Run optimisation network scenarios (Unconstraint & constraint) •     Run standard what-if scenarios •     Run iterative inventory optimisation model versus optimised and selected what if scenarios •     Report key model outcome by scenario (using PowerBI) •     Operational changes •     Impact on Supply chain performance indicators (tbc): •     Lead time /service •     Reliability / Risk •     Supply chain costs •     Material cost •     Manufacturing cost •     Outbound Logistics cost •     Inventory •     SLOBS •     Carbon emission •     Define and prioritise top network change initiatives for implementation •     Business case preparation, presentation of its outcomes and recommendations to stakeholders Develop process and requirements for creating a standardised Supply Chain network flow model (digital twin) across Akzo Nobel that covers: •     Define data requirements (templates) and process for creating and updating the network flow model, allow for inclusion of: •     Customer segmentation •     Product segmentation •     Define standard scenarios for identifying the optimal supply chain Network and testing sensitivities and network options, to be used on a periodic basis with model refresh •     Define reporting requirements of model outputs (using PowerBI) •     Define process and capability to optimise inventory considering modelled optimised network. Use of iterative process with separate tool / module Experience Experience with supply chain network design optimisation tools - Lamasoft SC Guru, AIMMS, Anylogic Master or advanced university degree. Preferably in technical, data sciences, or supply chain management 5+ years supply chain management and planning experience for a multinational company Excellent knowledge of databases, data processes, IT infrastructure, data modelling, and complex analysis Good to have experience on below tools: Data preparation/ transformation using Azure SQL, Alteryx Data visualization – Power BI, Tableau, SAP Analytics Cloud Working knowledge of SAP systems – ERP – standard tables, Tcodes, reports, BEX Analyzer, Analysis for Office Proven project experience with developing regional manufacturing & distribution network models. Team player strong in creating structure, timely, high quality deliverables Optimization practitioner with strong experience of strategic and tactical optimization - knowledge of the principles of optimization and how optimization is performed using software packages, familiarity with network optimization, inventory optimization, product flow analysis, operations planning, and cost to serve analysis.

Jobtitle: Solutions Engineer (Software Industry: Middle - Senior Level)
column8: Your impact: The Senior Solutions Engineer role is a leadership position that is responsible for leading and mentoring the solutions engineer team members, as well as providing technical expertise, solution consultant and support to the sales team, the implementation and customers. He/she is also responsible for ensuring that the team is equipped with the necessary technical skills and knowledge to provide effectively to the team. Your team: The Solutions engineer team is responsible for the sales process by providing technical expertise and support to the sales team. The main responsibility is to assist sales representatives in understanding the technical aspects of the company's products and services, and how they can be used to meet customer needs. We also help to create and deliver presentations, tech proposals and product demonstrations, and provide technical information and answers to customer questions. Additionally, we  conduct research on new technologies and products, and stay up-to-date on industry trends to provide the sales team with relevant information to close deals. We work closely with other departments, such as the implementation team, engineering, product management, and customer support teams to ensure that the company's products and services are well-positioned in the market and deliver the project smoothly. We are also responsible for ensuring that sales teams are equipped with the necessary technical skills and knowledge to sell the company's products and services effectively. Your day-to-day responsibilities: Collaboratively with customers (Enterprises and SMEs) for gathering business requirements, provide technical solutions to solve client use cases, do man-day and total cost estimation for project development. Work closely with sales team in regards to technical proposals and pitches to enterprise customers Put together technical cases (diagram, RFP, and proposals) for the sales teams to support their proposals Provide consultation to the customers on product best practices, use cases, customization, on-boarding, and to be 2nd tier on tech support for investigating cases (need some coding) before escalating to product and engineering team. Ensure that the company’s services can meet the customer’s requirements Initiate, coordinate, implement proof-of-concepts, do basic training with customers Working closely with Professional service teams for Kick-off meetings and Implementing phase. Work closely with the Product/Engineering team for feedback, customer requests, improvement. Initiate/Maintain development for Demo apps and Beta services under the Professional service team. Building and maintaining strong relationships with key customers, partners and stakeholders. Your ideal profile: Background in software sales/pre-sales engineering role experience Sales or pre-sales experience in enterprise, retail or financial services verticals At least 1-3 years of programming experience on at least one of the following stacks: Javascript, NodeJS, Python, ReactJS, VueJS, NextJS - Mobile skills such as Swift, Kotlin, React-native, Flutter a plus Experience, utilizing, understanding and implementation of RESTful, SOAP and SDK API (Bot and etc.) Experience using database (eg. ElasticSearch, MongoDB, etc.) Understanding of IT networking, infrastructure, cloud platforms (such as AWS, GCP, Firebase,Azure) and security. Strong verbal and written skill in Thai and English language Very strong communication and client management skills Ability to explain complex information in simple and clear terms to a non-technical person Flexible, self-learning, self-motivated, team-player, willing to work in a dynamic and fast-paced environment What’s in it for you: Check out more about our company, Bangkok team and our benefits -  https://www.amity.co/career/bangkok Office Location: True Digital Park near BTS Punnawithi Work Policy: Hybrid (1 week at office, 3 weeks work from anywhere) Find out more about us at https://www.amitysolutions.com

column8: POSITION: SECURITY PLATFORM MANAGEMENT ENGINEER WHY WORK WITH US KBTG is a tech organization in Southeast Asia that focuses on digital business innovation. It branched off from KBank, one of Thailand's leading commercial banks, and aims to become the best tech organization in the region. KBTG is committed to revolutionizing financial experiences by developing and innovating financial technologies with a "Customer First" mindset and new generation thinking. Its vision is to become the future of digital banking, empowering customers with easy, quick, and secure access to all financial services in every ecosystem. WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT FROM US We value our people and aim to attract, develop and retain exceptional talent. We work in a truly agile and collaborative environment where opinions are actively encouraged. …. we have no time for finger-pointing and politics; instead, we test & learn and celebrate successes as a team. We will provide a training and coaching program to all our team members tailored to your development needs and aspirations. This can cover a wide range of skills, like mastering new technologies, developing your skills in presenting to a non-technical audience, or supporting your growth in a leadership position. DIVERSITY, EQUITY & INCLUSION AT KBTG Our DE&I policy is the synergy of our employees’ diverse genders, generations, races, cultures, backgrounds, experiences, perspectives, and practices to create a work environment where differences are respected and valued to achieve the organization’s vision of becoming a leader in digital infrastructure that fully connects people, organizations, economies, and societies to create sustainable value for life. WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING Junior - Senior. In this role, you will be a key person for the overall CSOC architecture design and integration between the various platforms and components. You will be testing and building new, or updating existing, automation within CSOC technologies and integration between such technologies, including the larger set of systems and applications within KBank. Identify, evaluate, design new systems and technologies and provide security engineering guidance and recommendations. Work with the Threat Intelligence team to develop the technical design of the use case to be implemented in the SIEM Develop reporting dashboards and track key performance indicators. Collaborate with the security monitoring team to improve the performance of the CSOC operations and assist in incident response and remediation efforts Evaluate and select appropriate technology solutions to meet CSOC consumer needs. Work with other CSOC services to design automation and integration that meets their needs. Work with the CSOC Architect to test and fine tune the technical design of the use case to be implemented in the SIEM Document CSOC technology platform architecture and deployments Perform day-to-day CSOC log management platform administration tasks including configuration management, patch management, updates and testing, fine tuning, etc. Create searches, reports, dashboards and visualization. Manage all security and other data collected and stored by the CSOC. Implement, configure and onboard new data source. WHAT YOU NEED TO SUCCEED Bachelor's Degree in a related field such as Information Security, Management or Computer Engineering Platform-specific certification is preferred Extensive experience with the design, development, implementation and management of security analytics, threat intelligence, security use case management and other CSOC and information security platforms Working knowledge and expertise in various leading security technology and product e.g. Splunk, ThreatQ, FortiSOAR, Exabeam, or Sentinel. At least 2-10 years of relevant experience in Cyber Security, Security Architecture, with minimum of four years in the design and implementation of a SIEM Experience working in a Cyber Security Operations Centre (CSOC), Managed Security Service (MSS), Cloud security, enterprise network environment Excellent written and oral communication skills Excellent organizational and time management skills BENEFIT AND PERKS Group Insurance, Annual Physical Check-Up, Spending Account 6,000/ year, Flexible Benefit, Provident Fund 13%, Housing Loan, Maternity Allowance, KBTG, Business Travel Benefits Policy, Leave and Vacation, Grab for Business, KBTG Academy (Skillane Training Class), Nap room. Talent Acquisition, KBTG Know us more via http://www.kbtg.tech *All applications will be accepted by mail or attached in MS. Word or PDF only.*

Regional Service Manager (Chonburi) Job Description: The Regional Service Manager, Southeast Asia (SEA), provides technical support in SEA region to a wide variety of customers, including service companies, coin store owners, route operators, distributors, homestyle customers & special accounts. The position is responsible for providing technical support and training on all types of equipment The company current or previously manufactured or distributed and acts as a liaison between factory on field matters relating to service, service parts and warranty items. Conducts training schools on-site with customers on product service procedures for current and discontinued products. Provides on-site assistance and assists with factory schools when necessary. Maintains regular contact with customers by telephone, in writing and in person. Determines appropriate action plans in response to customer needs, problems or emergencies. Regularly advises Customer Experience Manager - APAC on technical service matters. Qualifications: University technical degree in an Engineering discipline, Electrical, Electronics or Mechanics is highly preferred; consideration will be given for years of experience in field. Minimum two years experience in commercial appliance repair. Experience servicing commercial laundry equipment (washers and dryers) is preferred. University technical degree in an Engineering discipline, Electrical, Electronics or Mechanics is highly preferred; consideration will be given for years of experience in field. High degree of computer skills, including experience using Microsoft Office Excel and Word. Service mind. Understand customer issue and willing to assist. Strong ability to work independently and manage workload effectively. Strong verbal and written communication skills in Thai and English. Practical mechanical and electrical skills Ability to correct installation of gas, steam, and electric installations. Have some background in electricity, mechanics, and electronics. Ability to work with others, assertive and diplomatic Must be able to travel up to 70 % + time. ManpowerGroup Thailand - Eastern Seaboard Branch 143/165 Moo 12 T. Nong-prue, A. Banglamung Chonburi 20260 Attn: K. Nantawan Racha Tel: 033 - 135014 Ext. 3408 Cell phone 0811048990 Nantawan.r @manpower.co.th www.manpower.th.com

17:00 Mon - Fri Probation period: 89 days Interviews held 2 times ( English & Computer Test and is required) Interested candidates are invited to email us your complete CV or Resume in English, stating qualifications, current and expected salary:

About Bluebik – Ambition to Reality Bluebik is the leading consultancy focusing on comprehensive advice on digital transformation to transform the capabilities of our clients through technological application. We provide transformation consulting consists of Management Consulting – advice on strategies and management, Digital Excellence & Delivery covering in-depth recommendations on digital and technological development within organizations, Strategic PMO – advice on tangible benefits and significant cost saving through clients’ business process, Big Data & Advanced Analytics – provide end to end solution for Big Data & Advanced Analytics from strategy to implementation. Role Description: The Senior SAP Consultant is a pivotal role in our organization, responsible for providing expert guidance and leadership in SAP implementation projects. With a solid background in SAP and a minimum of 2 full cycle project implementation experience, this role involves collaborating closely with clients to understand their business requirements and configuring SAP solutions to meet their needs. Additionally, the Senior SAP Consultant is expected to mentor and advise junior consultants, sharing their knowledge and experience. In this role, the ability to step out of one's comfort zone and continuously learn about new SAP technologies is crucial. As SAP evolves, staying current and adapting to innovative solutions is essential for success. What you will do: Project Delivery: In the realm of project delivery, you'll play an integral role within project teams, occasionally assuming leadership responsibilities. Your core duties encompass the comprehensive management of your module, including its seamless integration with external systems and solutions. This entails a spectrum of activities, from dissecting business requirements and system design to configuration, customization, implementation, testing, training, data migration facilitating the Go-live phase, and extending support post-implementation. Collaboration and Client Engagement: Work closely with stakeholders and clients of all levels, including team members and supervisors, to comprehend their needs and expectations. By actively engaging with clients, you will ensure that the deliverables surpass their expectations. Problem-Solving & User Experience Empathy: Your role involves exploring innovative methodologies to address complex challenges. Your creative problem-solving skills will prove instrumental in developing unique and impactful solutions. Moreover, you will maintain a keen focus on enhancing the user experience, prioritizing the optimization of user interactions and overall usability. Grow into a Leader: Your journey as a leader entail nurturing professional growth and knowledge-sharing initiatives among your colleagues and junior consultants through mentorship and guidance. Participate in Pre-Sales Activities: You'll collaborate with Presales consultants to assess the viability of proposed solutions. Your role involves scrutinizing effort estimates to ensure alignment with project scope and additional business requisites during the proposal phase. Additionally, you'll occasionally take the lead in presenting proposal and solution approaches within your designated module during pitching sessions. Qualifications & Skills: Bachelor's Degree or higher degree Excellent knowledge and extensive work experience in any of FI  CO, MM, WM, SD, PP, QM, PM module Skilled in requirement gathering, blueprint design, configuration, customization, testing, training, data migration, and maintenance of mentioned modules. At least 2 full cycle project implementations/upgrades. Has integration knowledge with other SAP modules and third-party systems. Has a high understanding of the business processes, standards & regulations, and solutions of related applications relevant to his/her area of responsibility. Strong written and verbal communication, presentation, client service and technical writing skills in both, Thai and English. Nice-to-have: ABAP development knowledge is an advantage (i.e. debugging, simple code creation, etc.) Nice-to-have: Possessing a SAP Certificate is a beneficial asset. Nice-to-have: Experience with S/4HANA Cloud Transformation is advantageous. Nice-to-have: Willingness to explore and adapt to new SAP Solutions, even if it means stepping out of your comfort zone. Please submit a project experience overview together with your CV. If you don't meet all the requirements, that's perfectly fine. We encourage you to apply anyway as we are eager to learn more about you and appreciate your can-do attitude . Why work with us We are a team of experts in a talented community, a collaborative atmosphere where creativity is encouraged. First , by putting people at the heart of our priorities, we foster a work environment where you can excel and grow personally and professionally. Bluebik strives for growth and expansion, and you can be part of our success story. We combine strategy, digital delivery excellence and deep technology advisory to help our clients transform their business. At Bluebik, your career advancement starts with actions . You can manage your own career and will advance based on performance. We collaborate to create unique and outstanding experiences with our talents to empower learning and growth opportunities. Whatever your ambitions, Bluebik offers you a highly inclusive community of talents from both tech and business worlds to realize your full potential. What we offer We offer impactful and challenging work with mentorship and support from direct managers and subject matter experts. You will have autonomy to manage your career path with endless opportunities for professional growth. Our comprehensive benefit package covers medical insurance, life, accident and disability insurance, wellness allowance, vaccination allowance, providence fund, flexible working arrangement, and Professional certification. Bluebik provides opportunities to become the best version of yourself! Equal opportunity Bluebik is an equal opportunity employer. We owe our success to the talents of our diverse team and the varying perspectives they add to our thriving community. Recruitment agencies Bluebik does not accept unsolicited resumes sent by recruiting agencies. Please do not forward resumes to our job postings, Bluebik employees or other parts of the business. Bluebik will not be liable to pay any fees to agencies for candidates hired as a result of unrequested resumes.

Responsibilities - Define project scope, timelines, and budgets. - Develop and maintain detailed project plans using relevant methodologies (e.g., Agile, Scrum). - Manage tasks, dependencies, and risks effectively. - Track progress, identify potential issues, and implement corrective actions. - Clearly communicate project progress, challenges, and decisions to stakeholders. - Manage expectations and address concerns. - Facilitate and support to product owners, developers, designers, QA testers, and other stakeholders. - Work effectively with the development team to understand technical roadblocks and solutions. - Conduct regular team meetings and reports. - Stay up-to-date with the latest mobile technologies and trends. Qualifications - Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Project Management, or a related field. - Minimum 2+ years of experience managing software development projects. - Experience with Agile methodologies (e.g. Scrum) is a strong plus. - Possess a strong understanding of the software development lifecycle (including design, development, testing, deployment, and maintenance). - Excellent leadership, communication, and organizational skills. - Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to explain complex technical matters to non-technical users. - Proven ability to build and maintain strong relationships with stakeholders. - Ability to prioritize, multitask, and manage time effectively. - Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment. - Passion for technology and innovation. **How to Apply:* * Interested candidates are invited to submit their resume,  to sarawan.w @ 360qm.co.th  for more information please line/call 065-232-4155

Job Descriptions Developing applications in accordance with life cycle software development. Participating with requirement gathering and requirement analysis with advice and/or recommendation. Clearly understanding all system requirements, in term of flow, workflow, data, platform, and technology that need for development. Reviewing and analyzing needs and product requirements with suggestion (if needed) to create a completed system structure design. Preparing development methodology/process that fit to designed system. Identifying measures or indicators of system performance and the actions needed to improve or correct performance, relative to the goals of the system. Determining how a system should work and how changes in conditions, operations, and the environment will affect outcomes. Qualifications Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, MIS, IT, or related fields. At least experience 5 years in Developer, Software Engineer, or related fields. Proficient understanding of programming language, Python and Java is a must. Proficient understanding of database, including PostgreSQL, MongoDB, SQL. Proficient understanding of cross-browser compatibility issues and ways to work around them. Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as GitHub/GitLab or SVN. Mobile application development skill (iOS and Android) would be advantaged.
